story:
We heard your voice, and now we are launching the latest generation of the smart visual cleaner,  Bebird N3 Pro. By using high-tech robotic arm technology, we make sure that your expectations are exceeded in a new way. Our motto remains the same: To offer the simplest solution for ear cleaning in the safest way.

All of Backer's feedback is valuable for us.  Because of your suggestion, we can continue to improve and upgrade our products and try our best to give you the perfect experience.

The bebird N3 Pro brings a fresh design to the most important self-care you do most often and makes it easier than ever. Unlike the previous generation, the new Bebird N3 Pro ear scoops will not fall off and it's more secured. 

The newly designed 10 million pixels HD camera improves clarity and enhances the accuracy of eliminating every single buildup.

Integrated with robotic arm technology, the Bebird N3 Pro redefines ear cleaning in an innovative way. When the safety tweezer is opened, it extracts the ear wax in the ears seamlessly. When the tweezer is closed, the ear spoon automatically becomes a smart visual ear cleaning rod.

Equipped with three different sizes: small, medium, and large opening, you can adjust the degree of the tweezer opening to fit the size of your ear canal. 

With an upgrade of 10 million pixels and 3.7mm lens length, the Bebird N3 Pro offers more precise cleaning and greater accuracy in ear wax removal.

View the smallest details in your ear canal in real-time with the high-definition camera and simplify your ear care. It's that easy.

Clean your ears precisely in all directions with 360° angle detection. The 6-Axis Smart Gyroscope consists of an accurate measurement that will detect the slightest movement of the cleaning tweezer.

It prevents the cleaning tweezer from being inserted more in-depth into the ear and protects against injuries to the eardrum. Here’s to breaking the boundaries of ear cleaning.

Enjoy the best ear cleaning experience while being comfortable with the Bebird N3 Pro. Safe for children three years old and up, they can watch the ear cleaning process while you clean their ears.​

The Bebird N3 Pro provides a similar temperature as the human body to avoid damage or burn injuries to your ear canal.

The micro-lens cover is equipped with a special lens that enlarges the target area. Simply put the tweezers on the lens cover, and you can enlarge the area you want to see with even more clarity.

With a long-lasting battery life of up to 300mAh capacity, the Bebird N3 Pro is convenient, portable and hassle-free. A full charge within 1 hour can be used for one months' duration. 

Watch while you clean and monitor the battery life of your Bebird N3 Pro via the app. The app supports both Android and IOS operating systems with multiple languages available.

Equipped with a super-fast WiFi chip, the Bebird N3 Pro has a very smooth transmission. It provides the highest speed for the app to function the camera display, making it easy and smooth to set up and auto-connect the product to your phone. 

Our ears naturally produce ear wax to prevent debris, but excess ear wax can have an impact. As ear wax hardens, it becomes harder to remove and it can cause severe health problems.

Without proper ear care, the result of damp ears or popping noises can affect your daily lifestyle and lead to mild hearing loss. Bebird N3 Pro is designed to remove earwax easily and maintain your ear health.

The Bebird N3 Pro promotes sustainability worldwide. The 100% reusable ear cleaner is environmentally friendly and designed to focus on sustainability to protect our environment.

To further ensure your safety, the Bebird N3 Pro has passed all required tests and received several safety certificates.

 Bebird is a technology-based company that integrates R&D, production, and sales. We are primarily engaged in ear cleaning products. The founder of the team has more than 10 years of experience in research and development, and our sales team also has over 20 years of experience in customer service.

To date, we have successfully marketed our products in Korea and the United States. We believe in the simplicity of design and use for each product—the invention of Bebird - a sophisticated technology with a user-friendly experience.

Contact: info@longhamtec.com
Customer service: crowdfunding@blackbees.cn

story:
just 60 seconds a day, place your thumb on iCare to look over your health condition, including 15 feature indexes such as ECG, blood oxygen level, blood pressure, heart rate, etc.
 
 

A normal blood oxygen level is typically between 95 and 100 %. Please pay more attention if the index is lower than 95%.

 

 

 

Mr. White has high blood pressure. However, by using iCare while rigorously following a medication schedule and healthy diet, he has successfully lowered his blood pressure by an average of 5% and heart rate by 12.2%.

 

With a dedicated team of AI Engineers and Health Professionals, the founders combined their decades of experience to create the world’s smallest Cardiovascular Tester.

After a trial run, 40% of our users have successfully obtained abnormal results, while the other 60% maintain a healthy lifestyle with iCare.

Exercise suggestion applies to GPS to record your exercise movement, Users can have their movement track on google map and can also know the distance and time of how long they have been doing exercise. Breath coaching helps users adjust their breath rhythm and feel relax. There is also instruction that will teach users every of the breath method.

 

Besides physical health measurement data, emotion indexes such as fatigue and pressure are also provided to help you realize if you are extremely tired or under pressure for a long period of time. AI analysis combining these two data to get body age and help you adjust living conditions in time.

 

iCare also forms big data on the professions of dietitians and medical staff, providing personalized recipes and lifestyle suggestions through AI analysis.

iCare's measurement records to the doctor and assists the doctor to evaluate your health status.

 

 

 

 

 

To take care of the health, both body and mind must be effectively paid careful attention to. People who are overworked and stressed often cannot realize that they arein the state of overloaded. 
Through using iCare, they can be alert in time and remind themselves to adjust their pace of life.

 

iCare can detect early abnormal parts of heart, alerting users to seek preventive treatment and make lifestyle adjustments.

iCare uses big data to analyze each user’s health condition. Over 4000 users have benefited from these early warnings and took preventive care to maintain healthy lifestyles.

 

 

 

Better precision than existing smart bracelets, iCare is the ultimate health metric tracker.

iCare combines premium photoelectric sensors and electrodes to accurately monitor key health metrics.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Note:
iCARE is for self-health management and supplement accessory. It can't be relied on alone in the treatment of heart disease.

story:
Many people underestimate the benefits of a professional massage gun. NEX Pro speeds up muscle recovery and helps athletes push themselves to their limits in each training session, with the advantage of not slowing down by cramps or muscle pain caused by training.

From product development to creation, we work with athletes and professionals to support your needs and provide the ultimate wellness experience. Professional athletes make no compromises, nor do we.

 
Our previous campaign of OYeet NEX has been funded over $360K and loved by 3000+ backers around the world. Now our team is back and bringing you the OYeet NEX Pro with more power, more amplitude, and more professional attachments in an elevated, premium package. Below are the feedbacks from the early supporters of NEX Pro:
Our goal is simple: We want to build the best professional massage gun on the market.
OYeet NEX Pro reduces inflammation and muscle tension by 50% faster, breaks up those pesky knots after hard training & increases the blood flow of muscle tissue into the circulation for quick recovery, and speeds up rehab within 2 minutes.

It is capable to break up scar tissue and adhesions to restore your muscles and provides an exceptional percussive massage & reactivates all your muscles and keeps you moving every day with a 50% deeper tissue relaxation.

OYeet NEX Pro is delivering the best massage performance on the market in the most compact package for only a fraction of competitors’ prices.

Powered by NEXPower™ Technology, the latest high torque 98.8W NP38 motor strikes 40% deeper into the skin, up to 3500 PPM at 50 times per second. Powerful cores bring professional technology as the maximum force of 60 lb penetrates your deep tissue at a depth of 12.55 mm.

Sports science research has guided us in choosing the strength of 60lbs of force, enough to ease the pain but not too much to exacerbate the issue and give you the control you need to recover faster.

The heavy-duty dual shafts in NEX Pro are built with Aircraft-grade aluminum to ensure long-lasting performance and minimize unnecessary vibrations. Made of engineered fiberglass, the handle is fully coated with liquid silicone, which is soft to touch and comfortable to grip.

Powerful performance does not have to be accompanied by a bulky structure. With a composition that is 50% lighter and 40% smaller, the NEX Pro is the most compact design ever on the market and features sports engineering at its finest.

We know that strength and speed are indispensable, but they would not matter if there were no attachments for your needs. Built of 100% metal and durable high-density plastic, the 8 professional attachments are designed for athletic performance, pain relief, and injury rehabilitation.

Designed for life on the go, the NEX Pro comes with all 8 professional attachments neatly packed in a TSA-approved premium travel case. Smaller than a book, it's the new essential that easily fits into your gym bag or handbag.

Our team believes that the massage sessions should not be noisy and disturbing like other massage devices with more than 60 dB. With this in mind, we have developed OYeet NEX Pro at only 45 dB - allowing you can relax and recover faster.

Whether at home or in public, the practical silence will not disturb anyone or yourself.

By improving the industrial design of the NP38 motor with NEXPower™ technology, we have significantly increased runtime by 40% compared to any other device on the market.

Rest assured that the NEX Pro has a long battery life of up to 240 minutes. With each charge of NEX Pro and 10 mins of massage time every working day, you get up to a month of massage time to enjoy more sessions.

To charge your NEX Pro, simply plug the device into the USB cable, and the ring will light up to notify you that the NEX Pro is ready to use.

The smart NEX Pro also has a cordless charging stand that features the sophisticated design of a non-slip suction cup on the bottom to secure itself on the desk. With our unique built-in sensor technology that provides visual feedback, you can get feedback and information during the massage process to increase the efficiency and effectiveness of each massage session.

Equipped with 4 speed modes from 1400ppm to 3500ppm, it allows you to choose your desired power for the massage of warming up or recovery. Loop mode starts at 1400ppm and gradually increases to 3500ppm before the circulation continues, and you can enjoy the different power without any distractions.

Experience the powerful and ultra-portable OYeet NEX Pro, the high-performance treatment in an elevated, premium-quality design. We have designed the NEX Pro that in such a way that it is not only ergonomic and easy to use but also extremely easy to control due to its lightweight form and one-button operation.

Discover our step-by-step, personalized wellness routine, which is intuitive and easy to explore with a simple swipe of a thumb.

New to INDIEGOGO? Please do not worry about the pop-up disclaimer at checkout. All the perks purchased by our backer will get the perks delivered to your door.

Our team will ship the NEX Pro to many countries while working with reliable logistics partners. You will be duly updated on the shipping/delivery schedule. We can not wait to get this professional percussion massage gun to you! 

To express our team's appreciation to early supporters and our confidence in the quality of OYeet NEX Pro, all the perks during this campaign will come with a 2-year Warranty.

Should you have any concerns or encounter any problem during the use of NEX Pro, please send an e-mail to nexpro@oyeet.com and our team will be glad to assist you.

Discover our step-by-step, personalized wellness routine, which is intuitive and easy to explore with a simple swipe of a thumb.

story:
Delivery started on 4-Nov. and more than 1,000 Duo delivered successfully

    

Join us sharing campaign on social media & snap pictures to us, and you get free travel bag. 

We'd love for you to meet LUFT Duo - it's small and mighty

Meet LUFT Duo - the worlds smallest molecular purifier. It uses UVA LED and Titanium Oxide/Zinc Oxide to zap dust, pollen, mold, and pathogens down to the molecule. It's 1/10th the size of other purifiers in the same category, but less than half the price.

Guaranteed delivery & Ship weekly

LUFT has shipped over 25,000 products to happy customers in 70 countries, including thousands of Indiegogo backers!

We've done this before - not once, but twice. 100% fulfillment with lots of happy backers!

LUFT Duo - still small, even mightier

Following up on our amazing Qi and Cube campaign - we are bringing our amazing Indiegogo community the 3rd generation LUFT - the LUFT Duo

The new LUFT Duo is 2x as powerful as the cube - now 240 square feet - while being even quieter and more efficient. It's 1/10th the size of other purifiers in the same category, and less than half the price!

For more press, please visit us on Spark Amplify

“This tiny portable air purifier may soon sooth your inner clean freak” mashable.com “Absorbs ambient air from all angles, breaks down into harmless CO2 and H2O” touchofmodern.com “The amazing thing is the filterless LUFT cube outperforms HEPA air purifiers in the market.” gadgetany.com “Grabbed my attention because it’s palm-sized, many air purifiers at CES are the size of desk fans.” tidbits.com “Being inspired by the precision and minimalistic design of Germany, LUFT was created to be a rebel in the air purifier market.” Taiwan Tech Arena “The CES2020 Taiwan Excellence booth was filled with colorful characters, the most colorful of all was Titus Chang of LUFT Cube” Taiwan Excellence “It also has an anti microbes metal mesh which is easy to remove and clean" sg.news.yahoo.com “The technology is not some esoteric hocus-pocus, but actually rooted in science. After 30 minutes, 37%, and after an hour almost 66%. This thing actually works”computerbild.de “It is lighter than a smartphone and can be used anywhere”.techable.jp “The operation sound is only 25 dB, which is lower than human whisper.” tabi-labo.com “In two days, LUFT Cube got rid of the new car smell. Driving isn’t tiresome.” unwire.kk “The latest innovation from Taiwan” shopee.co.th

You read that right: no filters.

Good air on demand

Whether you want to get rid of bad odors, defeat your allergies, or simply improve your indoor air quality, Luft Duo is the perfect air purifier for you.

Where can you use LUFT? Preventing Droplet Infection in New Normal

How does LUFT compare to HEPA?

HEPA only traps pollutants:

LUFT purifies them with patented photocatalytic tech:

LUFT destroys pollutants that are too small, too harmful & Actively

LUFT is the ONLY technology that destroys formaldehyde & toxic VOCs

3rd Parties Verified - We've test it inside and out

LUFT has NO replacement parts - and NO byproducts

How did we make LUFT Duo even better?

Twice the power, half the noise:

We listened to your feedback, and the third generation of Luft has an expanded range of 240 square feet. You’ll only need one Luft Duo for your entire house.

Same great mesh metal filter - now with super hydrophilic and self cleaning:

And one more thing:

While sleeping at night, turn on the night mode setting. Night mode is with darker light and quieter running sound. Let you sleep well until morning.

How did we get it so quiet?

The secret the is in the curved top.

The new generation of LUFT Duo uses patented 3D photocatalyst design. The patented structure increases efficiency by 62% from the previous model.

It's not magic, it's LUFT.

Here are some awesome extras for early backers:

With your LUFT cube you get a FREE cupholder and vent cap

Use the vent cap to get the most fresh air - up to 15x that of room purifiers. The cupholder can be used to use LUFT in your car without worrying about it falling or getting damaged.

Upgrade to a travel bag at checkout - or share the campaign to get one free!

We're shipping weekly - take your pick ♥

Please feel free to add the travel bag as an add-on, or share the campaign and tag us to get one free!

   
   
   
   

We can create custom engraving on orders of more than 30 LUFT Duos, and have many happy corporate clients. Feel free to buy a 30 pack on indiegogo, or email us at hello@luftqi.com to chat with us about the custom order that's right for you.

Our timeline

We're ready when you are!

From our backers

I purchased 2 Luft Cube here a while back. I love it. It has helped tremendously with how my family and I breathe when we sleep at night and during the day, especially since we’re inside the house almost all the time. I have it on almost all day long, switching between low and high throughout the day but it’s on all the time. Thank you for creating this amazing product.
–Alice Jen | Canada

I received my Luft Cube a couple weeks ago, and putting it next to the cat litter box has made me a believer. I used to be able to smell it every time I walked into the large living area where the litter box was housed, but no longer. It has been running 24/7 since I received it and no problems so far. I personally find the fan very quiet, and the lighting unobtrusive. I am very happy with my backing, thank you!
–Kendall McCarthy | United States

Thank you Luft cube team! I have used the cube for around 2 weeks already. The very next day, my wife stop her every morning uncontrollable sneezing due to sinus condition. She has been sneezing for years and now it has stopped for the past 2 weeks since starting using the Luft cube. Thank you very much from.
–Royston Teo | Singapore

Love these things! Use 1 at home in the bedroom, use 1 in the office at my desk and I gave the other as a gift. The Luft Cube has exceeded all expectations. Quiet, powerful, efficient, portable and high quality. Looking forward to ordering more for more areas and more gifts. Thank you.
–Michael Johnson | United States

Had a pair of these for about 2-3 weeks now, and must say I’m pretty happy with them. Wis-per quiet even on high. And they have helped clean the air in my personal space quite well!
–Phil Dallek | United States

Product specifications

Meet the team

We are a Taiwanese electronics company with subsidiaries in the United States. Guided by the slogan of “good air, anytime and everywhere,” our first Indiegogo campaign — the Luft Qi — launched in 2018 and introduced our innovative photocatalyst purification technology to the world.

A huge THANK YOU to all our backers in these past years. We’re thrilled for you to try the third generation Luft.

With love from Taiwan

- LUFT in the Air

With a little help from:

After 30 minutes, 37%, and after an hour almost 66%. This thing actually works”computerbild.de “It is lighter than a smartphone and can be used anywhere”.techable.jp “The operation sound is only 25 dB, which is lower than human whisper.” tabi-labo.com “In two days, LUFT Cube got rid of the new car smell. Driving isn’t tiresome.” unwire.kk “The latest innovation from Taiwan” shopee.co.thYou read that right: no filters.Good air on demandWhether you want to get rid of bad odors, defeat your allergies, or simply improve your indoor air quality, Luft Duo is the perfect air purifier for you.Where can you use LUFT? Preventing Droplet Infection in New NormalHow does LUFT compare to HEPA?HEPA only traps pollutants:LUFT purifies them with patented photocatalytic tech:LUFT destroys pollutants that are too small, too harmful & ActivelyLUFT is the ONLY technology that destroys formaldehyde & toxic VOCs 3rd Parties Verified - We've test it inside and outLUFT has NO replacement parts - and NO byproductsHow did we make LUFT Duo even better?Twice the power, half the noise:We listened to your feedback, and the third generation of Luft has an expanded range of 240 square feet. You’ll only need one Luft Duo for your entire house.Same great mesh metal filter - now with super hydrophilic and self cleaning:And one more thing:
While sleeping at night, turn on the night mode setting. Night mode is with darker light and quieter running sound. Let you sleep well until morning.
How did we get it so quiet? The secret the is in the curved top.
The new generation of LUFT Duo uses patented 3D photocatalyst design. The patented structure increases efficiency by 62% from the previous model. It's not magic, it's LUFT.
Here are some awesome extras for early backers:With your LUFT cube you get a FREE cupholder and vent capUse the vent cap to get the most fresh air - up to 15x that of room purifiers. The cupholder can be used to use LUFT in your car without worrying about it falling or getting damaged.Upgrade to a travel bag at checkout - or share the campaign to get one free!We're shipping weekly - take your pick ♥Please feel free to add the travel bag as an add-on, or share the campaign and tag us to get one free!

 
 



 
 



 
 



 
 


We can create custom engraving on orders of more than 30 LUFT Duos, and have many happy corporate clients. Feel free to buy a 30 pack on indiegogo, or email us at hello@luftqi.com to chat with us about the custom order that's right for you.Our timelineWe're ready when you are!  From our backers


I purchased 2 Luft Cube here a while back. I love it. It has helped tremendously with how my family and I breathe when we sleep at night and during the day, especially since we’re inside the house almost all the time. I have it on almost all day long, switching between low and high throughout the day but it’s on all the time. Thank you for creating this amazing product.–Alice Jen | Canada



I received my Luft Cube a couple weeks ago, and putting it next to the cat litter box has made me a believer. I used to be able to smell it every time I walked into the large living area where the litter box was housed, but no longer. It has been running 24/7 since I received it and no problems so far. I personally find the fan very quiet, and the lighting unobtrusive. I am very happy with my backing, thank you!–Kendall McCarthy | United States



Thank you Luft cube team! I have used the cube for around 2 weeks already. The very next day, my wife stop her every morning uncontrollable sneezing due to sinus condition. She has been sneezing for years and now it has stopped for the past 2 weeks since starting using the Luft cube. Thank you very much from.–Royston Teo | Singapore



Love these things! Use 1 at home in the bedroom, use 1 in the office at my desk and I gave the other as a gift. The Luft Cube has exceeded all expectations. Quiet, powerful, efficient, portable and high quality. Looking forward to ordering more for more areas and more gifts. Thank you.–Michael Johnson | United States



Had a pair of these for about 2-3 weeks now, and must say I’m pretty happy with them. Wis-per quiet even on high. And they have helped clean the air in my personal space quite well!–Phil Dallek | United States

Product specifications  Meet the teamWe are a Taiwanese electronics company with subsidiaries in the United States. Guided by the slogan of “good air, anytime and everywhere,” our first Indiegogo campaign — the Luft Qi — launched in 2018 and introduced our innovative photocatalyst purification technology to the world.A huge THANK YOU to all our backers in these past years. We’re thrilled for you to try the third generation Luft.With love from Taiwan- LUFT in the AirWith a little help from:

story:
Pure water. Clean bottle. All it takes is a shake.

Nuvoe Pod eliminates up to 99.9999% of bio-contamination by disrupting the nucleic acids and the structure of a cell's DNA. UV-C light is the new industry standard disinfection technology for hospital wards and high traffic public infrastructure and we have miniaturised this technology to a size that can fit inside your water bottle!

Nuvoe purifies your water and cleans your bottle all day long, so your drinking water is as pure and fresh as it can be.

 

Update (July 2021): Now with a fresh new look

We have reworked the design of the Pod with a simpler, more elegant design for its upcoming release.

 

Your bottle & water aren't as clean as you think.

Water bottles are perfect incubators. They are dark and moist ecosystems where bio-contaminants thrive and grow.

We know you wash your bottle - but guess what? Despite all that hard work - it's just not as clean as you think. Research shows that even with regular washing, 70% of refillable water bottles carry levels of bio-contamination above the FDA recommended limit for bottled water.

In fact, despite chlorination the treated water out of the tap still carries low-levels of bio-contamination, and when you store that water in a dark, moist bottle and drink from it throughout the day it accumulates and grows in-between washes, feeding on the nutrients released from saliva! Even worse, backwash adds more contamination with every sip.

It's a constant cycle that's impossible to stay on top of.

The result? Your favourite water bottle gives off that nasty, funky smell and your water starts to develop an 'off' taste. Yuck!

It's not pleasant. That's why we created Nuvoe.

We take a much deeper look in this article.

 

Meet Nuvoe.

Small yet powerful, the Nuvoe Pod is a water purifier powered by UV-C light designed to live inside your water bottle. It purifies your water and cleans your bottle of bio-contamination while you're on-the-go or at home. Drink the freshest water from the cleanest bottle possible every minute of every day.

 

Using Nuvoe is simple!

Upgrade - Tape the Magnetic Anchor to the outside of your bottle and drop in the Nuvoe Pod. It will magnetically snap into place! You only need to do this once.

Shake - Every time you refill, simply shake for 2 seconds to activate a cleaning cycle.

That's it! Nuvoe will beep after 1 minute to let you know it finished purifying your water and cleaning your bottle.

It's as easy as that - now you can enjoy purified, contamination free water from a bottle that won't smell.

 

Your questions answered.

Watch to learn more about how easy Nuvoe is to use!

 

Treat your bottle.

Nuvoe seamlessly fits into your lifestyle. Upgrade your bottle once and enjoy fresh-tasting water wherever you are and whatever you're doing.

Nuvoe works with all the water bottle brands you would recognise - and even non-branded bottles too. Check our minimum size requirements at the bottom of the page.

 

Constantly cleans. So you don't have to.

Nuvoe automatically activates for a short cleaning cycle every two hours to prevent the build up of biofilm and any newly introduced bio-contaminants throughout the day. Gone is the daily hassle of having to regularly wash your bottle. Guaranteed freshness.

 

Explore without worries.

Traveling or want to drink water from a natural water-source? Activate Deep Clean by shaking your bottle for 4 seconds to start an extra-rigorous 3-minute cleaning cycle.

 

Keep your favourite bottle.

Nuvoe lets you upgrade your own water bottle! It is compatible with most wide-neck bottles and most bottle types.

 

More than one bottle? Swap them out!

Do you use a different bottle during the day and another for the gym or hiking? With additional Magnetic Anchors you can move the Pod amongst your bottles to always drink the cleanest water, no matter what you’re doing. Additional Magnetic Anchors are available as an add-on.

 

One month's charge.

You can charge your Pod using the supplied magnetic USB cable. One charge is good for 30 days of daily use.

 

Like bottled water. Without the waste.

Globally, more than 1 million plastic bottles are sold every minute and over 91% of these are not recycled. Nuvoe supports the sustainable switch to using a refillable water bottle, and makes sure you are drinking the freshest water possible all day long.

Source: Nace T. We’re Now At A Million Plastic Bottles Per Minute - 91% Of Which Are Not Recycled. Forbes. Published July 26, 2017.

 

 

It doesn't stop there.

Upgrade all your water containers.

Nuvoe's small size, and easy to fit mounting system gives you so much choice on where you can use it! You can upgrade other water dispensing and storage devices around the home like filtered water pitchers, jugs & carafes, fridges with a dispensing water containers, and pet water accessories!

Switch Nuvoe to Timer Mode and it will automatically turn on at a regular time interval to keep your water containers as clean as can be.

 

Clean anything!

UV-C light can clean more than just water! Nuvoe is not permanently attached to your water bottle so you can take it out and use it to de-contaminate more things around the house like your phone, keys, or face mask.

Just attach Nuvoe inside any metallic tin with reflective internal surfaces, double tap the button to start a cleaning cycle and you're ready to go!

 

Accessorise with a Nuvoe Bottle.

Nuvoe bottles are specially designed to work with the Nuvoe Pod. They feature a built-in Magnetic Anchor, are vacuum insulated, come in a great variety of colours, and have a highly reflective internal surface to improve Nuvoe's ability to freshen your water and clean your bottle.

 

You will be able to select your Nuvoe Bottle colour in the post-campaign survey.

 

Colours

The Nuvoe Pod & Magnetic Anchor upgrade will be available in Slate for all 'Nuvoe Pod' perks.

The Nuvoe Pod & Bottle bundle comes in a great range of colours and feature a colour-matched Pod!

Coloured Pods will only be available with the Bottle bundle.

 

UV-C. How does it work?

UV-C light is the new industry standard technology for hospitals and high traffic public infrastructure. We have miniaturised this technology to a size that can fit inside your water bottle!

When shining UV-C light on bio-contaminants the light penetrates through cell walls disrupting nucleic acids and the structure of the cell's DNA. This leaves them unable to perform vital cellular functions, rendering them ineffective.

We have taken this very same UV-C technology, optimised it and built it into the Nuvoe Pod. The Pod uses three (yes, three!) UV-C LEDs to get rid of those hidden nasties in your water. The LEDs are positioned to maximise the volume of water and bottle surface area the UV-C light reaches.

Pure Light at 275nm.

Each of Nuvoe's LEDs emits light at a peak wavelength of 275nm, the optimal frequency for water-based UV-C applications. 275nm is also the optimal wavelength to target the most common bio-contaminant offenders found in our water bottles.

Why is 275nm more effective than other UV wavelengths? Other wavelengths either target the cell as a whole or specific compounds in the cell. UV-C specifically targets nucleic acids and DNA and requires 1,000x less power to achieve the same effect, and as such, are much safer and more efficient to use.

Other UV-C systems use 280nm based LEDs but Nuvoe's LEDs shifts the peak wavelength down slightly from 280nm to 275nm resulting in up to 25% improvement in efficiency!

Chemical-free, filter-free & no single-use consumables!

UV-C does not rely on chemicals or filtration materials, and can therefore be used effectively and safely. We're tired of the onerous repetitive cost and waste of single-use consumables and subscriptions. This means Nuvoe is an all-in-one, one-off-purchase solution.

Next-gen LED materials.

Old UV-C systems used mercury to generate UV-C light. Nuvoe's LEDs are completely mercury-free. The core of our LEDs are made from a bio-compatible, non-toxic gallium nitride (GaN) which is often used in medical devices like implantable electrodes.

100% Ozone-free.

UV light at very small wavelengths can produce ozone but Nuvoe's spectrum never falls below 250nm. Ozone can only be produced at wavelengths below 185nm meaning it's completely ozone-free! (Ironically, UV-C at 275nm breaks the third oxygen atom that's attached to any ozone, converting it back to straight oxygen!)

Positioned to perform.

Nuvoe is positioned in the middle of the bottle allowing the UV-C to work middle-out. Nuvoe can therefore achieve greater efficiency and coverage compared to being in the lid or the base of the bottle. This has the added advantage of also cleaning under the lid.

The power of 3.

Yes, two is better than one, but three is better than two! The Nuvoe Pod uses three UV-C LEDs to ensure that the UV-C light reaches everywhere inside your bottle.

Food-safe materials & IPX8 construction.

Water is considered a food by the FDA and all contact materials should be classified as food-safe. All materials in the Nuvoe Pod (and Bottle) are food & water-safe and BPA-free. The Pod is completely waterproof to the highest standard.

 

Testing aplenty.

We've spent months refining our UV-C technology to ensure your Nuvoe Pod freshens your water and cleans your bottle day-in and day-out.

 

 

The hype is real!

 

How is Nuvoe different?

 

Take a closer look.

Will Nuvoe work with my bottle?

Your bottle needs to meet these two minimum size requirements to fit Nuvoe.

 

Our Story.

We love our refillable water bottles - we have one with us all the time - but they do come with their own annoyances & problems. We came across news articles & supporting papers that surprised us with how much bio-contamination lives inside our bottles and how municipal water isn't as clean as we think it is. We also hate that funky smell and 'off' taste that can slowly develop throughout the day no matter how much we rinse it out; and the daily chore of washing to keep the water tasting great does become tiresome. We wanted to design a product that upgrades our existing water bottle with self-cleaning super powers and keep us using our bottles every day knowing the water is as clean and fresh as it can be.

The Nuvoe team has over 25 years combined experience delivering innovative technology solutions for start-ups in Australia and around the world and we are excited to bring this experience to our first Indiegogo campaign.

We have deep expertise developing complex electronic devices for consumer and medical device markets. Coupled with our strong network of supply chain and manufacturing partners we are extremely confident we will deliver an outstanding product and experience.

Supporting indigenous communities.

Nuvoe is working with Kembla Corp which is owned by Mark Ella AM (Member of the Order of Australia). Kembla works with Indigenous artists to help support Indigenous communities around Australia.

 

Production Updates

We've already started tooling and are on schedule to delivery by December 2021.

These are some images of the final prototypes.

Here are some photos showing first off-tool samples from the production tooling. More to come as production progresses!

Visit the "Updates" tab on Indiegogo for more.

 

Shipping & Taxes

We don’t want to disappoint our backers with late deliveries or confusing shipping rates. That's why we are partnering with global logistics providers to ensure seamless delivery of all rewards across the world.

We'll collect all shipping, sales and VAT taxes when you finalise your order.

Shortly before Nuvoe ships, we will email you a link so you can:

  • Input your shipping address and latest delivery information;
  • Pay shipping and sales/VAT/GST tax; and
  • Finalise your colours and bottle type
  • Order additional items like extra Magnetic Anchors, Pods and Bottles.

Below is a shipping estimate table based on the latest data - this excludes any sales tax (USA), VAT (UK & Europe), GST (Australia, Canada, NZ), or similar taxes and duties other countries may charge. We will strive to achieve the right balance of shipping speed and cost efficiency for our backers. We will remain 100% transparent regarding shipping costs and will pass on any potential savings to our backers as well.

There will be an additional incremental shipping cost for multipacks.

 

Note on Crowdfunding

Indiegogo is not a store; backers support a creative process and pledging is not considered a purchase. Funds raised through Indiegogo will be committed to set project costs like tooling and first batch production and hence can’t be refunded.

 

Timeline

Your support will fund completion of tooling and first-batch production.  We can't do this without you and we value every contribution that helps us bring Nuvoe to the world.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have spent a lot of time developing and testing the product to ensure you are getting the best performance and quality outcome we can deliver. We are also constantly working with our suppliers and manufacturing partners to design out as much production risk as possible.

We are now close to delivery, but the ongoing effects of the global pandemic has been an ongoing challenge to our programme timeline. Looking forward, we intend to be on the ground with our factories as we look to complete production pending international borders reopening later this year. As we move through the final stages of tooling and production - we believe the biggest hurdles to the timeline have been accounted for already, so we expect a smoother ride moving forward.

We promise we will be transparent with our progress, clear in our communications and make decisions that ensure you are receiving a quality product that cleans your water and water bottle effectively all the time.

 

Environmental Concerns

Long Lasting Design

Water bottles have a demanding life and regularly get damaged, Nuvoe has been designed to upgrade an existing water bottle and is built tough enough to go the distance.

Reusability & Recyclability

Globally, more than 1 million plastic bottles are sold every minute; and less than 30% of these are recycled. Nuvoe supports the sustainable choice of switching to a refillable water bottle - and ensuring everybody has access to clean water all the time without needless plastic waste. Also, as the Nuvoe Pod is designed as a water bottle upgrade - it can be swapped into new bottles and reused.

Sustainable materials

Nuvoe uses UV-C light which is a chemical free, safe and effective method to purify water from bio-contamination while creating no residual by-products.

Environmentally friendly factories

Our factories are ISO accredited.

As we move through the final stages of tooling and production - we believe the biggest hurdles to the timeline have been accounted for already, so we expect a smoother ride moving forward.We promise we will be transparent with our progress, clear in our communications and make decisions that ensure you are receiving a quality product that cleans your water and water bottle effectively all the time. Environmental ConcernsLong Lasting DesignWater bottles have a demanding life and regularly get damaged, Nuvoe has been designed to upgrade an existing water bottle and is built tough enough to go the distance.Reusability & RecyclabilityGlobally, more than 1 million plastic bottles are sold every minute; and less than 30% of these are recycled. Nuvoe supports the sustainable choice of switching to a refillable water bottle - and ensuring everybody has access to clean water all the time without needless plastic waste. Also, as the Nuvoe Pod is designed as a water bottle upgrade - it can be swapped into new bottles and reused.Sustainable materialsNuvoe uses UV-C light which is a chemical free, safe and effective method to purify water from bio-contamination while creating no residual by-products.Environmentally friendly factoriesOur factories are ISO accredited.

story:
NeoRhythm features more magnetic-field-producing coils than any other similar device: 5. These coils separately and in tune target specific areas of the brain (prefrontal cortex, temporal lobes, cerebellum, parietal lobe, occipital lobe) as well as different parts of the body to assist in cell recovery and regrowth. NeoRhythm covers the largest and most precise stimulation area on the market today.

NeoRhythm is the latest innovation in the rapidly developing field of neuroscience, using a non-invasive magnetic method of neuromodulation to target specific areas of the brain to help the user reach a desired state of mind such as sleep, deep meditation or focus as well as target specific body parts to increase oxygenation in the tissue in order to assist recovery.

Neural oscillations, also known as brainwaves, are reflections of repetitive electrochemical activity in the brain and central nervous system. They are similar to acoustic and optical waves as they also have a specific frequency and amplitude. Our every activity is reflected in the form of brainwaves with a dominant frequency and accompanying frequencies.

Our brain and body have a wonderful ability to adjust to external frequencies. NeoRhythm emits these frequencies with the help of medium-intensity magnetic fields and your body adapts to them. This results in a perfect mental environment for sleep, meditation and focus, and a natural, drug-free way to assist your body in recovery and regrowth.

​

Each of the 3 stimulation programs uses scientifically-determined frequencies, based on dozens of scientific studies in the fields of pulsed electromagnetic therapy (PEMF) and repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation (rTMS) across the world, and years of our research. 

NeoRhythm emits these frequencies with the help of medium-intensity magnetic fields and the brain adapts to them, creating a perfect mental environment for sleep, meditation, relaxation, focus, revitalization or help you living with chronic or acute pain. 

Reaching 1000 backers will enable us to adjust stimulation frequencies that may help to live with specific sleep disorders – and alleviate them more efficiently.

 

We invite you to learn more below about the LI/Hi rTMS and contribute what you can to make NeoRhythm happen. Informed and committed, we are all in this together!

 

Shipping Details

Free shipping. MDCN Technologies Inc. is not responsible for customs, taxes, import duties, brokerage or any additional charges by your local government, these are the responsibility of the recipient.

 

Refunds and Returns

NeoRhythm comes with our 60-day Money-Back Guarantee  (return shipping not included). For Terms & Conditions of Sale, please refer to www.omnipemf.com.

 

60-Day Money-Back Guarantee - our overall policy to test it. 

We have tried and tested NeoRhythm thoroughly. We know it works. But we are willing to give you, all our customers and supporters, the opportunity to confirm its effectiveness yourself. Our 60-day money-back guarantee gives you the possibility to test NeoRhythm at home and return it for a full refund if you aren’t satisfied with the results, no questions asked. 

 

Disclaimer

MDCN Technologies Inc. offers low risk, general wellness products that promote a healthy lifestyle, help to maintain or encourage good health or reduce the impact or risk of some chronic diseases and conditions where a healthy lifestyle has been shown to play an important role in improving quality of life and living well. NeoRhythm is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or medical condition.  MDCN Technologies Inc. is not a licensed medical or health-care provider and has no expertise in diagnosing, examining, or treating medical conditions of any kind.

Use OmniPEMF products as directed in the instructions provided on our webpage (official page: www.omnipemf.com) or in User Guide.

story:
DOZZ is the world's first smart sleeping device, helping you fall asleep and solve your snoring issues. You can easily enter meditating and deep relaxing states with the latest Neurowave Technology and breath coaching of the breathing light. To those who have snoring issues, DOZZ is designed to stop snores by stimulating your muscles around the throats. You can even track your sleep health record with the built-in app. Various sleep music also available to choose from to creates the right atmosphere for your healthy, restful sleep.

 

 

Many people suffering from depression, anxiety and stress may often experiences insomnia. The immediate concern is daytime sleepiness. A lack of energy can cause feelings of anxiety, depression, or irritation. Not only can it affect your performance at work or school, but too little sleep may also increase your risk for car accidents.

 

 

 

 

 

Let’s be honest here, you have probably tried every single sleeping remedy out there! You may even try seeking sleeping professionals, who charge you a very high-cost consultation fee. Sedatives and sleeping pills mask the underlying problems only and can also cause long-term damage to your brain. They can even come with a lot of adverse effects, including impaired memory, drowsiness, allergic reactions, and more.

 

DOZZ will be your new solution that is affordable and completely safe for your body. It is drug-free, reliable and effective to your sleeping issues. From now on, you can stop relying on these harmful drugs for your better health and restful sleep.

 

 

 

 

 

DOZZ comes with multiple features that can help put you to sleep easily. It releases pulsation that can ease your mind and relieve your stress with the Neurowave Technology. It guides you to breathe with the rhythmic calming light. You can even surround yourself with our in-app Sleep Coaching Music for better sleep.

 

 

Your brain constantly produces bursts of electrical activity. In fact, that’s how groups of neurons in your brain communicate with each other. When your brain produces these electrical pulses, that’s what’s known as brainwave activity. With the latest Neurowave Technology, DOZZ uses a low-level electrical current to manipulate your brainwave. It reduces stress, anxiety and tension, aiding you to fall into the theta rhythm (the state between wakefulness and sleep), hence, falling asleep.

 

 

Theta Waves

Theta waves are brain waves that occur in the 3 to 8 Hz range. Theta brain waves occur when you’re sleeping or dreaming. They may occur when you’re drifting off to sleep or suspended in that light phase of sleep, just before you wake up.

 

Theta wave is classed as “slow” activity. It is seen in connection with creativity, intuition, daydreaming, and fantasizing and is a repository for memories, emotions, sensations. Theta waves are strong during internal focus, meditation, prayer, and spiritual awareness. When the theta rhythm appears to function normally it mediates and promotes adaptive, complex behaviors such as learning and memory.

 

 

There have been researches suggesting various ways to boost certain theta wave activity, and could help calm and reduce anxiety in people suffering from generalized anxiety disorder (GAD). Brainwaves can be easily affected by external stimuli. Putting on DOZZ helps brainwave synchronize with the frequency, changing your mood and helping you get good sleep.

 

 
 

 

 

Taking slow, deep breaths is one of the easiest and most basic ways to engage your body’s natural relaxation response. If you find yourself lying awake in bed, start by taking 10 deep breaths. This alone can begin to slow the breath and create a sense of calm. 

 

DOZZ has a built-in breathing light, which will guide you to breathe slowly. Inhale when the beam expands and exhale when it retracts. DOZZ gradually slows down your breathing from 10 to 6 breaths per minute (bpm), in a regular, rhythmic pattern conducive to a relaxing/ meditating state.

 

 

The calming blue light, projected on the ceiling, has a very low intensity (less than 1 lux) compared to the high intensity of mobile/computer screens (about 60 lux), and will not inhibit melatonin secretion. 

 

 

 

 

 

Why we snore?

When sleeping, the muscles around your throat relax and the uvula (the back edge of soft palate) may partially block your airway and vibrate. The more narrowed your airway, the more forceful the airflow becomes. This increases tissue vibration, which causes your snoring to grow louder.

 

 

 

If you are a snorer, you may place DOZZ comfortably under the chin as you sleep. The sensors installed in DOZZ will detect your snores and track your sleep states. When DOZZ identifies your snoring sound, it will generate very light micro-impulses, ranging from 10-60Hz to your chin nerves. This will stimulate your Genioglossus muscles around the throat, tighten the soft palate, tone up the airway, and thus keeps you breathe smoothly and quietly.

 

 

DOZZ detects snoring, gathers information on your sleep and sleep quality, to feed into the built-in app. You can track your snoring records and adjust sensitivity & pulse strength through the app setting.

 

 

 

 

 

DOZZ has a built-in app that is very easy to navigate and user-friendly. It tracks and analyzes your sleep health. Identify your sleep states, monitor your snores and track your movements in bed. You can even customize your settings to suit your preferences. 

 

 

 

DOZZ app includes lists of meditative music for you to choose from. You could just pick your favorites, and it will help create the right atmosphere for healthy, restful sleep. The soothing baseline of sound will not just help you fall asleep, but also keep you asleep.

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hi! We are the Dozz team, and we are super excited to welcome you to our official Indiegogo page. We are a team of experts with different backgrounds in engineering, software development, marketing, public relations, product development, and many more to ensure the success of this project.

 

We are a group of engineering experts who have been in the industry for years are now seeking this opportunity to create a highly efficient sleeping aid device that can help people sleep faster and stop them from snoring.

story:
Think Health First

Washing hands after going out has become routine as viruses and disease are more prevalent than ever. But this is in vain if we proceed to touch items that have been out with us and been subjected to the same environment – they need to be sterilized too! That’s why we made it our mission to make the world a safer place by empowering people to disinfect their items wherever they go – keeping them safe and healthy.

What is ozone?

You’ve probably heard of the ozone layer before, which is located in the lower atmosphere. In the case of the JIUHE Sterilization Box, ozone is a versatile molecule that can disinfect any environment! The structure of the molecule itself is a strong oxidizing agent, which reacts with harmful molecules in the air as well as water – but don’t submerge the Ozeck Sterilization Box in water!

Why does it disinfect so effectively?

This portable little hero is designed to specifically disinfect and sterilize everything in confined and wider spaces. This means you can use the JIUHE to sterilize your car, oven, bedroom, and even those tinier objects you have – just by putting the device and objects in a bag!

The Sterilization Hero That Works

The JIUHE Sterilization Box is unlike anything else of its kind,Why?Because unlike other sterilization boxes,the JIUHE does not have any space limitations!This means that you can place it in any room and can easily be taken anywhere you go, it will work its disinfecting magic.

Sterilization With Zero Blind Spots

Disinfect Every Surface，Unlike UV sterilization which only disinfects the surfaces the light can touch; ozone technology facilitates sterilization with zero blind spots.

Free Collocation

Fast Clean Cycle for Your Essential Items.Time cycles ranging from a 10 mins fast cycle clean to a large 60 min cycle, the device adapts to your needs.

In One Go Save time

Multiple Items In One Go Save time ,disinfect multiple items all in one go including your phone, tablet, keys, mask, water bottles, remotes, glasses, wallet and purse, shoes, clothes, and more!

Safer and Healthier

With a global pandemic in our midst,the best defense against infection is sterilization.keep yourself safe,as well as your friends and family.To improve the living environment in which we live,making our families safer and healthier.

JIUHE Sterilization Box Tech Specs

Operation Steps

 

 

What’s in the box

 

JIUHE has obtained CE,FCC and ROHS certification

A Year with CoronaVirus

 

COVID-19 variant first seen in India designated as global concern, WHO says

 

Our Production Process

About JIUHE

Shenzhen Jiuhe Electronics Co.,Ltd was established in 2011.Since the company established,we developed numerous of products and sold them around the world.We’ve been thinking how should we keep our belongings clean,on the other hand,it can protect our family so.our developers did a lot of tests,after that,the JIUHE Sterilization Box was born.we hope that through our efforts,can make people’s lives healthier and safer,we wish that people can pay more attention to health.we’re still moving forward,and hopefully can continue to make things better.

Risks and challenges

This is the second time we have launched our new product on Crowdfunding platform.The first time was on December 26th,2019.It is obvious that the delivery time was around March,2020.How much difficulties that we had been through you can imagine.under the joint efforts of all our colleagues,the goods were delivered on time finally.

As the virus mutates in different countries,the logistics industry may suffer because of this.this is only speculation,of course.thankfully,we have begun getting vaccinated.we hope that everything will return to normal soon.

JIUHE Sterilization Box,It has got certificate of FCC,CE and ROHS already.The mold of Sterilization Box has been debugged many times.so it has reached to mass production status.however,we will ensure the quality of the product.and keep good communication with logistics company so that we can update the latest news to our backers.

All we use are environmentally friendly materials.all passed the ROSH testing.the packaging box is made of Paper Material,which is convenient for recycling and secondary processing.all the designs are small,minimalist and space-saving.reduce the pollution to the environment is that we can do.We will choose the high-quality factory for production.Good management experience,Passed the ISO 9001 and 5S checking at least.employees have a good working practices.In this way to ensure the quality of our products.

Whatever Happens, the one thing we can definitely control is communication. We are committed to keeping all our backers up to date on issues as they come up and on our efforts and progress in resolving them.what’s more,we have the confident to fulfill our promise as the first project that we did.

story:
We stand behind our products and provide a 2-year warranty from the date of purchase. Products manufactured and sold by Flaüs shall be free, under normal use and service, from defects in material and workmanship for 2 years.


 

 

 
 


 

 

 


 

Flaüs uses sonic vibrations to move quickly and gently between tight teeth, removing stubborn plaque and debris from places your toothbrush can't access. Designed to reach the nooks and crannies with ease and give your gums the T.L.C. they deserve, Flaüs does the hard work for you.

 

 

With up to 12,000 sonic vibrations per minute, Flaüs effortlessly glides between tight teeth and removes plaque and debris - providing a strong yet gentle clean.

 

Each Flaüs comes with a 3-month supply of replaceable Flaüs heads that are easy to use, sustainable and PFAS-free. After each flossing session, remember to compost or recycle the used heads (which are completely compostable and biodegradable), and simply snap on a new one!

 

Many types of dental floss are coated in highly toxic substances (like PFAS), which are responsible for some of the most potent greenhouse gas emissions. Not only is this bad for the environment, but can also be super harmful for you too!

 

 

Made from plant-based materials and infinitely sustainable aluminum, Flaüs is better for your teeth and the planet. We believe innovation should not come at the expense of the environment.

 

Prefer flossing on the go or in the shower? No problem! Our 1-month battery life, USB-C charging port and waterproof design make Flaüs the perfect travel companion or shower buddy.

 

 

Find maneuvering traditional floss tricky? Flaüs' ergonomic handle allows for greater control and easy access to those hard-to-reach places so you never miss your molars again.

 

Dental hygiene is supposed to be, well, hygienic. Did you know up to 10 million bacteria live on your fingertips? Gross! Our thoughtfully designed handle keeps your fingers and uninvited germs out of your mouth.

 

Brushing only cleans about 60% of your tooth's surface, leaving cracks and spaces between your teeth untouched. Flossing cleans the remaining 40% and is one of the best ways to improve your oral hygiene, beauty and overall health!

 

 

 





 

 

 

Have a hard time remembering to floss? Flaüs has built-in LED tracking technology that offers visual cues to help you keep up healthy habits and stay accountable.

 

Our magnetic mirror mount holds Flaüs above the sink, making it easily accessible and saving precious countertop space.

 

Flaüs comes with everything you will need to elevate your oral care game.

 

Most dental floss is made of nylon coated in synthetic wax, which is non-biodegradable and non-recyclable. Some even contain PFAS, which have been linked to adverse health consequences, including liver damage, thyroid disease, decreased fertility, obesity and cancer.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Add to your order at checkout! 

 

 



 





 



 

Flaüs was designed for manufacturing (DFM) from the very beginning.  We have sourced manufacturing partners, completed six functional prototype iterations with robust user testing between each step, and have a team that has built and delivered/launched multiple physical products. 
 

 

 

 

Flaüs, established in 2019, was inspired by a painful and expensive trip to the dentist. Samantha Coxe, co-founder and CEO of Flaüs, was a guilt flosser - flossing her teeth before a dentist appointment so that, when asked if she flosses, the answer would be "yes.” This led to a $2,000 dental bill, a lecture on the importance of flossing and a disappointed dental hygienist.

While Sam was a responsible twice-a-day brusher using her electric toothbrush, she dreaded flossing. It was the most tedious, painful and difficult step in her daily oral care routine.

When she expressed her frustrations to co-founder and partner, Taylor Jolin, he emphatically agreed. That’s when they thought - there must be a better way. Flaüs was engineered to solve the pain points of flossing so that everyone can have a happy and healthy smile. 

 

 

Flaüs is all about making your oral care routine easier and more eco-friendly. Because good overall health starts with good oral health, we strive to make products you will look forward to using each morning and night. We are passionate about utility, design, sustainability and helping you keep your teeth for life! Our team is a combination of Dentists, engineers and entrepreneurs working in collaboration to optimize your oral care routine.

 

Samantha Coxe – is the CEO/Co-founder of Flaüs.  Sam was a corporate associate at Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP, where she advised strategic and financial buyers and sellers in connection with domestic and cross-border mergers and acquisitions and the formation of joint ventures and strategic partnerships.  She attended the University of Southern California, where she graduated Summa Cum Laude with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Psychology, and received her J.D. from New York University School of Law.  Sam has had a lifetime passion for entrepreneurship and has always had a great interest in bringing smiles to those in need, attending two medical missions and teaching oral hygiene to dozens of children with Operation Smile.  Sam is a big fan of The Office, enjoys golfing and going for beach runs and has a major sweet tooth.  Sam is from San Clemente, California and currently lives in Manhattan Beach, California.

Taylor Jolin – is the Co-Founder of Flaüs. Taylor previously worked in financial markets at Goldman Sachs in both Chicago and Los Angeles. He met his partner and Co-Founder, Samantha (a USC Spirit Leader at the time), while playing football as a walk-on at the University of Southern California. Taylor majored in Business Administration at USC and received his Master of Science in Finance from Georgetown University. While working at Goldman Sachs, Taylor helped many successful entrepreneurs manage their financial assets (which in many cases was created from the sale of successful companies). Working with these entrepreneurs provided Taylor with a strong inspiration to start a company of his own one day where he could use his knowledge of business to make a positive impact. During his free time, Taylor absolutely loves to play guitar. His childhood hero is Eddie Van Halen. While attending high school in San Diego, he won the Battle of the Bands as the lead guitarist of his dream-come-true Van Halen cover band, “Van Jolin.” Taylor was born and raised in Encinitas, California and currently lives in Manhattan Beach, California.

Dr. Vivian Roknian is the lead dental advisor for Flaüs and has over 10 years of experience as a “super” general dentist with a focus in implant surgery. She currently serves on faculty at the Misch International Implant Institute and in the Department of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery at Temple Hospital.  She holds implant dentistry fellowships, a diplomate certificate in Oral Implantology and has published and lectured across the globe. She currently practices at her private practice in Beverly Hills, limited to Implant Dentistry and Reconstruction.  Outside of dentistry, Dr. Roknian has a background in building startups and scaling businesses in the healthcare, academia, and hospitality sectors.  She also founded the entrepreneurial blog, Dr. Vivian, which was created to nurture, inspire, and empower female leaders and entrepreneurs.  From the moment Sam and Taylor first approached Dr. Roknian with idea for Flaüs, she has been intimately involved with the design process while providing practitioner-based guidance throughout development. Dr. Roknian also enjoys traveling, gardening, and throwing dinner parties. Dr. Roknian grew up and currently lives in Santa Monica, California.

Andrew Namminga is the lead engineer and industrial designer of Flaüs. In 2010, Andrew started ANDesign Lab – a design, engineering, and manufacturing company based in Newport Beach, CA with a manufacturing office in Shenzhen, China – during his senior year at Cal State University Long Beach. Andrew holds two Bachelor of Science degrees in Mechanical Engineering and Industrial Design. After graduating in 2011, he opened the first ANDesign Lab office with three employees in a small warehouse in Santa Ana, California. Thanks to the early success of multiple ANDesign Lab products as well as a growing knowledge in manufacturing and logistics accumulated from countless trips to China to oversee manufacturing projects, Andrew expanded ANDesign Lab’s operations to Shenzhen, China with a dedicated team of engineers, manufacturing specialists, project managers, and quality control staff. Today, ANDesign Lab is known in the tech and hardware industry as the premier one-stop shop for industrial design, engineering, and manufacturing. Andrew enjoys craft beer and building anything from canoes to vintage automobiles in his spare time. Andrew grew up  in Rancho Cucamonga, California & currently resides in Newport Beach, California.

 

 

 

Many campaigns have disappointed their backers by not thinking through their shipping and logistics strategy. That is why we are pleased to let you know that we’ve partnered with the global fulfillment and logistics experts at Easyship.com who are the best in the business at fulfilling crowdfunding rewards and perks at the best possible shipping rates.

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included.

About one month prior to shipping rewards, you will be contacted by our global logistics partner to confirm your shipping address. You will also be asked to select your preferred shipping method/speed as well as pay any ancillary fees such as VAT taxes/duties (if applicable to your region). For estimated shipping rates, please visit the FAQs.

We plan to ship starting in August 2021*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.
*Actual ship dates may vary depending on your territory and chosen shipping method. . We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.


* InDemand orders will start shipping October 2021
story_txt:
We stand behind our products and provide a 2-year warranty from the date of purchase. Products manufactured and sold by Flaüs shall be free, under normal use and service, from defects in material and workmanship for 2 years.
  
 

 

 

   Flaüs uses sonic vibrations to move quickly and gently between tight teeth, removing stubborn plaque and debris from places your toothbrush can't access. Designed to reach the nooks and crannies with ease and give your gums the T.L.C. they deserve, Flaüs does the hard work for you.  With up to 12,000 sonic vibrations per minute, Flaüs effortlessly glides between tight teeth and removes plaque and debris - providing a strong yet gentle clean. Each Flaüs comes with a 3-month supply of replaceable Flaüs heads that are easy to use, sustainable and PFAS-free. After each flossing session, remember to compost or recycle the used heads (which are completely compostable and biodegradable), and simply snap on a new one! Many types of dental floss are coated in highly toxic substances (like PFAS), which are responsible for some of the most potent greenhouse gas emissions. Not only is this bad for the environment, but can also be super harmful for you too! 


 Made from plant-based materials and infinitely sustainable aluminum, Flaüs is better for your teeth and the planet. We believe innovation should not come at the expense of the environment. Prefer flossing on the go or in the shower? No problem! Our 1-month battery life, USB-C charging port and waterproof design make Flaüs the perfect travel companion or shower buddy.  Find maneuvering traditional floss tricky? Flaüs' ergonomic handle allows for greater control and easy access to those hard-to-reach places so you never miss your molars again. Dental hygiene is supposed to be, well, hygienic. Did you know up to 10 million bacteria live on your fingertips? Gross! Our thoughtfully designed handle keeps your fingers and uninvited germs out of your mouth. 


Brushing only cleans about 60% of your tooth's surface, leaving cracks and spaces between your teeth untouched. Flossing cleans the remaining 40% and is one of the best ways to improve your oral hygiene, beauty and overall health!



      Have a hard time remembering to floss? Flaüs has built-in LED tracking technology that offers visual cues to help you keep up healthy habits and stay accountable. Our magnetic mirror mount holds Flaüs above the sink, making it easily accessible and saving precious countertop space. Flaüs comes with everything you will need to elevate your oral care game. Most dental floss is made of nylon coated in synthetic wax, which is non-biodegradable and non-recyclable. Some even contain PFAS, which have been linked to adverse health consequences, including liver damage, thyroid disease, decreased fertility, obesity and cancer.         Add to your order at checkout!      Flaüs was designed for manufacturing (DFM) from the very beginning.  We have sourced manufacturing partners, completed six functional prototype iterations with robust user testing between each step, and have a team that has built and delivered/launched multiple physical products.

story:
Introducing the JOOLA Infinity Table Tennis Training Robot: Powered by iPong

This new table tennis robot can emulate any shot, from beginner to professional, teach you the fundamentals and transform you into an expert, all while being controlled from your mobile device.

 

Featured On:

Features:

The JOOLA Infinity Robot is the perfect table tennis training partner with its completely customizable settings for spin, frequency, speed, oscillation and trajectory. It will never get mad, never get tired and it will always be ready to take you to the next level. 

 

 

The Infinity Robot has two wheels which allows it to produce topspin, underspin, side spin and no spin while shooting with a frequency range of 30 to 100 balls per minute at varying speeds (2.5 mph to 45 mph) that can match even the highest caliber of players. You can also practice against any shot on the table since the Infinity Robot can seamlessly oscillate 150 degrees side-to-side and create ball trajectories of 30 degrees downwards to 50 degrees upwards. The Infinity Robot also supports ITTF Approved 3-Star 40+ balls.

We currently have been able to create a 5x3 grid where the robot can shoot anywhere on the table tennis table. However, with constant testing and improvements after launch, we will be able to make the robot even more accurate and precise to practice against any shot to perfection. 

 

Infinity Net + Hook System

One of the most unique features of the JOOLA Infinity Robot is that it comes with an infinity-play net. It was designed with a ball-recycling system that funnels the balls right back into the robot for constant non-stop action. The robot also has a two-hook mechanism instead of a large base that allows for an easy setup for you to start practicing immediately.

 

After testing multiple iterations of the net, we have perfected our newest design for easy assembly and minimization on space. 

 

App Controlled

The robot will be controlled via mobile app on both iOS and Android. Connected via Bluetooth, select from pre-programmed drills through the mobile app that teach you table tennis fundamentals such as receiving serves, loops, pushes, and lobs. JOOLA plans to tap into their extensive network of world-ranked players and coaches, like German National Team Coach & ITTF Coach of the Year, Joerg Rosskopf, to create regularly updated content for the app. 

 

We have spent the past five years developing and engineering a table tennis robot that is customizable, affordable, and fun. Our goal has always been to create the best table tennis robot that will exceed the features of any other training robot in the industry. With every iteration and change, we thought of you, the players, and applied everything we have learned to create the ultimate table tennis robot. We also understand that the delivery date is far and to thank you for your patience, we have provided the option to receive an iPong Trainer Motion bundle in advance with a 25% discount. We have also decided to limit the amount of Early Bird Special price to the first 50 backers on Indiegogo.

Backers who selected the JOOLA Infinity Robot + iPong Combo will receive their Trainer Motion Bundle sometime after the Indiegogo Campaign ends. 

With our final design, we will start mold production and app development in July 2019. We understand the complicated process of mold creation, sample making, and mass production from our many years of experience. We will be sure to follow our road map so that you will receive your new JOOLA Infinity Robot on time. And don’t worry, we care about the colors, but getting the color correct won’t delay the launch.

About the Brand

JOOLA's mission is to support table tennis players throughout their entire table tennis journey. We’re there for athletes when they pick up their first racket, when they become world champions, and everywhere in between. JOOLA has been the proud sponsor of the 1996 Atlanta, 2000 Sydney, and 2004 Athens games. JOOLA is also currently the Official Table Sponsor of the US Open and US National Championships.   

Established in 2009, iPong is a brand focused on promoting the sport of table tennis by providing products that introduce recreational players to a new and higher level of competitive play. 

Combining our knowledge of table tennis and robotics manufacturing, we have created the ultimate table tennis training robot. We have completed the final stages of development and are about to enter the manufacturing phase. Now we invite you to join us in shaping the future of table tennis. 

Community

From start to finish, we will ensure that we deliver on our promises and will provide transparency throughout the whole process. 

To support JOOLA and for live and quick updates, follow us:

On Facebook or Instagram @JOOLAUSA

On Youtube or LinkedIn @JOOLATABLETENNIS

Why Crowdfunding?

We’ve still been seeing questions about why an established company like JOOLA chose to do crowdfunding for this project, so we wanted to answer this question in a separate update in case it was too hidden in the first. 

JOOLA and iPong both share a commitment to promoting the sport of table tennis. With that in mind, we chose Kickstarter as our launch platform because of the wide audience reach.

We wanted not just to sell our robot to table tennis enthusiasts, but to also pique the interest of those who might not be familiar with the sport. Whether the initial interest is in robotics, tech, or electronics, we think that this sleek, innovative training robot is a great way to get new players excited about ping-pong.

For those already invested in the sport, we believe Kickstarter is a great way to be more personal and transparent about the JOOLA culture and bring you guys on the product development journey. 

The JOOLA Infinity was designed with the player's journey in mind and suits both novices and professionals alike. 

Crowdfunding is also a great way for us to get feedback and act on it!

Risks and Challenges

This is our first Crowdfunding project ever, but we have 10 years of manufacturing experience for table tennis robots and over 60 years of experience with table tennis products. We have thought of most of the risks and issues that may arise and have adjusted our timeline accordingly.

If we delay this project or miss our target date of March 2020, we will be happy to issue a refund to anyone who asks before we release the robot.

Mold Risks – Once molds are created, it is very difficult to make drastic changes to them without starting over. To address this risk, we have worked with an engineering firm to help us with the parts and will work closely with our manufacturer.

Hardware & Software Pairing – Due to the complexity of the capabilities of our robot, ensuring that the app works perfectly with the robot will require a lot of time for testing.

Product Changes - We’re always striving to provide you with the best product, so final product may vary due to additional enhancements. All changes will be disclosed in updates.

Global Shipping – Shipping logistics are very complicated especially on a global scale. However, we have also taken this into account with our timeline.

story:
Squeaky Clean Feet has undergone a high-quality production process and is made using durable and sustainable materials to facilitate its cleaning, massaging, and exfoliating functionalities. This patent-pending invention is comprised of three technologies:

These then make up the Squeaky Clean Feet parts that include:

The uniquely designed soap well provides the right vehicle to use your soap of choice to wash your feet. This is the part where you state: something like a textured area that can gently but effectively remove flaky or dry skin. The exfoliation station has pumice rock like textured panels to assist in removing dead skin leaving your foot smooth and refreshed.

You place your soap of choice in the soap well where it then cascades down to the upper scrubbers of the cleaning bridge to provide the toes and top of the foot with quality cleaning.

Inspired by reflexology, the product has strategically placed massaging mounds to create pressure points on the foot that have been linked to many health benefits.

A series of locking suction cups line the bottom of the Squeaky Clean Feet product. This enables the user to safely use the product.

The pull ring located in the front allows the user to effortlessly remove the product from the surface and place the unit on a hanger to dry after use as well as for storage.

The product is lined with longer scrubbers to gently wash and assure a thorough and comfortable clean.

SHIPPING

SHIPPING FEE WILL BE CHARGED SEPARATELY AFTER CAMPAIGN ENDS.  

THE TABLE BELOW SHOWS ESTIMATED SHIPPING COST.

Squeaky Clean Feet was created by two young entrepreneurs & inventors.

Inspired by Shark Tank this brother and sister team reviewed many avenues of creating a product or service to bring to market.  We wanted their offering to address a large issue that both had health and safety benefits.  This team eventually came to understand that there was a large demand for a foot cleaning, massaging, and exfoliating product.  There are others in the market but every single one of them lacked features but all missed have that luxury look and feel.

 

Squeaky Clean Feet is finally the right product that can provide a thorough clean which can aid completely refreshing your feet.  This product also helps reduce the hazards of balancing on one foot while people try to properly clean one foot at a time.

We hope you enjoy this product so much you tell all your friends and family.

Ava and Trevor

Risks and challenges

For those of you who got to this point, we want to thank you for your interest! We would like to thank all the sponsors and people who share this project. Without each and every one of you, it simply would not be the same. We hope that this project will run smoothly, as the final samples that we will definitely bring into mass production, have been produced and tested for months in all kinds of circumstances. We do not foresee any problems in the production at this moment, our manufacturer has years of experience, with an international quality more than contrasted, and it assures us even in the current moments of world pandemic the fulfillment of the production in date, with the maximum standards of quality, even we have added a good extra time of margin. At the same time, the logistics study has been meticulous in order to comply with the date and form. We will keep everyone informed of progress!
