THREE RESISTANCES - FOR BEST RESULTS
JawlineMe™ has three different levels that each come with different resistances.
Blue Level 1 - 40 lbs of Resistance Red Level 2 - 50 lbs of ResistanceBlack Level 3 - 60 lbs of Resistance
We HIGHLY SUGGEST that you start with our Blue Level 1 and work yourself up to higher levels to reduce the risk of injury, warm up your muscles and also achieve the best results possible. 
With all levels in your hand, you can also do supersets and drop sets for an absolute killer workout, but this is only if you are really advanced!
 
YOUR SAFETY IS OUR PRIORITY
ULTRA-HYGIENIC SILICONE
During the development of JawlineMe™, the one thing that was most important to us was the safety of our product. We put extra care into making sure that the materials you put in your mouth are absolutely safe. 
Ultra-Hygienic Silicone
Premium Quality Materials
Safe For In-Mouth Placement 

 
HOW IT WORKS
WE OFFER A WORKOUT THAT YOU CAN SINK YOUR TEETH INTO!
JawlineMe™ has been designed to reproduce the entire motion range of your bite with varied resistance levels to help you activating your facial muscles and getting a perfect jawline. Simply by putting the Jawline Fitness Ball & Facial Toner in your mouth, place your teeth within the bite strips, and start chewing. If it doesn't fit comfortably, you can put the JawlineMe™ Fitness Ball & Facial Toner in a pot of boiling water for 3-6 seconds, let it slightly cool off, and put it back into your mouth. That should give you additional comfort! 
Here is a quick Step-By-Step guide to show you how easy it works: 

We highly recommend that you begin with the lowest level of resistance and gradually work yourself up when you feel that your facial muscles are getting tighter and stronger.  We recommend that you carry out this exercise regimen for about ten to fifteen minutes every day or every other day for good results. You can do all this at home. There is no need to venture out unless you want of course!  
Our JawlineMe™ Fitness Ball & Facial Toner has been designed exclusively to help you work out a comprehensive range of motions into that all-important bite. This helps in giving you a fuller and stronger look when it comes to your facial muscles. Forget about all those face fillers and Botox treatment. Rising from low resistance to higher levels, this highly affordable tool will give more tone and a youthful appearance to your face.  
This is how it looks when you exercise with JawlineMe™: 

SUPER EASY RIGHT!?
If you think that you've done a complete full-body workout before, let us tell you that there are fifty-seven muscles in your face and neck! You need to put them through an adequate workout in order to get a more handsome jawline and a distinctive facial look. The cosmetics industry is earning billions of dollars by influencing people to go through facial surgeries and painful and invasive injections that do not bring in satisfactory and long-lasting results. People are simply tired of going through these expensive rituals. Next time, you want a jawline strengthened, think of JawlineMe™ for a more aesthetic and healthier facial appearance. 
INSTRUCTIONS FOR CUSTOM MOLDING
1. Get a small pot of water to boil fully. Then, place the Jaw Ball in that pot, gently with the help of a slotted spoon for 3 - 6 seconds.
2. Remove it from the boiling water and give it a quick shake to rinse off excess water. 
3. Use a mirror to ensure that JawlineMe’s logo faces outwards and that you have the right side up. Line up all those clear biting strips with the top and bottom front teeth of yours. 
4. Bite into the Jaw Ball and use sufficient pressure so that your teeth make an impression. Hold it for about ten seconds and remove it after rinsing under cold tap water for it to set. 
 
FACIAL EXERCISE?
These words may raise some eyebrows, but it’s more important than you may think! Your face is like any other part of your body; it is composed of dozens of muscles, each of which becomes healthier and better looking with proper exercise. Even the most virulent health enthusiasts may never have thought to exercise their face! The JawlineMe™ fitness routine is here to help you look and feel your absolute best.
JawlineMe™ has been created especially for you as a healthy and natural solution if you want a younger and healthier facial appearance and perform skin tightening face exercises. Exercising and flexing those facial and neck muscles will tighten your facial skin and will give you a youthful look.
JawlineMe™ helps you stand out from the crowd and look even more awesome than you already do!
  
 
YOUR FACE
THE MOST VISUAL BODY PART

Exercise your most visual body part, YOUR FACE, without needing to break a sweat! Simple to use and the easiest exercise for the most visual results!
It’s time to stop neglecting the muscles in your face, and time to start getting your face the workout it deserves. JawlineMe is a hands-free workout, that lets you exercise your face wherever you are, with built-in resistance to workout your face just as you would with any other muscle! JawlineMe's Fitness Ball & Facial Toner is the solution to "how to get a better Jawline"!

story:
Discover an immersive cycling experience that motivates you to come back for more. Freebike is a gamified studio cycling + strength hub, and your ultimate fitness companion at home. Say goodbye to the boring fitness routine and pedal to the beat of your own rhythm.

Embark on a whole new workout routine with a variety of on-demand classes. Turn on freebeat and never endure another dull moment during your fitness journey with its energetically curated music and beat-based choreography.

 

At freebeat, our rockstar instructors come from the world's top-notch studios such as Soulcycle, Flywheel, Equinox, and Cyclebar. Throughout the training process, the instructors will guide you through each workout session and motivate you to achieve your goals. 

The rockstar instructors have a wide range of experience in various training areas. Also, they have appeared on The Tonight Show, SNL, and led the cycling courses for the First Lady of the United States. In some cases, booking the instructor's signature sessions at your local studios can be a challenge. No matter when you want to train, we always have you covered with their on-demand courses when you're ready to drop some sweats.

   Keep your workout fresh with different curated high-energy music and well-designed choreography as you pedal to your own beat. 

Refresh, recharge and enjoy the beat of your own life whether you're doing pushups, dips, tapback, or other workout moves. The dynamic choreography is designed to unleash your strength and potential to the fullest by exercising every muscle.

        Experience studio fitness from the comfort of your own home with thousands of on-demand courses to choose from every day.

Take your fitness routine to the next level and discover several exclusively selected courses such as indoor cycling, Barre, HIIT, kickboxing, and more. Feel the energy and give it your all.

 

 Freebike includes a free 90-day membership ($117 Value) to interactive and on-demand fitness. You can access ALL on-demand classes with rockstar instructors, gamified workouts, and performance tracking that you and your family will love.

Make your fitness routine fun and enjoy the membership loyalty program and challenges that reward you with real gifts to motivate you every step of your fitness journey.

Create up to 10 individual profiles so that everyone in your household can access our complete library of on-demand courses under one membership.

 

Turn the screen, get off the bike, and follow your personal trainer on a 22" HD touchscreen for cross-training. 

Thanks to the 180° degree rotating design, you can place the freebike anywhere in your training room and follow your trainer from any angle. It also features anti-fingerprint and anti-glare technology for a continuous fitness session.

   Lighten up your fitness routine with the gamification system. Freebike offers a fun interactive game in which you ride to the rhythm and score by how accurate you pedal on the beat.

    The gamification system also allows you to connect and compete with your friends and family. Accept the challenge and climb up the leaderboard to make the most out of your fitness adventure.

 

 The freebeat app knows your favorite and personalizes course recommendations for your own vibe. Our sensors won't miss a single pedal and you'll get instant performance tracking results. 

 Our system analyzes your performance in the past and recommends the best training program according to your preferences. Each smart class recommendation would be your favorite.

With the mobile app integration, you get instant feedback from our instructors and track your performance at every beat. Share your dynamic moves on social media with your friends and family!

 

Find your favorite and discover a new workout theme to love. We design tailored CGI animations that stimulate the vibe of each class to give you a fresh atmosphere each time. Feel the vibe and tune in to your fitness routine with various themes such as federal holidays, co-branding, and popular tunes! 

Immerse yourself in our synchronized visual and auditory creation for ultimate motivation with unique breath lighting that moves with your beat.

 

Freebike comes with a pair of chic-design motion-tracking smart dumbbells with a performance tracker that empowers you to explore all gamified strength classes. You can also work out with freebell in a variety of classes, including full-body circuits, lower body strength, and yoga. Shape your body at home and find your beat with this compact portable device.

 

Enjoy every second of your workout with the most effective trainers and earn real gifts with the membership loyalty program, because freebeat has reinvented the way you train at home.

 

Thanks to the combination of smart features and high-quality material, freebike is the most affordable way to keep your body in shape.

Freebike offers the same specifications as other brands and much more features such as special animation effects for every class and lively music that motivates you throughout your workout.

 

 With rockstar instructors running a variety of versatile courses right in your home, you are more than qualified to make this step into a fitness routine. See what our rider says about freebike!

We heard your voice on Facebook and we really enjoyed reading all the sweet and creative comments. Let's see what our freebike community has to say, check it out.

 

Every detail of the freebike is designed and engineered to provide you with a safe and comfortable ride. 

 

 

 

       We strive to provide our customers with products that meet and even exceed their expectations. Therefore, craftsmanship and quality are important to our business because we value our customers. Due to the overwhelming demand for deliveries worldwide, please note the time between the start of the campaign and delivery. We appreciate your support and understanding.

 

  We are a group of passionate fellas who aim to bring a wholesome lifestyle to everyone around the world. The founding team comes from a variety field of expertise across global companies including Bridgewater, Apple, Microsoft, NBA, Esquire, Soulcycle, Diesel, G-Star RAW, and Macquarie Group. Prior to their career paths, the founding team received educations from world's top schools including Stanford, Williams College, Washington University in St. Louis, and University of Toronto.

story:
Overview:

I am Dr. Salvatore DeRicco - a dentist, orthodontist, award-winning toothbrush inventor, and successful entrepreneur.  And I have invented The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™, which is the first brush engineered specifically for gums, and which was inspired by the estimated 90% of adults and teenagers who have gum disease - either gingivitis or periodontitis, and the many life-threatening and life-shortening diseases, which are known to be linked to gum disease.

While The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ was conceived of one year before the COVID-19 pandemic, the discovered link between gum disease and more severe effects of COVID-19 infection further inspired and expedited the need to produce it.  The most recent research - indicating that COVID-19 is NINE TIMES more fatal - in victims with gum disease, than in those without gum disease, validated our efforts:

https://nypost.com/2021/02/08/covid-19-patients...

I truly appreciate your considering The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™, and I hope that you can support this Campaign by either pledging for one of our Rewards and/or sharing the Campaign with your loved ones, friends, and colleagues, who may benefit from The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ - even if just to improve their breath, for when you have to meet with them! 

 

 
 

The need to brush not only at, but under our gumlines was determined in the 1940's - 75 YEARS AGO - shortly after World War II - by Charles C. Bass, M.D., and YES, he was not a dentist, but a physician, who had gum disease, and who wanted to avoid having to have his teeth extracted, as was done, routinely, for gum disease.  And, while he developed both a toothbrush and a technique for us to attempt to brush both at and under our gumlines - "The Bass Technique", he refused to distribute it to anyone - including dentists, who he did not personally instruct in its method of use - perhaps due to its complexity of use.  And nobody has developed a more predictably effective, efficient, and user-friendly brush - for gums, since then, which is why the incidence of gum disease is STILL outrageously high - at 90% of all adults and teens!... 

 

...Recognizing this cavernous void, in proper daily oral hygiene, I - as a Dental Specialist and an Award-Winning toothbrush inventor, have picked up where Dr. Bass left off, by establishing "The PERFECTED Bass Technique™", (a.k.a. "The SIMPLIFIED Bass Technique™"), by simplifying and foolproofing your ability to brush at and under your gumlines, especially because we have learned - much more recently, that gum disease not only results in the obvious problems, including:

 - BAD BREATH  (often due to gum disease)

 - GUM RECESSION  (the underlying bone degenerates and is lost and the gums follow)

 - TOOTH and IMPLANT LOSS  (when too much supporting bone is lost and mobility ensues)...

 

...but even more importantly, and due to gum disease being a chronic inflammatory infection, which enables pathologic oral bacteria to enter our bloodstreams, gum disease is also linked to the following Life-Shortening Diseases and Life-Threatening Diseases: 

- Heart disease 

- Liver, Lung, and Kidney Diseases

- Diabetes

- Pregnancy Diseases

- Cancers

- Alzheimer's Disease

- COVID-19 coronavirus infection (increased severity*) 

* Molayem S, Pontes CC. The Mouth-COVID Connection: Il-6 Levels in Periodontal Disease — Potential Role in COVID-19-Related Respiratory Complications [published online ahead of print July 30, 2020]. J Calif Dent Assoc doi: 10.35481/jcda-48-10-01.

 

There are two things that other brushes lack, which restricts them from getting to where The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS does - REACH and FIT. Other brushes cannot predictably reach - both to our gumlines and under our gumlines - especially on the tongue sides of our teeth, because our teeth, themselves, obstruct other brushes from getting there; and other, multi-row brushes have too many rows of bristles, to be able to fit under our gumlines.  The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS solves both of these problems:

1. By having an offset/extended head, which reaches over our front teeth - to reach our gumlines on the tongue sides of our back teeth, and over our back teeth, to reach our gumlines on the tongue side of our front teeth

2. By having just one row of bristles, in order to be able to fit under our gumlines!  

In addition, the bristles are offset by 45 degrees (to the sides of the handle), to help guide the bristles under our gumlines.  

And, finally, I designed the handle to be hollow – to reduce its plastic volume, and to reduce “plastic pollution”.  This was inspired by The Ocean Elders - an eminent advocacy team, which includes H. M. Queen Noor, H. S. H. Prince Albert II, Jackson Browne, Neil Young, Sir Richard Branson, Jean-Michel Cousteau, and many other researchers, educators, dignitaries and celebrities, who have brought my attention to this important consideration.

 

A reasonable analogy for using a TOOTHbrush to clean your gums is using a fork to cut your food; you can cut some of your foods, reasonably, with a fork (desserts, some breakfast foods, etc.) - perhaps 10% of all of your foods; but to cut 100% of your foods, properly, you need a knife; and, by the same token, you may be able to clean 10% of your gums, reasonably, with a TOOTHbrush, but to properly and effectively clean 100% of your gums, you need a brush specifically designed for reaching and brushing at and under your gumlines - namely, The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™!!

 

What makes The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ so unique and beneficial, is its combination of 6 features identified above:

1 - Its head is offset from the "neck" of the brush, to permit it to reach over all teeth, and to access the gumlines on the tongue side of ALL of your teeth - with unubstructed access

2 - It has only 5 tufts of bristles, so its bristles can fully and properly fit everywhere, including the "narrowest" areas - at and under the gumlines at the backs of your upper and lower front teeth (see demonstration video)

3 - It has only ONE row of Ultra-Soft bristles, so the bristles can predictably fit into the crevice between your gums and teeth

4 -  The bristles are offset at 45 degrees to the sides of the handle, to help guide the bristles under your gumlines, at the proper angle

5 - The handle is hollow - for plastic volume reduction 

6- The handle is vented, since it's hollow - for airflow/drying

The technique developed by Dr. Bass - which we have named "GUMSSAGE™" - is NOT a scrubbing motion - which can damage teeth (by creating "toothbrush abrasion" notches) and gums, (by abrading them away), but rather, is a gentle massaging/vibratory process, used with our exclusively ULTRA-SOFT bristles - to safely and effectively remove the harmful bacterial plaque and biofilm, located at and under your gumlines, without damaging your teeth and gums:

 

 

 

Unfortunately, much like many cancers, gum disease is asymptomatic, until the advanced stages - when it's often too late to be able to do much about it.  However, bleeding upon brushing is the cardinal sign of gum disease - even in its earliest stage!  As such, by being able to reach 100% of your gums, The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ serves as the perfect  diagnostic tool, for you to know if your gums are inflamed/infected, by just using it and reaching all your gums!  Since its bristles are all Ultra-Soft, end-rounded, polished, and non-irritating, any bleeding elicited can only be due to pre-existing inflammation/infection. And, if the bleeding continues - after several days of twice daily use, it's a strong indication of the need for you to see your dentist, ASAP - sooner than your next scheduled recall/check-up.

 

The Gold Medal for Personal Care Products is awarded to Dr. Salvatore P. DeRicco - at the INPEX Invention and New Products Exposition, 2017

The AWARD-WINNING INVENTOR & FOUNDER of Saviour GUMS and Saviour LIFE!™:

My name is Dr. Salvatore P. DeRicco, and I am a dentist, an accomplished orthodontist, an award-winning toothbrush inventor, and a successful entrepreneur. I have a 10 year history of toothbrush invention, production, and distribution, and I hold over 20 toothbrush patents – Nationally and Internationally, with other patents pending, including numerous ones for The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™.  

In 2015, out of concern for my own orthodontic patients, I introduced The SPOT LESS BRUSH - a specialized brush, which enables orthodontic patients to better brush around their braces; and, in 2018, I introduced The ImplantClean Brush - a specialized brush for implant-supported dentures and the supporting implants, themselves; together, these brushes have helped nearly 100,000 individuals, to date.  And, I have won Gold Medal Awards, for my toothbrushes – at the INPEX Invention and New Products Exposition - in the Personal Care category, in both 2016 and 2017. Additionally, besides having my own orthodontic practice, I spent 23 years studying and practicing with one of the world’s most revered dental specialists - in both orthodontics and periodontics – the late Dr. Robert L. Vanarsdall, Jr., of The University of Pennsylvania, including 10 years in one of the Nation’s renowned “meccas” of periodontics – the Philadelphia practice of Drs. D. Walter Cohen, Robert L. Vanarsdall, Jr. and Louis F. Rose; and I have routinely been voted “Best of Westchester” (my county in New York) - as an Orthodontist, in the 10 years that they’ve been conducting “Best of Westchester” voting.

I truly appreciate your considering The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™, and I hope that you can support this Campaign by either pledging for one of our Rewards and/or sharing the Campaign with your loved ones, friends, and colleagues, who may benefit from The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ - even if just to improve their breath, for when you have to meet with them! 

Thank you,

Salvatore P. DeRicco, DDS

 

Our Needs and Your Rewards:

The The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ is completing production, and we are seeking to raise $500 for the establishment of our fulfillment process. 

As rewards for your contribution, we are offering "Our most heartfelt thanks" and bonus products, for the earliest of contributors.  The brushes will retail - online, at $8.00 (plus shipping).  We have multiple discount levels for volume ordering - for those who also want to help their family, friends and colleagues to maintain healthier gums.  We look forward to partnering with you on the development and fulfillment of this  revolutionary oral hygiene product! 

Thank you and PLEASE Spread the Word!

Whether or not you are in a position to support this campaign, we sincerely thank you for taking the time to consider  contributing, and we ask that you also consider spreading the word to family, friends, colleagues, etc., because the chances are that you know someone who has gingivitis or periodontitis, and  who can benefit from this revolutionary new oral hygiene product.

Other brushes cannot predictably reach - both to our gumlines and under our gumlines - especially on the tongue sides of our teeth, because our teeth, themselves, obstruct other brushes from getting there; and other, multi-row brushes have too many rows of bristles, to be able to fit under our gumlines.  The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS solves both of these problems:
1. By having an offset/extended head, which reaches over our front teeth - to reach our gumlines on the tongue sides of our back teeth, and over our back teeth, to reach our gumlines on the tongue side of our front teeth
2. By having just one row of bristles, in order to be able to fit under our gumlines!  
In addition, the bristles are offset by 45 degrees (to the sides of the handle), to help guide the bristles under our gumlines.  
And, finally, I designed the handle to be hollow – to reduce its plastic volume, and to reduce “plastic pollution”.  This was inspired by The Ocean Elders - an eminent advocacy team, which includes H. M. Queen Noor, H. S. H. Prince Albert II, Jackson Browne, Neil Young, Sir Richard Branson, Jean-Michel Cousteau, and many other researchers, educators, dignitaries and celebrities, who have brought my attention to this important consideration.
 

A reasonable analogy for using a TOOTHbrush to clean your gums is using a fork to cut your food; you can cut some of your foods, reasonably, with a fork (desserts, some breakfast foods, etc.) - perhaps 10% of all of your foods; but to cut 100% of your foods, properly, you need a knife; and, by the same token, you may be able to clean 10% of your gums, reasonably, with a TOOTHbrush, but to properly and effectively clean 100% of your gums, you need a brush specifically designed for reaching and brushing at and under your gumlines - namely, The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™!!
 

What makes The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ so unique and beneficial, is its combination of 6 features identified above:
1 - Its head is offset from the "neck" of the brush, to permit it to reach over all teeth, and to access the gumlines on the tongue side of ALL of your teeth - with unubstructed access
2 - It has only 5 tufts of bristles, so its bristles can fully and properly fit everywhere, including the "narrowest" areas - at and under the gumlines at the backs of your upper and lower front teeth (see demonstration video)
3 - It has only ONE row of Ultra-Soft bristles, so the bristles can predictably fit into the crevice between your gums and teeth
4 -  The bristles are offset at 45 degrees to the sides of the handle, to help guide the bristles under your gumlines, at the proper angle
5 - The handle is hollow - for plastic volume reduction 
6- The handle is vented, since it's hollow - for airflow/drying

The technique developed by Dr. Bass - which we have named "GUMSSAGE™" - is NOT a scrubbing motion - which can damage teeth (by creating "toothbrush abrasion" notches) and gums, (by abrading them away), but rather, is a gentle massaging/vibratory process, used with our exclusively ULTRA-SOFT bristles - to safely and effectively remove the harmful bacterial plaque and biofilm, located at and under your gumlines, without damaging your teeth and gums:
 

 

 

Unfortunately, much like many cancers, gum disease is asymptomatic, until the advanced stages - when it's often too late to be able to do much about it.  However, bleeding upon brushing is the cardinal sign of gum disease - even in its earliest stage!  As such, by being able to reach 100% of your gums, The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ serves as the perfect  diagnostic tool, for you to know if your gums are inflamed/infected, by just using it and reaching all your gums!  Since its bristles are all Ultra-Soft, end-rounded, polished, and non-irritating, any bleeding elicited can only be due to pre-existing inflammation/infection. And, if the bleeding continues - after several days of twice daily use, it's a strong indication of the need for you to see your dentist, ASAP - sooner than your next scheduled recall/check-up.
 

The Gold Medal for Personal Care Products is awarded to Dr. Salvatore P. DeRicco - at the INPEX Invention and New Products Exposition, 2017
The AWARD-WINNING INVENTOR & FOUNDER of Saviour GUMS and Saviour LIFE!™:
My name is Dr. Salvatore P. DeRicco, and I am a dentist, an accomplished orthodontist, an award-winning toothbrush inventor, and a successful entrepreneur. I have a 10 year history of toothbrush invention, production, and distribution, and I hold over 20 toothbrush patents – Nationally and Internationally, with other patents pending, including numerous ones for The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™.  
In 2015, out of concern for my own orthodontic patients, I introduced The SPOT LESS BRUSH - a specialized brush, which enables orthodontic patients to better brush around their braces; and, in 2018, I introduced The ImplantClean Brush - a specialized brush for implant-supported dentures and the supporting implants, themselves; together, these brushes have helped nearly 100,000 individuals, to date.  And, I have won Gold Medal Awards, for my toothbrushes – at the INPEX Invention and New Products Exposition - in the Personal Care category, in both 2016 and 2017. Additionally, besides having my own orthodontic practice, I spent 23 years studying and practicing with one of the world’s most revered dental specialists - in both orthodontics and periodontics – the late Dr. Robert L. Vanarsdall, Jr., of The University of Pennsylvania, including 10 years in one of the Nation’s renowned “meccas” of periodontics – the Philadelphia practice of Drs. D. Walter Cohen, Robert L. Vanarsdall, Jr. and Louis F. Rose; and I have routinely been voted “Best of Westchester” (my county in New York) - as an Orthodontist, in the 10 years that they’ve been conducting “Best of Westchester” voting.
I truly appreciate your considering The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™, and I hope that you can support this Campaign by either pledging for one of our Rewards and/or sharing the Campaign with your loved ones, friends, and colleagues, who may benefit from The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ - even if just to improve their breath, for when you have to meet with them! 
Thank you,
Salvatore P. DeRicco, DDS
 

Our Needs and Your Rewards:
The The WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS™ is completing production, and we are seeking to raise $500 for the establishment of our fulfillment process. 
As rewards for your contribution, we are offering "Our most heartfelt thanks" and bonus products, for the earliest of contributors.  The brushes will retail - online, at $8.00 (plus shipping).  We have multiple discount levels for volume ordering - for those who also want to help their family, friends and colleagues to maintain healthier gums.  We look forward to partnering with you on the development and fulfillment of this  revolutionary oral hygiene product! 
Thank you and PLEASE Spread the Word!
Whether or not you are in a position to support this campaign, we sincerely thank you for taking the time to consider  contributing, and we ask that you also consider spreading the word to family, friends, colleagues, etc., because the chances are that you know someone who has gingivitis or periodontitis, and  who can benefit from this revolutionary new oral hygiene product.

story:
POCKET MONKII 2™ is a complete bodyweight training system. You can get as good of a workout as the gym, but now you can do it anywhere. 

You aren't made to stare at a screen or move like a machine.  You're made to be wild.

 

 

 

 

 

 

So you want to be wild? Awesome, we've got the training side of things dialed for you - all you have to do is show up.  We've included over 100 days of training with PM2.  You'll start out easy with the 21-Day Habit and things will get more challenging from there. Remember, the monkii APP will show you exactly what to do.

 

We don't care what you look like - you won't see any "transformation" pictures here. Our goal is to help you get stronger for your own unique adventures - whatever they may be and wherever they may take you.

Be Wild,

Dan, David and Kim

To learn more about what's included in this reward level, explore Chapter 2: Upgrade Options.

 

 

If you liked the original, then you'll be obsessed over POCKET MONKII 2. PM2 is more efficient, easier to use, insanely durable, even stronger, more comfortable and loaded with ridiculously high-quality touchpoints and new features that you won't believe you lived without. The best part: it's more portable than ever and it still only weighs a pound.

 

v2.0 Design Notes

The all-new Adventure Case is now much easier to un-pack & re-pack. It features a 4-way transport strap that offers multiple ways to connect to your pack, and also provides an all-new storage option for hanging on your door when not in use. It's more durable and features higher quality materials and components at every touchpoint.

SPECS: 6" Tall (No change) | 3.5" Diameter (+0.5) | 2.6 oz (+0.6)

 

Easier Access

PM2 features an expandable capacity Wide-Mouth Opening that makes removing and storing the Bodyweight System incredibly fast and easy. (It also allows you to store the Outdoor Anchor 2 inside the Adventure Case.)

 

Instant On-Door Storage

The all-new 4-Way Transport Strap enables you to store your grips inside the Adventure Case when not in use. The Bomber Door Anchor provides enough counterweight to keep PM2 on your door even when the door is opened. This makes PM2 always ready for action.

 

 

 

 

v2.0 Design Notes

The all-new Bodyweight System features larger diameter, more comfortable grips, a "no-fuss" Dynamic Adjustment system that makes it easier to set your favorite positions, a silicone-coated steel door anchor and premium buttery-soft webbing.

SPECS: 82" Long (+2) | 14 oz (+4)

 

Bigger, Better Grips

PM2 features larger diameter, anodized aluminum grips inspired by technical ice-axes used by mountaineers.

 

Instant Setup, Easy "No Fuss" Adjustment

PM2 is even easier to setup and use. Our incredibly minimalist Dynamic Adjustment System provides 9 "No-Fuss" setup heights that integrate seamlessly into our training.

 

Premium Materials, Buttery-Soft Webbing

We made sure that everything you touch is super comfortable, sleek and premium.

For those who take their training extremely seriously and most likely rely on it for life and death situations, we created TACTICAL PM2.  It features an exclusive ultra-durable black powder-coat finish on all of the hardware and a blacked-out color scheme on everything else. And let's be real, it looks badass. 

 

 

 

What's Included:

  • TACTICAL PM2
  • TACTICAL TRAINING V: THE ENEMY WITHIN
  • ALL TRAINING INCLUDED WITH PM2
  • OPPORTUNITY TO EARN THE ENEMY WITHIN PATCH
 

It's like discovering the fountain of wildness.

 

Meet our 3 highly effective and best-selling products together for the very first time in a complete bundle that covers every aspect of your functional training needs.

You already know why you need PM2. Let's dive into how adding MONKII 360 and ISOCORE X can take your workouts to the next level.

 

Everything you do is powered by your core.

 

MONKII 360 makes it stronger.

✅ BUILD FUNCTIONAL CORE STRENGTH

✅ DEVELOP EXPLOSIVE POWER

✅ IMPROVE STABILITY & BALANCE

 

 

MONKII 360™ is the most functional core trainer on the market because it is powered by our proprietary DynaForce resistance bungees to provide tension over the entire range-of-motion AND MassCore modular weights to amplify the resistance.

 

 

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS THINK:

 

INCLUDES THE COMBO PROGRAM

 

SEE IT IN ACTION: 

 

 

 

WHAT'S INCLUDED:

  • MONKII 360 SYSTEM
  • MassCore Modular Weight
  • (2) DynaForce Bungees
  • COMBO TRAINING
  • (3) Bonus Training Programs (Habit, Core, Isocore)

 

MEET ISOCORE X  

A dynamic shoulder strengthening system that's the perfect warmup tool to use before every workout or as a precision training device targeting your shoulders and upper body.

 

 

It’s dynamic. It’s functional. And it targets the entirety of your shoulders unlike anything else.

 

BENEFITS:

 

✅ Strengthen Primary + Stabilizer Muscles

✅ Increase Range of Motion 

✅ Prevent Injury & Reduce Pain

✅ Get Old-School Grip Strength

 

 

SEE HOW IT WORKS: 

 
 

WHAT'S INCLUDED:

  • ISOCORE X COMPLETE SYSTEM
  • S3 TRAINING W/ 12 WORKOUTS

Includes everything in the ECOSYSTEM but comes in the Blacked-Out color scheme and includes heavier MassCore weight, higher resistance DynaForce Bungees and our entire Tactical Training library (5 Complete Programs). 

Add-Ons are available to select after you've chosen your main Kickstarter reward. Just choose your reward via the Kickstarter platform and you'll be taken to the Add-on menu where you can select the following:

 

 

 

SEE IT IN ACTION:

 

 

WHAT'S INCLUDED:

  • OUTDOOR ANCHOR 2
  • (BONUS) ULTRALIGHT CARRY POUCH
  • (2) BE WILD CARABINERS

 

Strength hurts but speed kills.

Agility is a skill. If you don’t use it; you lose it. The pm2 Agility program is the first of its kind to blend our proprietary Core-Agility™ training with classic footwork agility exercises. You will re-learn how to move quickly and efficiently in a way that prepares you to be ready. You will increase your range of motion, improve endurance, get faster and stronger, and build a body that can flow through the wild. This 36-day program takes you through 3 phases of increasing difficulty and complexity. When you complete that final day, you will feel ready for anything.

 

SEE IT IN ACTION:

 

 

WHAT'S INCLUDED:

  • Agility Mat w/ Functional Overlay
  • 36-Day Agility Training Program

 

 

 

Estimated Shipping Fees: 

Shipping fees will be collected post-campaign via the BackerKit platform.  This enables us to charge you the most accurate and fair shipping possible based on the weight of your package and shipping destination. Thankfully, PM2 only weighs a pound so shipping is inexpensive!!!  Note that Eco-System reward levels include MassCore weights which are heavy!

 

USA ESTIMATES:

PM2: $6-9

TACTICAL PM2: $6-9

ECOSYSTEM: $16-20

TACTICAL ECOSYSTEM: $16-20

OUTDOOR ANCHOR 2: Ships Free w/ any of the above

AGILITY MAT: $9-14

 

INTERNATIONAL ESTIMATES:

PM2: $15-20

TACTICAL PM2: $15-20

ECOSYSTEM: $50-79

TACTICAL ECOSYSTEM: $50-85

OUTDOOR ANCHOR 2: Ships Free w/ any of the above

AGILITY MAT: $30-60

 

A Note On Customs: All international backers will be responsible for customs fees charged by their respective countries.

--- 

©2021 THE WILD GYM COMPANY LLC

Nanoweave™ trademark and patents licensed from Kammok

story:
ContaKids Cards is a fun, interactive, and physical card game for 3–6 year old children and their parents/carers to play together.

Our aim is to spread positivity, playfulness, movement and connection all around the world! 

That's why we created ContaKids Cards.


ALL ABOUT CONTAKIDS CARDS 

The game helps families to log off, move, play, connect, and be completely present with each other.  

The ContaKids Cards is meant for everyone. 

No previous experience in sports or dance is needed to move and have fun together. Though if you are an experienced mover, ContaKids Cards could bring new inspiration for you too.

ContaKids Cards is a set of 30 engaging movement and task cards.

The cute and playful illustrations act as a step by step guide, walking families through the unique ContaKids moves.

Exercises range from relaxed Low on the Floor to more challenging activities such as those High in the Air... and everything in between.

And, we’ve made sure the cards are intuitive to use, whether you want a 10 or a 30 minute session.

THE GAME'S BENEFITS?

ContaKids Cards is a daily reminder to be present, spend quality time together, and connect as a family. It makes it easy for parents and children to play together. To discover physical possibilities and build mutual trust. The game rekindles a sense of touch and helps to develop the child’s motor skills.

FEEDBACK FROM THE PILOT

Early this year we ran a pilot with over 20 families from across Europe and beyond. The feedback we’ve got was extremely positive and inspiring.

WHAT IS CONTAKIDS?

Our game is based on ContaKids – a playful movement practice for children and their parents where both take active roles.

OUR STORY

ContaKids Cards founder Justina Brazaitė has been running ContaKids classes in both Norway and Lithuania, when she realised something was missing: a tool that would help families log off, move, play,  connect, and be completely present with each other. Something that would let families easily create those precious moments both in and out of ContaKids classes.

So.. Justina hooked up with Itay Yatuv, ContaKids founder, and Sam Baum, a designer and fellow ContaKids teacher. And, together with Sam’s brother, an illustrator Josh Baum, they have developed ContaKids Cards!

We just ran a successful campaign on Kickstarter reaching enough funds to bring ContaKids Cards to life. But we still need YOUR HELP so we can upgrade the packaging and reach out to people all around the world. And the best way to help is  to order your decks of ContaKids Cards and invite others to do so too.

OUR VALUES

We do what we do in an ethical and playful way, always thinking about quality and sustainability

Thus ContaKids Cards will come to life in a beautiful, ethical, and environmentally conscious print. We have chosen top-quality, durable, and long-lasting materials for the production. We will be using FSC certified paper/cardboard, and printing will be done with vegetable based ink locally in Europe, where our base is, thus minimising shipping and also supporting local businesses. We also will be using as little packaging as possible.

Risks & Challenges

We have tested ContaKids Cards with our pilot families and the game works great. Throughout many years of experience in print design Studio, Baum has also developed a trustworthy partnership with a local manufacturer in Bristol, UK, who specializes in ethical and environmentally conscious prints. We have thoroughly worked out the logistics to make sure that you get your ContaKids Cards as soon as possible after the campaign ends. Our main challenge is the constantly changing and unpredictable situation of the pandemic, which could disrupt the shipping and take a little bit more time. But we will be keeping our supporters updated on the status of our project.

Terms & Conditions

By backing the project you understand that you are also responsible for providing correct address information, ensuring the address is deliverable by usual methods at least until November 2021. In addition, you are responsible for any import duties, and any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities. We will do our best to organise shipping as customs-friendly as possible. However, it might happen that some extra fees may apply in international shipping from the UK. Shipping in the UK, Israel, Lithuania, and Norway will be organised domestically.

Refund policy

Indiegogo is not a store and Indiegogo usually does not issue refunds. When you order your perk, you're supporting a creator's right to try to make something new—and agreeing to go along for the ride.

Our main challenge is the constantly changing and unpredictable situation of the pandemic, which could disrupt the shipping and take a little bit more time. But we will be keeping our supporters updated on the status of our project.
Terms & Conditions
By backing the project you understand that you are also responsible for providing correct address information, ensuring the address is deliverable by usual methods at least until November 2021. In addition, you are responsible for any import duties, and any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities. We will do our best to organise shipping as customs-friendly as possible. However, it might happen that some extra fees may apply in international shipping from the UK. Shipping in the UK, Israel, Lithuania, and Norway will be organised domestically.
Refund policy
Indiegogo is not a store and Indiegogo usually does not issue refunds. When you order your perk, you're supporting a creator's right to try to make something new—and agreeing to go along for the ride.

story:
PROTECT YOURSELF and YOUR FAMILY with WONDERTOOL™

✅Scientists at Fujita Health University told a news conference they had proven that ozone gas in concentrations of 0.05 to 0.1 parts per million (ppm), levels considered harmless to humans, could kill the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 (Covid-19). TOKYO (Reuters 02.09.2020)

✅Stanford University’s Residential and Dining Enterprises has adopted a green cleaning standard that has reduced chemical usage in residences by over 90%.
The system engineers water by infusing it with OZONE to create a solution as effective as traditional chemicals with no environmental or human health consequences.  In 2018 access to the green cleaning system was expanded to students to clean their own apartments and use as laundry detergent.

✅The International Ozone Association confirms that OZONE is highly effective for the inactivation of many viruses.The study demonstrates that an ozone application achieves a high level of disinfection against PsA, a vegetative bacteria that the CDC identifies as more difficult to kill than medium-sized viruses such as SARS-CoV-2 (Covid-19),

                                           

Nice day! 
I hope you are keeping healthy.
WONDERTOOL™/// wash quickly without detergent/// cleans everything,
even the virus around
Finally, we shipped the first release  WONDERTOOL™  to our fulfillment
center in the USA.
Only     58        WONDERTOOL™  will be available at a special price from
September 19th  
All the best,
Vlad Datsyshyn,
inventor the WONDERTOOL™, Ph.D. in Engineering

WONDERTOOL™ for a SPORT –ideal, when you have only a few items to wash or your skin is sensitive to harmful chemicals and detergents

WONDERTOOL™ for a BABY – perfect for daily washing of kids clothes, because of gentle skin isn't compatible with chemical washing powders and germs

WONDERTOOL™ for an URBAN – great alternative to hand washing or making trips to the laundromat in-between big loads and anywhere where space is limited

WONDERTOOL™ for a HEALTH – best practice of protection against bacteria and viruses

 

✅ Washing without detergent  –  protect the environment and your skin   

✅ Washing without pesky germs/viruses  –  stay healthy as your number one priority  

✅ Washing in cold water  –  save energy and keep your clothes from shrinking

✅  Washing without twisting – a gentle cycle keeps gentle clothes from stretching 

✅ Dry cleaning without chemicals - remove these stinky smells from clothes yourself

✅ Cleaning fruits/vegetables – just imagine, clean food without germs and viruses

✅ Cleaning toys –keep your kids by protection from germs and viruses

✅ Cleaning the house with ozonated water – nothing is cleaner than using ozonized water

✅ Air purification with ozonated water – clean air, like after a thunderstorm  

✅ Disinfection of the car ventilation system  -- nothing can do this better than ozonized air

THE SECRET is saturating the water with OZONE – ozone naturally defends and cleans our planet. Everyone remembers that fresh air smell left from a thunder and lightning storm - the ozone made it that way! The benefit of ozone treatment is derived from its strong oxidation potential and the ability to transform and degrade most organic substances. The ozone works by breaking down the molecular bonds that hold grime to your clothes. Ozone makes this breakdown faster and more reliable than detergents, and it doesn't leave any chemical contamination in water and clothes. And you need fresh air in the house – make it happen with WONDERTOOL™ – it's a BONUS.

WONDERTOOL™ does your laundry anywhere and doesn't need a fixed connection to water supply and drain. The ergonomic design includes a durable handle for easy carrying, and a strong, tightly closing lid for loading and unloading your laundry. WONDERTOOL™ work from AC 110-240 v. Weight without loading - 11 lb (5 kg) and capable of washing up to - 6 lb (3kg). Dimensions - 13 "15 "13"

WONDERTOOL™ makes your life easier and compatible with Sonoff Wi-fi Smart on/off Timer, Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit & Google Assistant

You can put WONDERTOOL™ anywhere: on the floor, in the shower cabin, in the bath, on the table or countertop and even on the ground near the house or car. For safe use of WONDERTOOL™ in high humidity conditions, we specifically use a low-volt safety supply of DC 12V, as in your car. 

 

 

WONDERTOOL™  SAVES MONEY with EVERY WASH, PAYS for ITSELF within few MONTHS,  and HEALTH - PRICELESS

WONDERTOOL ™ SOLVES MANY OF YOUR DAILY LAUNDRY PROBLEMS:

SPORTSWEAR gets dirty and smelly every day and is often needed the next day. With WONDERTOOL™ your favorite sportswear will be clean without chemical powder inside

DAILY WEAR: shirts, blouses and personal items require that fresh and clean look. And you don't need someone else's mud on them from the public laundromat. 

Why accumulate children's clothing in the laundry basket? To make it even dirtier due to cross-contamination of other bacteria? Or waiting to accommodate a small wash in-between big load?

But most of all, kids clothes accumulate every day, and they are always very lacking. Don't you want to solve this problem without the risk of washing powder and germs on your delicate babies skin?

 Detergents adhere strongly to tissues and even repeatedly rinsing clothes in clean water doesn't allow them to be completely removed. It is always on our skin, and absorbed, causing allergic reactions and more serious health problems. The main role of detergents is to reduce contamination and the bonding of molecules to textiles. The same task is successfully solved with the help of ozone, and no more chemicals for washing clothes when you have the WONDERTOOL™

Ironically the very detergents that we normally use to get our clothes “clean” may actually be leaving them worse off than they were before we ran the wash. When you first switch to laundry your clothes w/ WONDERTOOL™, you will have suds whether or not you add any soap. There are so much residual soap and chemicals in your clothes after traditional laundering methods that you will be amazed. Switch to ozone washing w/ WONDERTOOL™ and stop all those chemicals from getting on the skin and inside your body.

Regular washing machines don't kill enough pathogenic germs and viruses with normal temperature treatment, turning your laundry into a bacterial danger. Good bio-security practices - using the biocidal properties of ozone to remove dirt, bacteria and viruses from your laundry reduces and even eliminates the need for harsh detergents for washing. Allergic reactions are eliminated due to residues of biocides in washed clothes and it becomes sterile and naturally fresh when you have the WONDERTOOL™  

Ozone laundering eradicates 99 % of bacteria and viruses in less than a few minutes, and this isn't an achievable result for traditional heat treatment.  Studies of traditional thermal washing have shown that only exposure to water at a temperature of 160ºF (71ºC) for 25 minutes will lead to the death of almost all pathogens. The process also needs a dizzying set of toxic chemicals, including Chlorine, which you absolutely don't want to take. Ozone first oxidizes and destroys bacteria, viruses and then turns into oxygen. WONDERTOOL™  replaces most of the chemicals needed to achieve an excellent end result only cold ozone saturated water.

Don't worry about damaging your expensive clothes made from natural silk and cashmere, there’s no need to sort clothes into different fabrics or colors for separate loads. Clothes become softer, fluffier, and fabric life is extended longer. Ozonated cold water will change your wash and you don't have to worry about damaged clothes when using the WONDERTOOL™. What you are left with are clean clothes free of any smells, grime or chemicals. And don't worry about the colored clothes - WONDERTOOL™ is washing in cold water - the colors stay in place.

Degradation of the clothes textile takes in the traditional wash wheel, where dynamic loads of twisting and stretching in hot water with caustic chemicals wear out and abrade the fabric. WONDERTOOL™ ozone washing by curtailing the chemicals and by decreasing the water temperature and have resulted in a more than 50% reduction in fabric degradation.

When clothes are worn even for a short time, a bad smell may be absorbed into the fabric, although the clothes are generally unsoiled. Examples can include adsorption of cigarette smoke into clothes, the smell of sweat, or removal of perfume traces. In this case, clothes, as a rule, don't have to be washed, but removing the adsorbed odor and killing viruses and pathogenic bacteria is required. Save time and money on dry cleaning with WONDERTOOL™, you just need to put the clothes in a plastic bag and send dry OZONE there with a silicone hose from WONDERTOOL™

WONDERTOOL™ is great for dry cleaning and removing unpleasant smells (sweat, tobacco, etc.) from your clothes, shoes and other things, including children's toys (made of fabric) and pillows. On clothing and other surfaces harder to disinfect pathogenic microbes and viruses can survive up to 24 hours,  and even up to 2-3 days. But our WONDERTOOL™ also removes 99% of known pathogenic microbes and viruses. Just put the dirty items inside (without water) and set the timer for 15 minutes. Protect yourself and your family with WONDERTOOL™. 

WONDERTOOL ™ is ideal for cleaning even sneakers - remove these smelly smells, bacteria and viruses from your shoes yourself.

Hand-washing fruits and vegetables remove only about 70% of pesticides and germs. But the ozone successfully disinfects and kills 99% of bacteria and viruses while reducing water and energy consumption. This is more difficult to do with traditional methods of washing using a lot of hot water and even bactericides in sterilization. WONDERTOOL ™ - the best bio-protection practice - keep your healthy by providing protection from agro-chemicals, bacteria, and viruses! 

WONDERTOOL™ in just a few minutes gently washes fruits, berries, vegetables and salad greens to 99% purity.

Ozone was approved by the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) as an antimicrobial agent in 2001 and it has since been used to combat bacteria and chemical residue.

WONDERTOOL™ can prepare ozone-charged water for cleaning in the house – germs, bacteria, and viruses will be destroyed. The ozone creates a more powerful and less selective secondary oxidant, hydroxyl radicals, in the water. The free radicals hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) and hydroxyl (OH) that are formed have a much higher oxidation potential than ozone and require even less time of contact of ozonated water with bacteria and viruses for their complete destruction. But it's necessary to use freshly prepared water, ozone very quickly returns to normal oxygen. This is the best way to ensure uncompromised cleanliness in the house. And this can't be achieved without ozone-saturated water with hydrogen peroxide and hydroxyl  from WONDERTOOL™

  

WONDERTOOL™ sterilizes many items: kids' toys, kitchen tools, and personal hygiene products. Only one warning - ozone during a very long and repeated exposure can deteriorate rubber products. When was the last time you cleaned your razor, toothbrush, or make-up brush? With WONDERTOOL™ you can finally clean it all back to its original sterile cleanliness. After this, ozonated water is very useful to water the houseplants so you protect them from fungi and harmful microbes.

 

WONDERTOOL™ cleans the air in the house and destroys 99% of microbes and viruses. It successfully removes unpleasant cigarette and mold smells. Remember, during the air purification process, people and animals can't be in the room, and after that, it is necessary to ventilate the room well. Everyone remembers the clean air after a thunder and lightning storm – it’s the ozone that washed it! WONDERTOOL™ will bring this wonderful natural effect into your home. 

WONDERTOOL™ can be connected to any home outlet (110-240 v).   WONDERTOOL™ works in manual mode - use only the on / off switch and timer. The washing time and the amount of loading should be determined by testing and your preferences. Usually, 15 minutes for washing and 5 minutes for rinsing are sufficient. It's very simple and reliable.

WONDERTOOL ™ is designed for a 7/24 run time with 15 min breaks every 60 min. Use 60+ minutes to clean the air of foreign smells and infections in the house (and even your car and boat). You will get great air quality in a house without allergens, germs, dust, and therefore a better quality of life. Remember, during the air purification process, people and animals can't be in the room, and after that, it is necessary to ventilate the room well. 

WONDERTOOL ™ is indispensable for cleaning the car interior from odors and, more importantly, from harmful bacteria and viruses found blowing around car air conditioning systems. For this, 15-minute treatments of the passenger compartment with ozonized air are sufficient with the ventilation system running.

WONDERTOOL™ can do it all, but ozone can be dangerous if handled incorrectly. Ozone is a strong oxidizer that is generally not harmful to humans and mammals at low concentrations, but homicidal to microorganisms such as bacteria. You must respect the oxidative powers of ozone and treat it accordingly. We thoroughly tested and selected the necessary power of the ozone generator so that it completely dissolves in the water. Nevertheless, some ozone will be released into the environment. Therefore, it is important to use WONDERTOOL™ together with the ventilation included and don't stay long in the same room while it works. Ozone will do its job and very quickly convert back to safeoxygen. Ozone is used in swimming pools, hospitals, and hotels for water disinfection and air freshening. It can also be used to clean industrial and domestic laundries and effectively combat pollution and save the environment from chemical detergents. Ozone has been approved by the FDA, USDA, and the EPA as antimicrobial disinfectants.

SHIPPING

 WONDERTOOL™ is not huge (15"13"15"), but to protect the product we must package it well. We will use the distribution centers of our partners to deliver to the US and EU. Also, prices don't include VAT and other country taxes, which may add to you upon receipt of the order in your country. Within 24 hours of your order being shipped from USPS, FedEx, and DHL, you will receive a tracking № with your shipping details. 

WARRANTY

We provide warranty service for 2 years from the date of purchase of this product.

We warrant this product to be free of major defects in material or workmanship to the original purchaser for a period of 2 years from the original date of purchase. This warranty is subject to the following limitations:
-We will make the final warranty determination, which may require inspection and/or photos and/or videos of the equipment, which clearly show the defect(s). 
-If a product is deemed to be defective, the warranty covers the repair or replacement of the defective product only.

-The warranty does not cover damage caused by misuse, abuse, neglect, or normal wear and tear including but not limited to,  damage caused by improper handling or storage, damage caused by impact, damage caused by use in contravention of local law, or damage caused by anything other than defects in material and workmanship.
-This warranty is voided if any unauthorized repair, change, or modification has been made to any part of the equipment.

-Warranty claims must be processed and be issued a return authorization.  If your warranty is accepted, we’ll send you a return shipping label, as well as instructions on how and where to send your package. Items sent back to us without first requesting will not be accepted.
To obtain warranty service, please contact us at , and a service center address will be provided to you.

We’re confident nothing will go wrong, but if it does, we’ll make it right.

For any questions, you can send us an e-mail to wondertool2019@gmail.com

story:
hemVR is a fitness VR solution that will bring engagement, connectivity, and effectiveness to all levels of bikers & all types of indoor bikes.

 

Having TV shows doesn’t help. That’s why we created hemVR - a virtual reality headset that turns your cycling workout into an exciting and engaging adventure in different parts of the world! Need more motivation? Get into a social adventure by cycling with friends and explore the VR world together without leaving your home!
Unlike other VR headset bundles, hemVR users save additional costs with no extra hardware needed. All you need for hemVR is a VR-compatible smartphone for easy integration.

*Note: hemVR is compatible with an iPhone 7 or above. For Android users, please download the hemVR apps and tap “Test My Phone” on the home screen to check your phone's compatibility

Our patented design assures a space between your face and the headset. Say goodbye to the stickiness & discomfort as you work out in the virtual world.

With the early bird package, you will unlock 3 different game apps, available on both iOS & Android. More games will be released in summer 2021 for all users at no additional cost.

hemVR is a novel way to enjoy exercising in a new perspective and allows exercisers to connect with others during their virtual journey.

hemVR will allow your senior family members to mentally explore a different realm while performing light exercises in a physically safe environment.

hemVR allows friends and family to overcome distance and spend some quality time together through a group workout session! 

Patented in the U.S. & Japan, hemVR is currently the only cycling-oriented VR headset in the market with an easy-to-use VR system. With the fitness-friendly & contactless design, hemVR ensures airflow and comfort during your workout.

The hemVR set comes with a special sensor that tracks your personal fitness activities. Simply attach the sensor to the crank arm or your feet, and your activity data is on its way to your smartphone. Gain meaningful insights into your health condition and monitor your progress over time within our visual dashboard.

Indoor biking gets boring when you look at the same scenery in the room over and over again - even with the TV on. hemVR is designed for doing bike training within VR games to keep you engaged and entertained throughout the whole cycling process.

Your hemVR comes with three game apps available in iOS and Android, with a 4th app on its way! All games are accessible through our hemVR’s app at no extra cost.

Float like an astronaut and explore the galaxy from various perspectives.

Transform into a bird and flap your wings in the sky as you advance. Balloons, airplanes, and missiles ambush you along the way -- dodge them to stay alive and aim for a high score!

Take an unknown journey as you pedal. Ride into foreign streets and meet people from other parts of the world.

Enjoy cycling along with friends in the VR world and chat with each other virtually. Pick your avatar and have simulated real-life competition and gaming experience while cycling together as a group!

With just five simple steps that are so easy to follow, you will be ready to start pedaling!

It comes with the newly patented contactless VR goggle Headset and a Sensor that connects to your smartphone app.

Toyama, the hemVR founder, was born and raised in Nagoya, Japan before leaving for his Bachelor's Degree in the U.S. and China. 

Currently, Toyama lives in Sweden with his family of 3 kids & a rabbit. He loves to read, reading 100+ books per year on top of thousands of Manga. He also loves working out in the gym during his free time. 

Toyama has over 2 decades of experience in running various businesses. During his free time, he dabbled in VR headsets. As a workout enthusiast, he eventually fell in love with VR gym training. Yet, he couldn’t find a product that could keep him comfortable with the headset on throughout his workout sessions. He also often got motion sickness using existing VR headsets. In 2016, he decided to start his own VR Bike Project to solve these problems. 

Toyama hired a team of Unity programmers, plugin programmers, electronic engineers, 2D/3D designers, 3D printing designers, factory inspectors, & patent lawyers from over 10 different countries. Finally, after 4 years of development, hemVR was brought to life.

story:
ThermGo is Ready To Ship!

 

If you backed 【Super Early Bird - ThermGo】 before March 25th, when we didn't ask you for shipping info and separated shipping fees from perk price, please check the email requesting your shipping info from HiDiThermGO@outlook.com and pay the shipping fee.

We'll arrange shipment soon after we receive your shipping fee. If you have any question please contact our support team at HiDiThermGO@outlook.com

 

ThermGo is a portable thermometer phone accessory that works with all mobile devices. No battery is needed, simply plug it into your phone or tablet to instantly measure temperature on persons, objects, or surfaces. It provides accurate temperature reading instantly and can log and track data in-app to monitor changes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ThermGo takes body temperature measurements in a safe, hygienic way without contacting the skin. This method saves time and eliminates the need to sanitize between uses. Its highly accurate infrared sensors are certified with over 2000 tests to ensure reliable accuracy of ±0.1°C.

 

 

 

ThermGo is fast and user-friendly. It easily switches between Fahrenheit & Celsius and is designed to work with multiple users so that you can perform temp checks on the whole family, friends, or colleagues. The temperatures can be tracked and monitored in-app with multi-user management. The app gives instant insight into temp data and lets you see temperature history and trends to easily monitor changes.

 

 

 

Do away with the uncomfortable temperature reading methods of the past that kids won’t sit still for. A quick second is all it takes for ThermGo to get an accurate non-contact measurement on kids and it won’t bother babies. And because it measures temp on any object, It’s also useful for other baby care needs such as checking the temperature of food, milk, or bath water.

 

 

 

ThermGo has many other uses around the home or workshop. It’s a convenient way to measure the indoor temp (15-35℃) and temp of any surface (30-50℃)，which makes it industrial and DIY applications as well.

 

 

 

ThermGo is compatible with all common mobile devices including iPhone and Android phones and tablets. It doesn’t require batteries and uses power directly from the device. It simply plugs into the HSB-C port (Lightning and Micro USB adapters are included for various devices) and the app is cross-compatible with both Apple and Android operating systems.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

HiDi Biotech is an exciting new startup with the goal of bringing more convenience to daily lives with simple, yet useful gadgets. The team at HiDi has years of individual experience with product design, electronics and biotech. Together, they are applying the latest technologies to everyday problems to streamline modern lives and help people live better.

 

 

 

 

HiDi Biotech has years of experience designing innovative biotech products and customer service is always our first priority. We have reliable suppliers and excellent manufacturing partners that we have long term relationships with that are ready to handle mass production for ThermGo. However, we understand that challenges can occur even with a well-prepared and executed campaign. If any unexpected problems arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving them. Contact us for any questions or concerns.

story:
VRTX MESH Resistance Band 2.0 Unleashed!
=> Pre-order on the right side =>

 

WE HEARD YOU and Here you go! We value your opinion and experience above all, we at VRTX recreated the VRTX MESH Resistance Band for a better look and feel, and more importantly, the performance. The VRTX MESH Resistance Band 2.0 showcases a smaller logo plate as well as a minor redesign, allowing for better and more consistent grip with less chances of fiber snags.

 

Here are two main upgraded spots:

1. Smaller Logo Plate

The MESH Resistance band’s prior design affected user grip due to the larger logo plate. To remedy this, we minimized the logo plate to prioritize the consistency of the grip and is situated in places where users normally wouldn’t grip the band for ease of use.

 

2. Improved Weaving Technique (to reduce probability of torn fibers)

We’ve also improved the weaving technique to increase the band’s durability as well as its visual quality by reducing the chances of fiber snags.

 

 

Pre-order Now on Indiegogo Indemand!

Get your hands on VRTX MESH 2.0 for an upgraded training experience. 

 

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

We are VRTX. Our aim is the perfect union of science and fitness. 

 

And now, VRTX MESH is the first offering from our proprietary Intelli-Weave Technology range.

To preorder it and bring it to life, click "Back This Project".

Introducing VRTX MESH:

 

 

Traditional rubber bands have three main critical flaws:

  • After reacting with oxygen and your sweat, they generate a layer of white residue on their surface which results in allergic reactions.
  • They pinch your skin and skin hair while stretching.
  • They are prone to generate tiny tears which give a risk of snapping when deteriorating.

 

That’s why we created VRTX MESH resistance band with our intelli-weave technology which is US utility patent-pending, fixing the problems, and more.

How? We are fitness enthusiasts.

Okay, be patient, my friends. Before we dive deeper into the features, let’s enjoy more photos of VRTX MESH.

 

 

1. Industry-Leading Structural Integrity - Train with confidence that our supreme product will endure your heaviest workouts.

A common problem with the elastic rubbers of the traditional resistance bands is that they can be prone to generate tiny tears when deteriorating, or when exposed to sharp objects that are very commonly found in training environments. Once the traditional band develops even just a tiny tear, there will already be a risk of the band snapping completely, which is unsafe not only for the person using it but also for anybody training nearby.

 

 

 

VRTX MESH resistance band will never encounter this kind of problem because with its unique intelli-weave technology (latex rubber fiber + polyester fabric fiber), it is highly resistant to deterioration, fatigue, or physical damages due to external causes. This allows the users to stretch the band literally as far as they want, without having the fear of the band snapping.

 

 

 

 

2. Skin-Friendly - No more allergic reaction with added comfort & irresistible Touch.

After being exposed to oxygen, water, and UV rays, the rubbers of traditional resistance bands tend to generate a layer of white residue on the surface of bands which irritate human skin, commonly resulting in an allergic reaction. Also, They often pinch and chafe your skin, causing pain and irritation which distracts you during training.

 

 

 

 

VRTX MESH is a unique training band unlike any other. Its selected fabric texture is super-comfortable, hypoallergenic and suited perfectly for each individual so you will never have to worry about any discomfort when exercising. It also promotes good hygiene because just like your favorite training vest, you can toss it in your washing machine right after use and leave it to dry indoors and you won’t have to worry about the quality being damaged.

 

 

 

 

Believe us. Once you try VRTX MESH, you will forget the rest!

 

 

3. Earth-Friendly - We believe the environment is equally important as your health. That is why we use 44%-68% less non-biodegradable material.

After rigorous experiments by the VRTX team, we have now reached the perfect union between scientific research and training comfort. We are now proud to announce that every VRTX MESH resistance band we manufacture contains 44-68% less rubber than traditional rubber bands, which is replaced by the fabric fibers. This means we generate 44-68% less non-recyclable and non-biodegradable rubber waste. 

 

 

As a brand aiming to provide people with a better training regime and body health, VRTX cares very much about the world we live in. We pledge to look after not only your health and fitness but also the environment and the world we share.

 

 

4. Dimensions

 

Now, let’s see the versatility of VRTX MESH in action, and how sport & fitness professionals trained with it!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dear Backers,

 

This is the first campaign that the VRTX team has launched on Indiegogo. All of our team members are sports & fitness enthusiasts with great passion in bringing people a better training life and a greener world. We've been thinking every detail thoroughly since the beginning of this project to ensure its success.

Firstly, during the R&D period, we’ve gone through 5 batches of prototypes to make the VRTX MESH the perfect product with safety and durability. We spent countless time validating those prototypes, keeping in mind the appearance, ergonomics, functionality, and producibility. We also worked extremely hard on eliminating the potential manufacturing risks.

Secondly, we chose an environmental-friendly manufacturer with leading experience of manufacturing sports & fitness goods in the industry. With its reliable production line and great relation between each party, we have full confidence in our first round of production.

Thirdly, to avoid unexpected taxes, we ship every reward as a gift worldwide. However, there may be additional duties and taxes you might have to pay. Please note as well that no invoice will be provided.

VRTX team sincerely appreciate your backing and support, and we cherish the opportunity to fulfill our promise. Delivering your orders in a timely manner will be our primary focus.

 

Sincerely,

 

VRTX Team
