story:
WHO I-AM?

My name is Darran Hall and I am a two-sport professional athlete, turned fitness expert and athletic coach.  I was born and raised in San Diego, CA, from a military family.  My father fought and died for this country and for my siblings and I to have a better life.   This is my WHY behind this invention.  I learned the importance of service from an earlier age.  As a result, I don’t only want to help people physically - I want to be able to affect people’s lives in a positive way on multiple levels.

My desire to make a difference is why I strive for success. I was one of the lucky ones.  From an early age, I watched many of my friends end up on the streets or even dead, because they did not have a stable home environment or the opportunities that were presented to me.  I was raised by a strong woman, who instilled rules and values in our home.  As a result I was able to keep my nose clean, stay out of trouble and thrive in my athletic pursuits.

In 1993, I was drafted by the Cincinnati Reds, straight out of high school, where I began my professional sports career.  I then went on to attend Colorado State University on a full football scholarship and was ultimately drafted as a WR/PRKR by the Tennessee Titans.

My professional sports career presented me with many opportunities to touch people’s lives. It also taught me the importance of having a strong core, not only for strength and speed but for quality of life.  

 

85% of Americans suffer from some form of lower back pain.  I have used my experience as a professional athlete to develop the RealABSolution, a revolutionary core fitness trainer that can help relieve chronic back pain and provide stronger more toned abdominal muscles.

ARE YOU SUFFERING FROM LOWER BACK PAIN?

Weak transverse abdominis muscles are directly associated with chronic lower back pain.  These muscles are essential for the stabilization of the spine.  The RealABSolution allows for strengthening and conditioning of these muscles without unnecessary strain on the lower back. 

ARE YOU LOOKING TO REGAIN THAT PRE-BABY LOOK?

The RealABSolution provides the support that mothers need to safely work their core during and after childbirth.  Women can quickly regain that “corset” look, lose love handles, and ensure their internal organs are adequately supported by strengthening the muscles that are often stressed, split, and lose their tone.  

SHORT ON SPACE?

With the addition of resistance bands, the RealABSolution becomes a compact, total body workout solution eliminating bulky home gym needs. 

 

WHAT DOES YOUR PURCHASE MEAN?

Your purchase means better self-care, a new image, and more confidence for you.  But it means so much more.  

I am excited to bring you all the blessings of better health with the RealABSolution Core Fitness Trainer.  But most importantly, your support will help me on my journey to help the community that raised me.   A portion of the proceeds from the sales of the RealABSolution will help me launch the IAM foundation, focused on providing support for inner city youth.  We will provide them with food, shelter, a learning center and full gym to develop both their academic and athletic skills.  This will be a safe haven for them to return to after school, an alternative to a life in the streets, where they will be loved and guided to become contributing members of society.  

Please join the RealABSolution campaign and help me to make
my dream to give back a reality!

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET?

I have literally put my blood, sweat and tears into bringing this product to life for the benefit of many.   It’s now time for me to share my passion for health, happiness and quality of life through my invention, the RealABSolution.   To take this product to the next level we need your help!  Our goal of $100,000 will allow us to protect our design, build a strong marketing and digital presence to get the word out to the masses and to graduate our production into a scalable manufacturing facility to reduce our overall costs without compromising quality.

For your support and generous contribution, you can be one of the first people to enjoy the benefits of the RealABSolution.  For our Gold and Platinum contributors, we have a very special perk. You will have an opportunity to spend an intense hour of training and motivation with yours truly, online or at my training facility in Las Vegas, NV.  

Based on your personal goals and body type, I will provide you with some customized training tips and examples of exercises you can perform to improve your overall health and well-being. I will walk you through the RealABSolution exercise guide to ensure you have the ultimate customer experience with the product and I will share some intimate details of my story and how I arrived at where I am today.  One thing I will guarantee – you will leave this one hour session inspired and motivated to become the very best version of you - #IAM, #ICAN, #IWILL!

Our Nickel, Bronze and Silver Contributors will enjoy one of our branded items – (fitness band, cap, hoodie) and if you feel like being all in, you can get all of our perk items in one Ultimate Combo package.

And don’t worry if we don’t reach our campaign goals.  Your support will still help us make significant progress.  We greatly appreciate all of our contributor’s support and you can rest assured that if you see enough potential in our product to give us your hard earned money, you will receive the perks associated with your contribution 100%.  The balance of the campaign funds will be used to make more units of the RealABSolution and we will get back to basics, pounding the pavement, going from gym to gym, city to city and continuing to build a grass roots following leading to our Black Friday launch on QVC.

 

THE IMPACT!

Your contribution will of course allow us to bring the RealABSolution to the masses and help people all over the world realize the benefits of a strong core.  But in supporting our campaign you will do so much more than that.  When I invented the RealABSolution my vision was much grander than to just invent the next best ab machine.  My goal is and has always been to help people and at the onset of this journey I realized very quickly that my invention could really change people’s lives.  

At some point in our lives, we have all experienced hardships.  When I see homeless people I want to be able to give them shelter.  When I know people are hungry I want to feed them.   We can all do our part to make the world a better place.  And with the RealABSolution, I quickly realized that the product had the potential to offer something impactful to people not able to effectively strengthen their core muscles because of various disabilities.   And everyone deserves the gift of exercise – especially people who are wheelchair bound.

That is why I turned the RealABSolution into the world’s only fully adaptable, wheelchair mounted fitness device that allows people with disabilities to safely work their upper body and core while remaining in the comfort and security of their personal wheelchairs.   People who are confined to a wheelchair would typically need to travel to an adaptive gym or specialized physical therapy facility, in order to exercise and strengthen their muscles. They then need to be transferred from their chairs to specially configured equipment.  This is not feasible for everyone and the challenges with time, transportation, resources and lack of mobility mean that many people are not afforded this opportunity.  With the RealABSolution Disability Device, people can enjoy the benefits of a workout without having to leave their homes, making fitness more accessible to people struggling with lack of independent mobility.   It can also become a valuable addition to existing adaptive facilities, used for rehabilitation and to prevent muscle atrophy. 

Your contribution will help me to take this version of the RealABSolution to the next level, protect the concept and design and pursue classification as a medical device.  The goal for the RealABSolution Disability Device is to become reimbursable through Medicaid, Medicare and private insurance, making it affordable and attainable to everyone, regardless of their ability to pay.

I am honored that you have decided to join and support me on this journey and you can rest assured that whatever your contribution, you will have a hand in helping to improve the quality of life of someone less fortunate, either through the IAM foundation or with our efforts to make fitness accessible to all.

RISK AND CHALLENGES!

Our biggest hurdle in bringing this product to market is being able to mass produce the machine at the lowest cost possible while maintaining quality and structural integrity.  We want to be able to deliver a product that offers long-term durability and ultimate customer satisfaction at an affordable price.  And we aim to accomplish this with a 100% Made in America product so that we can maintain control of the process, reduce time to market and bring new employment opportunities and fresh prosperity to American workers.

Low volume pre-production product fabrication is slower, more expensive and more difficult to scale.  We need to establish the manufacturing processes and procedures in place today, which will allow us to scale efficiently to larger volume orders without compromising quality.

As a contributor to this crowdfunding campaign,  you will help us reach a final production design that can meet both our performance and manufacturing goals simultaneously.  With these optimized engineering drawings in hand, we will be able to build relationships with US based manufacturers, create the tooling and testing capabilities needed for mass production and deliver a quality American made product for years to come.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP!

We understand that not everyone has the resources available to support our campaign financially.  But there is still so much you can do to help us be successful and we would greatly appreciate your help.

Help us make some noise!  We all spend a great deal of time on social media and have friends, family and associates in our online communities, who follow our stories.  I would be eternally grateful if you would consider sharing the link to our campaign on your social media platforms and help us spread the word within your personal networks.

Hashtags Rule!  When you post about our campaign, please be sure to use our hashtag #RealABSolution and #IAM.

Follow Us!  We are also looking to build our own social media platforms.  Please follow me, Darran Hall on Facebook @DarranLHall, on LinkedIn @DarranLHall and on Instagram @RealABSolutionCore  - and be sure to like, share and comment on my posts.

Help us create a buzz!  If you work-out at a gym you have direct access to our target audience, we would appreciate if you could help us create some buzz about the RealABSolution within your fitness community and if your gym has a notice board, maybe you could consider printing out and posting a copy of our campaign for other gym members to see.

Help us go viral!  We can do so much more to help others if this campaign were to go viral.  If you have people in your network that have large social media followings, please share our link with them and ask them to share it within their communities.  If ten of your friends tell ten of their friends and so on, this would help us reach people that might otherwise not hear about the good we are hoping to do through this endeavor.  

BOOKMARK OUR WEBSITE!  www.realabsolution.com. 

Use share tools to spread the word!  Indiegogo makes it easy for you to tell others about our campaign.  Using the Indiegogo share tools, you can simply copy and paste a link to your social media pages, into an email, on blogs and on other digital platforms to lead people right back to our campaign.

However you decide to help, I will be forever grateful for your support.  
Welcome to the RealABSolution Family!
story_txt: WHO I-AM?My name is Darran Hall and I am a two-sport professional athlete, turned fitness expert and athletic coach.  I was born and raised in San Diego, CA, from a military family.  My father fought and died for this country and for my siblings and I to have a better life.   This is my WHY behind this invention.  I learned the importance of service from an earlier age.  As a result, I don’t only want to help people physically - I want to be able to affect people’s lives in a positive way on multiple levels.My desire to make a difference is why I strive for success. I was one of the lucky ones.  From an early age, I watched many of my friends end up on the streets or even dead, because they did not have a stable home environment or the opportunities that were presented to me.  I was raised by a strong woman, who instilled rules and values in our home.  As a result I was able to keep my nose clean, stay out of trouble and thrive in my athletic pursuits.In 1993, I was drafted by the Cincinnati Reds, straight out of high school, where I began my professional sports career.  I then went on to attend Colorado State University on a full football scholarship and was ultimately drafted as a WR/PRKR by the Tennessee Titans.My professional sports career presented me with many opportunities to touch people’s lives. It also taught me the importance of having a strong core, not only for strength and speed but for quality of life.   85% of Americans suffer from some form of lower back pain.  I have used my experience as a professional athlete to develop the RealABSolution, a revolutionary core fitness trainer that can help relieve chronic back pain and provide stronger more toned abdominal muscles.ARE YOU SUFFERING FROM LOWER BACK PAIN?Weak transverse abdominis muscles are directly associated with chronic lower back pain.  These muscles are essential for the stabilization of the spine.  The RealABSolution allows for strengthening and conditioning of these muscles without unnecessary strain on the lower back. ARE YOU LOOKING TO REGAIN THAT PRE-BABY LOOK?The RealABSolution provides the support that mothers need to safely work their core during and after childbirth.  Women can quickly regain that “corset” look, lose love handles, and ensure their internal organs are adequately supported by strengthening the muscles that are often stressed, split, and lose their tone.  SHORT ON SPACE?With the addition of resistance bands, the RealABSolution becomes a compact, total body workout solution eliminating bulky home gym needs.  WHAT DOES YOUR PURCHASE MEAN?Your purchase means better self-care, a new image, and more confidence for you.  But it means so much more.  I am excited to bring you all the blessings of better health with the RealABSolution Core Fitness Trainer.  But most importantly, your support will help me on my journey to help the community that raised me.   A portion of the proceeds from the sales of the RealABSolution will help me launch the IAM foundation, focused on providing support for inner city youth.  We will provide them with food, shelter, a learning center and full gym to develop both their academic and athletic skills.  This will be a safe haven for them to return to after school, an alternative to a life in the streets, where they will be loved and guided to become contributing members of society.  Please join the RealABSolution campaign and help me to makemy dream to give back a reality! WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET?I have literally put my blood, sweat and tears into bringing this product to life for the benefit of many.   It’s now time for me to share my passion for health, happiness and quality of life through my invention, the RealABSolution.   To take this product to the next level we need your help!  Our goal of $100,000 will allow us to protect our design, build a strong marketing and digital presence to get the word out to the masses and to graduate our production into a scalable manufacturing facility to reduce our overall costs without compromising quality.For your support and generous contribution, you can be one of the first people to enjoy the benefits of the RealABSolution.  For our Gold and Platinum contributors, we have a very special perk. You will have an opportunity to spend an intense hour of training and motivation with yours truly, online or at my training facility in Las Vegas, NV.  Based on your personal goals and body type, I will provide you with some customized training tips and examples of exercises you can perform to improve your overall health and well-being. I will walk you through the RealABSolution exercise guide to ensure you have the ultimate customer experience with the product and I will share some intimate details of my story and how I arrived at where I am today.  One thing I will guarantee – you will leave this one hour session inspired and motivated to become the very best version of you - #IAM, #ICAN, #IWILL!Our Nickel, Bronze and Silver Contributors will enjoy one of our branded items – (fitness band, cap, hoodie) and if you feel like being all in, you can get all of our perk items in one Ultimate Combo package.And don’t worry if we don’t reach our campaign goals.  Your support will still help us make significant progress.  We greatly appreciate all of our contributor’s support and you can rest assured that if you see enough potential in our product to give us your hard earned money, you will receive the perks associated with your contribution 100%.  The balance of the campaign funds will be used to make more units of the RealABSolution and we will get back to basics, pounding the pavement, going from gym to gym, city to city and continuing to build a grass roots following leading to our Black Friday launch on QVC. THE story:
Praxis Yoga is a teacher-driven studio--the first of it's kind in Colorado Springs, meaning we hire highly-experienced teachers and allow them to flourish as passionate teacher-practitioners. We pride ourselves on hiring based on qualitative standards far above industry standards and paying our teachers wages more in line with fair labor practices.

Simply put, we value our amazing teachers and let them give you great yoga classes. 

Not a yogi, but a friend of the crew? Chipping into our campaign is an awesome way to support a locally owned small business. We invested a great deal into it's making including so much of our own sweat and muscle. Though the founders, Taryn Sweeney and Nathan Archer, did so much of the construction process themselves, construction costs are substantial. Even a few bucks thrown to our cause of offering amazing yoga helps us recoup those initial start up costs. 

PLEASE NOTE!!: Each tier of donation receives all the perks of the tiers below. For example, "Water bottle" includes "Sticker +2 Classes" and so on. You give big, we give big:)

You can find out more info at: https://praxisyoga.com/

 

Updates!!  Studio walls are all "healed" after a bit of surgery to install the showers! Not long now. We are painting away, hanging doors, building shelves, and rolling out flooring! 

The cheery lil' water bottles finally arrived, yay!

And here is a pic of the Mala on offer for a $150 donation. Apatite (the darker teal and guru bead), Amazonite (light teal), and Howlite (white).  What's a mala you may ask? A mala is a string of prayer beads used in Vedic traditions (Hinduism and Buddhism, et al). There are 108 beads, used to count mantra or prayers.

story:
UVC LEDs: Destroys 99.999999% of bacteria, viruses, and pathogens. Filter cartridge: Removes microplastics, particulates, chemical, and metal impurities.


 

Superior Hydration using Science

Powered by cutting-edge 4D Purification™ technology that treats your water by first using dual UVC LEDs to destroy viruses, bacteria, and pathogens. Second, it filters your water by using a proprietary blend filter cartridge system to remove metals, chemicals, organic and particulate matter. Lastly, it uses a natural blend of minerals to add a crisp taste-just like artesian water.

 

 
 

4D Purification™ combines the traditional filtration system with a time-dependent variable. In conventional filtration systems, water is treated in 3-Dimensions as it travels through the filter's XYZ planes and has no significant time-dependent variable. With our 4D Purification™ system, the UVC treatment adds a significant time-dependent purification BEFORE the water passes through the filter cartridge system, creating a revolutionary 4th Dimension in water purification with a germicidal efficacy of up to 99.999999%.

3D water purification occurs as water travels through the XYZ axis of the coconut charcoal + ion-exchange filter. 4D Purification™ elevates this process by treating the water using UVC LED light for a specific time period. 

Over the years, scientific studies have shown the effectiveness of UV light in disinfecting surfaces. Most recently, scientists discovered that a particular portion of this UV spectrum, UVC, has maximum germicidal efficacy. With the very modest power of UVC, you can disinfect a surface more effectively than traditional high-powered UV systems. Our products use this particular UVC region of the spectrum to achieve a maximum neutralizing effect up to 99.999999% against a wide variety of bacteria, viruses, and pathogens.

 

Only bottle powered with 2X 20mW UVC LEDs

We know filters are not "one size fits all". So, we designed the cartridge to be easily interchangeable to accommodate a variety of cartridges that we will be introducing in the near future. We designed our first three sets of cartridges to satisfy your thirst: 1) PURIST - filter for the purists,  2) ARTESIAN - filter for the idealists, and 3) ALKALINE - filter for hydration enthusiasts.

The foundation/bed of all three filter cartridges consists of a proprietary blend of coconut charcoal and ion-exchange resin. Coconut charcoal is designed to capture organic molecules and chlorine effectively. Ion-exchange resin is designed to capture ions in water (non-organic). This process is very effective in reducing the hardness of the water.

Note: Filter cartridges are optional. One can use WAATR bottles only in UVC purification mode.

The WAATR filter cartridge system consists of a proprietary blend of coconut charcoal and ion-exchange resin. Coconut charcoal is a highly porous organic material designed to capture organic molecules and chlorine effectively. Ion-exchange resin is a spherical porous bead resin material designed to exchange ions (inorganics) in water for other ions fixed in the resin. This process is very effective for reducing the hardness of the water.

We value the world we live in. That's why, at WAATR, our mission is to go beyond purification by providing knowledge and information about the contaminants lurking in your drinking water. We do this by studying your used WAATR filter cartridges. Simply ship your used filters to our facility. Our scientists will analyze them carefully and provide you with a detailed lab report so that you can take preventative measures to limit exposure to harmful contaminants if they are present in your source water.

 

Filter analysis is a paid service (the US only):

It will cost $49 to get the filter analyzed by one of our expert scientists. Once users sign up for the service online, they will receive prepaid postage to mail the filters to our laboratory.

Filter analysis service for the rest of the world will be rolled out by the end of 2022. We are currently speaking to several laboratories around the globe to get your filters analyzed locally to save on shipping. 

 

Water + Purification + Analytics = WAATR

 

No more funky-smelling bottle. WAATR bottle cleans itself by blasting UVC light every hour for 20 seconds each to keep your bottle free of mold, bacteria, viruses, etc.

(Note: This feature can be disabled to conserve battery life)

Thanks to the wide-mouth of the WAATR bottle, you can insert objects as big as a cell phone and sterilize them with UVC LEDs in a matter of minutes.  Toss in your dirty cell phone, face masks, keys, utensils, etc., to quickly neutralize the germs lurking on their surface. Perfect for travel and quick on-the-go sanitizing applications.

The WAATR bottle performs many functions. With its built-in RGB status indicators, you'll know exactly what it's doing. When it's running low on battery, it will glow RED; when it purifies your water, it will pulse BLUE; when it's reminding you to hydrate, it will pulse GREEN. 

 

 

It is vital to drink water daily for optimal health and body function. Water helps regulate body temperature, keeps joints lubricated, helps prevent infections, delivers nutrients to cells, and helps keep organs functioning properly. Being well-hydrated also improves sleep quality, cognition, and mood. With the WAATR bottle, the Smart Hydration Reminder will alert you every 30 minutes to take a sip for optimal hydration. It automatically turns ON/OFF the reminders based on your bottle usage.

After a hot summer day at the park or a killer workout at the gym, nothing feels as rewarding as drinking icy-cold water.  Hydrating with room temperature water is just not as satisfying as a chilled beverage. WAATR's wide-mouth bottle makes it easy to add some ice to your water for a refreshingly cold sip of water when you need it most. 

 

Triple Insulated Design

A proprietary vacuum insulation technology keeps contents arctic cold for up to 36 hrs. *Note: Due to the filter cartridge, we don't recommend our bottles for hot contents.

 

Pro-Grade Stainless Steel Material

Pro-grade stainless steel (18/8) is durably constructed and ensures no flavor transfer from the bottle into the water.

 

Powder-Coated Sweat-Proof Finish

Provides a comfortable and slip-free grip.

 

Six Amazing Colors

Color options will be available on post-campaign surveys.

One Cap for Any Size WAATR Bottle

Depending on your usage, you can upgrade or downgrade your WAATR bottle size. All WAATR bottles have the exact mouth dimensions, enabling you to switch between the bottles. Additional bottle sizes without caps will be available on the post-campaign survey and our website. You can always store a few sizes of the WAATR bottle, so you can come back and pick the right size depending on your need.

 

Bottle size options will be available on post-campaign surveys.

 

Our CrazyCap customers love carrying handles. Almost every user buys an additional handle to help make carrying the bottle easier. That's the reason we designed the handle directly into the cap's structure.  If you are taking a hike or walking in the park, carrying your water bottle will be easier than ever with our convenient rainbow handle.

 

WAATR is powered by a rechargeable lithium-ion battery.  Protecting the battery from water is CRUCIAL, not only for safety, but also to extend the life of the product. To make the WAATR bottle completely IPX7 WATERPROOF, we designed the cap to be port-less. There is absolutely no entry point for water to enter into the electronics. The WAATR bottle is also equipped with several safety features such as short-circuit protection, over-charge protection, and over-discharge protection to ensure the bottle lasts for years.

 

Nowadays, we dispose of everything... 

There are only a few products that are made to be re-craftable. We designed the WAATR bottle cap to be totally re-craftable. This means, once you have used it to its maximum potential, you don’t need to throw it away. Just send it back to us and you'll basically get a brand new one in return.

 

Rather than throwing used products away which go into the landfill and create more waste, this is just one way you can ensure sustainable, eco-friendly living.

WAATR bottles are TSA preapproved. This means optimal hydration without borders.  Just empty the contents before the security check at the airport, and refill the bottle after the security check. That's all; you are set for your next adventure!

All of the UVC bottles on the market are designed to consume water from the same entry point where the contaminated water entered into the bottle. The position of the UVC LED placement inside the cap makes it impossible to sterilize the bottle mouth, as this region does not fall under the path of UVC LED light. To prevent this, we created an all-new approach where people can consume their water through a spout that NEVER needs to touch contaminated water. This is excellent for people filling up with water from rivers, streams, fountains, lakes, etc.

 

 

HELP US KEEP PLASTIC OUT OF LANDFILLS

Part of our commitment to the environment is keeping WAATR products out of landfills. Once you sign-up for our recycle program on our website, you can download a pre-paid postage to recycle the WAATR filters. This service is avaiable for free for our US customers. We are working on a recycling program for international customers.

 

Compare WAATR With Other Bottles

Preliminary Design Sketches of WAATR

 

Prototyping and some earlier designs

 

Finished Product Shot

WAATR bottle cleans itself by blasting UVC light every hour for 20 seconds each to keep your bottle free of mold, bacteria, viruses, etc.(Note: This feature can be disabled to conserve battery life)Thanks to the wide-mouth of the WAATR bottle, you can insert objects as big as a cell phone and sterilize them with UVC LEDs in a matter of minutes.  Toss in your dirty cell phone, face masks, keys, utensils, etc., to quickly neutralize the germs lurking on their surface. Perfect for travel and quick on-the-go sanitizing applications.The WAATR bottle performs many functions. With its built-in RGB status indicators, you'll know exactly what it's doing. When it's running low on battery, it will glow RED; when it purifies your water, it will pulse BLUE; when it's reminding you to hydrate, it will pulse GREEN.   It is vital to drink water daily for optimal health and body function. Water helps regulate body temperature, keeps joints lubricated, helps prevent infections, delivers nutrients to cells, and helps keep organs functioning properly. Being well-hydrated also improves sleep quality, cognition, and mood. With the WAATR bottle, the Smart Hydration Reminder will alert you every 30 minutes to take a sip for optimal hydration. It automatically turns ON/OFF the reminders based on your bottle usage.After a hot summer day at the park or a killer workout at the gym, nothing feels as rewarding as drinking icy-cold water.  Hydrating with room temperature water is just not as satisfying as a chilled beverage. WAATR's wide-mouth bottle makes it easy to add some ice to your water for a refreshingly cold sip of water when you need it most.  Triple Insulated DesignA proprietary vacuum insulation technology keeps contents arctic cold for up to 36 hrs. *Note: Due to the filter cartridge, we don't recommend our bottles for hot contents. Pro-Grade Stainless Steel MaterialPro-grade stainless steel (18/8) is durably constructed and ensures no flavor transfer from the bottle into the water. Powder-Coated Sweat-Proof FinishProvides a comfortable and slip-free grip. Six Amazing ColorsColor options will be available on post-campaign surveys.One Cap for Any Size WAATR BottleDepending on your usage, you can upgrade or downgrade your WAATR bottle size. All WAATR bottles have the exact mouth dimensions, enabling you to switch between the bottles. Additional bottle sizes without caps will be available on the post-campaign survey and our website. You can always store a few sizes of the WAATR bottle, so you can come back and pick the right size depending on your need. Bottle size options will be available on post-campaign surveys. Our CrazyCap customers love carrying handles. Almost every user buys an additional handle to help make carrying the bottle easier. That's the reason we designed the handle directly into the cap's structure.  If you are taking a hike or walking in the park, carrying your water bottle will be easier than ever with our convenient rainbow handle. WAATR is powered by a rechargeable lithium-ion battery.  Protecting the battery from water is CRUCIAL, not only for safety, but also to extend the life of the product. To make the WAATR bottle completely IPX7 WATERPROOF, we designed the cap to be port-less. There is absolutely no entry point for water to enter into the electronics. The WAATR bottle is also equipped with several safety features such as short-circuit protection, over-charge protection, and over-discharge protection to ensure the bottle lasts for years.  Nowadays, we dispose of everything... There are only a few products that are made to be re-craftable. We designed the WAATR bottle cap to be totally re-craftable. This means, once you have used it to its maximum potential, you don’t need to throw it away. Just send it back to us and you'll basically get a brand new one in return. Rather than throwing used products away which go into the landfill and create more waste, this is just one way you can ensure sustainable, eco-friendly living.WAATR bottles are TSA preapproved. This means optimal hydration without borders.  Just empty the contents before the security check at the airport, and refill the bottle after the security check. That's all; you are set for your next adventure!All of the UVC bottles on the market are designed to consume water from the same entry point where the contaminated water entered into the bottle. The position of the UVC LED placement inside the cap makes it impossible to sterilize the bottle mouth, as this region does not fall under the path of UVC LED light. To prevent this, we created an all-new approach where people can consume their water through a spout that NEVER needs to touch contaminated water. This is excellent for people filling up with water from rivers, streams, fountains, lakes, etc.   HELP US KEEP PLASTIC OUT OF LANDFILLSPart of our commitment to the environment is keeping WAATR products out of landfills. Once you sign-up for our recycle program on our website, you can download a pre-paid postage to recycle the WAATR filters. This service is avaiable for free for our US customers. We are working on a recycling program for international customers. Compare WAATR With Other BottlesPreliminary Design Sketches of WAATR Prototyping and some earlier designs Finished Product Shot

story:
So, how does this work? 

 

1. Choose your perk (on the right column) 

2. Click 'get this perk' for more details 

3. Choose your choice of lenses - find out what lenses you need here

4. Input a shipping address and make payment

5. Receive a post-campaign survey on 05/11/22 

6. Enter your requirements - model, colour, lens type, prescription 

7. Receive your Dougo's on 19/01/22

8. From the date of despatch, you have 90 days to try these out and if you don't like them you can return them free of charge.

 

 

At Dougo’s we’re all about bringing the coolest and highest quality eyewear to the blue light protection arena. 

We have developed a range of frames and lenses over 11 months and have made sure our suppliers are not only professional but close to home. 

We have validated our research through testing our bespoke lenses on friends, families, athletes and individuals most in need and the feedback has been incredible. 

Our lenses range from helping you:

  • Sleep better
  • Reduction in stress
  • Wind down and relax in the evening
  • Mitigate screen-induced (blue light) eye strain and headaches
  • Rest & recovery 
  • SAD syndrome
  • Carbohydrate craving
  • Driving at night 

The list goes on and on. 

 

 

A study, using a competitor's lenses at a lower specification to our lenses, found that 73% of participants reported improved their overall sleep.

We are working with the University of West England with sleep researchers and psychologists. Our aim in the next year is to publish results from a collaborative postgraduate research study. We can't wait to add to the mounting evidence on light frequencies and sleep hygiene. 

These glasses provide powerful benefits, the mountain of evidence released in recent years is slowly coming to light. 

We can’t wait to hear how these stylish glasses upgrade your life. 

Below is what you will find when the product arrives at your door.

 

 

 

You will receive:

  • A high-quality pair of Dougo's made from bio-acetate (derived from wood pulp). The lenses are manufactured here in Gloucestershire in the UK. They are scratch-resistant and anti-reflective coating with pigment-imitating dyes. The glasses themselves! Whether that be clear, yellow or red lenses.
  • Hardened cork case - fully sustainable from oak farms in Portugal.
  • A printed microfibre cloth. 
  • A Dougo's keyring made from recycled fishing nets from the UK coastline provided by Nurdle.
  • A Fairtrade organic drawstring to keep your Dougo's protected while you're on the move. 

 

We offer prescription options for all our lens types:

We require your dioptre and PD. 

We offer range from +4:00 to -6:00 with a cylinder +/- 2:00

 

 
 

Mike is an aspiring CrossFit athlete, he has been trying out a few different types of lenses for the last three months and he has found huge benefits both during the day and with his sleep. Listen to the video below and find out what he has to say...

 

 
 
Some of the boys involved have raised money for Alzheimer's Society and Mind previously. We felt it would be a nice touch to donate £1 for every backer supporting us. 
 
 
 

 

 

Pictured above is our lens range. You will notice that each lens takes a different colour. The major reason for this is specific light frequencies affect bodily functions in different ways.

The colour perception has to change to different degrees, depending on the range that needs to be blocked. Each lens has unique use cases. We go into some detail in the next section.

 

 

Whether you’re an office professional or are simply an individual who is susceptible to suffer from “square eyes” and eye strain when looking at laptop and phone screens - these lenses offer the perfect relief. 

They help you combat headaches, eye and head fatigue and prevent ‘Computer Vision Syndrome’ - a 21st Century illness that develops from overexposure to blue light-emitting technology in our modern lives.

 

 

Looking for something which ticks all the boxes? The screen+ lenses have you covered. And who doesn't like the colour yellow!?

They block 100% of blue light which is in the lower range (433-477nm) keeping your stress levels down. By keeping your stress hormone (cortisol) regulated, you head into your evenings feeling relaxed and ready to settle down. 

The yellow lenses allow your sleep hormone (melatonin) to be released at the time nature intended - resulting in better sleep and performance.

If you find yourself on screens following lunchtime, wearing these in the latter part of your day means you can use your digital devices at work, on the go, or at home even all the way into your evenings knowing that you’re adequately protecting yourself from harmful blue light.

 

 

Two camps.

1) People suffering from insomnia, fatigue, nighttime stress and anxiety, and poor sleep.

2) People who want to optimise their sleep cycles for maximum energy, performance, wakefulness, recovery, and sleep quality and duration.

If you find yourself in any of these two camps, then the sleep lenses are designed for you.

We all know how important a good night’s sleep is. Harmful blue light frequencies, particularly after sundown significantly disrupt the quality of sleep you may be getting.

Whether you’re an elite level athlete or just simply want to feel fresh every day when you wake up, these red devils will certainly do the trick.

They block 400-550nm of blue light, and help to restore your body back to its natural sleep cycle by suppressing cortisol and sending your sleep hormone production through the roof! 

So relax... and wave goodbye to sleepless nights.

The sleep lenses. Sleep better, be better.

 

If you're still unsure about which lenses are best suited for you, then head over to our calculator. It's just a short, two-minute survey we have put together to really give you a clear indication as to which lenses you need!

Access the blue light calculator here.

 

 

 

Sleep is one of the fundamentals to great performance and good health - both physical, and mental. It's a beautiful thing; it keeps our hormones in check, allows us to recharge, and helps us learn and retain information. But, the sad reality is, sleep is seriously disrupted for the large majority. HEV (high energy visible) light adversely affects our endocrine system, resulting in severely disrupted sleep.

The pace of technological change sweeping across business and society has been breathtaking, too much so for our biology.

Within the last fifty years, lighting has become far more efficient through LED technology, technological advancement has provided huge amounts of digital solutions, and working environments and schedules have adjusted to a 24hr economy. Although this may not seem like much of an issue at first, we are unknowingly putting our health at risk through the increased levels of artificial blue light exposure. 

In order to produce melatonin (the body's sleep hormone and most abundant antioxidant) when you need it, blue light exposure needs to decrease in the latter half of the day, correlating with when the sun goes down. This is where blue light filtering glasses come in. With the right choice for your needs, you can block blue light in varying degrees to ensure that your exposure to blue light is as natural as possible, and your circadian rhythm is kept healthy and unaffected.

 

Our Frame Designs

Take a look below at our frame designs, you'll find the measurements so you can compare them to other designs you are more familiar with. 

We have been through at least 30 different prototypes to find the most comfortable AND stylish frames that suit both men and women. 

 

 

You may be wondering why on earth they have been named the “Ott’s” and the “Sharma’s”. We could’ve gone for ‘the usual’ name such as a city or maybe even a type of animal. But we wanted to give a little nod to some of our favourite authors. 

John Ott, author of Health and Light and Robin Sharma, author of the 5am club. Both books have educated us or helped inspire the journey.

Both frames have been carefully designed in-house to not only keep you stylish, but to ensure you are comfortable whilst looking the business.

 

 

A deep dive into the science

Your body is the highest tech device at your disposal. So it's important to keep it well regulated, happy and functioning optimally.

In fact, the body has its own internal clock which helps to regulate your night/day or wake/sleep cycles. This internal clock is known as your circadian rhythm. 

How your body regulates this clock is by the production of certain hormones throughout the day - namely, cortisol (the stress hormone) and melatonin (the sleep hormone).

A circadian rhythm that is in tune with nature and helps you perform and feel at your best is one that:

1) Produces cortisol first thing in the morning when you wake up, making you feel wakeful and alert so you can attack the day. This gradually subsides during the course of the day which is what we want so we can start to produce melatonin and start to relax.

2) In the latter part of the day as the sun begins to drop, your body should be producing melatonin into the evening to help you wind down, feel calm and eventually - sleep. And sleep well.

The problem is that overexposure to harmful blue light throughout the day, and particularly at night disrupts this circadian rhythm, sending these two major hormones out of balance.

What is the case for many of us is that blue light frequencies in the evening and afternoon after dark keeps our cortisol levels higher than they should be leaving us stressed and anxious.

This blocks your body’s ability to produce melatonin, as it is the opposite of cortisol (think Ying and Yang).

As a result, instead of feeling relaxed and rested come bedtime, you feel alert, stressed and anxious. This causes problems falling asleep, mental distress and poor quality sleep. As a result, you wake up feeling tired, groggy, and anything but fresh.

Think about the effect this will have over days, weeks and months if your circadian rhythm remains out of balance…

It can result in insomnia, fatigue, chronic illness and a severe deterioration in your mental health. 

Fixing or maintaining your body’s circadian rhythm, therefore, is fundamental to improving your sleep, performance and both physical and mental health.

There’s some good news though…

By protecting yourself from harmful blue light in the day and night time can help keep your CORTISOL DOWN and your MELATONIN UP.

Restore your body’s natural internal clock, by protecting yourself from blue light - and upgrade your body’s software with this simple bug fix.

 

The Frame colours and Unlockable Extras

As we're starting out, we decided to run a survey to find out what people were after. We found neutral colours were a safe bet and most popular. We might release a little more 'out there' colour if we hit 100 backers!

 

 

We are offering three colours to start with, and if we get enough of you wonderful people to back us, then a fourth colour will be released before the campaign ends - the power is in your hands!

 If our target is hit at the end of the campaign, we will release a survey asking whether you would like to change it for the new colour. 

Not only are we going to offer another colour, but at 200 backers we will be revealing another style for the ladies!

 

 

We are extremely proud of the product we have brought to the market. Right from the get-go, we agreed that we wanted as little plastic in our product as possible, and we are pleased to say there is ZERO. (Besides from the Nurdle keyring). 

Becoming a sustainable brand is a journey, and is something that has been at the core of our values and thought processes from the beginning. Granted, there is always more that can be done, learning and improving is all part of the process and we aim to be as transparent as possible with you along the way.

 

 

Equity Campaign

So, if you like the idea of this concept and want to invest in us and reap the rewards, this is the process:

 

1. Choose your perk (on the right column)

2. Receive post-sale survey in 14 days of purchase

3. Enter your personal details (name, postal address)

4. Receive shareholder agreement (PDF), review and return with a signature

5. Quarterly emails with internal news and sale updates

6. Buyback December 2024

 

So you might be asking, "what return will I get?", well, it's dependent on our sales total over the next three years (January 2022 - December 2024). 

If you want to look in a bit more detail you can look at our sales forecasts, where we've broken down specific sales channels and their rationale. You can view this here.

If you want more information on Dougo's and our strategy. You can book an appointment with us here.

 

 

You can go check out our Instagram or Facebook to be the first to find out what is going on in the world of Dougo's.

story:
The Future of Training

The RXT-1 Fight Coach Robot

 

 

 

 

 

 

Work on reflexes, reaction time, and cognitive processing for athletes. The RXT-1 “Combo Mode” feature allows users to strike the arm pads to practice various combinations. This trains your eye-hand coordination, speed, and agility all while getting a more engaging cardio workout. Another emphasis of the RXT-1 is its low impact and can be used in limited space - making it ideal for home use.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Can the RXT-1 take a punch from a pro?

Yes! Want proof? 

Watch Jeff Chan (ONE Championship MMA Athlete), with over 274K subscribers on YouTube demonstrate the durability of the RXT-1 robot and see how he uses it to train!

Here's the link to his demo video on Instagram (@MMAshredded - 148K followers)

 

Here's another recent example, featuring Taekwondo black belt and Gymshark pro athlete Samuel Ericsson (@EricssonSamuel - 531K followers). Watch as he proves how the RXT-1 can take a (hard!) punch from an MMA pro!

 

 

 

 

 

We designed the RXT-1 with three training modes to be a complete in-home fighting Coach.

  • Practice Mode — designed to get you accustomed to the rhythm and flow of striking, using the RXT-1 to drill specific techniques. This mode can be used by beginners and professional fighters alike.
  • Spar Mode — this is your personal sparring partner. Get the convenience of waking up in the morning and getting a few spar rounds in before going to work, or in the evening before you relax.
  • Combination Mode — Master over 100+ pre-programmed striking combinations. Now you can practice at any time without the risk of injury, as the RXT-1 is low-impact and ready to go at any time!

 

 

 

"Learn" Mode, also called "practice" mode is the foundation of training on the RXT-1. It is designed for both beginner and advanced users to train one specific striking technique at a time. The RXT-1 strikes at the user in a consistent pattern every two seconds, which allows you to drill counters, dodges, and defense tactics as well as offense. Practice mode is easy to learn, but can never be mastered!

 

 

 

 

 

 

"Spar Mode" has 3 intensity levels to test your speed and improve reactions, while also getting an intense cardio workout. This is perfect for anyone who wants to train quick slips, rolls, and your best defense techniques.

 

 

 

 

 

 "Combination Mode" is like your own personal striking trainer. It has over 100 preset combinations and allows users to strike the arm pads as they would the focus mitts. This trains the user's hand-eye coordination, speed, agility, and cardio.

 

 

 

 

 

The RXT-1 comes with three intensity levels. Each level increases the difficulty for the user by striking faster and increasing the strike cadence. No fighter has defeated the RXT-1 on Level 3 up to now - Can you?

 

 

 

 

 

Sage Northcutt is a formal UFC fighter and now fights for ONE Fight Championship. After testing the RXT-1 he had this to say:

"The RXT-1 is a great training device to work your reflexes and timing! It's very unpredictable and helps keep you sharp."

 

Pro Athletes & Fighters Testing the RXT-1

In case you missed it, here are a few clips showing pro athletes and fighters who recently got a chance to test the RXT-1:

  •  Jeff Chan - ONE Champion Athlete (@mmaShredded 257k YouTube)
  •  Tatiana Suarez - Ultimate Fighter season 23 Winner (@TatianaSuarezUFC 144k Instagram)
  •  Samuel Ericsson - Gymshark athlete (@EricssonSamuel 536K Instagram)
  •  Raymond Daniels - Bellator Kickboxing World Champion (@Rd_Goat 119k Instagram)
  •  Colbey Northcutt - 36-time Karate World Champion (@ColbyNorthcutt 67.5K Instagram)
  •  Julia Miller - Muy Thai fighter shows quick combos (@DightNomadJulia 17k Instagram)
  •  Javon "Wanna" Walton - 12 year old actor and boxing prodigy (@OnwardWanna 274k Instagram)

 

All of these professional athletes and fighters are loving the RXT-1 while training at home, or at their gym. You can see the durability of the RXT-1 robot as each fighter uses it to train their reflexes and speed without holding anything back.

 

 

We have so much more awesome content planned. If you haven't already, please follow us on Instagram @Stryk.USA to catch all the action!

 

 

Muay Thai superstar Saenchai (@saenchaithailand 962K Instagram followers) has been training with the RXT-1 lately, and he is loving it!

In case you haven't heard of Saenchai, he is a legendary world champion in multiple Muay Thai weight divisions. He holds five prestigious Lumpinee belts and many consider him one of the greatest Muay Thai fighters of all time.


Watch as Saenchai spars with the RXT-1, which he says "will inevitably make you a better fighter." He explains that the RXT-1 is useful for a variety of training purposes and improves your punching, vision, head movement, footwork, and reaction time.


Saenchai says: ​"I recommend this robot. I agree that if you use this device, you will inevitably become better."

 

STRYK In The News

The Military Times (2.2+ million readers) recently posted its story about STRYK titled, “Army Special Forces veteran builds robot sparring partner.” The article came out great!

Here’s a link to that story: https://www.militarytimes.com/news/your-army/2020/11/25/army-special-forces-veteran-builds-robot-sparring-partner

We have more great news. Air Force Times also picked up our story about the RXT-1, here's a link: https://www.airforcetimes.com/news/your-army/2020/11/25/army-special-forces-veteran-builds-robot-sparring-partner

 

STRYK - RXT - The World's First Automated Fitness Robot Trainer featured on NewsWatch TV.

 

 

 

 

 

Training at 40%-80% is ideal - controlling motor functions, training your body to move at the right speeds, and how you need to operate when adrenaline kicks-in for a real-life scenario. Also, round count and time, speed, and rest intervals are amongst the customizable features. If practiced daily, users will notice results within a week.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The RXT-1 offers the convenience of a personal gym, so you can train whenever you want - day or night. It provides a range of exercise modes that can be used effectively in a small space compared to barbells and other bulky gym equipment. The RXT-1 puts you in complete control of your workouts, allowing you to add interesting variations between exercises to reach your training goals. Mount the RXT-1 to a wall in your basement or garage to enjoy at-home training while getting the best utility for the cost.

 

 

 

All parts come included with minimal assembly needed. The RXT-1 is wall-mounted with 4 screws. No downloads or apps needed, no external sensors or accessories, just simple direct control. Built with premium parts to last 10+ years.

 

 

 

 

 

Many of you have told us that you wanted to practice body strikes with the RXT-1, so we worked hard in designing and testing the torso pad just for you.

Take a peek at our Instagram to see the new RXT-1 torso pad in use!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

STRYK's founder, Brent Verdialez, served ten years in US Army Special Forces. His MMA background began with Kung Fu and later he trained in Muay Thai. After sustaining a wrist injury, Brent had the inspiration to invent the RXT-1 as a low-impact, high-intensity exercise device with huge potential. The RXT-1 allowed him to effectively train and maintain fitness without risking injury to his wrist, and he realized the value of this device for anyone who wants to train at home.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Get ready to improve your striking and get a killer workout with RXT-1, the ultimate in-home striking coach! See the RXT-1 in action by following @STRYK.USA on Instagram, where we post new content weekly.

 

 

 

 

  1. We are trying to co-locate all manufacturing to streamline production time and efficiency. 
  2. The other current challenge we are facing is obtaining enough orders and securing enough funds to begin manufacturing a production model. Securing funds through RXT-1 orders and/or by raising funds from investors.
story_txt:
The Future of Training
The RXT-1 Fight Coach Robot
 


 

 


 



 
 
Work on reflexes, reaction time, and cognitive processing for athletes. The RXT-1 “Combo Mode” feature allows users to strike the arm pads to practice various combinations. This trains your eye-hand coordination, speed, and agility all while getting a more engaging cardio workout. Another emphasis of the RXT-1 is its low impact and can be used in limited space - making it ideal for home use.
 

 
 
 

 
 

 
Can the RXT-1 take a punch from a pro?
Yes! Want proof? 
Watch Jeff Chan (ONE Championship MMA Athlete), with over 274K subscribers on YouTube demonstrate the durability of the RXT-1 robot and see how he uses it to train!
Here's the link to his demo video on Instagram (@MMAshredded - 148K followers) Here's another recent example, featuring Taekwondo black belt and Gymshark pro athlete Samuel Ericsson (@EricssonSamuel - 531K followers). Watch as he proves how the RXT-1 can take a (hard!) punch from an MMA pro!
 

 
 

 

 
We designed the RXT-1 with three training modes to be a complete in-home fighting Coach.


Practice Mode — designed to get you accustomed to the rhythm and flow of striking, using the RXT-1 to drill specific techniques. This mode can be used by beginners and professional fighters alike.

Spar Mode — this is your personal sparring partner. Get the convenience of waking up in the morning and getting a few spar rounds in before going to work, or in the evening before you relax.

Combination Mode — Master over 100+ pre-programmed striking combinations. Now you can practice at any time without the risk of injury, as the RXT-1 is low-impact and ready to go at any time!

 
 

 
"Learn" Mode, also called "practice" mode is the foundation of training on the RXT-1. It is designed for both beginner and advanced users to train one specific striking technique at a time. The RXT-1 strikes at the user in a consistent pattern every two seconds, which allows you to drill counters, dodges, and defense tactics as well as offense. Practice mode is easy to learn, but can never be mastered!
 
 
 
 
 

 
"Spar Mode" has 3 intensity levels to test your speed and improve reactions, while also getting an intense cardio workout. This is perfect for anyone who wants to train quick slips, rolls, and your best defense techniques.
 
 
 
 

 
 "Combination Mode" is like your own personal striking trainer. It has over 100 preset combinations and allows users to strike the arm pads as they would the focus mitts. This trains the user's hand-eye coordination, speed, agility, and cardio.
 
 
 
 

 
The RXT-1 comes with three intensity levels. Each level increases the difficulty for the user by striking faster and increasing the strike cadence. No fighter has defeated the RXT-1 on Level 3 up to now - Can you?
 
 

 
 

 

Sage Northcutt is a formal UFC fighter and now fights for ONE Fight Championship. After testing the RXT-1 he had this to say:"The RXT-1 is a great training device to work your reflexes and timing! It's very unpredictable and helps keep you sharp."

 Javon "Wanna" Walton - 12 year old actor and boxing prodigy (@OnwardWanna 274k Instagram)


 
All of these professional athletes and fighters are loving the RXT-1 while training at home, or at their gym. You can see the durability of the RXT-1 robot as each fighter uses it to train their reflexes and speed without holding anything back.

story:
Boasting a slim exterior only 4.5 mm thick, Cardlax 2.0 is apersonal massager designed on the mechanism of Electrical Muscle Stimulation so it fully serves the needs of both relaxing and strengthening your muscles. Despite its tiny size, this card massager is powerful enough to carry 8 modes and 10 intensity levels, allowing you to have amazing massage sessions.

   

 

 

 

 

 

 

After intense workouts, your muscles are tight and overtaxed. Use Cardlax to help relax your muscles and feel great after working out. Don’t forget, you can change the modes and intensity levels to find the right level of comfort for you.  

While other massagers can be large and bulky, hard to carry with you, Cardlax is small and extremely portable. It fits in your pocket, purse, and even your wallet!  

With the Cardlax 2.0, we have upgraded the material that holds the gel pads from plastic (Cardlax 1.0)  to synthetic leather. The leather is not only more comfortable for your skin, it also makes the pads easier to maintain and lasts longer. To remove dust and dirt from your gel pads, simply rinse with water and let them dry completely.

Gel pads for EMS units usually last for 4 to 6 months, and wear off after 50 - 60 rounds of use. 

 

 Cardlax is a great affordable gift for anyone in your life! 

  • An EMS(Electronic Muscle Stimulator) unit delivers low voltage electric impulses to stimulate the nerves and help in pain management.
  • A massage gun sends direct vibrating pulses through your muscles and is used to ease tight muscles and temporarily increase circulation.

After our first Kickstarter project, we have learned more experience in handling supply and production. Now our molds required for production are ready, production has been tested and passed quality control procedures. We can say with certainty, we are ready to produce when the fund is ready. Have a look at our mold :)

The gel pads can be purchased as an add-on (same for big gel pads).

 

 

On the upper right of the page, select the perk you would like to choose.

After you have selected your perk, web goes to the payment and fill in address page, comlete your payment and fill in your address.

Then you are all set and we are ready to send out your perks.

Free shipping for:

United States, Canada, Europe (Only for 23 countries, see below), HongKong, Japan, Taiwan, South Korea, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia.

European countries include: Cyprus, Greece, France, Slovenia, Lithuania, Croatia, Poland, Portugal, Malta, Netherlands, Finland, Belgium, Estonia, Luxembourg, Latvia, Denmark, Ireland, Sweden, Germany, Spain, Italy, Czech Republic, Austria. 

Other countries shipping fees will charge after the campaign ends, please refer to our survey.
 

Based off Delaware and Hong Kong, we're a small team of designers and engineers but we hold a big dream for the innovative products we created. The amazing journey of our previous campaign on Kickstarter made us set foot on another adventure of bringing a project to life. With portable gadegets like Cardlax, we bring ease to people's life.

 

FAQ.

1. What brings Cardlax back for a second project?

The team of Cardlax is a small group of people who are passionate about bringing portable technology to people who need it, with our original design in 2018.

Crowdfunding a project let us share our ideas with the world much earlier than traditional launches. Give backers an opportunity to bring ideas and share it with the community.

Also help people discover KickStarter alongside with other creative projects!

2. Will my rewards be different from your first project？

Most changes are the bits you can’t see, Cardlax itself has been upgraded, as well as material used for gel pads. Better programing of the device itself, material changed for longer usage.

More massager programs and higher output options available.

3. When will I get it?

We promised shipping before Christmas, but delivery service is just so busy and we can’t guarantee you will have it for Christmas. But will send you a digital Christmas Card, so you can still have it for Christmas gift, a better late than never gift.

4.  What is Cardlax made out of?

The frame is made of aluminium, and the main body is made of Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) materia, suitable for skin contact.

5. Who can’t use it?

Who is pregnant, children under 12 etc. See instruction for more information.

6. Are there any side effects?

Skin irritations may occur in the application area. Headaches can occur if used on the head. Excessive use of the device may cause pain in the muscles and joints.

7. Is Electrical Massage safe?

Is totally safe! We have also obtained FDA Safety Certification. The voltage is too low to do any harm to the human body, and it is recommended by physical therapists and doctors for rehabilitation and muscular pain relief.

8.  You said you can use Cardlax on neck, but on Cardlax 1.0 page, neck is the prohited areas, why is that?

This was our mistake, by the neck of being the prohibited area, we mean the front part of the neck. But you can use Cardlax on the back of your neck, where there are muscles (back muscle) around, you can safely use Cardlax on the back of your neck.

9. How long does the battery last?

The rechargeable battery keeps Cardlax going for 7+ days.

10. How does it charge? And how long does it take?

We include a micro-USB cable in our box. You can charge Cardlax using your computer or any micro-USB charger. Takes 1.5 hours to fully charge, so we have decided to make it this way, so that the battery will have a longer life period.

11. How long do the Gel Pads last?

Gel pads for EMS units usually last for 4 to 6 months, and wear off after 50 - 60 rounds of use. Please note you don’t need to wash the gel pads every time you use and make sure to apply some water on the pads and dry it before applying, and rinse accordingly after use.

PS: We recommend washing gel pads after 10-20 times of use, and each time you wash count as one round.

12. Can we get more gel pads? (More add-ons?)

You can choose more gel pads in the add-on option, which we will send you a survey to collect add-on options and mailing addresses 10 days after the campaign ends.

13. How do I change the reward tier?

1) Click the menu icon in the top left of the page and select your profile name. Then, select the project.

2) Click “Manage pledge”,  then you'll be able to choose a different reward tier.

3) Click “Next” to confirm your new reward.

14.How much does cardlax weigh?

Cardlax only weighs 1.3oz (36g).

15. Can we cancel the pledge?

You can cancel your pledge before the campaign ends. We do not offer refunds, returns, or exchanges on items received as Kickstarter rewards once the campaign ends. We appreciate your understanding of our policy and your support.

16. I have ordered more than one Cardlax, can I choose different colors? When and how?

The answer is yes you can, without doubt. You can choose the color you like. Once our campaign ends, you will receive a survey, which you will need to fill in your postal address and you can select colors and addons you like.

17. How does it feel to be massaged? Does it feel shocking?

Not at all! Bioelectricity exists in the human body, Cardlax is sending simulated electrical impulse. So using Cardlax won’t feel like being shocked.

18. Why is my Cardlax not working? The working light was on and flashing but nothing happened.

Our massager is an EMS unit, which delivers small, low-voltage electrical impulses to muscles to simulate massage effects; it is required to form a closed circuit in order for the device to start working. You need to place both of the pads to your preferred area of your skin, in order for the device to work.

19. What is the PledgeBox Survey?

PledgeBox is a third-party backer management platform that handles the survey for our campaign, after the campaign ends PledgeBox will send out a survey where you will be able to add any add-ons, update your shipping information.

It will take PledgeBox a few weeks to send out the survey.

However, we will take responsibility for defective products. Just contact our customer service, at hello@cardlax.net.

20. Can I use Gel Pads from other devices on Cardlax?

Theoretically, Yes you can. But our gel pads are connected magnetically, we can’t guarantee gel pads from other devices will work on Cardlax.

21. How do I get more Gel Pads after the project ends?

Yes, we will have our online/Amazon store later on, you can get more gel pads over there.

22: What about VAT or import tax?

Our product price does NOT include VAT or import tax of your country. But we’ll try our best to declare a comparatively reasonable value for the product. Due to the customs policy of different countries, we CANNOT guarantee if there is a tax for you. From our previous experience, the following countries/regions haven’t been charged for import tax including the U.S, Singapore, HongKong, Japan, China, South Korea, and other EU countries such as Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom and Canada. There is a chance you might be taxed, but the chance of getting taxed is very low right now, our parcel is very small and is highly unlikely to be charged. Please be aware of that. If you have further questions, please feel free to email us at hello@cardlax.net, thank you.

23. What is the best way to contact the Cardlax Team?

Is tough for us to reply directly in the comment section. Also, some problems are better discussed individually.

You can either:

1: Write us an email to hello@cardlax.net.

2: Send us a message on KickStarter.

24.  What is your refund policy?

Orders from 'backers' are not considered as 'purchases', but rather a contribution with a 'reward' in return for believing in and for funding the project. That's why refunds of contributions are not available for our project on this platform.

The support we get from our backers is what enables us to grow and choose crowdfunding as our business model.

25. Why do we have different feelings when we use Cardlax?

Under specific functions and intensity setting, EMS wherein the device for certain purposes may be more or less effective.
story_txt:
Boasting a slim exterior only 4.5 mm thick, Cardlax 2.0 is apersonal massager designed on the mechanism of Electrical Muscle Stimulation so it fully serves the needs of both relaxing and strengthening your muscles. Despite its tiny size, this card massager is powerful enough to carry 8 modes and 10 intensity levels, allowing you to have amazing massage sessions.    
 
See how Physical Therapists thinks of our product:

In order for a muscle to contract, your brain has to send an electrical impulse to neurons in muscle fibers. By applying electrode pads to different parts of muscle, Cardlax sends a small electrical impulse to a muscle that tells it to contract. That's why EMS is particularly useful for people who have tense and sore muscle. 
The purpose of EMS devices are:

To help build your muscle strength.
To help with muscle recovery after exercise. 
To help with improving your overall training efficiency.
To help relieve pain.

 

 
Cardlax has four main massage-like modes: 
 - An unique fitness mode - Shred
1. Knock       2. Malaxate       3. Rub       4. Knead
 

A new fitness mode, Shred. Specifically designed for people who want stronger, higher-frequency currents to get a full muscle contraction during or after their workouts. Small wave of short pulses stimulate your muscles, pulses gradually accelerates and become more powerful. The deeper, more intense muscular contractions can have positive effects in building muscle and help you on your body building journey.

* Disclaimer: Electric pulse stimulation can help build muscle mass in conjunction with proper workout and nutrition. It will not do it FOR you. In Shred mode, you may experience uncomfortable or intense contractions.

In the Knock mode, short but strong pulses stimulate your muscles. Every 3 “knocks” are followed by an interval and this mode is perfect for soreness of muscles. Remember to turn down the intensity level if it starts to feel too strong.

 

 
The Malaxate mode causes small muscle contractions and it feels like the currents first hit the center of the stimulated area and then spread out to the surrounding area. The electric signals are sent out every second, gently soothing your pain.

 

 
If you change it to the Rub mode, you will have a similar sensation to Malaxate. In this mode, small and then stronger pulsations that last a total 6 seconds are alternating, with a stop of 2 seconds. Every few rounds are mixed with equally intense stimulations on the both sides.

 

 
The last one is Knead. This mode brings you the feeling of someone slowly but firmly kneading your muscles, with a contraction like your stimulated parts are being pulled. A round of kneading lasts around 2 seconds, helping your muscles recover better.

 
The other three are combination modes: 
6. Knock + Malaxate       7. Knock + Rub        8. Knock + Knead. 
Each one of them helps relieve your pain and stress with 10 adjustable intensity levels. 
* The gif shown above is a simulation of hand massage for Cardlax.
 

 

To use Cardlax in wired mode, attach the wire to the electrode plate and place the gel pads directly on your skin of the body part you want to massage.
Power on the device and press the + button to increase the intensity and the - button to decrease intensity. Press M to change modes.

​​

 

 
Sitting for long periods of time has become an increasingly large problem for employees. You are more likely to experience neck, shoulder, arm, and back pain. Cardlax is a great option for portable, easy, and quick massaging to relieve stress and muscle tension in seconds. It is also small and discreet!

 

 
We're Cardlax Team and this is our 2nd Kickstarter project. After our first campaign, we believed Cardlax still had room for improvement and the funds we raised on Kickstarter made it possible for us to keep developing products so we decided to upgrade Cardlax and finally now we’re able to launch Cardlax 2.0! 

 

 
 











 

 



 

 
 
 
 
Cardlax 2.0 has been upgraded to include an extension cord for better usability and now has washable gel pads to last longer for you. Even though we added a wired mode, you can still use Cardlax wirelessly, too, to go hands-free. You can use Cardlax anywhere on your body to stimulate your muscles, though some of the best-suited areas are your waist, arms, calves, shoulder, and neck.
  After intense workouts, your muscles are tight and overtaxed. Use Cardlax to help relax your muscles and feel great after working out. Don’t forget, you can change the modes and intensity levels to find the right level of comfort for you.     
  ​    While other massagers can be large and bulky, hard to carry with you, Cardlax is small and extremely portable. It fits in your pocket, purse, and even your wallet!    
 
 With the Cardlax 2.0, we have upgraded the material that holds the gel pads from plastic (Cardlax 1.0)  to synthetic leather. The leather is not only more comfortable for your skin, it also makes the pads easier to maintain and lasts longer.
