Headaches can occur if used on the head. Excessive use of the device may cause pain in the muscles and joints.7. Is Electrical Massage safe?Is totally safe! We have also obtained FDA Safety Certification. The voltage is too low to do any harm to the human body, and it is recommended by physical therapists and doctors for rehabilitation and muscular pain relief.8.  You said you can use Cardlax on neck, but on Cardlax 1.0 page, neck is the prohited areas, why is that?This was our mistake, by the neck of being the prohibited area, we mean the front part of the neck. But you can use Cardlax on the back of your neck, where there are muscles (back muscle) around, you can safely use Cardlax on the back of your neck.9. How long does the battery last?The rechargeable battery keeps Cardlax going for 7+ days.10. How does it charge? And how long does it take?We include a micro-USB cable in our box. You can charge Cardlax using your computer or any micro-USB charger. Takes 1.5 hours to fully charge, so we have decided to make it this way, so that the battery will have a longer life period.11. How long do the Gel Pads last?Gel pads for EMS units usually last for 4 to 6 months, and wear off after 50 - 60 rounds of use. Please note you don’t need to wash the gel pads every time you use and make sure to apply some water on the pads and dry it before applying, and rinse accordingly after use.PS: We recommend washing gel pads after 10-20 times of use, and each time you wash count as one round.12. Can we get more gel pads? (More add-ons?)You can choose more gel pads in the add-on option, which we will send you a survey to collect add-on options and mailing addresses 10 days after the campaign ends.13. How do I change the reward tier?1) Click the menu icon in the top left of the page and select your profile name. Then, select the project.2) Click “Manage pledge”,  then you'll be able to choose a different reward tier.3) Click “Next” to confirm your new reward.14.How much does cardlax weigh?Cardlax only weighs 1.3oz (36g).15. Can we cancel the pledge?You can cancel your pledge before the campaign ends. We do not offer refunds, returns, or exchanges on items received as Kickstarter rewards once the campaign ends. We appreciate your understanding of our policy and your support.16. I have ordered more than one Cardlax, can I choose different colors? When and how?The answer is yes you can, without doubt. You can choose the color you like. Once our campaign ends, you will receive a survey, which you will need to fill in your postal address and you can select colors and addons you like.17. How does it feel to be massaged? Does it feel shocking?Not at all! Bioelectricity exists in the human body, Cardlax is sending simulated electrical impulse. So using Cardlax won’t feel like being shocked.18. Why is my Cardlax not working? The working light was on and flashing but nothing happened.Our massager is an EMS unit, which delivers small, low-voltage electrical impulses to muscles to simulate massage effects; it is required to form a closed circuit in order for the device to start working. You need to place both of the pads to your preferred area of your skin, in order for the device to work.19. What is the PledgeBox Survey?PledgeBox is a third-party backer management platform that handles the survey for our campaign, after the campaign ends PledgeBox will send out a survey where you will be able to add any add-ons, update your shipping information.It will take PledgeBox a few weeks to send out the survey.However, we will take responsibility for defective products. Just contact our customer service, at hello@cardlax.net.20. Can I use Gel Pads from other devices on Cardlax?Theoretically, Yes you can. But our gel pads are connected magnetically, we can’t guarantee gel pads from other devices will work on Cardlax.21. How do I get more Gel Pads after the project ends?Yes, we will have our online/Amazon store later on, you can get more gel pads over there.22: What about VAT or import tax?Our product price does NOT include VAT or import tax of your country. But we’ll try our best to declare a comparatively reasonable value for the product. Due to the customs policy of different countries, we CANNOT guarantee if there is a tax for you. From our previous experience, the following countries/regions haven’t been charged for import tax including the U.S, Singapore, HongKong, Japan, China, South Korea, and other EU countries such as Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom and Canada. There is a chance you might be taxed, but the chance of getting taxed is very low right now, our parcel is very small and is highly unlikely to be charged. Please be aware of that. If you have further questions, please feel free to email us at hello@cardlax.net, thank you.23. What is the best way to contact the Cardlax Team?Is tough for us to reply directly in the comment section. Also, some problems are better discussed individually.You can either:1: Write us an email to hello@cardlax.net.2: Send us a message on KickStarter.24.  What is your refund policy?Orders from 'backers' are not considered as 'purchases', but rather a contribution with a 'reward' in return for believing in and for funding the project. That's why refunds of contributions are not available for our project on this platform.The support we get from our backers is what enables us to grow and choose crowdfunding as our business model.25. Why do we have different feelings when we use Cardlax?Under specific functions and intensity setting, EMS wherein the device for certain purposes may be more or less effective.

story:
The normal version of the Stemoscope was successfully crowdfunded by 4,089 backers on Kickstarter and INDIEGOGO in early 2019. That version allows everyone to listen to the sound of life, for STEM education, recreation and many other purposes. Many medical professionals were surprised by its excellent acoustic performance. Some of them even used it in fighting the pandemic. Let's pay tribute to our HEROES!

After they enjoyed the high quality Stemoscope sounds, they provided many valuable feedbacks and inputs on what a wireless stethoscope they wish they can use in their daily practice. Introducing Stemoscope PRO, the wireless stethoscope designed with all their valuable inputs, allows you to auscultate your patients with THREE Wireless Modes and Advanced Noise Cancelling and provides you all what you need.

The Stemoscope brand has been widely featured by the world wide media since the first day.

And the normal version of the Stemoscope has been reviewed by many medical professionals.

In your busy daily practice, you might not be willing to pull out your smartphone to auscultate your patients. You can forget the smartphone now. In Wireless Mode I, Stemoscope PRO directly transmits the auscultatory sounds to Bluetooth earphones or hearing aids. Most popular TWS earphones and Apple AirPods are supported. It is the first truly wireless stethoscope and no smartphone is needed to use it if you like. This makes your life safer and easier because every extra step could increase the chance of infection. Simply slide the switch of the Stemoscope PRO to the left and wear your Bluetooth earphones to auscultate. 

  • Simple Steps to use with Bluetooth earphones

  • Listen while keep a safe social distance

The tubeless and wireless feature provides some advantage and freedom on distance auscultation. You can even fix it on a selfie stick to keep the safe social distance. 

  • Hold Stemoscope PRO with a plastic bag

The tubeless and wireless feature also makes it easy to put the Stemoscope PRO in a one-time plastic bag. The Stemoscope PRO is so sensitive that the audio quality is not affected by the plastic bag.

Hospitals and clinics can be busy and noisy. Sometimes it is hard to hear clearly with a traditional stethoscope. Advanced noise cancelling technology used in Stemoscope PRO can help you hear more clearly by attenuating ambient noise magically while amplifying the heart or lung sounds, making the sounds clear.

Let's listen to the sound samples without and with noise cancelling in this video.

 

The complicated structures of a stethoscope such as tubes and earpieces are difficult to be cleaned. Stemoscope PRO is designed for easy cleaning. Normally you can use an alcohol wipe to clean it. If you think it is not thorough, you may bath it with alcohol solution. It is designed to be water and alcohol proof, the first of this type. Please make sure it is turned off and don't move the switch before it is dried.

 

Nowadays everything gets "smart" through Apps. Slide the switch to the right to enter Wireless Mode II and unleashes the power of the Stemoscope PRO with the Apps we designed. There are two well developed Apps, the Stemoscope App and the PetStemo App, which are immediately ready to be used. These two Apps have been continuously fine-tuned based on our customers' feedback. In addition to these two, a new designed medical grade App, DrStemo App, will be released once the Stemoscope PRO device is cleared by FDA or certified by CE.

With these Apps, you can do a lot more.

  • See What You Hear

Not only can you hear these incredible sounds of life, but the audio can also be visualized as a waveform and spectrogram within the Stemoscope App, which helps you learn and identify the characteristics of each sound better. Let the rhythm of life come alive visually.

  • Record the Sounds and Share

With the Stemoscope App, you can easily record your heart and lung sounds. You can also save the location where the Stemoscope you placed when you recorded. The audio file and the Stemoscope location can be easily shared with most of the instant messaging Apps.

  • Three listening modes to choose

​The App provides three listening modes for you to do auscultation under various conditions. The Bell Mode emphasize the low pitched heartbeat sounds while the Diaphragm Mode weaken the heartbeat but emphasize the lung sounds. The Extended Mode includes all the sound components from 20-2000 Hz. 

It is easy to connect the Stemoscope PRO to the App. Unlike other Bluetooth devices, the Stemoscope App doesn't require the device to pair with your phone, but just follow the steps in the instructions to make it work.

You can connect your smartphone with the wireless headset while your smartphone is connected with Stemoscope through the Bluetooth. This provides you the second wireless  stethoscope experience.

With the Apps we have developed, you can do livestream and record. If you still feel there are some limitations, Wireless Mode III gives your more freedom. In this mode, Stemoscope PRO can work as a Bluetooth microphone that can be connected to a phone or a computer. You can use your favorite smartphone apps or PC software such as Skype, Facetime, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger and Line to record or do live streaming with your colleagues, friends or patients.

The Stemoscope design is elegant with chrome plated zinc alloy and a plastic cover. The Stemoscope PRO is even better. The body is made of stainless steel and a glass cover. Both materials are very endurable, making Stemoscope PRO a long-lasting piece of art.

 

You may choose the following add-ons when you check out.

The Impact

With the worldwide backers, many great product ideas come true, including the Stemoscope. Now we need your help to make a great wireless stethoscope that works without breaking the social distance rule, but still can be iconic for every doctor. We have successfully brought the Stemoscope to the world and provide people opportunities to listen to the sound of life. We have extended experience in designing, developing and manufacturing medical devices. Our team also successfully got FDA clearance on a medical device in the past. With your help, we are confident that we can deliver the Stemoscope PRO to you and the world!

Risks & Challenges

In real life, risks sometimes can not be avoided but can be managed. Though we have designed the Stemoscope PRO and successfully built the fully functional samples, there could still be some technical challenges in high volume manufacturing. Though we have a solid plan to submit an application to FDA for clearance, nobody in the world can guarantee a timeline on the clearance – the FDA is a government! However, our plan and preparation can help. As an engineering team, we are ready to solve the potential manufacturing problems as we did in the past 20 years. As the experts in the acoustics science and biomedical engineering, we are prepared to overcome all the potential challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Besides backing us directly, you can help us in many ways. Please share this page with your friends and colleagues who may need the Stemoscope PRO. You may share with the Indiegogo share tools, or you may join our referral program on Kickbooster to get some cash back.

story:
Introducing the MAÄT 1.0 Legging

 

As seen in Yoga Journal

More Movement. More Possibilities. 

Elevate your yoga practice with MAÄT and reconnect to your joy of movement and exercise.  

A yoga teacher in NYC, our co-founder Fiona witnessed her students (and herself!) avoiding knee pain by using mats, towels and blankets as padding during their practice. The padding had to be constantly repositioned, disrupting focus and flow. Fiona envisioned a yoga legging with built-in padding so that every yoga practice could be seamless and distraction-free. This was the inspiration for our MAÄT 1.0 Legging. 

Moto-inspired style, wetsuit-inspired technology

Designed with the fit and flexibility of wetsuit padding and the edgy aesthetic of motorcycle gear, the MAÄT 1.0 Legging with our patent-pending, innovative ribbed knee pad provides soft, supple padding with gentle compression so you can move through your workout without the distraction of pain or discomfort. 

 

Everything about the MAÄT 1.0 Legging is made to fit and flatter with the most comfortable, durable and body accentuating materials. MAÄT leggings are made in the USA, crafted with materials from top suppliers who all have a long-standing history of business success. Our leggings are made to last. 

 

 

Practice yoga anywhere with MAÄT

Travel is back! When talking to people about the MAÄT 1.0 Legging, so many people told us stories of folding up a hotel towel to put under their knees while doing yoga, or working out without their yoga mat because it was too bulky to pack. Pack your MAÄT leggings and practice wherever you go - no more discomfort, no more distractions! 

If you're staying closer to home, it's likely that you'll be taking your practice outside now that the warmer days are here. We love practicing in the great outdoors with the sun on our skin and nature all around, but...pebbles and rocks and pieces of tree bark have a way of digging into our knees. With the MAÄT 1.0 Legging, it's no longer a concern. 

We care about our impact on the environment 

First and foremost, we keep our suppliers close to home. MAÄT leggings are manufactured in the USA, reducing emissions from long distance shipping. We also chose durable, long lasting fabrics to ensure that the MAÄT 1.0 Legging is designed to last. We structured our business model to reduce waste, and have chosen environmentally friendly packaging and shipping options. 

We use Sendle to ship in the USA, so everything we ship domestically is carbon neutral. Shipping for one pair of the MAÄT 1.0 Legging in the USA is $7. 

Return Policy

Indiegogo is a platform where innovators offer their creations at discounted prices. Funds raised are for launching the product and covering the costs of production. As per Indiegogo's Terms of Use, we will not offer refunds for leggings that are not defective. We will allow for one exchange of size (returned leggings must be unworn and still have tags attached) with the backer covering shipping costs. For exchanges, please contact help@maatactive.com. Please note, if you are unsure of which size to order, email help@maatactive.com and we will do our best to assist you and hopefully avoid unnecessary exchanges. 

Risks and challenges

Although this is MAÄT's first crowd funding campaign, we are confident that we can deliver our leggings as promised, on time. We have taken our time developing this product in order to get it right, and as a result, have had time to develop strong working relationships with our suppliers and manufacturers. We made the decision to delay the launch of this campaign in order to do a first production run so that we could experience and more fully anticipate any issues that could potentially arise throughout the production process. With the knowledge gained from this first run, we have set up systems to deal with any foreseeable problems and situations.

Our manufacturers are all in the USA, so we have minimized our exposure to global disruptions. That said, it is not possible to completely eliminate all exposure, especially during a global pandemic.

We promise complete transparency with our backers. If any unexpected issues arise, we will clearly communicate the issue(s) with our backers along with our clear plan of action.

Our suppliers and manufacturers are all highly respected in their industries and have each been in business for a minimum of 30 years. Throughout our development process they have been extremely reliable and when an issue has arisen, extremely responsive. We are confident in their abilities to meet deadlines. Our mentor, Cheyann Benedict, is an expert in navigating quick, explosive growth. Within 3 months of launching her first fashion company, C&C California, the brand found itself on Oprah's list of favorite things. Sales skyrocketed and Cheyann quickly learned how to accelerate production to meet off the charts demand. C&C was sold to Liz Claiborne within 2 years, making it the youngest company to ever be acquired. In the event that we far exceed our funding goal, we are confident that with Cheyann's expertise and experience, we will be able to stick to our timeline.

story:
Enyware lets you do the impossible. Sit in a “zero-stress” posture where your spine is stacked in an ideal S-shape while your body is upright, balanced, with back muscles comfortably relaxed.

A few minutes in Enyware, and you will never want to sit the same way again.

 

Enyware applies just the right amount of force from its dual lumbar to roll up your pelvis and shape your spine into a neutral S-Shape. At the same time, its patent-pending posture shaper structure gently lifts the front of your chest into a power pose that eliminates slouching in a way no other chairs can.

This unique approach stacks your spine into an upright and relaxed posture, with minimal muscle force required to maintain this perfect balance.

Enyware does not lock the body in one posture. You are still free to write, look through the microscope, or create a work of art. Enyware will continuously support your body, reducing the spine's load and returning you to the zero-stress posture whenever you need it.

 

Your phone, iPad, laptop, and joypad require your arms and shoulders to be in different positions, but most armrests are set too far apart or at the wrong height to support modern devices.

These poorly designed armrests force us into awkward postures. One side was leaning to use a phone, slouching down to find armrest support when typing, or bending our neck down to view the tablet contents.

Enyware's dynamic, detachable armrest is created as the result of our research and forms a critical part of the total support your body needs at work.

Our armrest is adjustable to let the elbows rest at the right height to reinforce your "zero-stress" upright posture.

It moves out to support your arms when typing or moves in create a support platform to let both hands hold phones & tablets at a healthy eye level, so you don't need to bend down.

With your neck properly aligned and the shoulders relaxed, shoulder pain and text neck risks are greatly reduced. 

 

Combining dynamic armrest with the zero-stress posture is how Enyware provides total support to the body and helps transform your posture away from the ergonomic pain affecting most of us today.

Even with Enyware’s zero-stress sitting posture and dynamic armrest, static posture for long stretches of time is still unhealthy.

To encourage dynamic sitting, we integrate a sensor into Enyware to be your habit coach throughout the day. 

Enyware tracks your torso movement and angle, so it knows if you are sitting still for too long or too reliant on the forward support.

Choose to set active time goals and reminders to get up for a short stretch. Since Enyware is smart enough to know if you have left the seat or shifted posture, it will send a nudge only when necessary.

 

Enyware lets you set active goals and work with you either through app and browser notification, or a single report at the end of the day.

 

Enyware can remind you to periodically alternate between inclined seating in the backrest and perching on the seat. The perching posture opens the hip to the optimal 135 degrees, engages the core muscles, and further reduces tension on your spine. With the support provided by Enyware, you can perch more comfortably for longer. 

By putting you in control of your health goals, Enyware provides the positive reinforcement you need to transform sedentary habits into a more active lifestyle.

Enyware is the world’s first smart seat that considers both the physical and mental aspects of sitting.

While our physical support helps you achieve a “zero-stress” sitting posture. Our intelligent system also gives you a powerful tool to reach a “zero-stress” state of mind.

Integrated with Enyware's posture shaper is a sensor that calculates your breathing rate and even detects stress based on your breathing pattern. 

Breathing is a conscious act that can create dramatic changes in your body. It can increase the oxygen level in the bloodstream and reduce stress without the need for medication. 

Now with Enyware, you will see your breathing rate and set a stress alarm in case of elevated breathing. Pick a technique to help manage your stress in the same way top executives employ mindful breathing to boost their performance. 

As a society, we are obsessed with how many calories we burn and what muscle group we exercise from just 1 hour in the gym. But we believe what we do during 8 hours of sitting is no less important and should be intelligently managed by you.

Enyware makes sitting as intelligent as our other devices, not to distract you with another piece of technology, but to help your body and mind live in the same moment, and enriching both.

Enyware lets you take the zero-stress sitting experience any where. All you need is an even surface, and Enyware will turn your place into an ergonomic space.

Enyware weighs only 2.6 kg and is easily portable, so you can use it in your kitchen chair for work and easily put it away during meals.   Freeing up the need to place out-of-place furniture like an office chair in your living space.

Just about everything about Enyware is adjustable. You can change the pan size, height, and depth of the posture shaper to fit your body type snugly. Its armrest is also detachable depending on your needs and sitting style.

We designed Enyware for the masses. We took great care to test Enyware with a sample various people of all sex, body size, and ethnicity to ensure maximum comfort and support

 

It would be best if you had ergonomics everywhere, and Enyware makes that possible, any where.

 

Enyware was vigorously tested with medical-grade motion capture sensors and EMG to measure both the participant’s posture and muscle strain over a 30-minute sitting session simulating tasks performed by modern workers.

The result proves that using Enyware can help you sit upright for much longer while imposing only half the muscle strain compared to sitting upright without support.

In time-lapsed comparisons, participants can keep the optimal spine posture without slouching throughout the entire testing period, with better neck and shoulder alignment.

The EMG results show that our “zero-stress” posture imposes only half the strain on the lower back muscle (Thoracolumbar fascia) and middle back muscle (Trapezius) when compared to sitting upright without support.

Even better, sitting upright with Enyware strains your muscle less than slumping.

This impressive result has been repeated both under laboratory conditions and in real-world scenarios with our beta testers.  

In 2018, our team made the LEX Bionic chair and the kind people of Kickstarter made LEX the most crowdfunded wearable robotics product ever. LEX had a 100% Kickstarter delivery date went on to star in one episode of HBO's Silicon Valley.
story_txt: Enyware lets you do the impossible. Sit in a “zero-stress” posture where your spine is stacked in an ideal S-shape while your body is upright, balanced, with back muscles comfortably relaxed.A few minutes in Enyware, and you will never want to sit the same way again.  Enyware applies just the right amount of force from its dual lumbar to roll up your pelvis and shape your spine into a neutral S-Shape. At the same time, its patent-pending posture shaper structure gently lifts the front of your chest into a power pose that eliminates slouching in a way no other chairs can.This unique approach stacks your spine into an upright and relaxed posture, with minimal muscle force required to maintain this perfect balance.Enyware does not lock the body in one posture. You are still free to write, look through the microscope, or create a work of art. Enyware will continuously support your body, reducing the spine's load and returning you to the zero-stress posture whenever you need it. Your phone, iPad, laptop, and joypad require your arms and shoulders to be in different positions, but most armrests are set too far apart or at the wrong height to support modern devices.These poorly designed armrests force us into awkward postures. One side was leaning to use a phone, slouching down to find armrest support when typing, or bending our neck down to view the tablet contents.Enyware's dynamic, detachable armrest is created as the result of our research and forms a critical part of the total support your body needs at work.Our armrest is adjustable to let the elbows rest at the right height to reinforce your "zero-stress" upright posture.It moves out to support your arms when typing or moves in create a support platform to let both hands hold phones & tablets at a healthy eye level, so you don't need to bend down.With your neck properly aligned and the shoulders relaxed, shoulder pain and text neck risks are greatly reduced.  Combining dynamic armrest with the zero-stress posture is how Enyware provides total support to the body and helps transform your posture away from the ergonomic pain affecting most of us today.Even with Enyware’s zero-stress sitting posture and dynamic armrest, static posture for long stretches of time is still unhealthy.To encourage dynamic sitting, we integrate a sensor into Enyware to be your habit coach throughout the day. Enyware tracks your torso movement and angle, so it knows if you are sitting still for too long or too reliant on the forward support.Choose to set active time goals and reminders to get up for a short stretch. Since Enyware is smart enough to know if you have left the seat or shifted posture, it will send a nudge only when necessary. Enyware lets you set active goals and work with you either through app and browser notification, or a single report at the end of the day. Enyware can remind you to periodically alternate between inclined seating in the backrest and perching on the seat. The perching posture opens the hip to the optimal 135 degrees, engages the core muscles, and further reduces tension on your spine. story:
Yogurt Glamour is a unique, yogurt skincare and soap brand dedicated to authenticity and sustainability, delivering the highest quality, natural, handcrafted in small batches products for men and women. Since its launching in Los Angeles, CA in 2019, the brand, which has a portfolio of forty nine products, has quickly expanded to become a local, popular go-to shopping choice of men and women from all ages and cultures. Our solution to skincare is Yogurt Goodness in each product.

We are looking for like-minded people to join us in our journey to expand nationwide.  

 

I am Annie, the creator behind Yogurt Glamour. I am so glad we are connecting today. With a background in Biology and a MBA degree, a passion for nature preservation and love for natural skincare, during family travels where so many cultures use yogurt to beautify the skin, I was inspired to create high quality, unique yogurt skincare and soaps in vivid colors and amazing scents that make you feel good about using. 

Why is yogurt so good for the skin? Yogurt has amazing properties for the skin: Lactic Acid helps dissolve dead skin, tightens pores and hydrates. Zinc is anti-inflammatory and soothing. calcium helps heal dry skin. B2, B5 and B 12 vitamins keep the skin hydrated and healthy. 

Each purchase support projects that sustain biodiversity, help protect wildlife habitats and support communities. We are honored to have partnered with The Midnight Mission - the largest homeless shelter in Downtown Los Angeles, donating soap for our homeless community, as well as with the Jane Goodall institute and several other community non-for-profit organizations. 

All of our packaging is sustainable and biodegradable. People love the amazing long lasting scents and artistic look. With a large variety, we have face and body soaps, shampoo bars, natural aluminum-free deodorants, shave bars, 24h moisturizing face cream, bath bombs, lotion bars, bath salts and hair conditioner bars. 

Despite the pandemic, Yogurt Glamour expanded to open a storefront in La Habra-CA, Five in-store locations in Souther California, Fifteen Venues such as State Fairs, Certified Markets, Malls and Festivals. We sell direct-to-consumer via our website: https://www.yogurtglamour.com

Reason to contribute to the cause: 

* Unique, Mission Driven Sustainable Brand.

*Highest Quality Handcrafted Yogurt Soaps and Skincare.

*Growth Potential to expand and serve more communities nationwide. 

*With the funds raised, we will be able to execute effective activations in multiple states to open more locations, market with a PR team, and bring our amazing products to more consumers to use and enjoy. 

 

Yogurt Glamour is always committed to the clean cosmetics pledge. 

People love how our products make their skin feel soft and moisturized.

story:
We found that many people -including ourselves- wear our overstimulation as a badge of honor; The more we do, the "better". We want to steer away from that socially constructed mindset and wanted to create a tool to help remind us to slow things down, be more mindful, present, and overall more aware in our day-to-day.

 

For centuries and throughout different cultures around the globe, the egg has symbolized life, wealth, and promise. Our goal was to use natural materials that can work in harmony with the egg's simple yet captivating symbology and design.

 

Balancing at 17mm wide and 23.38mm tall, the Thinking Egg has been ergonomically designed to feel great in your hands while being extremely portable.

 

 

 

 

 

The Thinking Egg II is now available in five natural materials that hold specific properties. We encourage customers to choose the Thinking Egg/s they can relate to most based on their specific metaphysical qualities.

 

Whichever reward you select, we're providing all our early adopters a discounted rate, only available here on Indiegogo. You'll be able to select which Thinking Egg/s you'd like to receive in our post-campaign backer survey. 

This month three years ago we launched our very first campaign called the Thinking Egg. Having more than 4,500 supports from all parts of the world supporting our mission and design was remarkable.  

Fast forward to today - we've shipped over 100,000 Thinking Eggs to over 80 countries.  We're incredibly excited for all our supporters to experience the Thinking Egg II and to continue our mission of promoting self-health and wellness through the products we create. 

 

 

This isn't our first rodeo. We've been fortunate enough to receive funding and deliver ahead of schedule on our past two campaigns. We'll aim to continue that very same tradition comes fulfillment time for your Thinking Eggs.

 

At Orijin Design Company, we strive to slow things down and intentionally think about designs and systems that can be made better. In a world inundated with information and stimuli, we aim to harmoniously intertwine form and function, making designs and systems that provide for the space to be present and aware in our daily lives. 

We're very excited to share The Thinking Egg II with the Indiegogo community and to create a community of our own composed of individuals that desire to slow down, be more mindful, present, and overall - more aware in our day-to-day.

story:
ZEUS is a sleek, non-invasive solution to prevent snoring. The device targets the throat muscles which contract to cause snoring, tightening the tongue muscle and keeping the airways open without waking the user.

Renowned sleep expert Professor Joerg Steier & Morgan Innovation & Technology have collaborated to develop a new device to tackle snoring and improve the lives of snorers and their partners alike. ZEUS is a CE marked device and has been tested to medical standards. The device is currently in the process of being FDA approved. 

ZEUS attaches underneath the chin with disposable adhesive pads, stimulating automatic electrical impulses in response to vibrations from the snorer. The electrical impulses will redirect the muscles in the tongue and throat in order to dilate the airways for easy breathing.

 

 

 

Snoring occurs due to the contraction of the airways, causing vibrations in the throat muscles. The device’s currents redirect these muscles, move the tongue and dilate the airway to allow easy breathing - all whilst the user sleeps!

The ZEUS device has been trialled by sleep disorder breathing charity: Hope2Sleep.

Here are what a few of their members thought of ZEUS...

ZEUS is a device for use in the home to alleviate snoring associated with the soft palette and tonsils, which adheres under the chin.

  • The device is not effective for sufferers of nasal snoring, as this device specifically targets the snoring caused by the tongue muscle relaxing in the throat.
  • The device is not suitable for users who have long facial hair under the chin as this will prevent adherence with the hydrogel z-pads. Short stubble works fine, but beards typically will not hold the device well throughout the night.
  • Do not use in conjunction with metal implants (excluding fillings) in the head or neck region
  • If you have any pre-existing medical conditions and are in doubt about whether ZEUS is suitable for you, we recommend consulting a medical professional. Read more about user contraindications in our site FAQs here.
  • ZEUS is only suitable for ages 18+

Professor Joerg Steier is an academic studying in the field of respiratory physiology and sleep disorder breathing; an interest which has led to academic collaborations across 5 continents. Professor Steier trained in Medicine at the University of Leipzig, further working at the University of Alabama, gathering work experience in Zurich and Bavaria; then later working at the University of Essen in the Western German Lung Centre. He has been awarded Chair of Respiratory and Sleep Medicine at King’s College London, whilst also serving as President of the British Sleep Society (BSS), Consultant at Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust and as a Consultant Respiratory Physician at the Lane Fox Unit.

Around a decade ago, Professor Steier theorised an idea for a non-invasive aid to assist sufferers of snoring and sleep disordered breathing.

Professor Steier formed a research partnership with Morgan IAT in order to trial and develop a consumer device that would employ sleek electronics to prevent snoring. 

Morgan IAT supported Professor Steier and his team throughout every research stage, providing technical support and valuable prototype trials to ensure that a compact, effective and easily manufacturable product could be developed to fit Steier’s methodology and expertise. 

 

Morgan IAT are a Hampshire-based, family-run innovation company that develop, design and manufacture market-leading technology products in the medical and commercial industries. They have achieved an impressive selection of awards such as The Queen’s Award for Enterprise in both 2011 and 2016 and The IET Innovation Award in Health and Technology amongst many others. Morgan IAT are passionate about innovation, bringing fresh, new ideas to the market. Their business ethos is rooted in the need of others, ensuring that their profits are invested in the development of products which assist people’s quality of life and well-being by design. 

 

 

ZEUS was recently featured in MediaPlanet’s Sleep Health campaign, which featured in the supplement of The Guardian newspaper recently; a campaign dedicated to sleep awareness and ways to develop better sleep practices.

Find ZEUS featured on Sleep Gadgets, a sleep website dedicated to featuring the best consumer technology on the market.

We are offering a referral campaign through Kickbooster.me which allows you to get a unique referral link to share with your friends and family.

You will earn commission on any pledges that are made through your unique link.

To find out more visit our referral page on:

https://zeus-sleep.kickbooster.me

story:
Story

We spent the last three years designing the perfect rod mobility device.

 

Through feedback and personal experience we have designed a patent pending training tool that you can use literally anywhere.

 

Inconvenience is not an excuse anymore.



Our Story

3 years ago I was in Buffalo, NY for my job (as a Professional Baseball Umpire)  and Haley came out for a short weekend visit. Whenever Haley comes to visit, we always make it a point to stop in at a local gym to get in a workout together. We dropped in that day and spent a solid 10 minutes looking for something to warmup with, after finally finding a pvc pipe. On our way back to the hotel we thought to ourselves, “Finding a tool to warmup with just shouldn’t be that difficult. Why isn’t there something better?”

 

The idea of RomRod was born on that walk back to the hotel. We realized that what we wanted didn’t exist and that we were going to be the ones who invented it.

 

Putting it on paper

That afternoon, as we ate lunch, we began discussing all the possible features we would want in a rod mobility fitness device. Haley and I had just started our fitness journey in CrossFit. So, naturally I was infatuated with all the different Olympic lifts used in CrossFit and wanted to perfect my technique.

Haley, whom had previously had a shoulder surgery from an injury suffered while playing high school sports, needed to improve her mobility so she could rack a barbell on her back. These reasons are why we loved incorporating a stick or rod into our warmup routine.

But, the question was, "How do we make this tool portable?" My career requires me to be on the road almost 200 days a year. And, Haley comes out to visit about every 2-3 weeks. So, portability was definitely a priority.

We made a list of those necessary features and began sketching possible designs. The device needed to be lightweight, short enough that could fit in any bag, and provided similar elements of a barbell (knurling, dimensions, and feel). I can't tell you how many times we drew and redrew all possible design concepts, that next couple days.

When we thought we had nailed down a design concept, we started speaking to an engineer. Wow, were we mistaken about our progress. Our amazing engineer came back to us with problems, solutions, and of course suggestions. Through our knowledge and background in fitness and his expertise in product design, we came up with a working concept ready to be prototyped. This would be the first prototype of 10 (or so... I think we have kind of lost count). We were so excited when we were able to get our hands on that first 3D printed plastic prototype.

 

This was Haley and I's first experience with designing a product. So, of course, we didn't nail it on our initial attempt. But, it didn't matter. We now knew what it took to go from paper to physical product. And, that was a small victory.

 

Each prototype has been a learning experience. Some days were very disappointing and others were ultimate highs. The hardest days were those waiting in anticipation for that next prototype to be delivered from the 3D printers or the production facility we have hired to manufacture our first bulk order.

 

We have made it, but it wasn't overnight!

From numerous attempts at an aluminum prototype we are proud of, has come something we can not wait to share. Our manufacturer is currently in production of our first bulk order. Below is a sneak peak of our ready to sell Patent Pending RomRod in its packaging.

 

Through the prototyping stage, we have tested RomRod with all different types of athletes, fitness enthusiasts, and even people just wanting to work on their mobility or recover from an injury. Their feedback and suggestions have been considered and implemented; helping us reach this point.

 

The molds have been created for the different parts. Our packaging is complete. And, a free RomRod carry bag is included with each purchase. It's amazing what it takes to put together each piece of the puzzle to have a final product ready to deliver to the customer. But we are happy to say, it's ready!


Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

 

Get Your Project Funded Today!


We’ve worked tirelessly to get this device ready for the marketplace and we are incredibly proud and enthusiastic about this becoming a reality.

 

We want to thank you for your continued support in this project and we are so thrilled that you finally have the ability to become the owner of your very own RomRod mobility device. We know that it will add value to your fitness and mobility lifestyle, the way that it has ours.

Risks and challenges

1. Manufacturing Risks: We have multiple working prototypes that look, feel, and function exactly how we intend the owner to use it. Also, we are ready to process our first bulk production run of over 1,000 devices with successfully reaching our campaign goal. If the campaign goes beyond these numbers, there is a risk of a slight delay of a month for the second production order to fulfill those rewards. 2. Product Quality Risks: While preparing for manufacturing we have setup strict quality control procedures involving factory visits through the production process. There is always a risk that there will be an underperforming device, but we are confident our procedures will catch most. If there is an issue with a device that a customer receives, we will be happy to replace immediately. Considering the risks, we will deliver the device to the user even if it means a loss for us. The only risk you are taking, once we reach our goal, is that your device will not reach you immediately. But, you can battle that by being an “early bird supporter”. We will keep backers up to date with all production and fulfillment statuses.

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Environmental commitments

Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.

Long-lasting design

We used spaceship graded aluminum and stainless metal instead of plastic to make the product last much longer than other alternatives.

Reusability and recyclability

We plan to make all packaging from recycled paper products.

Sustainable materials

We plan to use recycled paper board for our packaging.
story_txt:
Story
We spent the last three years designing the perfect rod mobility device.
 
Through feedback and personal experience we have designed a patent pending training tool that you can use literally anywhere.
 
Inconvenience is not an excuse anymore.



Our Story
3 years ago I was in Buffalo, NY for my job (as a Professional Baseball Umpire)  and Haley came out for a short weekend visit. Whenever Haley comes to visit, we always make it a point to stop in at a local gym to get in a workout together. We dropped in that day and spent a solid 10 minutes looking for something to warmup with, after finally finding a pvc pipe. On our way back to the hotel we thought to ourselves, “Finding a tool to warmup with just shouldn’t be that difficult. Why isn’t there something better?”
 
The idea of RomRod was born on that walk back to the hotel. We realized that what we wanted didn’t exist and that we were going to be the ones who invented it.
 
Putting it on paper
That afternoon, as we ate lunch, we began discussing all the possible features we would want in a rod mobility fitness device. Haley and I had just started our fitness journey in CrossFit. So, naturally I was infatuated with all the different Olympic lifts used in CrossFit and wanted to perfect my technique.
Haley, whom had previously had a shoulder surgery from an injury suffered while playing high school sports, needed to improve her mobility so she could rack a barbell on her back. These reasons are why we loved incorporating a stick or rod into our warmup routine.
But, the question was, "How do we make this tool portable?" My career requires me to be on the road almost 200 days a year. And, Haley comes out to visit about every 2-3 weeks. So, portability was definitely a priority.
We made a list of those necessary features and began sketching possible designs. The device needed to be lightweight, short enough that could fit in any bag, and provided similar elements of a barbell (knurling, dimensions, and feel). I can't tell you how many times we drew and redrew all possible design concepts, that next couple days.

When we thought we had nailed down a design concept, we started speaking to an engineer. Wow, were we mistaken about our progress. Our amazing engineer came back to us with problems, solutions, and of course suggestions. Through our knowledge and background in fitness and his expertise in product design, we came up with a working concept ready to be prototyped. This would be the first prototype of 10 (or so... I think we have kind of lost count). We were so excited when we were able to get our hands on that first 3D printed plastic prototype.
 
This was Haley and I's first experience with designing a product. So, of course, we didn't nail it on our initial attempt. But, it didn't matter. We now knew what it took to go from paper to physical product. And, that was a small victory.
 
Each prototype has been a learning experience. Some days were very disappointing and others were ultimate highs. The hardest days were those waiting in anticipation for that next prototype to be delivered from the 3D printers or the production facility we have hired to manufacture our first bulk order.
 
We have made it, but it wasn't overnight!
From numerous attempts at an aluminum prototype we are proud of, has come something we can not wait to share. Our manufacturer is currently in production of our first bulk order. Below is a sneak peak of our ready to sell Patent Pending RomRod in its packaging.

 
Through the prototyping stage, we have tested RomRod with all different types of athletes, fitness enthusiasts, and even people just wanting to work on their mobility or recover from an injury. Their feedback and suggestions have been considered and implemented; helping us reach this point.
 
The molds have been created for the different parts. Our packaging is complete. And, a free RomRod carry bag is included with each purchase. It's amazing what it takes to put together each piece of the puzzle to have a final product ready to deliver to the customer. But we are happy to say, it's ready!






Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
 
Get Your Project Funded Today!






We’ve worked tirelessly to get this device ready for the marketplace and we are incredibly proud and enthusiastic about this becoming a reality.
 
We want to thank you for your continued support in this project and we are so thrilled that you finally have the ability to become the owner of your very own RomRod mobility device. We know that it will add value to your fitness and mobility lifestyle, the way that it has ours.
Risks and challenges
1. Manufacturing Risks: We have multiple working prototypes that look, feel, and function exactly how we intend the owner to use it. Also, we are ready to process our first bulk production run of over 1,000 devices with successfully reaching our campaign goal. If the campaign goes beyond these numbers, there is a risk of a slight delay of a month for the second production order to fulfill those rewards. 2. Product Quality Risks: While preparing for manufacturing we have setup strict quality control procedures involving factory visits through the production process. There is always a risk that there will be an underperforming device, but we are confident our procedures will catch most. If there is an issue with a device that a customer receives, we will be happy to replace immediately. Considering the risks, we will deliver the device to the user even if it means a loss for us. The only risk you are taking, once we reach our goal, is that your device will not reach you immediately. But, you can battle that by being an “early bird supporter”. We will keep backers up to date with all production and fulfillment statuses.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We used spaceship graded aluminum and stainless metal instead of plastic to make the product last much longer than other alternatives.
Reusability and recyclability
We plan to make all packaging from recycled paper products.
Sustainable materials
We plan to use recycled paper board for our packaging.

story:
MyPet is a powerful, functional & accurate monitor that will follow everything from your pet’s location and activity to more in-depth information surrounding their vital signs and behaviour levels.  All of your pet's information will be accessible via a monitoring app, where pet owners will get insightful health alerts and recommendations when the device detects changes in your pet’s data. MyPetGo is designed to help pet owners like you understand exactly how your pet is feeling while saving you time by connecting you to trusted local pet care services if any issues arise.

                                                                    

 
We help you identify potential risks and alert you to any sudden changes.  

                                                            

 
Never lose sight of your pet again and get access to a wide range of location features. 
 
 

Once you've ordered your monitor and it's arrived in the post, activating it couldn't be simpler!

                       

Each monitor comes with a 1-month data trial, where you can have some time to think about your preferred plans. At the end of the trial period, you can choose from the following options listed below. For those who do not select a plan at the end of the trial period, we will default to the monthly-rolling $9.99 data plan.

 

.                

                                                   

 

We've built a robust monitor, designed to withstand the elements:

We're well underway for a launch this year! Check out our project timeline below and follow our journey:

This is just the beginning! We have big plans coming up, here is how we plan to redefine the pet tech space:

We’re an international team of animal lovers headquartered in Singapore, Vietnam and Barcelona and we want to help pet owners become more responsible so their pets can live happy healthy and long-lasting lives.  For a long time, there has been a disconnect between the natural and technological worlds, so we’ve made it our mission to bridge this gap by creating a two-way dialogue between animals and humans. We hope our product will pave the way for future developments bringing us even closer to communicating with our pets.

We carefully selected Herald Datanetics Ltd as our manufacturing partner due to their vast experience with building IoT products, wearables and other connected devices. As a financial partner and shareholder in our business, they have consulted us every step of the way, helping us hit our development milestones, whilst future-proofing our product through rigorous testing and due diligence throughout each development phase.  

A credible Hong-Kong listed company with many years working in this field, we have formed a formidable partnership and look forward to moving onto DVT phase, where the product inches ever closer to mass production. 

See their credentials: 

Herald Datanetics Ltd

Design, engineering & contract manufacturing of connected electronics products.

https://www.heraldata.com/ 

We love meeting pet owners or anyone lucky enough to work with pets! Follow our journey and come and say hello!

Worldwide Component Shortages

After working on R&D for over 1.5 years on this project, we've seen firsthand the issues caused by worldwide shortages in both semiconductors and microchips.  This is causing serious component lead-time delays which are affecting nearly all major production focused industries.  We have mitigated this as much as possible by placing an advanced order for all of the components required in order to fulfil the first batch of monitors. 

COVID-19
The global pandemic is still causing ongoing issues with shipping and logistics worldwide. We are always keeping an eye on the latest developments, but right now, there is a delay risk to shipping should your country or region or our manufacturing partners encounter new local restrictions. 

Communication Protocol: any lead time issues or shipment delays will be communicated to the community as quickly as possible.

As a company on a mission to improve the health and well-being of pets, we feel it is our duty to carefully consider the environmental impact of our product. We plan to work on the following areas:

  • Improve packaging design & choose sustainable materials where possible 
  • Reduce the impact of fulfilment by being mindful of logistics & shipping
  • Create recycle processes where old devices, in particular batteries and other parts, are carefully disposed of and re-usable parts are up-cycled or re-used internally for R&D.

If you would like to speak with us about any of our sustainability goals or if you think you can help us improve the way we operate, we would be very happy to speak to you. Please email info@mypetgo.com and one of our team members will be in touch. 

Pet Owners

If you have any questions, comments or feedback, we'd love to hear from you. You can DM us on any of our social channels, leave a comment on the community discussion thread or alternatively write to us on info@mypetgo.com.

Pet Industry Professionals 

If you work in the pet sector and provide products or services to pet owners, we'd be happy to chat with you and learn more about your business. We're looking to list all sorts of services on the platform, but we are particularly keen on e-commerce shops, televet services, pet insurance providers and on-demand booking services such as groomers, sitters, walkers, pet-boarders and local vet clinics. If you'd like to learn more about partnerships and want to schedule a call with our team, please email info@mypetgo.com.

Press & Media 

If you'd like to feature us in an online magazine publication, website, blog, or news article, please email info@mypetgo.com.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Hey All, Thank you for visiting my campaign! 

     My Name is Meg McKelvey and I am the Owner and Holistic Bodywork Practitioner Of Epicenter-Indy.

     Since 2019 I have been providing massage therapy, holistic bodywork, and healing concepts in Indianapolis. Epicenter-Indy and I are ready to expand to a larger studio, but not just for me. My goal is to create a coworking space where holistic practitioners and educational resources can can share their ways of therapeutic, holistic methodolog

     I named my company the Epicenter because it is a place where the vibration can begin and impact outward with a goal of reaching those in direct proximity and also eventually be felt around the world. Supporting the concept of the Epicenter invites our community to embody self-care and connect while offering our entrepreneurs a place to call home.  It is said that as we heal the world around us heals. I believe that in Indianapolis that has come. Let's Keep our Vibes Alive.

 

Our goal is to Raise $5,500. 

    I have selected and negotiated a new location and launched this campaign to raise funds to bring the building back to life. What it will take to restore:

- New floors

- Interior and Exterior paint

- Bathroom facelift

- Finish the laundry room

Totaling  $3,500.

 

The rest of the funds will be dispersed for carefully selected products and features: 

- Meditation Cushions

    for a destination to practice meditation at leisure but also as a facilitator of more comfortable guided Meditation offerings

- Community Acupuncture Chairs

- Toddler foam gym

    for mommy and me learning sessions

- Front Desk

- Lighting Fixtures

    crafted by local artists

- Signage

- Local Art Decoration

Totaling $2,000

 

     As an existing business, we already have our standard operating supplies but we are raising for expansion. If we do not reach our goal, the funds raised will go directly to the build-out. We will continue to encourage hand-me-down donations at any point from any of the generous donors who believe in our cause!

 

 

Impact

     After moving to Indianapolis in 2019, I  learned firsthand how challenging it is for holistic practitioners to find a welcoming location to host their businesses. Many current options are lost deep within the high rises or tucked away in the back of storefronts. Trying to operate a downtown practice has been strictly prohibitive to practitioners in the holistic field for a large majority of places. Being one of those practitioners, I was lost on the 12th floor next to an attorney's office. 

     Even with these limitations, I was determined to reach our community and help practitioners and our clients in need. While operating in the highrise, I was able to start holding meditations while also partitioning and s and subletting the space to practitioners in need of a space to fulfill their client sessions. 

 

Why is it important? 

 

After this last year that the world and humanity shared together I, Myself, and my fellow colleagues all noticed the same thing.

 

We’re busy! 

 

“Why do you think this is?” This is the question we are asked daily.

 

There is a shift in how we take care of ourselves. 

 

It is no longer when we are depleted, or at rock bottom, and desperate for help. We are finding new ways to embody our physical, mental, spiritual, and emotional wellbeing through holistic therapies and enjoying the results because of it. 

 

Risks & Challenges

     While our contractor has already taken a look at the space and the buildout goals are agreed upon, there is always a risk of additional unforeseen challenges in the buildout that could raise the cost of the project. 

 

     Another possible risk is simply that shipping delays in items for the buildout might delay the target opening date of the studio.

 

     As Epicenter Indy is an existing business with a strong client base, there is no risk associated with starting a new business. This expansion project has been in the works for two years, and now Meg now has the building and the business to bring this to fruition. One possible challenge is that this space will be outgrown quickly as the practitioners and client base grow.

 

Ways to Spread the Vibration

Money is not the only means towards good karma currency, it's all about the energy we bring to it. We would love exchanges in, “the good word”  field. Sharing our Campaign via the Socials and your own experience perspective as a participant within The Epicenter is all we would truly ask for. 

And Remember, 

#Keepthevibealive

story:
Perks

 

About Gills Labs 

Back in 2015, when we first looked at personal air purification products and PPE the availability of options was limited and the technology ancient. Surgical masks were only a cheap consumable in the medical industry and respirators had not changed much since WWII.  

Something had to be done and Gills Labs was born with the intention to develop advanced masks and respirators for the 21st century. Since then we have made significant innovations in the air PPE domain. These are some of our previous innovation milestones:

1. Launched the first compact respirator with a medical grade silicone perimeter
2. Implemented Reverse Ambient Air Sourcing (RAS) tech
3. Introduced the world’s first flexible cartridges
4. Introduced the first mask and cartridge based hybrid
5. Experimental algae based air purifiers 
6. Retrofitted air purification devices 

 

Meet the Founders

 

Campaign Team

story:
Unboxing Review of inFace Smart Body Cleansing Brush

 

 

 

 

Have you ever had these painful experiences? Unbearable itchy back acne, hard to remove the dead skin on the heels and knees, and the accumulated dead skin cells cause calluses and cracked skin. It’s always hard to reach your back while in the shower or bath. Also, the quality of most normal brushes is rough that may easily damage your skin. Now time to say goodbye to all these troubles. Let’s enjoy a brand new bathing experience with inFace!

 

 

Your skin can be improved completely with the help of inFace smart bath brush. In addition to removing oil and dirt from the surface of your skin, even acne marks and pimples can be effectively removed. Say goodbye to skin problems, forever!

 

Most bathing instruments use one-way rotation rubbing, which will cause discomfort and incomplete cleaning. inFace Smart Body Cleansing Brush pioneered the development of a dual-way rotating brush head to achieve a double-cleaning rotation and rubbing gently like the delicate mode of a washing machine with no hurt to skin. 

 

It can also deep clean and get rid of trapped dirt and excess oil beneath the surface of the skin, to help prevent the build-up of pimples, fat granule and dead skin in your pores. Improve your skin condition effectively, leaving skin smooth and soft.

 

Equipped with five multi-purpose brush heads, that could comprehensively improve back acne and fat particles, care for your skin with full effective clean and tender your skin. Just take one second to replace and very easy to use.

 

3 selections of speed mode, whether soft, moderate, or high-intensity. inFace will meet all your needs

 

 

Use the silicone brush to massage the body in the shower or bath, to enjoy a massage-style rubbing while cleaning. You can also massage your body with essential oils which is truly relaxing and enjoyable.

 

 

In order to care for the skin entirely and avoid damage caused by excessive scrubbing, the inFace smart brush has developed an intelligent protection system. The brush will beep twice when the pressure exceeds 2 kg, then shut down automatically. Scrubbing for ease without hurting your skin

 

 

inFace body cleansing brush uses a high capacity 1200mAh battery. It can be used for up to 120 minutes on one single charge. Moreover, for safety reasons and the convenience of charging, the battery case can be removed easily and charged wirelessly by the magnetic charging station. Super safe and portable.

 

 

InFace represents the high-quality of life. In addition to the most basic cleaning functions, its extremely user-friendly design has caught everyone’s eye. Give you a brand new and high-quality lifestyle, while body cleaning.

 

The Long handle helps to reach your back and lower legs easier. The brush head has a 3D arc surface to match the human body curves perfectly.

 

The whole body of the inFace brush is made of Dow Corning food-grade silica gel, which is exceptionally safe and very comfortable without leakage. The grip has high friction and is not easy to fall off. The battery shell is made of high-quality PC + ABS. This material is widely used in the smart phone shells with super high gloss and safety. Let you use it with 100% peace of mind.

 

At the same time, the whole body of the brush has an IPX 7 waterproof rating that is good for taking in the shower or bath with confidence.

 

Easy to use is the most important thing, simply long press for two seconds to turn on and off.

 

Hang it directly on the bathroom wall and use it whenever you want. Convenient and Simple, Does Not Take Up Space.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 “InFace” is a personal care brand under Migoo Smart, which product line covers personal beauty instruments and personal care series, such as Sonic Facial Device, Ultrasonic ionic cleaner, Eye Beauty Instrument, Blackhead Remover, IPL Hair Removal, ION Hairbrush…

As a new, young and vigorous company, Migoo Smart is committed to building a leading brand of high-tech beauty products. Our team has good designers, Taiwan RDs, China manufacturing. We have cooperated with some Global IC suppliers, such as TI, TXC…

In the future, we will launch more states of the art product to meet the needs of different users, and provide high-quality and good service to all of you.

Equipped with five multi-purpose brush heads, that could comprehensively improve back acne and fat particles, care for your skin with full effective clean and tender your skin. Just take one second to replace and very easy to use.



 

3 selections of speed mode, whether soft, moderate, or high-intensity. inFace will meet all your needs


 

 
Use the silicone brush to massage the body in the shower or bath, to enjoy a massage-style rubbing while cleaning. You can also massage your body with essential oils which is truly relaxing and enjoyable.


 

 
In order to care for the skin entirely and avoid damage caused by excessive scrubbing, the inFace smart brush has developed an intelligent protection system. The brush will beep twice when the pressure exceeds 2 kg, then shut down automatically. Scrubbing for ease without hurting your skin

 

 
inFace body cleansing brush uses a high capacity 1200mAh battery. It can be used for up to 120 minutes on one single charge. Moreover, for safety reasons and the convenience of charging, the battery case can be removed easily and charged wirelessly by the magnetic charging station. Super safe and portable.

 

 
InFace represents the high-quality of life. In addition to the most basic cleaning functions, its extremely user-friendly design has caught everyone’s eye. Give you a brand new and high-quality lifestyle, while body cleaning.
 

The Long handle helps to reach your back and lower legs easier. The brush head has a 3D arc surface to match the human body curves perfectly.

 

The whole body of the inFace brush is made of Dow Corning food-grade silica gel, which is exceptionally safe and very comfortable without leakage. The grip has high friction and is not easy to fall off. The battery shell is made of high-quality PC + ABS. This material is widely used in the smart phone shells with super high gloss and safety. Let you use it with 100% peace of mind.

 

At the same time, the whole body of the brush has an IPX 7 waterproof rating that is good for taking in the shower or bath with confidence.

 

Easy to use is the most important thing, simply long press for two seconds to turn on and off.


 

Hang it directly on the bathroom wall and use it whenever you want. Convenient and Simple, Does Not Take Up Space.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 “InFace” is a personal care brand under Migoo Smart, which product line covers personal beauty instruments and personal care series, such as Sonic Facial Device, Ultrasonic ionic cleaner, Eye Beauty Instrument, Blackhead Remover, IPL Hair Removal, ION Hairbrush…

As a new, young and vigorous company, Migoo Smart is committed to building a leading brand of high-tech beauty products. Our team has good designers, Taiwan RDs, China manufacturing. We have cooperated with some Global IC suppliers, such as TI, TXC…
In the future, we will launch more states of the art product to meet the needs of different users, and provide high-quality and good service to all of you.

Next is the “FOCUS MODE” that is uniquely embedded in this product.

To use this mode, turn on the power and select the intensity level. Then press the “FOCUS MODE” button on the product’s main body and bring the tip close to the area you want to remove the sebum. Once it starts operating, the head tip will contract and relax at even intervals.


Lastly, the “WIFI MODE & LED MODE” allows you to observe your skin with a magnifying lens without operation.마지막으로 'WIFI MODE & LED MODE'를 통해 조작 없이 돋보기로 피부를 관찰할 수 있다.마지막으로 'WIFI MODE & LED MODE'를 통해 조작 없이 돋보기로 피부를 관찰할 수 있다.마지막으로 'WIFI MODE & LED MODE'를 통해 조작 없이 돋보기로 피부를 관찰할 수 있다.마지막으로 'WIFI MODE & LED MODE'를 통해 조작 없이 돋보기로 피부를 관찰할 수 있다.마지막으로 'WIFI MODE & LED MODE'를 통해 조작 없이 돋보기로 피부를 관찰할 수 있다.마지막으로 'WIFI MODE & LED MODE'를 통해 조작 없이 돋보기로 피부를 관찰할 수 있다.Lastly, the “WIFI MODE & LED MODE” allows you to observe your skin with a magnifying lens without operation. The LED can be turned on and off, so users can set it according to their needs.

 

 

HEADPOP FOCUS uses a special solenoid valve that helps to minimize any irritation to the skin while maintaining strong suction power and eliminating sebum at the same time.헤드팝 포커스(HEADPOP FOCUS)는 강력한 흡입력을 유지하면서 동시에 피지를 제거하면서 피부에 자극을 최소화하도록 도와주는 특수 솔레노이드 밸브를 사용한다.헤드팝 포커스(HEADPOP FOCUS)는 강력한 흡입력을 유지하면서 동시에 피지를 제거하면서 피부에 자극을 최소화하도록 도와주는 특수 솔레노이드 밸브를 사용한다.헤드팝 포커스(HEADPOP FOCUS)는 강력한 흡입력을 유지하면서 동시에 피지를 제거하면서 피부에 자극을 최소화하도록 도와주는 특수 솔레노이드 밸브를 사용한다.헤드팝 포커스(HEADPOP FOCUS)는 강력한 흡입력을 유지하면서 동시에 피지를 제거하면서 피부에 자극을 최소화하도록 도와주는 특수 솔레노이드 밸브를 사용한다.헤드팝 포커스(HEADPOP FOCUS)는 강력한 흡입력을 유지하면서 동시에 피지를 제거하면서 피부에 자극을 최소화하도록 도와주는 특수 솔레노이드 밸브를 사용한다.헤드팝 포커스(HEADPOP FOCUS)는 강력한 흡입력을 유지하면서 동시에 피지를 제거하면서 피부에 자극을 최소화하도록 도와주는 특수 솔레노이드 밸브를 사용한다.

HEADPOP FOCUS uses a special solenoid valve which helps to minimize any irritation to the skin while maintaining the strong suction power, and eliminating sebum at the same time.

Unlike other sebum suction devices that constantly suck in, HEADPOP FOCUS alternates between suction and pause. This helps to prevent bruises and removes sebum with less irritation, so people with delicate or sensitive skin can use it too.

However, these methods lead to colored bruises and side effects like sagging skin, while procedures from dermatology clinics only offer temporary solutions. Since we can’t always go to these clinics, we began to put our heads together to create a tool that can easily pull out sebum, and is convenient for everyday life.

story:
*Every 15 days we will send a post-purchase survey to choose your preferred color, size and shipping info.

 

 

 

Thanks to our world-class wetsuit expertise, we have crafted a product of the finest quality with an amazing design, and have produced it with the best low-polluting materials. We are delighted to say that TURTL PROJECT produces the most versatile wetsuit you will ever find at an accessible price.

 

 

Galapagos Wetsuit has been designed and tested for, but is not exclusive to, high-performance Surfing, Kitesurfing, Sailing, Windsurfing, Paddle Surfing, and Wakeboarding.

 

 

Wetsuit ranges reinvented. Why having a shorty wetsuit, a long-arm springsuit, a long john, a 5/4/3mm and a 3/2mm wetsuit if you can have a fullsuit for all year long.

 

 

 

Unlike traditional wetsuits, our eco-friendly alternative avoids harmful petroleum-made neoprene as well as it reduces significantly the carbon footprint in the production process.

 

 

 

Amid a monopolized wetsuit market by large brand names, high margins at quality's cost, and no environmental commitment, Turtl Project's effort is to deliver high-quality products with the lowest possible CO2 emissions at reasonable prices.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Within a 90% monopolized wetsuit industry, with full control over pricing, high margins at quality's cost, and taking advantage of sustainability to increase prices, Turtl Project wants to offer better-quality and sustainable-only products at a honest accessible price. 

 

 

 

 We have successfully crafted a watersports’ wide-ranging wetsuit and appropriately tested it to fulfill all needs of current water men & women:

 

 

Thanks to our successful configuration, based on the right blend of fabrics and the perfect equilibrium of thicknesses, we have been able to create the most versatile Wetsuit. This way you can avoid having a wetsuit for each season without compromising any feature.

 

 

There is not a 4/3mm Wetsuit standard in the market, with diverse and inefficient distributions of thicknesses which limits its target weather conditions ranges.

Our formula is simple: full 4mm (+ thermal lining) torso and 3mm limbs of the best and stretchier limestone neoprene which allows us to encompass the widest range of conditions.

 

 

 

 To efficiently reduce our production carbon footprint, we decided to launch a crowdfunding campaign as this is a more sustainable approach, optimally producing according to actual demand, and hence, avoiding overproduction.

 

 

 

 We selected suppliers that have been Bluesign certified and/or comply with the Standard 100 OEKO-TEX label, which makes our world-class wetsuits respectful for the environment. They have successfully undergone harmful chemicals laboratory tests, besides they comply with ethical and child-labor-free production procedures, not to mention the high quality of the fabrics which makes it a wetsuit of superior durability.

 

 

Our premium wetsuits are exclusively produced in a greater sustainable alternative neoprene which not only avoids harmful refined petroleum in the production process but also gives revolutionary flexibility, lighter overall weight, and incomparable heat insulation.

 

 

 

 

 

 Turtl Project cares about our endangered marine ecosystems, and as you may guess, we care about Sea Turtles. In order to better validate our commitment with our Oceans, we will be giving a % of all pledges to the conservation of Sea Turtles through CRAM: a Foundation for Conservation and Restoration of Marine Species.

 

 

 

 We have also created an essential and innovative travel bag to easily bring your fresh Galapagos Wetsuit back home after your session without pouring a single drop of salty water in your backpack.

 

Introducing our brand-new water-resistant bag to pack your wet wetsuit. No more travel hassle assured!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Through this campaign, all our backers will exclusively receive a Mesh Bag made of GOTS Organic Cotton.

 

Get it with an Early Bird discount for a limited time only. Get your Galapagos Wetsuit before anyone else, and at the lowest price.

 

 

 As part of our commitment to climate positivity, all shipping will be sent by carbon neutral options when available, or by postal services, which use existing routes (as opposed to express shippers) and are the most environmentally friendly way to get a package to your door.

 

 

All Shipping fees will be collected separately in the post-purchase survey.

 

 

To all Backers: We will ship your Galapagos wetsuit worldwide via trackable post.

 

Please note that no duties & taxes policy only applies to the EU in all packs and US/Australia/New Zealand in some pledges. Other region backers may be charged import duties upon arrival, dependent on your country's import policies. 

 

*Shipping charges above are estimates, final shipping charges will appear on the post-campaign survey and may vary slightly from these estimates.

 

Disclaimer: in case unexpected duties arises, the client will be fully responsible.

 

Check our FAQ to learn more about our shipping rates.

 

 

 On average, 26% of a garment’s environmental impact happens after-purchase, and has a lot to do with how we take care of our clothes as well as the resources used for washing them.

 

 

Here you have our reccons to look after your wetsuit and make it last!

 

 

Once your wetsuit is done, don’t get rid of it. At Turtl Project we introduced a downcycling program to give a second life to those old or broken wetsuits you no longer use. Learn more at:

 

 

 

 

Please consider Product Delivery as an estimate that may be delayed due to the current challenging times in the logistics sector.

 

 

 We are a team of Business & Engineering graduates, Former Professional Sailors and World Champions. Together we have a lifetime experience in the watersports industry and a true love for the Ocean. It doesn’t matter how, you can find us on the water either surfing, kitesurfing, windsurfing or sailing.

 

 

 Our idea came from a very simple statement: to disrupt the market by creating a high performance wetsuit minimizing its environmental impact. For this reason, we have come together and have spent more than a year designing and testing to get the best all-round wetsuit you will ever find at an accessible price.

 

 

Turtl Project is on a mission: to keep our playground safe while we enjoy the ocean!
