story:
Goodbye Petroleum Plastics, 
Hello Quick-Composting Paper.

Happi Floss is on a mission to replace single-use plastics and we’re starting with flossers. Made with layers of post-consumer recycled paper, Happi Floss is designed to decompose quickly in the compost or soil, unlike our plastic counterparts that can take 400+ years to decompose, if ever.

Created by Doctor Staci, a functional and holistic pediatric dentist, Happi Floss is a woman-founded, owned, and operated company. Our flossers are locally made in a fair-wage shop near Portland, Oregon with renewable energy. Happi Floss is toxin-free and cruelty free, and our two sizes accommodate mouths of all shapes and sizes.

To date, Doctor Staci has self-funded Happi Floss through research and development, testing product with friends and family to come up with the final iteration that's being shared with the world during our Indiegogo Campaign. With patents secured, R&D complete and 5,000 flossers produced, we are ready to go mainstream, but we need your backing.

What We Need

A successful Indiegogo will enable us to scale our machinery and offer Happi Floss to the World. The $50,000 raised through Indiegogo will enable us to build our first full-scale, direct to consumer production machinery. If we do not meet our $50,000 goal we will continue raising funds outside Indiegogo to close the gap. Your support will enable us to become competitive with environmentally destructive plastic flossers. With your help we can create a better future.

Risks & Challenges

With patents in hand, flossers through R&D and already tested by friends and family, our biggest challenge is the time it will take to create the one-of-a-kind machinery needed for mass production. As Covid continues to impact supply chains, we are exploring alternative machinery components to quickly bringing Happi Floss to the world.

Environmental Commitments

Reusability and recyclability

Happi Floss is the world's first flosser designed for true compostability, and our Indiegogo packages come wrapped in seed-paper packing. In total, 99.7% of what consumers receive will be compostable and/or recyclable, and we're working on that last 0.3%. For now, simply remove the floss and everything else can be composted. In the future, we will source or create a quality non-plastic floss filament.

Sustainable materials

Happi Floss is made with layers of post-consumer recycled paper and is completely compostable. Our flossers are toxin-free and are manufactured using renewable energy. We are currently sourcing environmentally-friendly, compostable floss that lives up to Doctor Staci's standards.

Environmentally friendly factories

Happi Floss is locally made in a sustainability-focused, fair-wage shop near Portland, Oregon with renewable energy. Our manufacturing process is free of toxins.

Sustainable Distribution

Happi Floss is committed to infusing sustainability into every aspect of our company. While packaging is still being created for our 30 and 90 packs, we plan to use post-consumer recycled paper and will avoid plastic at all costs.

A Happi Story

For Doctor Staci, seeing plastic flossers wash ashore hit too close to home.

The idea for Happi Floss came to Doctor Staci as she witnessed a shocking amount of trash washing ashore while walking a beach in Hawaii. It’s an all too common experience many of us share - escaping into nature only to discover it’s been overrun with plastic waste. For Doctor Staci, seeing plastic flossers wash ashore hit too close to home. As a pediatric dentist, she regularly heard from parents that although they loved the convenience of plastic floss picks for their children, they often would skip flossing altogether due to the guilt they felt using single-use plastic.

After years of testing materials and manufacturing techniques, Happi Floss was born. Intelligently designed to keep their shape in your mouth, yet compost quickly, Happi Floss is composed of layers of compressed, post-consumer recycled paper and biofilm, a plant-based, non petroleum material. When placed in the compost, our layered design allows moisture and microbes to permeate our flossers, quickly breaking them down and turning them back into usable organic matter.

With design complete and thousands of flossers created, the Happi Floss story is really just beginning. Launching Spring 2021, Happi Floss now turns to increasing manufacturing capabilities in order to rid the world of single-use plastic flossers. Consumers and investors are encouraged to support the Happi Floss Kickstarter or to reach out for early investment opportunities.

About Doctor Staci

Passionate about children’s oral health, protecting the planet and healthy eating, Doctor Staci Whitman is on a mission to make a difference. A Board-Certified Pediatric Dentist in Portland, Oregon, Doctor Staci empowers children and adults to take control of their own well being through healthy practices, from proper oral health to establishing nutritious eating habits.  

A graduate of the Institute of Integrative Health, Doctor Staci earned her International Health Certification in Health and Lifestyle Coaching and is currently enrolled in the Institute of Functional Medicine. A floss-lover, a real food advocate, and an airway-supporter, her manta in life is to”Eat the Rainbow.” Doctor Staci regularly speaks to the strong connection between oral health and overall health, as well as our collective need to do better for our planet.

As the inventor of Happi Floss and owner of several businesses, Doctor Staci is proud to infuse her beliefs into all that she does. Happi Floss, NoPo Kids Dentistry and DoctorStaci.com are woman-owned and operated businesses that use best-in-class environmental practices, providing fair wages to a diverse workforce. Happi Floss flossers are manufactured near Portland, Oregon in a pro-environment, fair wage manufacturing shop.

It’s an all too common experience many of us share - escaping into nature only to discover it’s been overrun with plastic waste. For Doctor Staci, seeing plastic flossers wash ashore hit too close to home. As a pediatric dentist, she regularly heard from parents that although they loved the convenience of plastic floss picks for their children, they often would skip flossing altogether due to the guilt they felt using single-use plastic.
After years of testing materials and manufacturing techniques, Happi Floss was born. Intelligently designed to keep their shape in your mouth, yet compost quickly, Happi Floss is composed of layers of compressed, post-consumer recycled paper and biofilm, a plant-based, non petroleum material. When placed in the compost, our layered design allows moisture and microbes to permeate our flossers, quickly breaking them down and turning them back into usable organic matter.
With design complete and thousands of flossers created, the Happi Floss story is really just beginning. Launching Spring 2021, Happi Floss now turns to increasing manufacturing capabilities in order to rid the world of single-use plastic flossers. Consumers and investors are encouraged to support the Happi Floss Kickstarter or to reach out for early investment opportunities.
About Doctor Staci

Passionate about children’s oral health, protecting the planet and healthy eating, Doctor Staci Whitman is on a mission to make a difference. A Board-Certified Pediatric Dentist in Portland, Oregon, Doctor Staci empowers children and adults to take control of their own well being through healthy practices, from proper oral health to establishing nutritious eating habits.  
A graduate of the Institute of Integrative Health, Doctor Staci earned her International Health Certification in Health and Lifestyle Coaching and is currently enrolled in the Institute of Functional Medicine. A floss-lover, a real food advocate, and an airway-supporter, her manta in life is to”Eat the Rainbow.” Doctor Staci regularly speaks to the strong connection between oral health and overall health, as well as our collective need to do better for our planet.
As the inventor of Happi Floss and owner of several businesses, Doctor Staci is proud to infuse her beliefs into all that she does. Happi Floss, NoPo Kids Dentistry and DoctorStaci.com are woman-owned and operated businesses that use best-in-class environmental practices, providing fair wages to a diverse workforce. Happi Floss flossers are manufactured near Portland, Oregon in a pro-environment, fair wage manufacturing shop.

story:
BreezeBubble UltraProtect is a sleek, smooth and comfortable mask that's designed for your ultimate protection. We started developing this mask in 2019 to combat the problem of pollution for people living in polluted air environments. 

Check out our website: https://www.breezebubble.com/

 

Key Features

Smooth Silicone Seal: It's soft and airy silicone seal is designed to sit snug and comfy on your face. 

No Fogging in Glasses: Due to its airtight fit we ensure that no dirty air can leak in and out of the mask and hence there is no fogging of glasses. 

High Protection: Our BFE95 certified filters ensure high protection. 10 replaceable certifies filters are included with each of our rewards. 

Lightweight: The BreezeBubble is super light and weights 1.4 ounces.

Wash and Reuse: You can easily clean and reuse the mask

Wearing the BreezeBubble

Place the mask so it rests gently on your face. Pull the ear loops behind your ears and use the ear loop clips to adjust according to your needs. The silicone edge is designed to take the shape of your face gently and create an airtight fit to prevent any air leakage. Finally, move the mask up or down based on what feels most comfortable!

Includes 2 detachable filter holders, 2 filter and the silicone seal

                                                 Give your BreezeBubble a Shower

                                Comfortable To Wear, Lightweight and Ergonomic Design

 

Replacing filters in the mask:

  • Simply pop open the filter element
  • Dispose the filter and replace with new one
  • Close the Filter Element
  • And you're all set!

Design and Customize 

                                      Paint, Style and Customize your BreezeBubble

 

We plan to make custom cloth skins that you can attach to your BreezeBubble. By backing us you can be part of the design process! As we roll out the mask skins, we will take a vote and allow design entries for you to participate in and make the top voted ones available to you. We will update you via email for more details of our design contest post the Kickstarter campaign. 

 

Comparison With Other Masks:

 

Our Story

I started developing the mask in October 2019 when I visited my family back home in India. This was at a time when air pollution is at it's worst in the country. It directly impacted my family and I, as we couldn't go out for a walk or run without wearing a restrictive and uncomfortable mask to protect ourselves. I realized that there is a need for a better solution and started developing a breathable and comfortable mask to combat this pollution problem. 

With the BreezeBubble mask we are one step closer to providing quality breathing to everyone across the world for a healthy active and happy life. We will continue to iterate and make this mask lighter, more comfortable and high tech and through your support reach millions of people across the globe who will benefit from this solution. 

Just a few months back we were brainstorming new ideas for this product and prototyping a new and creative solution for a comfortable mask while studying at University of Michigan.

 

After graduating in May, we officially incorporated the company and started working on this startup full time. After a series of prototyping, we released our early adopter SmoothEdge mask. Our early customers bought and tested this mask for $29.99. Along with good reviews some of the feedback we received was that: the mask feels too tight for few users, the ear loops are uncomfortable, the mask feels small for some users, some users would like to have a more aesthetically pleasing mask.
 

New Features

Given this feedback, we decided to develop VERSION 2 the "Breezebubble UltraProtect mask" with various product iterations. Through Indiegogo we will ramp up production for this NEW mask and it will retail for $45.00. The changes in this mask are:

  •  Higher Comfort due to new and improved softer and longer ear loops
  •  New ear loop adjusters that are tighter and don’t come off easily 
  •  Higher Protection (Filters BFE95 certified. N95 Certification in process) 
  •  Slightly wider mask design with a softer silicone material to allow a one size fits all for adults
  •  Possibility of colorful ear loops, different color mask and designer detachable cloth mask skins (stretch goal if we cross our funding goal amounts)
     

Through the support of the Indiegogo community of backers, we will be able to bring this new better, smarter, more comfortable BreezeBubble mask to life!

 

Our Stretch Goals 

Along with some of the changes mentioned above, we want to push ourselves to develop some more awesome new features for our early backers.

Sneak peak of the new adjustable straps in development:

 

If we reach $100k+ we plan to launch new colors that we will decide based on a vote by you! (Choice of Purple / Black / Red / Yellow / Blue / Green )

Possible new colors for the mask to be launched:

We are also working on new designer mask skins that can be attached to the mask as an add on to make it more fashionable. Here are some sketches of the designs we've been working on:

Through your support of backing and sharing our campaign we will be developing an additional detachable micro-fan cooling device that will be added on to the mask for more ease of breath-ability. We will build this micro-cooling technology with the funds raised through this campaign. Some early designs and prototypes:

Finally, we plan to provide different mask sizes post the Indiegogo campaign. This will be around March 2021 depending on the demand our production capabilities. We will provide this for 20% off for all our Indiegogo backers and support community.

 

Awards and Recognition:

 

Rewards:

 $29 - Early Bird Special : One BreezeBubble mask with 10 filters

 $35 - One BreezeBubble mask with 10 filters

 $60 - Two BreezeBubble masks with 20 filters

 $110 - Four BreezeBubble masks with 40 filters

 $250: Ten BreezeBubble masks with 100 filters

 

Our Mission

By supporting our campaign you receive the BreezeBubble mask as well as help us ramp up production to provide for healthcare workers and people in need during this crisis.

 

Press Release Kit:

https://1drv.ms/u/s!Auf6QpU1lRdIr3uL5Cd2nMdps3t...

 

CONTACT:

breezebubble.info@gmail.com

 

Risks and challenges

International shipping outside the US might be delayed a bit due to longer shipping times.

Environmental commitments

Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.

Long-lasting design

The BreezeBubble mask is long lasting and can be used for eternity. It has replaceable filters that can be changed after 3-5 times of use to keep the mask clean and fresh.

Reusability and recyclability

The mask can by recycled by the facilities that specializing in silicone recycling. It's a more sustainable solution since you are not disposing the mask and buying new ones over and over again.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

It would be super helpful if you could spread the word! Please do share our campaign with your friends and family so that we can provide our soft and comfortable masks to thousands of people who are looking for a better solution to stay highly protected. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BreezeBubble

Twitter: https://twitter.com/breeze_bubble

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/breezebubble/

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/breezebubble

story:
Summertime is great for outdoor activities and enjoying the sun but being overheated and feeling muggy and sweaty is no fun. Extreme heat conditions can tire you out and can even be dangerous to your health. According to the University of Michigan, conditions such as heatstroke can result in “Very high body temperatures may damage the brain or other vital organs.”
 

Even indoors, people have different temperature sensitivities and what may be a comfortable room temp for one person may be much too hot for another.
 

Wouldn’t it be great if you had your own personal air-conditioner that you could carry with you anywhere? How enjoyable would it be to remain cool, calm, and comfortable at your preferred temperature anytime & anywhere?

 

Now you can with THEKU Neck-Cooler – World’s smallest and lightest Thermoelectric personal cooling device. A go-anywhere personal AC that you wear comfortably on your neck to provide instant cooling to achieve your perfect body temperature for productivity, performance, and comfort.
 

Forget about mini-fan coolers that only deliver a tiny breeze or putting up with a large and noisy desk fan that just blows hot air around.
 

THEKU takes personal cooling to a whole new level of technology. Its innovative proprietary low-wattage TEC (Thermoelectric) cooling technique effectively maintains the perfect body temperature for you. By providing cooling at the neck, THEKU helps to cool down the entire body. Beat the summer heat by lowering temperature 5-13℃ (9°-23.4°F) to feel better, perform better, and get more work done. 
 

No more sweat stains or unpleasant odors. THEKU changes your comfort level, not just your body temperature. Eliminate mugginess and hot flashes in seconds with THEKU’s Thermal Relief tech and control your body’s temperature and all-day freshness wherever you are. 
 

Remember the feeling of downing a cold drink after a summer day workout? If so, you get the taste of THEKU’s magic.
 

THEKU is your gateway to calmness. By balancing your temperature, THEKU gives you a better mood, a sharper mind, and a peaceful heart. It helps you concentrate and improves overall wellness.
 

Once your temperature cools to your preference, you will instantly feel much better, physically, and mentally.
 

  • Your Best Outdoor Activities Companion
     

It’s never too early to get prepared. The hot 2021 summer will be here before you know it. This year, get out there and enjoy your life with THEKU. Its unibody waterproof design is light, comfortable and IPX7 certified for water and sweat resistance. THEKU is your best companion for outdoor sports like jogging, golfing, fishing, climbing, cycling, motorcycling, and hiking. 
 

  •  Comes In Handy For Every Occasion 
     

Hands-free and noiseless, THEKU works in all conditions to bring you coolness for better performance during any workout and helps keep you productive during office work, daily commute, working around the house, or while driving. 
 

THEKU is the result of years of research and development. Our team’s only goal is to offer you the world’s smallest and lightest TEC wearable air conditioner.
 

Made of a titanium memory alloy, THEKU weighs only 80g and is shaped ergonomically to comfortably fit and adapt to all body sizes. 

 
  • What Is Super TEC Cooling Technology?
     

Unlike a fan that simply blows air that only cools down the skin’s surface, THEKU provides instant thermal relief for your whole body. It is equipped with a proprietary mini-type thermoelectric cooling system with the lowest 0.9w power dissipation to provide more than 2hrs of battery life per charge.  
 

  •  THEKU Cooling Capabilities DEMO 
     

In this demonstration, THEKU was placed in a room with a temperature of 24.7° Celsius (76° Fahrenheit). After activation, the temp of THEKU quickly dropped to a comfortable 11° Celsius (51° Fahrenheit). (The TEC components on both sides will be covered with premium aluminum covers in the production unit for even temperature distribution. In this video, the aluminum cover had been removed for demonstration purposes.)
 


 
  • So How Does THEKU Work?

According to the National Center for Biotechnology Information, “The areas that are most effective in cooling core temperature are the groin, axillae, neck, and torso.” THEKU’s magic works by placing a cooling chip on the neck that cools down the large blood vessels. This cooler blood travels throughout the circulation system to help cool the entire body. 
 

  • Safety Is Our No.1 Priority

To provide our users with the best and safest experience, THEKU is designed with an accurate temperature control system. The smart chip & algorithm captures the outside temperature and locks down the cooling capability to reduce the temperature by 5-13℃ (9°-23.4°F) relative to the outside air. It provides soothing comfort no matter what the weather conditions are. 

THEKU is an innovative hardware design company started in 2018. By cooperating with one of the largest AC manufacturers in the world, our team is a group of lifestyle and outdoor activity enthusiasts who have years of experience in AC technology R&D and specialize in intelligent & wearable electronics, outdoor cooling product manufacturing. THEKU is dedicated to the well-being of your everyday life with cutting edge thermal technological innovations.
 

THEKU has been growing with the materialization of our concept bit by bit. This time, we came up with the idea of using material science and semiconductor technology on neck coolers. After 18 months of repetitive trials and failures, we finally achieved success and now present to you THEKU Neck-Cooler. It is now the world’s smallest and lightest TEC refrigeration equipment.
 

Are you ready to experience the coolest summer ever? Join us, and support our THEKU Neck-Cooler Indiegogo campaign today! 

 

Citation:

University Health Service. (n.d.). Retrieved from https://uhs.umich.edu/heatrelief

story:
THE IMPRINT

"My Ayurvedic Diary" comes to provide a one-way experience!

Our mission is to share with you all the possibilities of what life and health can be, according to traditional Ayurveda, in modern times.

A practical guide for self-awareness, containing educational texts and Ayurvedic concepts for sustaining physical and mental health. All in a clear, concise and meaningful way.

We also talk about Vedic astrology, which considers the earth’s axis inclination with the sun in its calculations. The diary’s weekly and monthly forecasts can help you use the planets’ energies to your benefit.

We guide and explain why self-care routines change with the seasons. Also, the connection with the circadian rhythm and how to use the Dosha clock to your advantage in order to be your best self.

Yoga, pranayamas, meditation, mantras, mudras. Throughout the year, you’ll also learn how to utilise these powerful practices.

We discuss food, tastes, spices, herbs, philosophical and political texts, Indian festivals, among others.

Every month, you'll be able to assess the four pillars of life; Body, Mind, Sense Organs & Soul, with the Ayurvedic Wheel of Life (a visual tool used to evaluate and understand how balanced your life is).

You will be able to track your menstrual cycle, fertile period, what moon you are on, what kind of self-care to have on bleeding days, and what to eat and drink. In addition, you will discover how to take care of yourself throughout the month to have an easy flow. All this, visually and through education, bringing empowerment and autonomy into your everyday life.

A planner that will build mental and physical health, nourish your soul, feed your senses, cultivate affection and respect for your temple. The art of living, day by day.

We want to walk with you on this journey!

It’s the ayurvedic routine you’ve been dreaming of!

With this diary, you will reconnect with yourself, experience oneness with your body and senses while acknowledging timeless space and bodies.

Available only in Southern Hemisphere version at the moment (AEST) GMT+10.

 

THE FEATURES

 

 

THE HEARTS BEHIND THE PROJECT

We are Carol and Laryssa,

Two Brazilians souls who’ve met in Byron Bay — Australia, while studying the Advanced Diploma of Ayurveda.

Carol, working as a publicist, had a lifestyle based on work, happy hour, late-night and black box warning drugs. Finding no way out, she turned to a bookstore and found "The Science of Self-Healing", and sought assistance. Her life changed in 40 days after seeing an excellent Ayurvedic doctor and following the protocols. She immersed herself in ayurvedic courses, training, and yoga practices to learn more about this science. She has embarked on a journey that has no return. While in Australia, she discovered Ayurveda College and studied for over four years. Now she has a joyful daughter (Julia - 1,5) who has brought creative energy into her life, inspiring her to share it with the world.

Laryssa was introduced to Yoga and Ayurveda for the first time during a dark time in Brazil. Yoga helped her thrive and gave her a different perspective on life that she had never experienced before. As a result, she came to Australia, particularly Byron Bay, to dive deeply into herself. She then enrolled in an Ayurveda course, which transformed and saved her. Laryssa has earned an advanced diploma in Ayurveda after 4,5 years of dedicated study and yet having so much to learn, but in love with this science, now wishes to spread it with the world.

Ayurveda has shaped our lives. Thanks to it, we can now identify our bodies’ strengths and weaknesses and use this knowledge for our well-being.

The desire to facilitate the Ayurvedic Daily Routine for the collective emerged as we realised many people want and believe in the power of Ayurveda but find it difficult to follow a routine of habits considered holistic. Based on classic books and studies, together we have dreamed and created “My Ayurvedic Diary”, aiming to help people learn and experience Ayurveda, the most ancient form of healing, in its authentic form through the year. 

Your support is the key to sharing this dream with the world. Our goal is to print this planner and spread this knowledge that empowers, heals, and enlightens.

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

So far, the project has been entirely self-funded, and the design is already concluded. Using only family support and weekly income from our ordinary jobs, we've hired a designer, artist, translator, web designer, astrologer, and editor to make it happen. Despite working several jobs and raising a family, we are incredibly proud of what we have achieved.  

To accomplish this dream, we need to raise $30K to print 2,000 planners. This amount will be used to print and pack our product.

As a means of reducing environmental impact, we will use only sustainable packaging and paper.

We are printing locally — Australia

 

WE NEED YOUR TRUST

The design is ready!

Although this is our first time here, we ask for your trust in our ability to deliver a high-quality product. We will print regardless of whether we reach the expected amount since we are confident in our product and its benefits. The funding is to avoid borrowing from banks or working with corporate publishing companies.

We have 30 days to reach $30k, so we can deliver them by the beginning of November! We guarantee you’ll receive this planner before Christmas.

Funding us through this platform will give you up to a 22% discount. Additional funds will enable us to print more planners and add some bonus items to your order!

FREE SHIPPING TO AUSTRALIA OVER 2 UNITS

WE ARE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

 

YOU CAN ALSO HELP IN OTHER WAYS

We need your help in spreading this powerful tool. 

Tell your friends, family, and community about it. Anyone who might benefit from this product. 

Please share this campaign through Indiegogo and follow our pages:

Instagram: myayurvedidiary

Facebook: myayurvedicdiary

Webpage: myayurvedicdiary

We are building a community. Join us!

Our hearts will be fulfilled.

 

NORTHERN HEMISPHERE VERSION

Please, let us know if you would like to have this planner in the Northern Hemisphere, and depending on how many requests we receive, we will consider it.
story_txt:
THE IMPRINT"My Ayurvedic Diary" comes to provide a one-way experience!Our mission is to share with you all the possibilities of what life and health can be, according to traditional Ayurveda, in modern times.A practical guide for self-awareness, containing educational texts and Ayurvedic concepts for sustaining physical and mental health. All in a clear, concise and meaningful way.We also talk about Vedic astrology, which considers the earth’s axis inclination with the sun in its calculations. The diary’s weekly and monthly forecasts can help you use the planets’ energies to your benefit.We guide and explain why self-care routines change with the seasons. Also, the connection with the circadian rhythm and how to use the Dosha clock to your advantage in order to be your best self.Yoga, pranayamas, meditation, mantras, mudras. Throughout the year, you’ll also learn how to utilise these powerful practices.We discuss food, tastes, spices, herbs, philosophical and political texts, Indian festivals, among others.Every month, you'll be able to assess the four pillars of life; Body, Mind, Sense Organs & Soul, with the Ayurvedic Wheel of Life (a visual tool used to evaluate and understand how balanced your life is).You will be able to track your menstrual cycle, fertile period, what moon you are on, what kind of self-care to have on bleeding days, and what to eat and drink. In addition, you will discover how to take care of yourself throughout the month to have an easy flow. All this, visually and through education, bringing empowerment and autonomy into your everyday life.A planner that will build mental and physical health, nourish your soul, feed your senses, cultivate affection and respect for your temple. The art of living, day by day.We want to walk with you on this journey!It’s the ayurvedic routine you’ve been dreaming of!With this diary, you will reconnect with yourself, experience oneness with your body and senses while acknowledging timeless space and bodies.Available only in Southern Hemisphere version at the moment (AEST) GMT+10. THE FEATURES  THE HEARTS BEHIND THE PROJECTWe are Carol and Laryssa,Two Brazilians souls who’ve met in Byron Bay — Australia, while studying the Advanced Diploma of Ayurveda.Carol, working as a publicist, had a lifestyle based on work, happy hour, late-night and black box warning drugs. Finding no way out, she turned to a bookstore and found "The Science of Self-Healing", and sought assistance. Her life changed in 40 days after seeing an excellent Ayurvedic doctor and following the protocols. She immersed herself in ayurvedic courses, training, and yoga practices to learn more about this science. She has embarked on a journey that has no return. While in Australia, she discovered Ayurveda College and studied for over four years. Now she has a joyful daughter (Julia - 1,5) who has brought creative energy into her life, inspiring her to share it with the world.Laryssa was introduced to Yoga and Ayurveda for the first time during a dark time in Brazil. Yoga helped her thrive and gave her a different perspective on life that she had never experienced before. As a result, she came to Australia, particularly Byron Bay, to dive deeply into herself. She then enrolled in an Ayurveda course, which transformed and saved her. Laryssa has earned an advanced diploma in Ayurveda after 4,5 years of dedicated study and yet having so much to learn, but in love with this science, now wishes to spread it with the world.Ayurveda has shaped our lives. Thanks to it, we can now identify our bodies’ strengths and weaknesses and use this knowledge for our well-being.The desire to facilitate the Ayurvedic Daily Routine for the collective emerged as we realised many people want and believe in the power of Ayurveda but find it difficult to follow a routine of habits considered holistic. Based on classic books and studies, together we have dreamed and created “My Ayurvedic Diary”, aiming to help people learn and experience Ayurveda, the most ancient form of healing, in its authentic form through the year. Your support is the key to sharing this dream with the world. Our goal is to print this planner and spread this knowledge that empowers, heals, and enlightens. WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET
So far, the project has been entirely self-funded, and the design is already concluded. Using only family support and weekly income from our ordinary jobs, we've hired a designer, artist, translator, web designer, astrologer, and editor to make it happen. Despite working several jobs and raising a family, we are incredibly proud of what we have achieved.  
To accomplish this dream, we need to raise $30K to print 2,000 planners. This amount will be used to print and pack our product.As a means of reducing environmental impact, we will use only sustainable packaging and paper.We are printing locally — Australia WE NEED YOUR TRUSTThe design is ready!Although this is our first time here, we ask for your trust in our ability to deliver a high-quality product. We will print regardless of whether we reach the expected amount since we are confident in our product and its benefits. The funding is to avoid borrowing from banks or working with corporate publishing companies.We have 30 days to reach $30k, so we can deliver them by the beginning of November! We guarantee you’ll receive this planner before Christmas.Funding us through this platform will give you up to a 22% discount. Additional funds will enable us to print more planners and add some bonus items to your order!FREE SHIPPING TO AUSTRALIA OVER 2 UNITSWE ARE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE YOU CAN ALSO HELP IN OTHER WAYSWe need your help in spreading this powerful tool. Tell your friends, family, and community about it. Anyone who might benefit from this product. Please share this campaign through Indiegogo and follow our pages:Instagram: myayurvedidiaryFacebook: myayurvedicdiaryWebpage: myayurvedicdiaryWe are building a community. Join us!Our hearts will be fulfilled. NORTHERN HEMISPHERE VERSIONPlease, let us know if you would like to have this planner in the Northern Hemisphere, and depending on how many requests we receive, we will consider it.

story:
Dreams and sleep play an important role in our health and happiness. While sleep rejuvenates the body, dreams rejuvenate the mind. Meet iBand+, the headband that helps you sleep and dream!

A truly smart wireless Bluetooth EEG headband, iBand+ senses your brain waves with laboratory level accuracy. It also conceals special health tracking sensor to measure body movement.

iBand+ tracks and analyzes information about your brain and body throughout the sleep cycle with an advanced auto-learning software algorithm. It then uses this information to play and intelligently adjust the audio-visual signals to:

  • Induce lucid dreams
  • Help you fall asleep easily
  • Wake up naturally

The RGB LEDs on iBand+ headband and the compact iBand+ pillow speakers work together to effectively deliver audio-visual stimuli while providing optimum user comfort.

Based on the information gathered from your previous sleep cycles, iBand+ app recommends the audio-visual techniques that can work best for you and helps you choose from the pre-loaded audios. In the future, you can also choose from your own music and audiobook library.

Dreams are the best and most authentic VR experience; a world with no rules and consequences. Imagine if you could be fully aware that you are dreaming without you actually waking up. Such a state of consciousness is possible and it is called “lucid dreaming”.

Once you are lucid in a dream, you can take control of your dream actions and consciously reshape the dream to fulfill any fantasy and experience anything you can imagine! To control your dream, however, you must first become aware that you are dreaming. iBand+ helps you do that!

Dreams occur when you are in the Rapid Eye Movement (REM) phase of your sleep. During REM phase, the body is largely disconnected from the brain, effectively leaving the muscles incapable of movement -- the reason we don’t act out our dreams. iBand+ accurately senses this dream phase by monitoring variations in your brain waves and the body movements.

Once iBand+ senses this dream phase, it plays audio-visual cues. These subtle external stimuli of light patterns via the LEDs on headband and sound from the pillow speakers appear as anomalies in your dream making you aware that you are dreaming without waking you up.

Once in lucid dream, you enter a virtual world where everything you see, hear, touch, taste and smell is as authentic as reality!

Lucid dreaming has been researched scientifically. Many psychologists and researchers have recognized that lucid dreams can help with artistic creativity, problem solving, improving sports and language skills, and can even help people prone to nightmares to get their fears under control.

A productive day starts with a great night’s sleep. Soothing music is one of the oldest techniques used for meditation and relaxation. Music can help the onset of sleep, improve sleep quality and sleep duration thus leading to a greater sleep satisfaction.

iBand+ helps you sleep easily in a natural way with sounds and music that calm your mind and trigger sleep. It tracks your sleep cycle, body movement, and intelligently adjusts the music and the volume as you fall asleep. Once asleep, iBand+ turns off the music. It then gently introduces white noise that masks distractions and ensures a sound sleep.

Sleep is very important to restore energy reserves and strengthen the immune system. Even minimal sleep loss affects mood, productivity, ability to handle stress and even body weight!

iBand+ tracks your sleep by monitoring brain waves, indicates sleep quality and gives feedback on improvement.

iBand+ has the most advanced smart alarm feature that wakes you up gradually with simulated natural sunlight and sounds at the most optimum period of sleep cycle so that you wake up refreshed every time!

EEG brain sensing technology is the core of iBand+ functionality.

The brain uses electrical pulses to transmit messages. iBand+ is the EEG headband that reads and records activity in the brain through its dry electrodes. ‘Brain waves’ are the graphs plotted from these readings.

EEG technology has been used extensively in the medical field, but recent advances in nanotechnology and increasing computational power has made it possible to shrink the EEG electronic circuits and embed them in wearables for everyday applications.

iBand+ headband communicates with iBand+ app on your iOS and Android smartphones via Bluetooth.

Headband:

  • Strap made of high quality soft, breathable fabric for superior comfort.
  • Low power Bluetooth 4.0 module that wirelessly syncs with your smartphone.
  • 4 LEDs placed at interpupillary distances (eye distances) that optimally cover almost all the face sizes.
  • With RGB LEDs users can customize the colors of the visual cues as per individual preferences.

Pillow Speakers:

  • 2 high fidelity compact and slim speakers for superior sound.
  • Soft, anti-slip cover.
  • Forward facing speakers ensure the sound gets evenly distributed throughout the pillow surface.
  • Standard 3.5mm headphone jack.

Technical Specifications:

  • Dry EEG electrodes: no preparation, no adhesive gel
  • Low noise EEG sensing: 50dB signal-to-noise ratio, high accuracy
  • 4 RGB LEDs: each producing a gamut of 16 million colors
  • Body movement: 3D accelerometer
  • Bluetooth wireless range: 10m / 33 ft

In developer edition, iBand+ provides access to processed EEG frequency spectrums (Alpha, Beta, etc.) as well as raw EEG data so that developers can use iBand+ as standalone or integrate it into numerous Bluetooth controlled applications to create amazing new experiences.

Potential iBand+ applications:

  • Improving Focus
  • Meditation
  • Stress therapy
  • Fitness tracking
  • Thought controlled computing
  • Interactive television
  • Gaming and entertainment
  • Smart home integration

Imagine using your brain waves to control numerous smart devices in your home to simplify your daily life. For example, when you fall asleep iBand+ could make sure that lights are off, doors locked, security alarm activated and thermostat adjusted to maintain a comfortable bedroom temperature!

Developers can publish their apps on our website that would enable everyone to use iBand+ in many other ways.

iBand+ production tooling molds and out-of-mold product samples:

Headband:

4 LEDs placed at interpupillary distances (eye distances) that optimally cover almost all the face sizes.
With RGB LEDs users can customize the colors of the visual cues as per individual preferences.


Pillow Speakers: 

2 high fidelity compact and slim speakers for superior sound.
Soft, anti-slip cover.
Forward facing speakers ensure the sound gets evenly distributed throughout the pillow surface.
Standard 3.5mm headphone jack.


Technical Specifications:

Dry EEG electrodes: no preparation, no adhesive gel
Low noise EEG sensing: 50dB signal-to-noise ratio, high accuracy
4 RGB LEDs: each producing a gamut of 16 million colors
Body movement: 3D accelerometer
Bluetooth wireless range: 10m / 33 ft


In developer edition, iBand+ provides access to processed EEG frequency spectrums (Alpha, Beta, etc.) as well as raw EEG data so that developers can use iBand+ as standalone or integrate it into numerous Bluetooth controlled applications to create amazing new experiences.

Potential iBand+ applications:

Improving Focus
Meditation
Stress therapy
Fitness tracking
Thought controlled computing
Interactive television
Gaming and entertainment
Smart home integration


Imagine using your brain waves to control numerous smart devices in your home to simplify your daily life. For example, when you fall asleep iBand+ could make sure that lights are off, doors locked, security alarm activated and thermostat adjusted to maintain a comfortable bedroom temperature!
Developers can publish their apps on our website that would enable everyone to use iBand+ in many other ways.




Meditation is an excellent form of mind training that relieves stress, improves concentration and mindfulness, thus improving your quality of life.
iBand+ sleep meditation feature with brainwave entrainment audio-visual techniques is also an excellent way of preparing yourself for lucid dreaming!
5 to 10 minutes of iBand+ sleep meditation technique before going to sleep is what it will take to relax yourself, define the dream cues, set the dream intention and increase self-awareness in your dreams - crucial preparation tactics to become and stay lucid in your dreams.
iBand+ headband with its EEG brain-sensing will track your state of mind during sleep meditation which you can easily check via iBand+ app. You can even compare your daily meditation performance through this app. The app will also provide tips and suggestions to improve your sleep meditation!


Complete set contains: 

iBand+ EEG brain sensing and health tracking headband
iBand+ pillow speakers with superior sound
USB charging cable
User manual download
Free app download


Q. Is iBand+ a medical device?A. No, iBand+ is not a medical device. It is a consumer electronic product not meant to diagnose or treat any disease or illness.
Q. How can I view my brain and body information?A. You can view your brain and body information in an easily interpretable format using the iBand+ app on your smartphone.
Q. How can I customize the iBand+ settings?A. iBand+ settings can be easily and conveniently modified from the iBand+ app.
Q. Can I customize the iBand+ audio cues?A. Yes, you can customize the audio cues to include special sounds that come with the iBand+ app. In the future, you can also choose from your own music and audiobook library.
Q. And, what about the visual cues?A. You can also customize the LED light patterns, brightness and the colors.
Q. How does iBand+ headband communicate with the iBand+ app?A. iBand+ headband communicates with the app wirelessly via Bluetooth.
Q. On which platforms will the app be available?A. Initially the app will be available on iOS and Android platforms.
Q. How do I charge iBand+ headband?A. You can charge iBand+ headband through a standard micro USB interface.
Q. Where do I connect the iBand+ pillow speakers?A. To the smartphone installed with iBand+ app.
Q. Where do I place the iBand+ pillow speakers?A. iBand+ pillow speakers should be placed inside your pillowcase under your pillow.
Q. Can I play audio cues on my smartphone speakers if I want?A. Yes, you can. However, be aware that smartphone speakers will not provide you as discreet sound as iBand+ pillow speakers. That could inadvertently wake you and your partner. Moreover, iBand+ pillow speakers are designed with a purpose to provide you superior, lifelike auditory experience while in bed.
Q. How will I receive software updates?A. Through app upgrades.
Q. Are taxes and/or duties included?A. The prices are excluding taxes and/or import duties. You will receive iBand+ as a reward for your contribution and support to this campaign. You will have to check with your local authorities if any taxes or duties are applicable to you.
Q. Do you accept returns?A. Unfortunately, we cannot accept Indiegogo returns. However, we will repair/replace the defective unit free of cost. Thank you for your understanding and support.
Q. How will I contribute to the iBand+ development?A. We are looking forward to your feedback and improvement suggestions to develop a world-class product. Technical specifications will evolve during the course of development such that we can deliver the best EEG brain-sensing and health-tracking headband to you!
Q. Can I pay by Paypal?A. You cannot pay by Paypal anymore on Indiegogo.
Q. Whom should I contact in case of more queries?A. Please visit our website www.ibandplus.com or send an email to hello@ibandplus.com with subject “QUERY”. We are getting many customer support requests every day, so please be patient with us. We will get back to you ASAP.

story:
​

 

 

 

Getting your temperature checked is inevitable during this global pandemic. You are bound to see a thermometer everywhere you travel to. TEMPMi is the ideal thermometer that is portable and tiny, which makes it easier to carry it around rather than carrying a bulky conventional one.

 

 

Time to get rid of your old and conventional thermometers! It is troublesome to replace the batteries every once in a while and they are bulky and heavy. No temperature record as app tracking is not supported and some are unsanitary to use as they are unable to measure contactlessly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

TEMPMi is a game changer. Scanning body temperature with a fast, simple, no-contact gesture, measuring anyone's temperature with the most hygienic way within 0.4 to 1.6 inches. With the usage of thermopile and infrared sensor, TEMPMi can record body temperature with an accuracy of ± 0.5°F / 0.3°C.

 

 

TEMPMi is perfect for knowing the temperature of visitors when they are entering your office or home. Temperature can be measured contactlessly without the need of sanitizing between each measurement.

 

 

 

Simply hover above your hot coffee to know to avoid getting your tongue burn. Tired of overcooking your food? Measure your food with TEMPMi to know the exact temperature to cook the perfect meal.

 

 

 

Track and record temperature data with our exclusive user-friendly mobile application. You can monitor your temperature data anytime and set upper limits in the mobile app so you make sure your body is in a good condition.

 

 

Measure temperature of anyone or anything around you with ease using TEMPMi and a mobile device. Temperature record can be checked anytime with the mobile app after measurement.

 

 

 

Tritium is the best light source as it can glow continuously for years without exposure to any form of energy. It has been used in high-end watch faces, camping equipment, and many more.

 

 

You can easily locate TEMPMi in the dark with the self-illuminating tritium light which is built on its surface. You don’t have to worry about not finding your TEMPMi in the dark anymore.

 

 

 

 

TEMPMi is the size of a key, you can bring it and use it anywhere without feeling them in your pocket. It is now effortless to measure temperature anywhere you go.

 

 

 

TEMPMi is the perfect EDC. Simply hook it on to your backpack, keychain, or use it as a zipper pull. You can even wear it as a necklace to ensure you will never lose your TEMPMi when you are on the go.

 

 

 

With TEMPMi, you can just plug it in your mobile devices to measure temperature anytime and anywhere instantly without any hassle.

 

 

 

TEMPMi is compatible with all Android and IOS devices.  Survey will be provided to you once the campaign has ended and you can pick the TEMPMi with the connection port of your choice (USB-C or Lightning).

 

 

TEMPMi can be used with all mobile devices including Android smartphones, iPhone and even your tablets. Just plug it in your devices and measure temperature right away without using any batteries. It is also environmental friendly as you do not need to use or waste more batteries to power your thermometer.

 

 

 

With TEMPMi in your hand, you can just plug it in your mobile devices and measure temperature right away. For example, you can check temperature of your friends or your pets without any contact.

 

 

Use TEMPMi to know the exact temperature of your surroundings before you go out.

 

 

Cook your meal at desired temperature with TEMPMi.

 

TEMPMi is the only thermometer you will need. This self-illuminating keychain is really an advanced thermometer. It is lighter, smaller and easier to use than any other thermometer at a competitive price!

 

 

 

 

 

You can choose your TEMPMI in white or black color.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

TEMPMi was born from a group of experienced hardware engineers and product designers. Our team aims to create a product that can provide help to everyone in this time of pandemic. This year, we are determined to produce and deliver a thermometer that is compact and easy to carry around that can instantly measure temperature at an accurate rate. It is also convenient for anyone to use as it can be powered by any mobile devices. We have a strong belief that technology will make our lives easier.

 

TEMPMi Designer's 2D Sketch 

 

 

TEMPMi 3D Model Rendering Screenshot

 

 

 TEMPMi Production & Assembling Line

 

 

 Measurement Demo (Body Temperature in Celsius & Record Checking)

 

Measurement Demo (Object Temperature In Fahrenheit)

 

Measurement Demo (Object Temperature In Celsius) 

 

 

 

Hello! We are the TEMPMi team and we are excited to welcome you to our official Kickstarter page. We are a team of professionals with diverse backgrounds in hardware engineering, software development and product design and we are trying our best to create the perfect product for users.

Measurement Demo (Object Temperature In Fahrenheit)

 
Measurement Demo (Object Temperature In Celsius)    Hello! We are the TEMPMi team and we are excited to welcome you to our official Kickstarter page. We are a team of professionals with diverse backgrounds in hardware engineering, software development and product design and we are trying our best to create the perfect product for users.

story:
Welcome to the future of vision testing-- No appointments, no waiting rooms.

The EyeQue VisionCheck 2 is the most convenient way to check your vision anytime, anywhere with real-time results.

Use the personalized results to order new glasses online and track vision changes over time. This powerful smartphone attachment uses MIT-patented technology to measure your refractive error and provide EyeGlass Numbers - the lens power needed to correct nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism. The VisionCheck 2 comes with the PDCheck pupillary distance measurement tool so you can quickly and accurately capture your PD and order glasses with ease.

*NEW! Now the VisionCheck 2 can test for reading vision, commonly know as near-vision ADD (NV ADD). This ADD number can be used for reading glasses, bifocals, or progressive lenses.

VisionCheck 2 is the world’s only do-it-yourself smartphone-powered refractive error test. Some claim to have online or app-based refraction tests, but they are merely prescription verification services based on visual acuity estimates. EyeQue users are actually performing a self-refraction test while proprietary algorithms process, personalize, and store results. Leveraging the power and ubiquity of smartphones, the mobility of VisionCheck 2 brings accurate vision correction to billions of people, many of whom lack access to traditional vision care.

 

Sound too good to be true? Here's how to use it:

1. Download the iOS or Android app and sign up for an account.

2. Slip the VisionCheck 2 device onto your smartphone and follow simple on-screen instructions to start a test.

3. Look into the soft eyecup. Look for the red and green lines. Use the buttons on the device to move them and overlap into one solid yellow line. 

4. Once you are satisfied that the lines are fully overlapped, click on the "enter" button and gently rotate the thumb wheel to the next position. Overlap the lines again and repeat. The test consists of 8 measurements per eye.

5. See your results- EyeQue EyeGlass Numbers® (EGNs). 

Here's an example of what your EyeQue EyeGlass Numbers® (EGNs) will look like:

We are delighted to show you a proof of concept prototype video of the VisionCheck 2:

Once you have your EyeGlass Numbers, the next step is to measure your pupillary distance using EyeQue’s PDCheck.

PDCheck

VisionCheck 2 includes another product called PDCheck. An accurate measurement of pupillary distance (PD) is necessary to order eyeglasses. If the measured PD is wrong, you will find the glasses uncomfortable and it will make you feel dizzy, it can sometimes even lead to headaches. Our patented PDCheck technology uses the smartphone camera to take a “selfie” and extracts the PD to an accuracy of +/- 1 mm.

How do you use PDCheck?

1. Download the iOS or Android app and sign up for an account then start a new test. Next, you should put on the PDCheck frames.

2. Center your face inside the oval and take a picture. 

3. Adjust the markers to the center of your pupils and T marks (if needed) to get the most accurate PD. Receive your pupillary distance measurement instantly! 

Once you have your EyeGlass Numbers and your pupillary distance, you can get Try-On Glasses or get new glasses online using your EGNs!

Our Try-On Glasses are custom made in California. 

At only $19 (shipping included), they are a low-cost, super-fast way to experience how well your EGNs and PD will work for you.

Subscription

EyeQue smartphone-vision tests require an annual membership subscription. Your active subscription provides unlimited vision testing, unlimited access to your vision data, and exclusive access to other EyeQue products and services. An All Access membership for our VisionCheck (1st generation) and Personal Vision Tracker devices is currently $4.99 per year. Service associated with the VisionCheck 2 will be $29 per year and will provide more personalized reports, enhanced customer support, and access to a host of new exclusive offers and discounts from EyeQue and EyeQue affiliates. To reduce uncertainty for you, we are including two full years of subscription service as part of your reward pledge. Contact us if you have any questions about our subscription service.

If you are already one of the 5,000+ backers who supported our Personal Vision Tracker campaign back in 2016, we are delighted to inform you that your membership remains free forever.  As promised, you are grandfathered into membership for life with your existing account.

For our many existing EyeQue customers, including those who have the VisionCheck (1st generation) with an active recurring All Access membership of $4.99 a year, we’ll have special options for you to extend your current membership rate for years to come. Stay tuned for more updates.

 

Yes, yes it does! Here's how the technology works, in a nutshell. 

The VisionCheck 2 is based on an MIT patented technology licensed exclusively to EyeQue. This technology has been extensively tested in previous generations of our products and uses a variant of the inverse Shack-Hartmann optical method.

The original Shack-Hartmann method is used in an optical device called "autorefractor" and trusted by eye doctors around the world. The autorefractor, short for "automated refractometer, is used to give a quick estimation of vision correction. You may recognize it by its iconic "hot air balloon" or "barn house" image. Many of the optical principles and components used in the autorefractor are also used in the creation of the VisionCheck 2.

The device projects two beams of light that comes from the smartphone display into your eyes and onto your retina. Using an interactive interface, the user overlaps the two lines to form what looks like one yellow line.

Based on the amount of pixel movement made to fully overlap the two lines into one yellow line, EyeQue calculates the user's refractive error. Proprietary algorithms then process results once a full test is completed. After three or more consistent tests are taken, EyeGlass Numbers® are calculated and presented in the same format as a traditional prescription with the spherical, cylindrical, and axis powers needed to correct nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism.

 

Users have performed approximately 150,000 tests using this proprietary technology. Hundreds of testimonials and thousands of surveys from VisionCheck customers helped inform product updates to VisionCheck 2. We set out to create a refraction device that's easier to use, with more accurate results, and better optics.

Based on the feedback of our members,  we came up with a brand new form factor, app design, and test screens – nearly every aspect of the user experience has been reimagined.

We're proud to announce that the VisionCheck 2 was named a CES® 2021 Innovation Awards Honoree in two categories– Health & Wellness, and Mobile Devices & Accessories

  • A more interesting test taking experience with new backgrounds: A new background channel features a variety of customizable animated images that help you get more accurate results. 

  • Larger, brighter, easier-to-see lines: A better optical system allows the display lines to appear larger and crisper than the lines in the previous device, making them easier to see, therefore improving test efficiency and accuracy. 

  • Easier to attach clip system: A convenient clip that's compatible with most phone cases allows the VisionCheck 2 to easily attach to any phone without interfering with any buttons or Popsockets.

  • Easy to rotate thumb wheel design: A new, purely mechanical, easy-to-rotate thumb wheel design allows you to proceed to the next test without having to take your eyes off the device, so you can maintain focus and complete the test faster. Plus, testing has been reduced from 9 meridians down to 8 meridians, making for a faster testing process.

  • Upgraded eye cup design: A redesigned, ergonomic eye cup helps filter more light for an easier test taking experience. 

  • Tactile buttons: Redesigned test buttons on the VisionCheck 2 improve the ergonomics of the test taking experience. The new buttons also eliminate the need to connect your device to your phone via Bluetooth - this also eliminates the need for batteries, so you don't need to charge the VisionCheck 2.

  • Brand new app: A reimagined app design maximizes usability. The new app includes educational elements and makes it easier to reach support.

 

The MIT-patented technology powering the VisionCheck 2 has been extensively tested with over 150,000 tests over the past 3 years and has been optimized to give excellent refraction values for ordering eyeglasses.

Moreover, at-home vision test results can be more accurate than a single point-in-time refraction test. Since your vision fluctuates throughout the day, taking multiple tests at different times of the day gives a better average refraction than a one-time refraction test during an office visit. Especially if someone is having a bad day!

Real VisionCheck and Try-On Glasses users share their stories. 

Dan:

Michael:

 

EyeQue has a family of vision testing products that work together to equip you with everything you need to order eyeglasses.

 

 

We cannot explain the science without explaining the human eye first. Nearsightedness, farsightedness and astigmatism occur when the eye lens and eye distance are “out of sync". Normal distance vision is the result of the light entering the eye and focusing exactly on the retina, where the brain interprets sharp images. Common deviations from normal vision include nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism. Nearsightedness, or myopia, occurs when the lens focuses the light before your retina. Farsightedness, or hyperopia, occurs when the lens focuses the light past your retina, both causing the brain to interpret "blurry" images. Almost 50% of the human population has some degree of nearsightedness, farsightedness, or astigmatism. These conditions are also known as "refractive errors".

While it is easy to understand how EyeQue can measure the overall optical power for nearsightedness and farsightedness, VisionCheck 2 also gets an accurate measurement of astigmatism by sampling over different angles. To measure astigmatism, a complete set of power measurements is comprised of 8 measurements for your right eye and 8 measurements for your left eye. Measurements are made at increments of 45 degrees and with these measurements, the astigmatism is computed.

Yes, that’s a lot of measurements, but the device is making measurements of tiny differences that reflect the shape of the eye lens and cornea. About 1 diopter of astigmatism, a typical value, implies that the non-spherical component of the eye is about 0.25 mm. 0.25mm is thinner than your average ball-point pen point.

All computations are carried out in the EyeQue cloud as it takes a substantial amount of computation that is dependent on many different parameters including the smartphone you are using. As you take more tests, the results are aggregated together through averaging and removing bad data points. Each test is scored based on the goodness of the computed fit to the measurements. An example of test results is shown below.

Along with your test results, we also provide you with a measure of the consistency. The plot on the right also shows how other users have performed as shown by the relative size of the blue dots; most but not all users fall into the "good" category. Our personalized vision report is a great way to stay in touch with your test results and vision changes.

Several EyeQue products, including the first-generation VisionCheck, have undergone clinical studies regarding their accuracy. We are in the process of publishing our findings (spoiler: they work extremely well) and will share them with our backers as soon as we can.

 

 

 

 

It all started with two friends who shared a vision.

 

Today, EyeQue has a team of dedicated scientists, engineers, marketers, designers, and support professionals helping advance vision care, one pair of eyes at a time. 

EyeQue’s Medical Advisory Board provides guidance on the Company’s services, products, and programs with a particular focus on identifying opportunities for EyeQue to serve and partner with the medical community.

The board provides insight into the current and evolving vision healthcare environment, helping EyeQue to pinpoint the specific needs of healthcare providers, serving patients from within and outside of the doctor’s office, where EyeQue technologies could be used to serve those needs in a meaningful way. The board is comprised of distinguished Ophthalmologists and will expand to include additional representatives as EyeQue’s business evolves.

 

 

 

A Mission to Bring Affordable Eye Care to Everyone

We’re putting accurate vision tests directly into the hands of people around the world. Our patented technology makes self-administered eye tests available to billions of people – many of whom may not have had the ability to test their eyes and correct their vision without access to low cost, convenient solutions.

A Global Need to Raise Our EyeQue

It is estimated that more than sixty percent of the world’s population are vision impaired. Hundreds of millions of people, adults and children, are challenged daily by the discomfort and struggle of normal tasks like reading, studying, working and caring for their family. In fact, the global economic cost of lost work productivity due to people with poor vision has been estimated at 700 billion dollars per year.

Refractive error, which eyeglasses correct, is the number one cause of vision impairment in the world. Yet for many families in many countries, access to an optometrist is limited or even non-existent, and the costs associated with obtaining corrective eyeglasses are not affordable. Sometimes corrective eyeglasses are not even available. Our goal is to enable anyone, anywhere in the world to self-administer an accurate refractive measurement test. With our advancements in technology, the mobility of the testing platform, and the commitment to affordable vision solutions, EyeQue will empower people all over the world to easily access and inexpensively correct their vision and improve their daily lives.

Myopia (or nearsightedness) is the most common cause of blurry distance vision. If uncorrected, myopia can increase the risk of developing more serious vision problems including cataracts, glaucoma, retinal detachment, and macular degeneration - all of which threaten sight. Yet this condition is easily corrected, and progression can be slowed with corrective glasses.

A closer look at this myopia epidemic:

Uncorrected refractive error has been steadily climbing and is now the second most common cause for blindness (~20%), with the first being cataracts (~35%).

We’re taking the growing myopia epidemic head-on by rapidly developing and distributing innovative at-home vision tests and devices.

Our Road is Long and Unpaved

We introduced the first at-home smartphone-powered refractometer in October 2016. With our continuous customer feedback in mind (primed by our Kickstarter backers!), we're on schedule to deliver our third generation refractometer in a few months.

EyeQue's Goals

Empowering people to test their vision as often as they like in the convenience of their home.

Arming the optometry, ophthalmology, and optician industries with technological advancements to improve patient care by enabling remote vision monitoring.

Bringing vision testing to areas of the world that lack standard eye care and allowing people to correct their vision with eyeglasses.

EyeQue is also actively seeking non-governmental organizations (NGOs) to use our technology to expand their reach and enhance their services, particularly in areas lacking eye care professionals.

story:
Basalt volcanic stone is what the ancients used and is still preferred by professionals around the world. It has amazing heat retention properties and allows heat to be given off slowly and sustainably.

7 heavy volcanic Elo Stones heat up fast to 3 temperature levels and slowly release captivating warmth to soothe and calm your body and mind.

 

Diffuse calming essential oil blends to trigger your mind to change states from active to passive. 

High-output LED light rings produce calming visual effects and mimic dusk skies. Set your mood with the app, launching 2021.

Hot stones have been used in different cultures around the world for thousands of years. 

We spent 3 years working alongside professional therapists to develop Elo, starting with the traditional volcanic stones of this ancient practice and integrating the capabilities, speed, intelligent sensors, and smartphone connectivity we expect, in a modern device.
story_txt:
Hot stones are a thousand year old tradition. They melt muscle tension so you can relax and sleep better. Elo aims to reverse the bodily responses associated with stress, slowing breath and increasing the parasympathetic activity that makes you feel calm and rested. Target muscle groups on your own or unlock some bonding time with a partner. Giving the perfect massage is effortless with Elo.
 
Hot stone is the premier treatment in spas and can be expensive, especially for frequent visits. Elo is a one time cost, and can be used any time you want. Skip the spa and get the life changing treatment of hot stones in the comfort of your own home.
 
Used for over 2000 years to melt muscle tension and put you into a meditative state. Elo has reinvented this ancient practice, using hand-shaped volcanic stones that preserve the traditions that make it so powerful. The stones you’ll hold in your hand each time you use Elo started their journey possibly thousands of years ago as hot, molten rock from deep inside the earth that once reached over 2000 F before settling down, untouched for generations.Basalt volcanic stone is what the ancients used and is still preferred by professionals around the world. It has amazing heat retention properties and allows heat to be given off slowly and sustainably.
 
We've thought it all through. Elo makes it possible for you get the benefits of Hot Stones entirely on your own. Easily target muscle groups with the help of the included stone placement mat and position guide. Lying overtop of Elo stones just before bed each night can help induce a sense of total calm from which to drift gently off to sleep.
 
Elo is an immersive experience for your senses, incorporating ambient light and aromatherapy for optimal relaxation. Sleep is in Elo's DNA, combining the most calming sensory experiences into a minimalist device that deserves a spot on your nightstand. 
  7 heavy volcanic Elo Stones heat up fast to 3 temperature levels and slowly release captivating warmth to soothe and calm your body and mind. 
 
 
 
 Diffuse calming essential oil blends to trigger your mind to change states from active to passive. 
 
 High-output LED light rings produce calming visual effects and mimic dusk skies. Set your mood with the app, launching 2021.
 
 
  Hot stones have been used in different cultures around the world for thousands of years. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 We spent 3 years working alongside professional therapists to develop Elo, starting with the traditional volcanic stones of this ancient practice and integrating the capabilities, speed, intelligent sensors, and smartphone connectivity we expect, in a modern device.

story:
Thank you to all your contributions to this campaign, we are grateful to have you accompany us along the way. Your enthusiasm and support are the motivation that pushes us forward and makes our products better every day!

We have now started the trial-production in order to figure out and help prevent potential risks that might affect mass-production later on. For more information, please check our updates.

56% of people with diabetes today would test themselves 8-10 times per day with a traditional finger-pricking kit. That means pricking your finger 8-10 times a day. Painful, right? If testing was painless and convenient, wouldn’t it be amazing? Luckily, now we have Hela!

You can check out the video for how accurate the Hela watch works. We made a comparison with the traditional monitor that is frequently used on normal days.

 
 
Your blood sugar level equals your glucose(mMOL/L) divided by 1%~2%, and a result between 4.0~6.5 (glucose 60.0~97.5 uMOL/L) is considered healthy. Please keep in mind that blood sugar measurement is most accurate when an empty stomach.

Using Hela to measure your glucose is simple, quick, and 100% completely pain-free. Probably the most convenient solution to your diabetes problems, in a simple wearable device on your wrist that accurately tests your blood sugar level with just a drop of sweat (about 1 μL).

The Hela Bio Smart Watch uses its unique patented technology to read your blood sugar levels within three seconds. By analyzing your sweat, it gives you an accurate result on your glucose and active acid levels.

No pain, no prick. Just apply a drop of sweat on the sensor as you continue on whatever exercise you’re doing, and see your result on the display. A green circle means you are in good condition. A red circle will show when your blood sugar is too high. Compare to traditional glucose test kits, Hela has advantages, including its size, portability, convenience, data volume, and monitoring frequency than traditional devices simply cannot compete with.

Most importantly, it’s painless, wearable and cost-efficient. We know most people with diabetes spend nearly $1000 annually on test strips for blood glucose testing⎯With Hela, you’ll only need to spend half as much.

Check out how to replace the sensor easily.

Keep track your condition anytime, anywhere. No more sudden drop of blood sugar and dizziness. Set up customized health advice and notifications through Hela APP to help you manage your medical treatment schedule.

Our Smart Cloud technology automatically logs down your tracking history to compare with current data and gives you a thorough report on your glucose levels trends. With this feature, you’ll be able to treat your body better by adjusting your exercise plans and diet accordingly.

 Internationally + Patented Nano-Technology

(Click the picture for more patent information)

For years, we have been studying and aiming to create new sweat sensor technology. Through this technology, we aimed to make breakthroughs in the blood-testing industry and make life easier for those who need to monitor their blood. 

Our efforts finally paid off and our team was able to successfully patent this technique last year on WIPO. We are sincerely grateful to everyone who has come all this way and worked hard on this project, and we hope our invention will help people all over the world who live with diabetes.


Combining your Dynamic heart rate and your resting heart rate, Hela helps monitor your heart rate at all times, whether you’re working out or just resting.

Keeping track of blood pressure is also vital to those with diabetes. Hela offers real-time blood pressure tracking on a daily basis for your medical reference.

We spend approximately 1/3 of our lifetime in bed. Thus, It's significantly important for us to understand our night’s sleep. By measuring the length of your sleep, the quality of your sleep, and heart rate during sleep, Hela works to maximize your recovery.

For outdoor runners, one of the most useful features is the pedometer and distance tracker. Hela has built-in GPS which can count your steps and tell you how far you’ve run to help show you your exercise achievements.

In addition, the Hela Bio Smart Watch also provide:

Enable updates to its operating system. We anticipate four annual updates to provide additional functionality.

The watch comes with a magnet-lock charge cable to ensure enclosure integrity and make charging a breeze.

An optional charging case is available to charge your watch without the need for cables. As an additional benefit, when closed, it can also be used to change your wireless charging capable smartphone.

How does the Hela Bio Smart Watch help me to enjoy the benefits of exercise?

For a Type 1 diabetic, exercise can be a delicate balancing act of eating enough, taking enough insulin, and managing the increased effectiveness of insulin while exercising.

By measuring your sugar levels when you work up a sweat you are able to always know if it’s safe to keep going. Giving up too soon can mean you miss out on the benefits of exercise as a whole.

Exercising too long can cause hypoglycemia in the middle of a sports event or at the gym. Many diabetics will preload with carbs to offset the lows and the result can be unwanted high sugar levels. The Hela Bio SmartWatch makes getting fit much easier for Type 1 Diabetics.

 

How does the Hela Bio Smart Watch read glucose from sweat?

With just one drop of sweat, you can test your sweat sugar, then view your Blood Glucose reading in the Hela Smartphone app.

 

I have Type 2 Diabetes, can it work for me?

Yes, in fact, the Hela Bio Smart Watch is ideal for anyone looking for information on their body throughout the day. We have chosen to focus on the benefits to those with Type 1 Diabetes because having a low during exercise is something many Type 1s struggle with. However, Type 2s and everyone else, measuring glucose levels, blood pressure trends, heart rate, and more, are useful indicators that can improve your everyday life. The watch has so many features, it’s hard to list them all.

 

Why has no one else done this before?

The Hela Bio Smart Watch uses innovative and internationally patented technology. Other glucose metering systems rely on blood or interstitial fluid (under the skin) to provide glucose readings. These methods have their benefits, but they present issues when exercising as they require you to interrupt your workout to conduct a test. When playing a sport, you need to keep your focus on the game. When running, it can take a while to get into 'the flow', and stopping to test can make it harder to push yourself. The Hela Bio Smart Watch gives you the freedom to know your levels when active so that you can keep going.

 

Will I get my watch?

The Hela Bio Smart Watch is in full production, and delivery is guaranteed. If you back the project to receive a watch, you will receive a watch, simple as that. We use the same logistics platform as Apple.

Our design team believes that elegant design improves usability and ensures enjoyable use over the long-term. We have used mathematical formulae such as the famous Fibonacci Sequence to deliver a timeless look.

 

Specification

Hardware

 

Sports Features

 

Health

 

Miscellaneous

 Treat Yourself Better , and best gift for those you love and care.

Short Watch Strap (highlighted yellow above) fits wrist circumference of 140-175 mm

 Long Watch Strap  ( highlighted blue above ) fits wrist circumference of 175-200 mm

   

 

     

 

Our design team is lead by a former Porsche designer. Our Chief Technology Officer has a career spanning multiple to market nanotech products. We are scientists, engineers and artists. We are proud of the Hela Bio Smart Watch, and each one contains a microchip signed by the team.

When will Hela Smart Watch be sent?

Our production has begun and is on schedule. We will be sending watches to backers in November.

Hela Bio Smart Watch: A technology which puts the power of data in your hands and into a package which allows you to use it, literally, on the run.

Hela Bio Tech

Data is power
