story:
Pinpoint Pressure, Where You Need It Most!

Meet the Rollga Point - The smaller, pointed version of the innovative foam roller that reshaped muscle activation and recovery.

Key Features:

  • Grooves - Bones and tendons drop into the grooves so that only muscle is targeted. The grooves also provide the ability to easily target muscles at different angles (for better muscle release) and create a more comfortable rolling experience.
  • Pointed End - The pointed end provides the ability to easily target muscle knots directly with greater leveraged pressure (see pictures below).   
  • Smaller Size - Better for travel and also allows the head to rest at a more natural angle when releasing the neck.
  • Quality Foam - Best in class foam that holds its shape over time and doesn't lose density.

 

Key Benefits:

  • Headache Relief - The smaller size and less spaced groves of the Rollga Point fit the top of the spine and neck/trap muscles perfectly for advanced headache relief. 
  • Back Pain Relief - The center and outer groves of the Rollga Point cradle the spine and shoulder blades for a more comfortable and effective deep tissue back massage. 
  • Muscle Knot Release - The pointed end of the Rollga Point targets trigger points directly, breaking up painful muscle knots.

 

 

The Timeline:

The Rollga Point has entered production and is expected to be available July 1st. All orders will be shipped by July 15th at the latest. 

 

 

The Rollga Point In Action:

story:
NOTICE*

We have all sizes you need. If you can't find your size in the buying options, don't worry you will receive a separate email where you will be able to indicate the size you would like to order.

Also feel free to contact us right away!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With the 3D printed Fluid Blades, Betee can be fully stretched. It will maintain flexibility allowing your feet to be fully free while exercising.   

 

 

The high end materials provide Betee's light weight. You will  feel full comfort of the Betee with all features that it bring  to You.

 

 

With nano filtering technology, Betee will keep Your feet protected from water intervention.  No more wet shoes with Betee.

 

 

Betee comes with moisture-wicking core, that insures comfortable use. No ponds and dirty streets can scare Betee it will stay clean for you.

 

 

 

Adaptive knit makes Betee breathable, allowing for smother air flow and sweat-free experience. Betee stays fresh and at the same time allows for healthy feet use.

 

 

With Betee forget about sweat and smell in your sneakers. The air flow dynamics will always keep them clean inside.

 

 

With a combination of Fluid Blades and 3-layer protection, Betee still is lightweight. Thanks to special materials, the Betee will be felt as natural to your feet as it possibly could get.

 

 

The Betee’s weight stands at 74 grams, putting it amongst the most lightweight sneakers available in the market.

 

 

The core principle of Betee is safety and comfort. The team of doctors and engineers collaborated to create the most healthy sneaker that there can be.

 

 

 

 

With special polyurethane formula the Smart Foam insole of Betee gives your more elasticity and extra comfort while using. You want  to feel on the cloud take a look at this.

 

 

The Smart Foam combines health and comfort. You will always feel comfortable when wearing Betee with Smart foam. 

 

 

 

The Fluid Blades of Betee bring the ultimate comfort. If you are looking for a shoe that will provide support for your lower arch, then Betee is for you.

 

 

The Betee is ideal for shock absorption and provides control over the movement of the heel and forefoot.

 

 

Thanks to Fluid Blade technology Betee provides ultimate shock absorption and brings ultimate comfort to your back and spine area.
Betee is the choice for you if you seek healthy sneakers.

 

Eco-friendly

 

Betee is completely eco-friendly. Made of recycled knit and 3D printed materials, Betee is part of a larger cause of protection and preservation of the world around us.

 

 

All Recycled Materials

 

 

 

Prototyping and Testing

 

 

 

 

Considering the current situation over the global Pandemic we would like to let you know that we are very precautious in our actions and we make sure that our product is completely virus free and that our actions that we take are responsible. For that reasons here are the facts and actions that we took and that we will continue to do.


1) The Betee prototypes and its first batch were produced earliest in May 2019 and ended in July 2019.

2) The Shenzhen where the Betee was produced is not in the near location with the center of outbreak.

3) We will follow the rules provided by CDC and health  authorities, our partners and employees are working remotely,

4) We insure the healthy environment for our workers,

5) We will insure the sanitarily clean order to be delivered to the Backers by following the phytosanitary rules required by the authorities of the countries where we will deliver the Betee.

story:
....often for many hours a day. We spend too long:

- looking at our phones

- sitting poorly at work or at home

- driving

- even some leisure activities such as the gym and cycling can take their toll.

It's no wonder 50% of adults suffer with neck pain at some point each year!

Therapy can help but is expensive and not always convenient. Medication can reduce pain but has side effects.

Stretching the neck and improving it's alignment can help and now there is a super easy and convenient way to do just that and to feel taller, better and more confident.

So be kind to your neck..

....meet necksaviour Mini.... :)

 

 

Designed by a physical therapist. necksaviour Mini restores your default head and neck position while you just lie down and relax. Mini helps to undo the negative affects that gravity, stress, work and some leisure activities can have on your neck and shoulders.

 

 

 

How does necksaviour Mini work??

Good question! It's actually very simple.

 

necksaviour Mini is made of foam and when it is bent it wants to go back to being flat. If you place it behind your neck in the folded position it can't because your head and shoulders are in the way....genius :)

The neck is stretched and the alignment improved. The head is therapeutically being lifted from the neck and it feels great. When you sit up you will feel taller, more comfortable and have improved posture. Having less tension in the neck is also great for relieving headaches.

The foams used are skin friendly and are incredibly durable. They are engineered and arranged in such a way that they give an ideal stretch and also so that you can choose between a light or strong stretch.

Versatile

Each necksaviour Mini has 2 options:

Quick guide video:

The Journey from necksaviour Original to Mini

neksaviour Original was developed by Wes Marshall a physical therapist who has treated thousands of spinal pain patients. Wes was frustrated that many patients didn't maintain improvement between sessions and that products already out there were so difficult to use, were uncomfortable and often just plain ridiculous!!

After four years of painstaking development, prototyping and testing Wes had created a product that ticked all the boxes.

Very first prototypes:

 

necksaviour Original was launched in 2014 and in the next 2 years won 3 design excellence awards!

necksaviour Original has sold all over the world from the UK to USA, from Australia to Norway and from Malaysia to Botswana.

necksaviour Original is recommended by:

Therapists and Pilates and yoga instructors and by the thousands of people who use it!

What people have said about necksaviour Original:

 

 So why Mini?

necksaviour Original users love how light and portable it is but seeing as we always wanted to grow the necksaviour family why not go one better and make a necksaviour even smaller so it can fit in pretty much any bag and make it even easier to use:

At home

At work

At the gym

At Pilates/Yoga

or when outside and most definitely when traveling :)

mini was developed with the same painstaking care and attention to design, engineering and testing but is:

- 30% smaller

- has enhanced contouring = increased comfort and fit.

 

Mini is 30% smaller!

 

 

a safe product...

Not only is necksaviour Mini a great lifestyle product but like necksaviour Original it will be registered as a Grade 1 medical device and CE marked. It is suitable for most neck related complaints and has been tested by the University of Hertfordshire (England). The forces necksaviour mini delivers are well within safe limits. The foams used in the manufacture of necksaviour Mini are completely skin friendly.

Please Note: necksaviour Mini (and all forms of traction) may not suitable for people with extremely severe neck injuries or very recent trauma to the neck or people suffering from severe rheumatoid arthritis (different to osteoarthritis which is the wearing/ageing process of joints). For any of the above conditions or if you have concerns regarding other conditions, including VBI (vertebrobasilar insufficiency) you should seek expert advice before using necksaviour Mini. For more information go to:

 https://www.necksaviour.com/

necksaviour Mini is patented and will be CE marked. It is the brainchild of Epiphany Innovations, a brand new therapy, rehab and exercise product development company run by Wes Marshall. Great innovation, cutting edge design and the use of advanced modern materials are at the heart of Epiphany Innovations.

 

Mini has been shipping now for nearly 2 years....

Here are some photos of our brand new packaging :)

 

So why back us and the necksaviour Mini campaign?

nearing production...

A fully functioning necksaviour Mini prototype has been made and the molds can be created. Funding is only required in order that we can start necksaviour Mini production in sufficient quantities in order that unit costs are reasonable.

Back this project so that you can hold your head up high and together we can spread neck kindness all over the world!

Each necksaviour Mini comes in it's own drawstring backpack.

 

  

 

 

For larger orders please contact us directly at: info@necksaviour.com

 

Thanks.....

So much to Luke Rance of Luke Rance Media for his brilliant videography and incredible patience! https://lukerancemedia.com/

So much to Richard, Greg and Andy the great design team at PDT. http://www.pdt.com/necksaviour.html

So much to my family, friends and patients for their support, help and modelling!

Please Note: necksaviour Mini (and all forms of traction) may not suitable for people with extremely severe neck injuries or very recent trauma to the neck or people suffering from severe rheumatoid arthritis (different to osteoarthritis which is the wearing/ageing process of joints). For any of the above conditions or if you have concerns regarding other conditions, including VBI (vertebrobasilar insufficiency) you should seek expert advice before using necksaviour Mini. For more information go to:
 https://www.necksaviour.com/
necksaviour Mini is patented and will be CE marked. It is the brainchild of Epiphany Innovations, a brand new therapy, rehab and exercise product development company run by Wes Marshall. Great innovation, cutting edge design and the use of advanced modern materials are at the heart of Epiphany Innovations.
 
Mini has been shipping now for nearly 2 years....
Here are some photos of our brand new packaging :)


 
So why back us and the necksaviour Mini campaign?
nearing production...
A fully functioning  necksaviour Mini prototype has been made and the molds can be created. Funding is only required in order that we can start necksaviour Mini production in sufficient quantities in order that unit costs are reasonable.
Back this project so that you can hold your head up high and together we can spread neck kindness all over the world!
Each necksaviour Mini comes in it's own drawstring backpack.
 

  


 
 

For larger orders please contact us directly at: info@necksaviour.com
 
Thanks.....
So much to Luke Rance of Luke Rance Media for his brilliant videography and incredible patience! https://lukerancemedia.com/
So much to Richard, Greg and Andy the great design team at PDT. http://www.pdt.com/necksaviour.html
So much to my family, friends and patients for their support, help and modelling!

story:
The World’s First Truly Barefoot-Like Sneakers

Packed With Innovative Technologies - Based On Latest Science

 

 

Customized for a Perfect Fit

        We customize your Sneakers based on the foot measurements you provide.

 

 

Build Your Own Colors – Eco-Friendly Materials

 

Scroll down to learn more about how our ground breaking technologies and innovative design transform the shoe-wearing experience into an exercise program for your feet – for optimal healthy function and performance.

 

Revolutionary Proper Technique Sneakers

Hi IndieGOGO! We created BioPods® Stimsole® Sneakers because we know footwear can be (and should be) different! 

Step into science and say goodbye to foot stress and fatigue and hello to exceptional performance and comfort!

Our Sneakers are designed to stimulate and retrain healthy function rather than artificially support or cushion, it’s that simple!  BioPods Stimsole Sneakers are the worlds’ first shoes that incorporate modern Proper Technique rehabilitation and sport training principles.

                                         The World's First Proper Technique Footwear
 

After 35 years of foot care experience and years of research, our team of athletes and healthcare professionals gained a new scientific understanding of optimal foot function based on modern sports training principles. This new understanding changes how foot-related conditions and athletic performance are viewed and identifies ideal footwear design characteristics.

 

 


BioPods Insole and Sneakers feature patent-pending Stimsole technologies that incorporate this new science.

We introduced the world to BioPods Stimsole Insoles in 2016 and are now proud to present our revolutionary Stimsole Sneakers. 
 


Why Proper Technique?

Quite simply, because it's good for you! Foot function and athletic performance capabilities have a lot in common. Both are affected by how we regularly use our bodies.

Proper Technique is used to describe the execution of physical activity that promotes healthy robust function with a reduced risk of injury. Poor Technique refers to the execution of physical activity that has a negative effect on your body and increases risk of injury. Footwear that supports, cushions, and/or restricts the foot’s natural dynamic movement creates a poor technique environment.

There are 100,000 sensory receptors in the soles of your feet that provide the critical information required by the brain to activate optimal muscle function throughout the feet, legs, hips, and back.
 


BioPods’ Stimsole technologies provide this critical information and encourage optimal movement with every step you take, ensuring “Proper Technique” function during all of your activities. 

Our Urban Flex model in Black on White. 

 

  • People who enjoy or want to enjoy an active lifestyle.
  • People who are tired of experiencing discomfort and problems related to poor footwear fit and function.
  • Athletes who want to improve their performance capabilities and reduce risk of injury.
  • Anyone, from children to seniors who regularly wear shoes. 

 

 

BioPods Stimsole Sneakers create a Proper Technique environment for your feet.

Therapeutic and Rehabilitative

 

BioPods Sneakers work like a therapeutic exercise program by providing the Stimulus and the freedom of movement that is required for healthy foot and lower limb function.

Wear them consistently for best results.


Designed for Active Lifestyles

We developed BioPods Sneakers for active people and those who want to be! Our goal was to make the healthiest footwear possible, and we believe we have succeeded. Our patent-pending Stimsole outsole design is universally applicable to a wide range of activities.


Revolutionary Fit for Optimal Comfort


                                 Our sneakers perfect fit = optimal comfort.

We customize your BioPods Sneakers based on your foot measurements to ensure an optimal fit. BioPods Sneakers are designed to provide a dynamic Proper Technique environment rather than snugly encapsulate your feet. Our Sneakers fit loosely and move in harmony with your natural foot movement, which is the foundation for optimal comfort and healthy function. 


Breathable and Lightweight


                           Don’t work up a sweat when you don’t need to!

BioPods' extremely lightweight Sneakers almost feel like you're wearing nothing at all, so your muscles aren’t working harder than they need to. And when you pick up the pace, BioPods Sneakers' breathable uppers help keep the heat down. 

 

Enhanced Athletic Performance  

   Run higher, jump faster and exceed your goals with BioPods Stimsole Sneakers.

Athletes understand the importance of Proper Technique training. It promotes a balance of strength and flexibility, safely increases functional robustness, and reduces the risk of injury. Now you can get the benefits of Proper Technique exercise in your everyday shoes to better prepare your body for your more rigorous athletic activities.

 

Recommended by Health Care Professionals 

It’s not surprising that with a 99+% success rate, more and more healthcare professionals are recommending BioPods technologies as a more effective alternative to custom orthotics.

 

 

Incorporate patent-pending Stimsole technologies and innovative design

 

 

Midsole/Outsole Stimsole Technologies

 

BioPods' patent-pending outsole/midsole and Sneaker upper designs create a Proper Technique environment for your feet by providing healthy Right Stimulus and encouraging the Right Movement.

 

Personalize Your Stimulus Level 

 

 

Interchangeable Velco® backed discs provide 3 levels of stimulus adjustment under your arches to accommodate your specific needs and provide optimal comfort.

 

Extremely Flexible

 

 

BioPods Sneakers’ soft flexible outsoles and 4-way stretch uppers encourage optimal dynamic foot movement for exceptional fit, comfort, and performance.

 

Neutral Heel

 

BioPods' innovative outsole/midsole design provides a neutral heel for a natural gait. The outsole’s heel is 1mm thicker than the forefoot, while the midsole stimulus pins are the same height. This extra 1 mm under the bottom of the midsole pins allows the soft honeycomb treads to compress a bit more at heel strike to provide enhanced initial traction and grip.

 

Exceptional Traction and Anti-Slip Properties

 

 

We designed our sneakers with optimal traction, grip, and anti-slip properties in mind. Our proprietary EVA material and innovative honeycomb tread design feature soft elastic-like cells. During weight bearing, the honeycomb treads deform, creating a wide contact patch that enhances traction and grip. And the midsole pin’s TPU material becomes tacky when wet. Our proprietary EVA material is also exceptionally durable and won’t leave marks on your floors.

 

Made With Eco-Friendly Materials 

 

 

BioPods Stimsole sneakers are good for you and the environment. Our Sneakers’ 4-way stretch knitted uppers and inner linings are made from Ynviron® yarns and Repreve® fabrics, both made from recycled plastic bottles. On average, each pair of sneakers contains materials made from 8 recycled plastic bottles. Do good + feel good = world changer!

 

Water Repellent and Stain Resistant

 

 

BioPods Sneakers' are treated with Fluorine-Free NeverWet® DWR, which repels water and resists staining. Our Sneakers keep your feet dry in the rain and dry out quickly after being submerged in water.

 

Feather-lite

 

Averaging just over 1lb, BioPods Sneakers feel like you're wearing nothing at all.

 

 

A BioPods Sneaker for Every Occassion

 

Customized Fit For Every Backer 

BioPods Stimsole Sneakers are designed to comfortably fit all foot types. Whether your feet are wide, narrow, flat, or high arched, our innovative customization process ensures a perfect fit. Based on your foot measurements, for your foot length, we combine one of two outsole widths with uppers made from one of three degrees of 4-way stretch to make your sneakers. This gives you an exceptionally comfortable, loose-fitting sneaker that mirrors your natural foot movement for optimal function.

]

 

No need to measure just yet. Once our campaign is complete, we will get your custom shoe size.

 

Step Into Science

BioPods Stimsole Sneakers are designed to retrain healthy function rather than provide artificial support or cushioning. Foot-related problems and our performance capabilities have a lot in common. Both are the result of how we regularly use our bodies.

 

Healthy activities help our bodies become stronger and more capable, while unhealthy activities weaken our bodies, making them prone to injury. Every moment we spend wearing shoes trains foot and leg function that is either healthy or unhealthy.

 

Support & Cushioning = Unhealthy Function 

Recent research is changing the way foot and leg function is viewed. Modern science has identified that prolonged artificial support or cushioning of a body part results in progressive functional atrophy. It becomes weaker, less physically capable, and more prone to injury. In effect, artificial support and cushioning create a Poor Technique environment that results in the imbalanced muscle use, instability, and poor alignment that contribute to shoe-related problems and pain.

The modern approach to addressing unhealthy function that arises from a Poor Technique environment is to employ Proper Technique exercise to retrain and maintain healthy function. Recent advancements in neurology have crystalized a new scientific understanding of what constitutes healthy Proper Technique foot function.

 

BioPods Stimsole Sneakers = Healthy Function

BioPods Stimsole Sneaker designs incorporate this latest science. Biopods Sneakers are the world’s first shoes that create a healthy Proper Technique environment for your feet.

 

What Needs To Happen For Healthy Function?

Recent scientific advancements emphasize that the quality of sensory information transmitted from the soles of the feet to the brain is vital for healthy function in the feet, legs, hips, and back.

 
This healthy function occurs naturally in those who regularly walk or run barefoot on natural terrain. With each step, the soles of their feet receive a subtly different sensory experience during ground contact. In response, the brain initiates protective muscle activations before, and in anticipation of, each new step’s “unknown” ground contact.

These protective reflexes are nature’s way of keeping the body safe from harm. They are responsible for optimal alignment and efficient muscle function, including the dynamic rising of the toes and arches, which is critical to stabilizing the foot and ankle.

 

Conventional Footwear = Poor Technique

 
Footwear, supportive orthotics, and cushioning insoles create a Poor Technique environment for your feet by inhibiting healthy function in two ways:

1. Stimulus to the soles of the feet is muted and unchanging step after step. Therefore, the brain does not receive sufficient information to initiate healthy protective reflex activations in the feet and legs.

2. Footwear with stiff soles, shallow toe boxes, or restrictive arch areas prevent the dynamic rising of the toes and arches that are critical to the stabilization of the foot and ankle.

Over time, the Poor Technique environment trains the poor alignment and inefficient muscle function to become the dysfunctional “norm.” As a result, the feet become increasingly weaker and more dependent on the artificial support/cushioning. This leads to footwear-related foot and ankle instability, poor lower limb alignment, and imbalanced muscle use that contributes to a wide range of problems and discomfort.

 

BioPods Sneakers = Proper Technique

 
Grounded in science and proven in practice, BioPods Stimsole Sneakers provide the subtle, varied stimulus to the soles of the feet and encourage the natural dynamic movement required for healthy function.

This Proper Technique environment helps safely retrain and maintain healthy protective reflex function in your feet, legs, hips, and back, minimizing the risk of injury. By working in harmony with your natural foot movement, the cause of shoe-related problems and pain is eliminated.

And best of all, BioPods Sneakers’ Proper Technique environment ensures exceptional comfort. Use BioPods Sneakers consistently for optimal benefits and get a pair of BioPods Stimsole Insoles as an Add-On to experience the BioPods' difference in your existing shoes! 

 

 

 

 

Our revolutionary Stimsole Insoles turn your other shoes into a rehabilitative, performance enhancing experience. BioPods Stimsole Insoles create a comfortable “springy” sensation under your arches, providing your brain with the information it requires for optimal muscle activity in your lower limbs and back. BioPods Insoles are safe and easy to use and gradually help your feet, legs, hips, and back regain and maintain healthy function.

 

Make your BioPods Urban and Urban Plus Sneakers fully waterproof. Add a Dintex waterproof, windproof, and breathable membrane between the shoe's upper, outer, and inner layers. When combined with the NeverWet DWR treatment your feet will stay dry in even the worst of weather.

 

BioPods Repreve® socks are designed to enhance our footwear's stimulus properties. They are unbelievably soft and cozy, surprisingly breathable, and incredibly durable. And what’s even better, REPREVE® yarn, like our socks, is made in the USA. Each pair of BioPods REPREVE® Socks is made from 3 recycled plastic bottles that would otherwise pollute waterways and landfills. Available in white, grey, black, brown, blue, and amethyst, you will choose your color(s) after our campaign.

 

 

BioPods' bamboo athletic socks are designed to enhance our footwear's Stimulus properties and to help you take any workout to the next level. There are thousands of fitness socks on the market today but none with the combination of support (compression), softness, and design of our Sport Pro socks. Plus the odor resistance inherent in bamboo fiber means you can say goodbye to smelly workout socks for good.

Inherent qualities of our socks' eco-friendly FSC certified bamboo fibers make them super soft and incredibly breathable - qualities that make these sustainable socks super cozy and the best socks for sweating feet! Available in white, grey, black, brown, blue, and amethyst, you will choose your color(s) after our campaign.

 

Shipping & handling costs will be the least expensive option available for your address and will be charged after the Campaign has finished and before your sneakers are shipped (taxes and customs charges may apply). Our estimates right now are as follows:

Shipping to all 50 United States & Canada:

 1 pair - $12.00 / 2 pairs - $18.00 / 3 pairs - $21.00

Shipping to Europe (USD):

 1 pair - $24.00 / 2 pairs - $29.60 / 3 pairs - $41.60

Shipping to Asia, New Zealand, Australia (USD):

 1 pair - $25.60 / 2 pairs - $32.00 / 3 pairs - $41.60

 

BioPods Sneakers are not an instant fix

BioPods Sneakers work like an exercise program to help retrain healthy functional alignment and muscle use throughout the lower limbs, hip, and back. With consistent use, they will help you reach your personal level of optimal function. Like any therapeutic exercise program, this retraining process takes time.

Other than the few exceptions noted below, everyone, regardless of age and foot-related problem history will benefit from consistent use of BioPods Sneakers.

In most instances, younger people and those without an extensive history of foot-related problems will respond very quickly, usually within a week or two. If you are older or have a long history of foot-related problems, it can take a month or two to regain your personal level of healthy function.

Most importantly, every moment you are wearing shoes, they are training neuromuscular function. Therefore, for optimal benefits, BioPods Sneakers should be worn as often as possible. The more you are active and on your feet, the greater their benefits. 

Rehabilitation sticking points

If you have longstanding foot-related issues or lower limb/hip surgeries, in most instances, you will have developed inelastic scar tissue/fibrosis at one or more locations throughout the feet, legs, hips, and back. Often these fibrotic areas are not symptomatic because they aren’t being challenged by movement. These inelastic areas can become irritated and painful sticking points that impede the body’s adjustment towards healthier function.

The good news is that these inelastic tissues are easily addressed by a Healthcare Professional using Soft Tissue Mobilization Therapies, such as deep tissue massage, ultrasound, Active Release Technique, and laser. After a few treatments, these tissues will regain their natural elasticity to allow the body’s continued adjustment towards healthy function. In more severe instances, there may be several layers of fibrotic/scar tissue (like layers of an onion), each becoming engaged and presenting symptoms only after an outer layer's inelasticity has been resolved. It is advisable to continue using your BioPods footwear as much as possible during this treatment and adjustment process.

BioPods Sneaker Use Exceptions

There are a few instances where BioPods Sneakers are not recommended or should only be used under a doctor’s supervision, as noted below:

If you have bones fused in your feet, especially the toe-metatarsal joints, BioPods Sneakers are not recommended due to the Sneaker's extremely flexible toe area. If your toe-metatarsal joints are immobile, the Sneakers' flexibility can stress the fused joints.

After surgery, your doctor may recommend specific weight-bearing limitations for a period of time. In these instances, check with your healthcare professional before using BioPods Stimsole Insoles and Sneakers.

 

 

Steve H. of Uxbridge, Ontario

As a long-time wearer of orthotics, after I tried BioPods Stimsoles, I threw my 30-year collection of custom inserts into the trash.

BioPods have opened my eyes to the thousands of wasted dollars I spent trying to eliminate discomfort from using the antiquated inserts.

I’m an active outdoor sports enthusiast who participates in a wide range of summer and winter sports, including trail running, kayaking, cycling, and snowboarding.

I recently replaced my orthotics with two sets of BioPods. Over three months, I noticed a decrease in shin discomfort during exercise and a general increase in foot comfort, but it wasn’t until snowboarding that I was 100% sold on the products.

After using the BioPods, my wife noted that I was no longer stopping as often on our ski trips. I hadn’t even noticed, but I was boarding longer and with no discomfort – it was a revelation.

 

 

Jacquelyn B. of Toronto, ON

I’ve been an avid cyclist for over 25 years. I both mountain bike and road ride, and have even ridden across Canada.

Twenty years ago, while attempting to ride across New Zealand, I was hit by a truck that left me with serious hip and back injuries. As a result, I’ve required constant rehab to keep me active.

Several years ago, as part of my rehab, my chiropractor recommended BioPods Stimsoles to retrain my muscles. Initially, I felt an improvement, but it wasn’t until several months later that I experienced a dramatic change in how my body functioned from my feet to my lower back.

On the days I forget to transfer the BioPods into my shoes, I notice a huge difference! I’m more comfortable when I use BioPods every day. Best of all, BioPods have helped me return to and increase my pre-accident activity levels.

 

 

Birger Baastrup, Chiropractor of Juneau, Alaska

I’ve been a chiropractor for over 30 years and I have been using BioPods for quite a while, for both myself and my patients.

I’ve been prescribing BioPods for a lot of my patients and they have really been happy with them. I have also used other inserts over the years, but BioPods seem to be the easiest insert to use, so I have been recommending them for quite a long time.

 

 

 

 

We developed BioPods® technologies because we needed them!

Everyone on our research and product development team has had a history of foot-related problems and pain. All of us have tried “old school” supportive orthotics and cushioning insoles with minimal success. We wanted more.

 

Understanding the body

Using our combined knowledge and experience in sports training, we set out to find ways to rehabilitate and retrain healthy foot, leg, hip, and back function. To accomplish this, one of our first tasks was to develop a better understanding of the mechanics of healthy lower limb function.

 

Extensive research and development

Once we understood the mechanics of healthy function, it took 7 years to develop and test many technologies and product designs. The culmination of our efforts are the BioPods®Stimsole® and footwear products.

 

We care about your health and the health of our planet

We do our best to source the most environmentally friendly materials and environmentally responsible factories. We use minimal packaging for our products and all packaging materials are recyclable. Our products are made in Canada, Mexico, and the USA.

 

We've both had personal experience with shoe-related problems and pain and are passionate about providing solutions rather than treating symptoms.

 

We have a dedicated team of medical and sports professionals that have had personal experience with shoe-related problems and pain. Our goal is to enhance foot health for everyone who wears shoes.

Use BioPods Sneakers consistently for optimal benefits and get a pair of BioPods Stimsole Insoles as an Add-On to experience the BioPods' difference in your existing shoes!     Our revolutionary Stimsole Insoles turn your other shoes into a rehabilitative, performance enhancing experience. BioPods Stimsole Insoles create a comfortable “springy” sensation under your arches, providing your brain with the information it requires for optimal muscle activity in your lower limbs and back. BioPods Insoles are safe and easy to use and gradually help your feet, legs, hips, and back regain and maintain healthy function. Make your BioPods Urban and Urban Plus Sneakers fully waterproof. Add a Dintex waterproof, windproof, and breathable membrane between the shoe's upper, outer, and inner layers. When combined with the NeverWet DWR treatment your feet will stay dry in even the worst of weather. BioPods Repreve® socks are designed to enhance our footwear's stimulus properties. They are unbelievably soft and cozy, surprisingly breathable, and incredibly durable. And what’s even better, REPREVE® yarn, like our socks, is made in the USA. Each pair of BioPods REPREVE® Socks is made from 3 recycled plastic bottles that would otherwise pollute waterways and landfills. Available in white, grey, black, brown, blue, and amethyst, you will choose your color(s) after our campaign.  BioPods' bamboo athletic socks are designed to enhance our footwear's Stimulus properties and to help you take any workout to the next level. There are thousands of fitness socks on the market today but none with the combination of support (compression), softness, and design of our Sport Pro socks. Plus the odor resistance inherent in bamboo fiber means you can say goodbye to smelly workout socks for good.Inherent qualities of our socks' eco-friendly FSC certified bamboo fibers make them super soft and incredibly breathable - qualities that make these sustainable socks super cozy and the best socks for sweating feet! Available in white, grey, black, brown, blue, and amethyst, you will choose your color(s) after our campaign. Shipping & handling costs will be the least expensive option available for your address and will be charged after the Campaign has finished and before your sneakers are shipped (taxes and customs charges may apply). Our estimates right now are as follows:Shipping to all 50 United States & Canada: 1 pair - $12.00 / 2 pairs - $18.00 / 3 pairs - $21.00Shipping to Europe (USD): 1 pair - $24.00 / 2 pairs - $29.60 / 3 pairs - $41.60Shipping to Asia, New Zealand, Australia (USD): 1 pair - $25.60 / 2 pairs - $32.00 / 3 pairs - $41.60 BioPods Sneakers are not an instant fixBioPods Sneakers work like an exercise program to help retrain healthy functional alignment and muscle use throughout the lower limbs, hip, and back. With consistent use, they will help you reach your personal level of optimal function. Like any therapeutic exercise program, this retraining process takes time.Other than the few exceptions noted below, everyone, regardless of age and foot-related problem history will benefit from consistent use of BioPods Sneakers.In most instances, younger people and those without an extensive history of foot-related problems will respond very quickly, usually within a week or two. If you are older or have a long history of foot-related problems, it can take a month or two to regain your personal level of healthy function.Most importantly, every moment you are wearing shoes, they are training neuromuscular function. Therefore, for optimal benefits, BioPods Sneakers should be worn as often as possible. The more you are active and on your feet, the greater their benefits. Rehabilitation sticking pointsIf you have longstanding foot-related issues or lower limb/hip surgeries, in most instances, you will have developed inelastic scar tissue/fibrosis at one or more locations throughout the feet, legs, hips, and back. Often these fibrotic areas are not symptomatic because they aren’t being challenged by movement. These inelastic areas can become irritated and painful sticking points that impede the body’s adjustment towards healthier function.The good news is that these inelastic tissues are easily addressed by a Healthcare Professional using Soft Tissue Mobilization Therapies, such as deep tissue massage, ultrasound, Active Release Technique, and laser. After a few treatments, these tissues will regain their natural elasticity to allow the body’s continued adjustment towards healthy function. In more severe instances, there may be several layers of fibrotic/scar tissue (like layers of an onion), each becoming engaged and presenting symptoms only after an outer layer's inelasticity has been resolved. It is advisable to continue using your BioPods footwear as much as possible during this treatment and adjustment process.BioPods Sneaker Use ExceptionsThere are a few instances where BioPods Sneakers are not recommended or should only be used under a doctor’s supervision, as noted below:If you have bones fused in your feet, especially the toe-metatarsal joints, BioPods Sneakers are not recommended due to the Sneaker's extremely flexible toe area. If your toe-metatarsal joints are immobile, the Sneakers' flexibility can stress the fused joints.After surgery, your doctor may recommend specific weight-bearing limitations for a period of time. In these instances, check with your healthcare professional before using BioPods Stimsole Insoles and Sneakers.  Steve H. of Uxbridge, OntarioAs a long-time wearer of orthotics, after I tried BioPods Stimsoles, I threw my 30-year collection of custom inserts into the trash.BioPods have opened my eyes to the thousands of wasted dollars I spent trying to eliminate discomfort from using the antiquated inserts.I’m an active outdoor sports enthusiast who participates in a wide range of summer and winter sports, including trail running, kayaking, cycling, and snowboarding.I recently replaced my orthotics with two sets of BioPods. Over three months, I noticed a decrease in shin discomfort during exercise and a general increase in foot comfort, but it wasn’t until snowboarding that I was 100% sold on the products.After using the BioPods, my wife noted that I was no longer stopping as often on our ski trips. I hadn’t even noticed, but I was boarding longer and with no discomfort – it was a revelation.  Jacquelyn B. of Toronto, ONI’ve been an avid cyclist for over 25 years. I both mountain bike and road ride, and have even ridden across Canada.Twenty years ago, while attempting to ride across New Zealand, I was hit by a truck that left me with serious hip and back injuries. As a result, I’ve required constant rehab to keep me active.Several years ago, as part of my rehab, my chiropractor recommended BioPods Stimsoles to retrain my muscles. Initially, I felt an improvement, but it wasn’t until several months later that I experienced a dramatic change in how my body functioned from my feet to my lower back.On the days I forget to transfer the BioPods into my shoes, I notice a huge difference! I’m more comfortable when I use BioPods every day. Best of all, BioPods have helped me return to and increase my pre-accident activity levels.  Birger Baastrup, Chiropractor of Juneau, AlaskaI’ve been a chiropractor for over 30 years and I have been using BioPods for quite a while, for both myself and my patients.I’ve been prescribing BioPods for a lot of my patients and they have really been happy with them. I have also used other inserts over the years, but BioPods seem to be the easiest insert to use, so I have been recommending them for quite a long time.    We developed BioPods® technologies because we needed them!Everyone on our research and product development team has had a history of foot-related problems and pain. All of us have tried “old school” supportive orthotics and cushioning insoles with minimal success. We wanted more. Understanding the bodyUsing our combined knowledge and experience in sports training, we set out to find ways to rehabilitate and retrain healthy foot, leg, hip, and back function. To accomplish this, one of our first tasks was to develop a better understanding of the mechanics of healthy lower limb function. Extensive research and developmentOnce we understood the mechanics of healthy function, it took 7 years to develop and test many technologies and product designs. The culmination of our efforts are the BioPods®Stimsole® and footwear products. We care about your health and the health of our planetWe do our best to source the most environmentally friendly materials and environmentally responsible factories. We use minimal packaging for our products and all packaging materials are recyclable. Our products are made in Canada, Mexico, and the USA. We've both had personal experience with shoe-related problems and pain and are passionate about providing solutions rather than treating symptoms. We have a dedicated team of medical and sports professionals that have had personal experience with shoe-related problems and pain. Our goal is to enhance foot health for everyone who wears shoes.

story:
BaxBag's patent-pending X straps are inserted into the back of the bag and they cross over diagonally and exit closer to your waist. 

This creates a broader pull angle effect on your shoulders to adjust your posture in a more comfortable, desired fit. 

You can pull from the top or bottom to get the perfect fit.  

 

 

Foam shoulder cushions

Traditional backpacks yank on your shoulders, creating pain and discomfort over time. BaxBag instead takes the weight and evenly disperses it across your back for a more balanced distribution. 

The foam-padded shoulder cushions provide additional adjustable strap comfort and help prevent neck pain.   

 

Carry-on strap

 

Made for travelers and anyone else who needs multiple bags on the go, BaxBag makes carrying your things from place to place easy. 

 

 

A cuddle for your back

BaxBag’s foam pad cushioning is similar to that of luxury, high-end computer chairs, working to combat spine problems like lordosis, discitis, kyphosis, and more. 

Unlike current bookbag back cushions that cause constant trunk flexion, BaxBag supports the natural s-shape of the spine by reallocating the weight away from the shoulders and more onto the mid-back. The lumbar support cushion snugly fits the curvature of your spine.

 

Gentle muscle activation 

The proper weight distribution allows the muscles of your core, mid-back and glutes to engage. This not only lets other muscle groups share the weight of the load, but it also results in positively exercising, activating, or even “working out” these important multiple muscle groups while you walk. 

Because these muscles are newly engaged, you begin to train them, and eventually when you take off the bag you still continue standing straighter because you’ve begun utilizing the major muscle groups involved in gait and posture. 

The Science

BaxBag has a unique and fundamental design that helps reduce generalized back pain related to carrying a backpack. Many people are unaware of or have simply accepted the way traditional backpacks affect our bodies, but BaxBag is here to correct that and hopefully pave the way for fewer chiropractic bills and less back pain. 

Cushioned Design: The patented X design of our straps is made to press gently against your shoulder blades and create a broad stretch of your chest muscles. This reduces the chances of a kyphotic (hunchback) posture. 

Personalized Straps: Because the straps can be adjusted to fit your body, the wearing experience is more comfortable and evenly distributes the weight in your backpack. This prevents sway-back and pain in your lumbar area.

Upright Posture: Because our design helps keep your pelvis in a neutral position and gently engages your abs, the portion of your spine that supports the head is more likely to be in alignment. 

Eco-friendly materials

BaxBag isn’t just good for humans, we also made certain that it’s good for the environment. 

The outside is made from eco-friendly nylon. Made from rescued waste like fishing nets, industrial plastics, and more, given a new purpose with BaxBag.

We didn’t just want BaxBag to be strong, we also wanted it to be luxurious. That’s why we chose Eucalyptus fibers for the bag’s interior, which are soft as silk and cool to the touch. Eucalyptus fibers use 80% less water than cotton too.

BaxBag is also made of Raffia fiber, which is made from palm trees. Soft, pliable, durable AND biodegradable, this is the perfect eco-friendly material for your backpack.

We believe in radical transparency. Our materials are produced by environmentally responsible processes from sustainably sourced natural raw wood. It uses a closed-loop production process, meaning over 99% of the non-toxic solvent is recycled and pushed back into the system instead of being flushed out as wastewater. You can read more about our factory at veshinfactory.com 

 

Don’t take our word for it.

Check out what people are saying about BaxBag

 

Approved by World Class Doctors

 

*Due to popular demand: The Black BaxBag will no longer have white in its design and will have a more subtle green leaf stitching only   

 

 

 

 

As an avid traveler and physician, Dr. Shafiq Zaib (aka Dr. Zee) saw the toll on her body from carrying heavy backpacks for over a decade. Born out of her own search for relief, BaxBag is an eco-conscious solution that’s bringing relief to those in pain, while simultaneously being good for the body and the planet. 

"Why hasn't the backpack design changed in over half a century?" Dr. Zee saw opportunity in the antiquated way backpacks were designed. And the answer to how could we work on our postural muscles without having to think about it. We've accepted a level of discomfort with backpacks because it is all we have ever known. BaxBag challenges the entire backpack industry to the core with its innovative, revolutionary design. And due to our increasing use of technology, finding innovative solutions to help combat kyphosis (hunchback) has become more imperative than ever. Challenging industries to do better for humanity and the planet is core to BaxBag's mission. We only have two homes, our body and the planet; BaxBag takes care of both!
