story:
Just because we get older, doesn't mean we have to get old.

Once we reach our mid-twenties, our bodies lose the ability to produce collagen at a rate of approximately 1.5% every year. The skin becomes thinner, drier, and less elastic. The loss of collagen leads to wrinkle formation and the visible signs of ageing.

 

REGENESIS combines acoustic waves (sound) and phototherapy (light) with muscle inhibiting skincare and collagen building nutraceuticals to accelerate and fuel collagen production to slow the signs of aging, inside and out.

 

 

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT USING REGENESIS

  • YOUTHFUL SKIN
    • Our patent pending Photo-Acoustic Wave technology accelerates collagen production using combined sound waves and red-light.
  • REDUCTION IN WRINKLES AND FINE LINES
    • Our innovative skincare inhibits fine muscle movement to stop future fine lines and wrinkles while providing the building blocks for collagen synthesis.
  • HAPPIER SKIN INSIDE & OUT
    • Our evidence based nutrition gives the fuel for collagen production and younger looking skin.
  • AN EASY ROUTINE OPTIMISED FOR THE BEST RESULTS
    • The synergistic combination of therapies fits into your existing daily routine.

 

 

OUR RESULTS SPEAK FOR THEMSELVES

Regenesis works in harmony with your body for visibly younger looking skin, every day. We feel the results of our UK user trials speak for themselves. 

 YOUNGER LOOKING SKIN

98% of users experienced a significant improvement to the quality of their skin after 4 weeks.

 IMPROVED TEXTURE AND SKINTONE

  95% of users noticed improved texture, firmness and skin tone after 4 weeks.

 BRIGHTER & PLUMPER LOOKING SKIN

97% of users felt their skin looked brighter, plumper and had less redness after 2 weeks.

 REDUCE FINE LINES & WRINKLES

98% of users saw an improvement in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles after 12 weeks.

 IMPROVED SKIN ELASTICITY

55% of users felt their skin elasticity had measurably improved after 12 weeks.

 SKIN HYDRATION

62% of users saw an improvement in skin hydration and improved dull, tight and flaking skin.

 

 

HOW IT WORKS

REGENESIS combines four leading anti-ageing treatments in one synergistic therapy to activate, fuel and accelerate collagen production.

 

 

+ Photo Therapy
The REGENESIS device uses a proven 633nm (red) light phototherapy. 633nm light has been shown in clinical studies to trigger collagen and elastin production.

 + Acoustic Vibration Massage
Acoustic shear stresses gently massage the skin to reduce fluid retention and improve lymphatic drainage to help reduce under eye bags, while the micro-oscillations stimulate the action of fibroblasts – the key to collagen production.

 + Muscle inhibiting Skincare
Our skincare fuels and accelerates the growth of new collagen and elastin, naturally refills wrinkles from within and reduces the intensity of muscle contractions to reduce future frown lines. Our formulas contain a combination of SPF30, Vitamin C, Copper Peptides, Matrixyl 3000 and Argireline in a unique Hyaluronic acid base. We use active concentrations that have been clinically shown to produced results.

+ Advanced Nutrition
Our nutraceuticals contain a complex of Hydrolysed Marine Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C and Vitamin E. These provide the body with the necessary building blocks for healthy skin cells and collagen, as well as maintaining appropriate stores of antioxidant defenses against free-radical damage. Our nutraceuticals contain only the highest quality, natural ingredients and use the lowest molecular weight collagen (over half the weight of the industry average) to help in the body since it is easier to absorb in the gut.

 

 

DEVELOPED IN THE UK BY OUR TEAM OF EXPERTS

Founded in 2017 28 Day Skin has been developing Regenesis for the last three years from our inhouse laboratory in Gloucestershire, England. We have been financed in two successful rounds of seed funding investment through private and Angel investment. We've summarised our team below, but you can learn more about us and our mission from our website.

+ OUR TEAM

Our team comprises medical physicists, chemists and nutritionists with over 25 years of experience developing and manufacturing personal care products. We have a balanced combination of product development, legal, operational and commercial expertise passionately working to improve life by making synergistic therapy accessible to all.

 KEVIN HERBERT | Founder & CEO | Medical Physicist

Kevin is the CEO and founder of 28 Day skin. His goal was audacious: to help people access, understand, and benefit from synergistic therapy and fundamentally change consumer driven skincare in the process. Prior to founding 28 Day Skin, Kevin spent over 20 years working in healthcare and beauty-tech developing many of the top products you might commonly use today and has over 20 granted patents in his name. Kevin holds a degree in Medical Physics from Cardiff University.

 CAERWYN ASH | Medical Device development | Medical Physicist

Caerwyn joined 28 Day Skin in 2018 and advises on the development of our innovative technologies. Caerwyn possesses nearly a decade of experience in all aspects of designing medical and cosmetic devices having previously worked at L’Oreal and is a recognised international speaker and author of numerous peer-reviewed publications on laser and intense light safety and efficacy of treatments. Outside of 28 Day Skin Caerwyn is a Professor of Medical Devices at University of Wales Trinity Saint David.

 Kate Dimmer | Nutraceutical development | Registered Nutritional Therapist

Kate Dimmer joined 28 Day Skin in 2019 to lead the design and validity of our nutritional products within an evidence based framework. Kate is a registered Nutritional Therapist with a Masters degree (MSc) (Distinction) from University of Worcester. As well as advising 28 Day Skin, Kate practises from her clinic in Cheltenham, Gloucestershire. Kate is a full member of both the British Association for Applied Nutrition and Nutritional Therapy (BANT) and the Complementary and Natural Healthcare Council (CNHC)

 John Whitehouse | CFO & Co-Founder | Accountant

John joined 28 Day Skin in 2018 as Chief Financial Officer, responsible for the financial operations of the company, including accounting and controls, financial planning and analysis, tax planning and compliance, as well as cash management, funding and investor relations.

 Jason Lysandrides | CLO & Co-Founder | Lawyer

Jason joined 28 Day Skin as Chief Legal and Regulatory Officer in 2018. Jason brings more than 20 years of legal and management expertise to 28 Day Skin. Prior to joining 28 Day Skin, Jason served as general counsel and head of legal responsible for the legal and business development functions at Anatwine, a UK software technology company specialising in direct and bespoke integration supporting brands and retailers with their digital strategies. He is responsible for the development and execution of legal and compliance strategies and systems to support unprecedented innovation and access in consumer-driven health care. Jason holds a LLB (Hons) in Law, a LLM in Intellectual Property Law and is a qualified solicitor.

 Gemma Kelly | Head of Operations

Gemma joined 28 Day Skin in 2020 to lead the company’s GMP compliant manufacturing activities at the company’s headquarters. These activities comprise the manufacture of the group’s proprietary products as well as a number of manufacturing partnerships.

 Tara Pickthorn | Head of Brand

Tara joined 28 Day Skin in 2019 to lead the company’s brand and product marketing efforts. She has extensive experience in consumer insight and brand building to balance high impact ideas with realistic executions. Prior to joining 28 Day Skin Tara worked as the senior designer for Rio Beauty, a UK based Health & Beauty company.

28 Day Skin is the trading name of HarJam Innovations Limited, UK company number 11037577.

 

OUR RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT JOURNEY

Our mission is to improve people’s lives through the innovative synergy of skincare, technology, nutrition and mental health. We call this synergistic therapy.

+ DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE

2017 Oct | 28 Day Skin founded by Kevin Herbert

2017 Dec | First working concept device V1 

  

2018 May | Jason Lysandrides & John Whitehouse join as cofounders

2018 Jun | Dr Caerwyn Ash joins to develop the medical device protocol

2019 May | Kate Dimmer joins to develop the nutraceutical protocol

2019 June | Plant machinery installed for inhouse nutraceutical production

 

2019 Nov | First UK Patent Application filed for synergistic protocol

2020 Feb| First fully working functional prototype V2

 

2020 Mar | Prototype production V2

2020 Mar | First user trials using V2, testing and feedback

2020 Feb | Commercial packaging design & production begins.


2020 Jul | Second UK Patent Application filed

2020 Aug | Gemma Kelly joins to oversee production

2021 Jul | Final commercial version V3 ready. Preproduction of 300 units completed.

 

2021 Aug | Third UK Patent Application filed

2021 Aug | Launch on Indigogo of first 300 units.

2021 Sep | Shipping rewards

 

HOW MUCH FUNDING WE NEED AND WHERE IT'S GOING

We're looking to raise £85,000 through the sale of Regenesis devices. The funding raised will enable us to begin phase II clinical trials (independent, double-blind and placebo-controlled) and begin mass production of Regenesis devices.

  • We have completed all product development, phase I trials, regulation approval and production.
  • We have sufficient stock of finished product to fulfill all perks claimed through Indiegogo.
  • All orders are dispatched within one working day by 48h tracked courier service (UK) and International tracked courier service (Europe).
  • Delivery to UK is FREE. Delivery to Europe is £10.
  • At this stage we are unable to fulfill orders outside of the UK or Europe.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

We have taken the best anti-aging therapeutic approaches and combined them into one synergistic therapy. No other anti-aging system uses the combination of sound + light + skincare + nutrition to accelerate and fuel collagen synthesis. By combing treatments we are able to produce a result greater than the sum of the individual parts and a completely unique and effective anti-aging therapy.

Our innovative technology is the subject of three pending UK patents.
Regenesis is a Trademark of HarJam Innovations Limited.

 

CLINICAL SUBSTANTIATION

Regenesis has been developed by scientists who understand the importance of reliable and robust clinical trials.  Many Skintech and beauty products make their claims based upon consumer studies, which are the opinion of participants and vulnerable to the placebo effect. The claims made by the Regenesis protocol and device are based upon reliable and robust clinical trials, including double blind, placebo controlled randomised trials (these are the best and most reliable form of research). Our supporting clinical data shown is below: 

(1) Phototherapy clinical studies

A prospective, randomized, placebo-controlled, double-blinded, and split-face clinical study on LED phototherapy for skin rejuvenation: Clinical, profilometric, histologic, ultrastructural, and biochemical evaluations and comparison of three different treatment settings. Lee S.Y., Park K.H., Choi J.W., et al. (2007). J. Photochem. Photobiol. B. 88, 51–67

Regulation of skin collagen metabolism in vitro using a pulsed 660 nm LED light source: clinical correlation with a single-blinded study. Barolet D., Roberge C.J., Auger F.A., Boucher A., and Germain L. (2009). J. Invest. Dermatol. 129, 2751–2759

cDNA microarray analysis of gene expression profiles in human fibroblast cells irradiated with red light. Zhang Y., Song S., Fong C.C., et al. (2003). J. Invest. Dermatol. 120, 849–857

(2) Acoustic wave studies

Fibroblast traction as a mechanism for collagen morphogenesis- Nature. 1981 Mar 19;290(5803):249-51; Equibiaxial cyclic stretch stimulates fibroblasts to rapidly remodel fibrin – J Biomech . 2006;39(16):2983-90

Effects of a skin-massaging device on the ex-vivo expression of human dermis proteins and in-vivo facial wrinkles – PLoS One. 2017; 12(3): e0172624.

(3) Skincare studies on Argireline and Matrixyl 3000

The anti-wrinkle efficacy of argireline, a synthetic hexapeptide, in Chinese subjects: a randomized, placebo-controlled study. Yuan Wang, Mei Wang, Shengxiang Xiao, Ping Pan, Ping Li, Jia Huo (2013) Am J Clin Dermatol . 2013 Apr;14(2):147-53.

Enhanced Skin Permeation of Anti-wrinkle Peptides via Molecular Modification. Seng Han Lim et al. Sci Rep. 2018; 8: 1596.

Skin rejuvenation using cosmetic products containing growth factors, cytokines, and matrikines: a review of the literature. Caroline Aldag et al. Clin Cosmet Investig Dermatol. 2016; 9: 411–419.

Efficacy of anti-aging products for periorbital wrinkles as measured by 3-D imaging. Kaczvinsky, J.R.; Griffiths, C.E.; Schnicker, M.S.; Li, J.J. Cosmet. Dermatol. 2009, 8, 228–233

(4) Nutraceutical studies

Effects of hydrolyzed collagen supplementation on skin aging: a systematic review and meta-analysis. Roseane B. de Miranda MD, Patrícia Weimer MD, Rochele C. Rossi PhD
20 March 2021 https://doi.org/10.1111/ijd.15518

A randomized, triple-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel study to evaluate the efficacy of a freshwater marine collagen on skin wrinkles and elasticity
Malkanthi Evans DVM, PhD, Erin D. Lewis PhD, Nisrine Zakaria PhD, Tetyana Pelipyagina MD, Najla Guthrie BSc 16 August 2020 https://doi.org/10.1111/jocd.13676

Anti-aging potential of fish collagen hydrolysates subjected to simulated gastrointestinal digestion and Caco-2 cell permeation. Je HJ, Han YK, Lee HG, Bae IY. J Appl Biol Chem. 2019;62:101–107.

Skin antiageing and systemic redox effects of supplementation with marine collagen peptides and plant-derived antioxidants: A single-blind case-control clinical study. De Luca C1, Mikhal’chik EV, Suprun MV, Papacharalambous M, Truhanov A, Korkina LG. Oxid Med Cell Longev. 2016;2016(4389410) doi: 10.1155/2016/4389410.
story_txt:
Just because we get older, doesn't mean we have to get old.
Once we reach our mid-twenties, our bodies lose the ability to produce collagen at a rate of approximately 1.5% every year. The skin becomes thinner, drier, and less elastic. The loss of collagen leads to wrinkle formation and the visible signs of ageing.
 
REGENESIS combines acoustic waves (sound) and phototherapy (light) with muscle inhibiting skincare and collagen building nutraceuticals to accelerate and fuel collagen production to slow the signs of aging, inside and out.
 

 
WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT USING REGENESIS


YOUTHFUL SKINOur patent pending Photo-Acoustic Wave technology accelerates collagen production using combined sound waves and red-light.


REDUCTION IN WRINKLES AND FINE LINESOur innovative skincare inhibits fine muscle movement to stop future fine lines and wrinkles while providing the building blocks for collagen synthesis.


HAPPIER SKIN INSIDE & OUTOur evidence based nutrition gives the fuel for collagen production and younger looking skin.


AN EASY ROUTINE OPTIMISED FOR THE BEST RESULTSThe synergistic combination of therapies fits into your existing daily routine.


 
 
OUR RESULTS SPEAK FOR THEMSELVES
Regenesis works in harmony with your body for visibly younger looking skin, every day. We feel the results of our UK user trials speak for themselves. 
 YOUNGER LOOKING SKIN
98% of users experienced a significant improvement to the quality of their skin after 4 weeks.
 IMPROVED TEXTURE AND SKINTONE
  95% of users noticed improved texture, firmness and skin tone after 4 weeks.
 BRIGHTER & PLUMPER LOOKING SKIN
97% of users felt their skin looked brighter, plumper and had less redness after 2 weeks.
 REDUCE FINE LINES & WRINKLES
98% of users saw an improvement in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles after 12 weeks.
 IMPROVED SKIN ELASTICITY
55% of users felt their skin elasticity had measurably improved after 12 weeks.
 SKIN HYDRATION
62% of users saw an improvement in skin hydration and improved dull, tight and flaking skin.

 
 
HOW IT WORKS
REGENESIS combines four leading anti-ageing treatments in one synergistic therapy to activate, fuel and accelerate collagen production.
 
 
+ Photo TherapyThe REGENESIS device uses a proven 633nm (red) light phototherapy. 633nm light has been shown in clinical studies to trigger collagen and elastin production.
 + Acoustic Vibration MassageAcoustic shear stresses gently massage the skin to reduce fluid retention and improve lymphatic drainage to help reduce under eye bags, while the micro-oscillations stimulate the action of fibroblasts – the key to collagen production. + Muscle inhibiting SkincareOur skincare fuels and accelerates the growth of new collagen and elastin, naturally refills wrinkles from within and reduces the intensity of muscle contractions to reduce future frown lines. Our formulas contain a combination of SPF30, Vitamin C, Copper Peptides, Matrixyl 3000 and Argireline in a unique Hyaluronic acid base. We use active concentrations that have been clinically shown to produced results.+ Advanced NutritionOur nutraceuticals contain a complex of Hydrolysed Marine Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C and Vitamin E. These provide the body with the necessary building blocks for healthy skin cells and collagen, as well as maintaining appropriate stores of antioxidant defenses against free-radical damage. Our nutraceuticals contain only the highest quality, natural ingredients and use the lowest molecular weight collagen (over half the weight of the industry average) to help in the body since it is easier to absorb in the gut.  DEVELOPED IN THE UK BY OUR TEAM OF EXPERTSFounded in 2017 28 Day Skin has been developing Regenesis for the last three years from our inhouse laboratory in Gloucestershire, England. We have been financed in two successful rounds of seed funding investment through private and Angel investment. We've summarised our team below, but you can learn more about us and our mission from our website.+ OUR TEAMOur team comprises medical physicists, chemists and nutritionists with over 25 years of experience developing and manufacturing personal care products. We have a balanced combination of product development, legal, operational and commercial expertise passionately working to improve life by making synergistic therapy accessible to all. KEVIN HERBERT | Founder & CEO | Medical PhysicistKevin is the CEO and founder of 28 Day skin. His goal was audacious: to help people access, understand, and benefit from synergistic therapy and fundamentally change consumer driven skincare in the process. Prior to founding 28 Day Skin, Kevin spent over 20 years working in healthcare and beauty-tech developing many of the top products you might commonly use today and has over 20 granted patents in his name. Kevin holds a degree in Medical Physics from Cardiff University. CAERWYN ASH | Medical Device development | Medical PhysicistCaerwyn joined 28 Day Skin in 2018 and advises on the development of our innovative technologies. Caerwyn possesses nearly a decade of experience in all aspects of designing medical and cosmetic devices having previously worked at L’Oreal and is a recognised international speaker and author of numerous peer-reviewed publications on laser and intense light safety and efficacy of treatments. Outside of 28 Day Skin Caerwyn is a Professor of Medical Devices at University of Wales Trinity Saint David. Kate Dimmer | Nutraceutical development | Registered Nutritional TherapistKate Dimmer joined 28 Day Skin in 2019 to lead the design and validity of our nutritional products within an evidence based framework. Kate is a registered Nutritional Therapist with a Masters degree (MSc) (Distinction) from University of Worcester. As well as advising 28 Day Skin, Kate practises from her clinic in Cheltenham, Gloucestershire. Kate is a full member of both the British Association for Applied Nutrition and Nutritional Therapy (BANT) and the Complementary and Natural Healthcare Council (CNHC) John Whitehouse | CFO & Co-Founder | AccountantJohn joined 28 Day Skin in 2018 as Chief Financial Officer, responsible for the financial operations of the company, including accounting and controls, financial planning and analysis, tax planning and compliance, as well as cash management, funding and investor relations. Jason Lysandrides | CLO & Co-Founder | LawyerJason joined 28 Day Skin as Chief Legal and Regulatory Officer in 2018. Jason brings more than 20 years of legal and management expertise to 28 Day Skin. Prior to joining 28 Day Skin, Jason served as general counsel and head of legal responsible for the legal and business development functions at Anatwine, a UK software technology company specialising in direct and bespoke integration supporting brands and retailers with their digital strategies. He is responsible for the development and execution of legal and compliance strategies and systems to support unprecedented innovation and access in consumer-driven health care. Jason holds a LLB (Hons) in Law, a LLM in Intellectual Property Law and is a qualified solicitor. Gemma Kelly | Head of OperationsGemma joined 28 Day Skin in 2020 to lead the company’s GMP compliant manufacturing activities at the company’s headquarters. These activities comprise the manufacture of the group’s proprietary products as well as a number of manufacturing partnerships. Tara Pickthorn | Head of BrandTara joined 28 Day Skin in 2019 to lead the company’s brand and product marketing efforts. She has extensive experience in consumer insight and brand building to balance high impact ideas with realistic executions. Prior to joining 28 Day Skin Tara worked as the senior designer for Rio Beauty, a UK based Health & Beauty company.28 Day Skin is the trading name of HarJam Innovations Limited, UK company number 11037577. OUR RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT JOURNEYOur mission is to improve people’s lives through the innovative synergy of skincare, technology, nutrition and mental health. We call this synergistic therapy.+ DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE2017 Oct | 28 Day Skin founded by Kevin Herbert2017 Dec | First working concept device V1   2018 May | Jason Lysandrides & John Whitehouse join as cofounders2018 Jun | Dr Caerwyn Ash joins to develop the medical device protocol2019 May | Kate Dimmer joins to develop the nutraceutical protocol2019 June | Plant machinery installed for inhouse nutraceutical production 2019 Nov | First UK Patent Application filed for synergistic protocol2020 Feb| First fully working functional prototype V2 2020 Mar | Prototype production V22020 Mar | First user trials using V2, testing and feedback2020 Feb | Commercial packaging design & production begins.2020 Jul | Second UK Patent Application filed2020 Aug | Gemma Kelly joins to oversee production2021 Jul | Final commercial version V3 ready. Preproduction of 300 units completed. 2021 Aug | Third UK Patent Application filed2021 Aug | Launch on Indigogo of first 300 units.2021 Sep | Shipping rewards HOW MUCH FUNDING WE NEED AND WHERE IT'S GOINGWe're looking to raise £85,000 through the sale of Regenesis devices. The funding raised will enable us to begin phase II clinical trials (independent, double-blind and placebo-controlled) and begin mass production of Regenesis devices.
We have completed all product development, phase I trials, regulation approval and production. 
We have sufficient stock of finished product to fulfill all perks claimed through Indiegogo. 
All orders are dispatched within one working day by 48h tracked courier service (UK) and International tracked courier service (Europe).
Delivery to UK is FREE. Delivery to Europe is £10.
At this stage we are unable to fulfill orders outside of the UK or Europe.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
We have taken the best anti-aging therapeutic approaches and combined them into one synergistic therapy. No other anti-aging system uses the combination of sound + light + skincare + nutrition to accelerate and fuel collagen synthesis. By combing treatments we are able to produce a result greater than the sum of the individual parts and a completely unique and effective anti-aging therapy.
Our innovative technology is the subject of three pending UK patents.Regenesis is a Trademark of HarJam Innovations Limited.
 
CLINICAL SUBSTANTIATION
Regenesis has been developed by scientists who understand the importance of reliable and robust clinical trials.  Many Skintech and beauty products make their claims based upon consumer studies, which are the opinion of participants and vulnerable to the placebo effect. The claims made by the Regenesis protocol and device are based upon reliable and robust clinical trials, including double blind, placebo controlled randomised trials (these are the best and most reliable form of research). Our supporting clinical data shown is below: (1) Phototherapy clinical studies
A prospective, randomized, placebo-controlled, double-blinded, and split-face clinical study on LED phototherapy for skin rejuvenation: Clinical, profilometric, histologic, ultrastructural, and biochemical evaluations and comparison of three different treatment settings. Lee S.Y., Park K.H., Choi J.W., et al. (2007). J. Photochem. Photobiol. B. 88, 51–67Regulation of skin collagen metabolism in vitro using a pulsed 660 nm LED light source: clinical correlation with a single-blinded study. Barolet D., Roberge C.J., Auger F.A., Boucher A., and Germain L. (2009). J. Invest. Dermatol. 129, 2751–2759
cDNA microarray analysis of gene expression profiles in human fibroblast cells irradiated with red light. Zhang Y., Song S., Fong C.C., et al. (2003). J. Invest. Dermatol. 120, 849–857
(2) Acoustic wave studies
Fibroblast traction as a mechanism for collagen morphogenesis- Nature. 1981 Mar 19;290(5803):249-51; Equibiaxial cyclic stretch stimulates fibroblasts to rapidly remodel fibrin – J Biomech . 2006;39(16):2983-90
Effects of a skin-massaging device on the ex-vivo expression of human dermis proteins and in-vivo facial wrinkles – PLoS One. 2017; 12(3): e0172624.
(3) Skincare studies on Argireline and Matrixyl 3000
The anti-wrinkle efficacy of argireline, a synthetic hexapeptide, in Chinese subjects: a randomized, placebo-controlled study. Yuan Wang, Mei Wang, Shengxiang Xiao, Ping Pan, Ping Li, Jia Huo (2013) Am J Clin Dermatol . 2013 Apr;14(2):147-53.
Enhanced Skin Permeation of Anti-wrinkle Peptides via Molecular Modification. Seng Han Lim et al. Sci Rep. 2018; 8: 1596.
Skin rejuvenation using cosmetic products containing growth factors, cytokines, and matrikines: a review of the literature. Caroline Aldag et al. Clin Cosmet Investig Dermatol. 2016; 9: 411–419.
Efficacy of anti-aging products for periorbital wrinkles as measured by 3-D imaging. Kaczvinsky, J.R.; Griffiths, C.E.; Schnicker, M.S.; Li, J.J. Cosmet. Dermatol. 2009, 8, 228–233
(4) Nutraceutical studies
Effects of hydrolyzed collagen supplementation on skin aging: a systematic review and meta-analysis. Roseane B. de Miranda MD, Patrícia Weimer MD, Rochele C. Rossi PhD20 March 2021 https://doi.org/10.1111/ijd.15518
A randomized, triple-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel study to evaluate the efficacy of a freshwater marine collagen on skin wrinkles and elasticityMalkanthi Evans DVM, PhD, Erin D. Lewis PhD, Nisrine Zakaria PhD, Tetyana Pelipyagina MD, Najla Guthrie BSc 16 August 2020 https://doi.org/10.1111/jocd.13676
Anti-aging potential of fish collagen hydrolysates subjected to simulated gastrointestinal digestion and Caco-2 cell permeation. Je HJ, Han YK, Lee HG, Bae IY. J Appl Biol Chem. 2019;62:101–107.
Skin antiageing and systemic redox effects of supplementation with marine collagen peptides and plant-derived antioxidants: A single-blind case-control clinical study. De Luca C1, Mikhal’chik EV, Suprun MV, Papacharalambous M, Truhanov A, Korkina LG. Oxid Med Cell Longev. 2016;2016(4389410) doi: 10.1155/2016/4389410.

story:
Whether you’re concerned with everyday fitness or you’re training to reach new heights, there’s no substitute for hard work. But now it’s getting more difficult than ever to stay in shape, no matter how disciplined you are. The FIRENOW home gym offers you nothing less than a revolution in home training: a chance to engage in adaptive, data-driven workouts under the guidance of world-class personal trainers from the comfort of your living room.

 

 

The FIRENOW can track your movements in real time, providing you with immediate, in-depth feedback. FIRENOW algorithms track up to 100 individual points in your body at the same time, which means not only does it track your movement but it knows what exact motions you are doing. The front-facing camera has a field of vision of up to 16.4 feet across, leaving plenty of room in frame for a full range of motion.

 

During your workouts, FIRENOW compares your movements to our models and reacts within 1/60th of a second, notifying you instantly with on-screen text or animated multimedia explanations for how to improve your form.

Its 3D motion-sensing and AI-assisted tracking algorithms have been trained over several years with real users and motion data. The hyper-detailed detection and wide field of view equips our independent AI coaching algorithms with everything they need to provide you with customized feedback in real-time, so you can adjust your form and execute every technique perfectly with every rep. 

FIRENOW can also generate visualized reports. The mirror keeps track of your training progress and points out the part you need to improve such as balance, flexibility, and posture. 

The FIRENOW user profile and message center allow you examine course options and your training record and history, so you can see how your workouts have improved over time on different devices. You can even playback a particularly good session to see yourself in action.

 

Navigate FIRENOW through touchscreen access, 30+ courses ranging from dance to yoga , boxing and beyond. You can engage in adaptive, data-driven workouts under the guidance of world-class personal trainers – or opt for a private session – all from the comfort of your own living room.

Classes covering yoga, Tai Chi, boxing, Zumba, and more combining bodyweight, dumbbells, kettlebells, and resistance bands, ensure there’s always something new to try. If you can't decide which class to choose from, FIRENOW will make a workout suggestion based on your profile matching your current progress and intensity. 

 

Even better, you can use FIRENOW to train with a variety of expert trainers. Prepare to be trained by world famous NBA coaches, UFC champions, Hollywood stars, and many others. These premier online courses offer unparalleled opportunity to learn from the best in every field.

 

Fire up your FIRENOW and jump straight into action via the FIRENOW app or built-in touchscreen.

With both stand (add-on) and wall mount options and super light frames, installing FIRENOW to your workout collection is simple and straightforward . FIRENOW takes up minimal space while requiring a mere 7-by-5-feet of actual movement area.

 

FIRENOW is easy to install and adjust to your needs any time. Its lightweight frame is easy to adjust, and comes with various height settings. As you change the layout of your home, you can just re-arrange the FIRENOW home gym without worrying about a re-installation.

 

When it comes to improving your fitness, lack of motivation is a big problem, but with FIRENOW’s massive array of entertainment programs, that’s a thing of the past. Whether you’re a seasoned trainee or a beginner, there’s something for you on FIRENOW.

Having a home gathering? Give FIRENOW a go! FIRENOW isn’t just for personal training, it also comes with a ton of entertainment programs, including motion-games, dance programs, and more.

 

More than functional, FIRENOW will complement your living space with its effortless, elegant design. It functions as an ordinary mirror when turned off, and its intentionally conventional form factor is stylish and unobtrusive. The sleek, minimalist design blends in with any adjacent room decor, whether chic, modern, rustic or bohemian, never looking out of place.

 

The Premium Mirror provides state-of-art real-time instruction and corrective guidance for all training programs ,from fast paced cardio, combat and functional training, to more tempoed work such as strength training and yoga. The Standard and Lite Mirror focus on posture recognition based corrective feedback and are optimal for yoga and meditation programs which have static to slower movement. All three versions provide a report with statistics of power, volume and calories burned for your workouts.

 

 

 

FIRENOW is a group of passionate fitness enthusiasts committed to revolutionizing the way people workout by providing the most advanced AI-powered interactive workouts. Leveraging our proprietary algorithms, computer vision technology, built-in neural networks and datasets, our user-centric platform combines professional fitness guidance from world-class coaches with tech-optimized training to deliver the best in-home fitness experience.

 

Ruben Payan Jr. is many things but above all he defines himself by a mission and a vision. His is to share his life experiences and those he gained pioneering the fitness industry in Asia to motivate athletes, coaches, corporate executives and everyday people to reach their full potential. He has a message he calls POWERFUL HUMAN - it is a universal set of ideas aimed at self actualization that he articulates through life -changing presentations and workshops.It is Ruben's recipe for life and dreams, and one that has literally brought him to the top of the world and back.

Ruben is the first fitness professional to coach an Asian MMA fighter (Zhang Weili) to become a UFC World Champion. Ruben's success climbing the seven Summits, the highest mountain on each of the world's seven continents, culminated in 2016 with an eighth and final climb, the almighty K2. But his adventures as a mountain climber are just part of his fascinating story. He is also a successful entrepreneur - first landing in Asia in 2007 with little more than a suitcase. He went on to build HUMAN IN MOTION, the nation's NO.1 Functional Training Center; co-founded IHP Asia, the leading source of functional training education in Asia.

 

FIRENOW products have entered the mass production stage. We greatly respect our brand and cherish our relationship with customers.  As an official team, we guarantee delivery. We will always have your back.

story:
Since 2014…we’ve been redesigning dental products at TIO...

...environmentally friendly AND at the highest quality level of tooth care! To achieve this, we’re constantly battling to advance as pioneers in the field of plant-based plastics. We want to prove in our own way that pollution can be avoided. Because sustainable redesign of an everyday object, such as dental floss, which billions of people use every day, can have a huge, positive impact on our environment. Read on to find out why we rethink, reduce and reuse.

 

To reach the next level we need your support!

We operate on comparably small profit margins with TIO and a big investment required to make TIOFLOSS happen is the creation of two injection moulding tools for our dispenser: One for the top and one for the bottom half.  We can then set up the manufacturing process and start the first production run. Your support would also allow us to purchase the required raw materials and cover our manufacturing partner’s operating costs during the first round of TIOFLOSS production for our supporters. 

 

Our newly developed TIOFLOSS might seem like a small step at first sight... 

...but it’s big step for us—and mankind. Trailblazing doesn’t come easy (especially when production lines suddenly stand still in a pandemic) and we kindly ask for your support to get TIOFLOSS set up for production and push the use of TIO’s plant-based floss to the next level by reducing packaging even further with a reusable case. 

 

 

 

Why it’s really time to make a change

The ecological damage caused by the increasing amount of waste humans produce every day is immense. Climate change and the pollution of oceans are the first of many consequences if we don’t make significant changes in the manufacturing of consumer goods. Due to their very short lifespan, personal hygiene products like dental ones are a key segment.

 

Here's the sad reality of a single-use dispenser...

 

The impact reusable floss dispensers could have

Following your dentist's advice - flossing once a day with 0,5m (20′′) of floss - results in the consumption of 4-5 single use containers per year. Empty single use floss containers and their packaging in the U.S. would create ~ 15.000 tons of plastic waste. And that’s just for one year! Just in the United States! (According to Statista, 235.8 million Americans used dental floss / flossers / picks in 2020)

 

 

 

At TIO we minimize packaging wherever we can

When designing our products, we place great emphasis on minimal material usage to preserve resources. We avoid unnecessary waste through newly invented refill concepts to relieve our ecosystem. Our refills will be packaged in an innovative paper-based, FSC-certified and recyclable material.

 

Plants over plastic and a future without drilling

We want a clean conscience and clean teeth: Instead of conventional plastic made of petroleum, we use plant-based bioplastics for all parts from yarn to dispenser. These renewable raw materials enable us to drastically reduce greenhouse gas emissions and avoid the fatal consequences of fossil fuel extraction, such as fracking or tanker accidents.

 

 

The foundation of our floss and dispenser are renewable, vegetable raw materials. This saves CO₂ and allows you and many other people to clean up their carbon footprint and teeth. Our extensive material research helped us cut down green house gases by 55% compared to ordinary petro-based materials. Through downstream technical and procurement improvements, the carbon footprint can even be further reduced to just 22% of ordinary products.

 

The TIOFLOSS materials separate it from…the wasteful rest.

Beyond the drastical improvement of the carbon footprint, there are many other benefits. The original plant used for our organic raw material is the fast-growing wonder tree that does not require large amounts of water, uses only a small acreage of farmland and is therefore perfectly suited for a future of sustainable agriculture. Furthermore the castor bean is inedible which makes the TIOFLOSS unique regarding it's minimal harm to our planet and the people living on it.

 

By the way…these guys want to thank you :)

 

The process: From the field – to the press – to you

If you're now wondering whether this sounds a little too good to be true: Since our floss doesn't completely grow on trees we would love to quickly explain how it’s actually made because unfortunately using the type of plastic we use is still kind of unusual. This actually makes development a constant challenge for us. We've sketched together an overview of our material's journey that turns a plant into high-quality bio-plastic. Below you see the whole path—from the plant to the finished product. 

And with your support the floss we produce will now get an equally natural home

  • 40% wood fibers and 98% bio-based content without any palm tree products.
  • Up to 70% carbon footprint reduction vs. commonly used petro-based plastic.
  • The material is certified according to the ISCC which guarantees full transparency.
  • FSC/PEFC certified wood fibers assure responsible forestry.

 

Sustainable manufacturing processes are also very important to us.

Our Italian production facilities ensure fair working conditions and reduce the CO₂ exhaust due to short transport routes and a green energy production plant. With more than 20 years of experience in the development of dental floss and over 60 dedicated employees they can guarantee the best production possible. Their ISO 9001 Certification stands for the highest quality of product development and a rooftop full of solar panels has them classified AAA for energy efficiency.

 

Reforestation against the climate crisis

Although our products contribute to CO₂ reduction, based on the current standard of knowledge, nothing can combat global warming as effectively as reforestation. To help absorb even more CO₂ emissions, we also support Plant-for-the-Planet on their mission to fight the climate crisis.

 

Flossing at the highest quality level

Dental health is an important issue and everyone depends on reliable care products. We stand for the best possible dental cleaning. Because healthy teeth simply make life better. Therefore, compromises regarding the quality of care are never an option for us. We focus on maximum hygiene and cleaning performance for all of our products.

 

We are enthusiasts for sustainable design by heart.

As a company founded by two seasoned designers we have been trying to achieve the best possible result for people and nature alike through our products by combining material research and resource-saving design. To be honest: That really wasn’t always easy. There are many hurdles you face along the way, that we would have never expected beforehand. It’s something we have experienced almost constantly. But we won't let that stop us from thinking about every last detail. 

 

Perks

Every contribution counts and here's a breakdown of your pledge options that will help us make TIOFLOSS a reality!

 
 
 

 

Tiofloss & Tiobrush bundles

Since dental floss only does half the job, we're offering attractive bundles of our plant based replaceable head toothbrush and our Tiofloss. Tiobrush, our timeless classic made of plant-based bioplastics with a reusable, ergonomic handle for a good grip and replaceable brush head— hopefully just one of many to come. Tiobrush also includes a hygienic travel cap. The only thing not included: A bunch of marketing blah-blah. Tiobrush neatly cleans your teeth and toothbrushes aren’t rocket science.

 

 

 
 

Retailer Special

Progressive retailers who share the TIO vision—this reward is for you! We are offering our purchase units in practical shipping boxes which can be transformed into attractive point of sale displays. Important note: This pledge requires a proof of business!

 

The TIOFLOSS Countdown

Here’s current stauts: All the details about when you can expect to receive your TIOFLOSS (dispenser and floss of course) and what comes next.

 

And lastly...a little more about the team. 

Our path.

The two on the photo in bright white fine rib, that's us—Fabian and Benjamin the founders of TIO. Although we temporarily parted ways after our design studies, we stayed connected by a shared passion to question the status quo. Our goal as designers has always been fully understanding the big picture and creating better solutions based on it. That’s exactly why we finally founded TIO in 2015 and developed our first plant based toothbrush—with a replaceable head from day one.

Maybe because our natural materials have given us many sleepless nights, we’re all the more enthusiastic for each time we’ve beaten the odds and figured how to make it work. We’ll keep giving our absolute best to make sure you can scrub your teeth with TIO products better and more sustainably in the future. Developing purposeful and ecological concepts is what drives us. And: It’s actually fun.

 

 

In 2017 we joined forces with Christoph, Sebastian, Wanja and their team from wasserneutral. The three are friends from Hamburg who share our passion for sustainable businesses. We met during a trade show. After several long and enthusiastic conversations we decided that we can learn a lot from each other and so we set the foundation for a fruitful cooperation! Since then we've been able to rely on their profound experience in marketing, sales and distribution which will help us to fulfill your orders as soon as possible.
story_txt:
Since 2014…we’ve been redesigning dental products at TIO...
...environmentally friendly AND at the highest quality level of tooth care! To achieve this, we’re constantly battling to advance as pioneers in the field of plant-based plastics. We want to prove in our own way that pollution can be avoided. Because sustainable redesign of an everyday object, such as dental floss, which billions of people use every day, can have a huge, positive impact on our environment. Read on to find out why we rethink, reduce and reuse.
 
To reach the next level we need your support!
We operate on comparably small profit margins with TIO and a big investment required to make TIOFLOSS happen is the creation of two injection moulding tools for our dispenser: One for the top and one for the bottom half.  We can then set up the manufacturing process and start the first production run. Your support would also allow us to purchase the required raw materials and cover our manufacturing partner’s operating costs during the first round of TIOFLOSS production for our supporters. 
 Our newly developed TIOFLOSS might seem like a small step at first sight... ...but it’s big step for us—and mankind. Trailblazing doesn’t come easy (especially when production lines suddenly stand still in a pandemic) and we kindly ask for your support to get TIOFLOSS set up for production and push the use of TIO’s plant-based floss to the next level by reducing packaging even further with a reusable case.    Why it’s really time to make a changeThe ecological damage caused by the increasing amount of waste humans produce every day is immense. Climate change and the pollution of oceans are the first of many consequences if we don’t make significant changes in the manufacturing of consumer goods. Due to their very short lifespan, personal hygiene products like dental ones are a key segment. Here's the sad reality of a single-use dispenser... The impact reusable floss dispensers could haveFollowing your dentist's advice - flossing once a day with 0,5m (20′′) of floss - results in the consumption of 4-5 single use containers per year. Empty single use floss containers and their packaging in the U.S. would create ~ 15.000 tons of plastic waste. And that’s just for one year! Just in the United States! (According to Statista, 235.8 million Americans used dental floss / flossers / picks in 2020)   At TIO we minimize packaging wherever we canWhen designing our products, we place great emphasis on minimal material usage to preserve resources. We avoid unnecessary waste through newly invented refill concepts to relieve our ecosystem. Our refills will be packaged in an innovative paper-based, FSC-certified and recyclable material. Plants over plastic and a future without drillingWe want a clean conscience and clean teeth: Instead of conventional plastic made of petroleum, we use plant-based bioplastics for all parts from yarn to dispenser. These renewable raw materials enable us to drastically reduce greenhouse gas emissions and avoid the fatal consequences of fossil fuel extraction, such as fracking or tanker accidents.  The foundation of our floss and dispenser are renewable, vegetable raw materials. This saves CO₂ and allows you and many other people to clean up their carbon footprint and teeth. Our extensive material research helped us cut down green house gases by 55% compared to ordinary petro-based materials. Through downstream technical and procurement improvements, the carbon footprint can even be further reduced to just 22% of ordinary products. The TIOFLOSS materials separate it from…the wasteful rest.Beyond the drastical improvement of the carbon footprint, there are many other benefits. The original plant used for our organic raw material is the fast-growing wonder tree that does not require large amounts of water, uses only a small acreage of farmland and is therefore perfectly suited for a future of sustainable agriculture. Furthermore the castor bean is inedible which makes the TIOFLOSS unique regarding it's minimal harm to our planet and the people living on it. By the way…these guys want to thank you :) The process: From the field – to the press – to youIf you're now wondering whether this sounds a little too good to be true: Since our floss doesn't completely grow on trees we would love to quickly explain how it’s actually made because unfortunately using the type of plastic we use is still kind of unusual. This actually makes development a constant challenge for us. We've sketched together an overview of our material's journey that turns a plant into high-quality bio-plastic. Below you see the whole path—from the plant to the finished product. And with your support the floss we produce will now get an equally natural home
40% wood fibers and 98% bio-based content without any palm tree products.
Up to 70% carbon footprint reduction vs. commonly used petro-based plastic.
The material is certified according to the ISCC which guarantees full transparency.
FSC/PEFC certified wood fibers assure responsible forestry.
 Sustainable manufacturing processes are also very important to us.Our Italian production facilities ensure fair working conditions and reduce the CO₂ exhaust due to short transport routes and a green energy production plant. With more than 20 years of experience in the development of dental floss and over 60 dedicated employees they can guarantee the best production possible. Their ISO 9001 Certification stands for the highest quality of product development and a rooftop full of solar panels has them classified AAA for energy efficiency. Reforestation against the climate crisisAlthough our products contribute to CO₂ reduction, based on the current standard of knowledge, nothing can combat global warming as effectively as reforestation. To help absorb even more CO₂ emissions, we also support Plant-for-the-Planet on their mission to fight the climate crisis. Flossing at the highest quality levelDental health is an important issue and everyone depends on reliable care products. We stand for the best possible dental cleaning. Because healthy teeth simply make life better. Therefore, compromises regarding the quality of care are never an option for us. We focus on maximum hygiene and cleaning performance for all of our products. We are enthusiasts for sustainable design by heart.As a company founded by two seasoned designers we have been trying to achieve the best possible result for people and nature alike through our products by combining material research and resource-saving design. To be honest: That really wasn’t always easy. There are many hurdles you face along the way, that we would have never expected beforehand. It’s something we have experienced almost constantly. But we won't let that stop us from thinking about every last detail.  PerksEvery contribution counts and here's a breakdown of your pledge options that will help us make TIOFLOSS a reality!   
 
Tiofloss & Tiobrush bundles
Since dental floss only does half the job, we're offering attractive bundles of our plant based replaceable head toothbrush and our Tiofloss. Tiobrush, our timeless classic made of plant-based bioplastics with a reusable, ergonomic handle for a good grip and replaceable brush head— hopefully just one of many to come. Tiobrush also includes a hygienic travel cap. The only thing not included: A bunch of marketing blah-blah. Tiobrush neatly cleans your teeth and toothbrushes aren’t rocket science.
 

 
  Retailer SpecialProgressive retailers who share the TIO vision—this reward is for you! We are offering our purchase units in practical shipping boxes which can be transformed into attractive point of sale displays. Important note: This pledge requires a proof of business! The TIOFLOSS CountdownHere’s current stauts: All the details about when you can expect to receive your TIOFLOSS (dispenser and floss of course) and what comes next. And lastly...a little more about the team. Our path.The two on the photo in bright white fine rib, that's us—Fabian and Benjamin the founders of TIO. Although we temporarily parted ways after our design studies, we stayed connected by a shared passion to question the status quo. Our goal as designers has always been fully understanding the big picture and creating better solutions based on it. That’s exactly why we finally founded TIO in 2015 and developed our first plant based toothbrush—with a replaceable head from day one.Maybe because our natural materials have given us many sleepless nights, we’re all the more enthusiastic for each time we’ve beaten the odds and figured how to make it work. We’ll keep giving our absolute best to make sure you can scrub your teeth with TIO products better and more sustainably in the future. Developing purposeful and ecological concepts is what drives us. And: It’s actually fun.  In 2017 we joined forces with Christoph, Sebastian, Wanja and their team from wasserneutral. The three are friends from Hamburg who share our passion for sustainable businesses. We met during a trade show. After several long and enthusiastic conversations we decided that we can learn a lot from each other and so we set the foundation for a fruitful cooperation! Since then we've been able to rely on their profound experience in marketing, sales and distribution which will help us to fulfill your orders as soon as possible.

story:
Over 500 million children worldwide carry life- critical medicine wherever they go and always. All childrens’ conditions are unique and require different medicines. Therefore, if you don't know the child, it’s impossible in an emergency to get information on what condition the child has. There is a current solution, however it’s complicated and doesn’t take advantage of today's technology.

This is what led us to create MedsBag-  The first- ever wearable audio action plan, made for children carrying life-critical medicine. MedsBag digitizes the old and outdated written medical action plan and brings emergency protocol into the 21st century. It is easy to activate and easy to operate.

We want MedsBag to signal an insightful awareness of a serious state, showing the public that the child carries life- critical medicine. The bag will be a symbol for inclusion, counteracting stigma and empowering the everyday heroes.


Besides the fact that there are 500 million children carrying life- critical medicine, we have a personal relationship to this matter.

We are a family of five where the youngest one, Matteo (12), has asthma and anaphylaxis, a more severe type of allergic reaction most often caused by exposure to allergenic substances. Ever since Matteo was 5 months old we have carried with us adrenaline and an inhaler.

We quickly understood that an extremely low percentage of our community would know  what his condition was if he would get an allergic chock. Therefore, it was always very frightening to let him out the door alone where there are possible enemies wherever he goes and potentially no allies to call for help. He needed to carry much more than just a paper with instructions, he needed an ally that had his back wherever he went, the MedsBag.

Even though, we as a family were scared that something would happen to him when we weren't with him, we were determined to allow him to move freely and without limitation through his upbringing. It was also important for us that Matteo never felt he should hide his conditions. Matteo, and all 500 million children with the same need, is our why.


MedsBag is a fashionable and multifunctional bag for children to keep with them at all times. It’s equipped with a recordable speaker on the outside and is designed to store proper medication, inhalers, syringes, autoinjectors and more. The speaker is easy to access and provides recorded instructions from the caregiver. MedsBag supports all languages and unique conditions as you record it yourself.

 

Every MedsBag will have a QR code. The code will be added into the informational pocket together with the name and picture of your child. When scanning the QR code the bystander will be directed to the same recorded instruction as the recorded in the audio device and can be used if the speaker malfunctions. 

How MedsBag works

 

How to use 

Today's solution doesn’t work, and far too few even know about it. The written action- plan is outdated, hard to understand and unknown for most. You don’t only have to know about the written action plan, you also have to find it, read it, understand it, and finally, after all those steps, act.   

We chose the color blue because Matteo has always carried a blue bag, therefore it felt very natural to have the first version of MedsBag in blue. Also, it’s the color of clean air, and we just love blue?

Lack of statistics: Sadly, there is limited research and data focused on children carrying life- critical medicine. Therefore, it’s hard to know how many everyday heroes there actually are out there. But here is some statistics we've found that supports our market and how big it is, and how it's growing exponentially.

Asthma: 339 million people worldwide live with asthma & its prevalence increases by 50%every decade.

Epilepsy: 13 million worldwide live with epilepsy.

Diabetes: 422 million people worldwide live with diabetes & increased by 88% between 2000-2009.

Anaphylaxis: 1 in 13 children in the US live with food allergies where 30% have been treated, at least once, in the ER.

Statistics from our survey

480 respondents

We are now ready to begin large scale production. With your support, we will bring MedsBag to the world.

What we aim to achieve with kickstarter

If we reach €20 000 we’ll be able to create a second batch of MedsBags with more smart functions integrated. All to safekeep the everyday heroes.

If we reach €40 000, we'll be able to create an app for MedsBag, meaning a community for the heroes and caretakers, with functions like geo-positioning and expiration date alerts for meds and EpiPens.

If we reach €100 000, we'll be able to give out MedsBags to selected pre-schools.

We'll also be able to create a stronger marketing division in our company to enable us to reach relevant communities.

Our goals

MedsBags main goal is to reach as many children as possible by expanding our business globally and creating designs that will appeal to children of different ages.

We hope to have corporate sponsorship which will eventually allow us to provide a free bag to those everyday heroes who fight unknown allergens each day in the world.

We plan to build a community that empowers and unites people carrying life critical medicine.

We want MedsBag to become a symbol for all people carrying life- critical medicine and therefore readily recognizable by the average person.

We aim, at all times to develop the best bag available for those in the community who face every days dangers . 

Timeline

Team MedsBag

Now we need YOUR help to kickstart MedsBag. Help us help all 500 million everyday heroes by donating, thank you!

story:
BREATHE CLEANER, FILTERED AIR 
WITH THE AIR MASK

Finally, a filter mask you can wear all day in comfort.
Made from 100% eco-friendly moisture-wicking bamboo fabric.




 

A NEW KIND OF MASK,
WHERE FUNCTION MEETS STYLE



Our mission: To make the world's best premium air filtration mask.
Make it to last. Make it functional. Make it sustainable.    



THE AIR MASK FEATURES



Breathe better, look great 
& respect the planet.


Protective, High Quality, Breathable,
Reusable & Sustainable. 



GUARANTEE PROTECTION FROM POLLUTION & DROPLET WITH 5 LAYER FILTERS

Did you know that air pollution killed 4.2 million people in 2019?

Help yourself from the devastating side effects of breathing polluted air with the Air Mask's premium air filtration system.

With the Air Mask, you'll automatically be immune to all the pollution that’s floating around in the air.

Let the Air Mask's active carbon technology cut out everything from dust and pollen to gas, hazardous material, smoke and exhaust fumes.

The Air Mask comes with 5 layer filters that block over 97% of micro airborne pollution up to 0.1 micron.

We will launch the official certification process during the funding and thanks to your participation.
We'll keep you updated.

 


 

Made from eco-friendly bamboo, the outer layer is the start of the filtration system. It wicks moisture away from your breath, allows you to breathe efficiently and dries quickly. Bamboo is grown without pesticides, herbicides, or other chemical fertilizers---making it fully sustainable as well as better for your health and the environment.

BREATHABLE AND REUSABLE IS THE NEW NORMAL



Made with a unique triangle valve system, the Air Mask it easy and comfortable to wear whenever you're outside, whatever you're doing. Walk, run, relax. You can even chase squirrels in your yard---the Air Mask lets you do it all and more.

Wear it while grocery shopping, on your commute, working out, meeting friends, anything you can do in this new normal. 

Use the filters for up to 4 weeks and then easily replace them in just 2 minutes. The mask can be washed by hand with soap or in the washing machine.



PROTECT YOURSELF AND RESPECT THE PLANET

The Air Mask is made from eco-friendly fabrics---so it has the minimum impact possible on the environment. They're also completely reusable---making their footprint even smaller and preventing waste.

Sourced from the finest materials, the Air Mask is a timeless solution that'll last for years.

Actually, it'll last for decades.

Our fabric is proudly certified by STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX®

STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® is one of the world's best-known labels for textiles tested for harmful substances. It stands for customer confidence and high product safety.



ENJOY A SEAMLESS FIT

The Air Mask is no ordinary mask. It gives you a whole new level of filtration, breathability, design, and fit.

Our fully-ergonomic design makes sure The Air Mask will fit you like a glove. No more uncomfortable headaches or tugging on your ears with The Air Mask.

The Air Mask comes in three sizes and has a simple lace-up system that guarantees a super-comfy and adjustable fit. You’ll be able to select the sizes in our post-campaign survey, together with your shipping address and preferred add-ons!

The outer layer is made from 100% eco-friendly, moisture-wicking bamboo fabric---so you’ll feel like a chilled-out panda whenever you put it on.

Our valves allow you to breathe out easier. They prevent humidity and reduce uncomfortable heat and carbon dioxide buildup inside the mask.

VALVE DEACTIVATOR SEALS

The valve masks adequately protect the wearer. However, when breathing out some particles can escape.



That's why we offer valve deactivator seals as add-on purchases to provide two-way protection.

 

 

CHOOSE FROM 5 COLORS & BREATHE IN ESSENTIAL OILS


5 colors will complement your outfit every day. 

We keep it simple and let the colors do the talking. We've worked tirelessly to ensure that every shade and every glow matches the tone of the design---and looks great!

Our shades are inspired by scenes of nature and the details we found in them.



 






Our colourful filter packs are easily replaceable---making them adaptive to your mood while always keeping you protected. Switch them up with ease---whenever you want.

Plus, the filters are gently infused with essential oils so you get that “just entered the spa” feeling whenever you put it on. Choose from the range of essential oils depending on your mood on a given day.

 

 


AT ARIA WE BELIEVE WE CAN

ALL MAKE A DIFFERENCE


Our way:
High quality, Ethical products. Real transparency. Full independence.

Aria was founded in 2018 by Jeremy Arnoux. He had a clear vision about creating essential everyday products that were both ethical and sustainable as well as affordable. With ARIA, he's helped bring this vision to life.

Inspired by his travels to some of the world's greatest cities, Jeremy first came up with the idea of the Air Mask when he saw the need for a covering that offered a good style and filtering out air pollution.

After a year of design, development and testing with his passionate team of experts---the Air Mask was born.

The ARIA Air Mask provides a breathable, comfortable & stylish solution that lets you thrive in any situation.

 

 

THE AIR MASK IS READY TO GO


As you can see in our video and photos the prototype is functional, we only need your orders to launch production at the end of the campaign.

We will launch the official certification process during the funding and thanks to your participation.
We'll keep you updated.

 

 

THE ARIA TEAM


We are an Independent Company that Believes in the Goodness of People. 


That’s why we will share with you how we work, we call it transparency.  

Jeremy made a name for himself in product development, working for a number of well-known brands. When he started ARIA, he wanted to create something worthwhile that would also stand the test of time.

His vision was to start making essential everyday products that were ethical, sustainable, and affordable.

With the AIR MASK, Jeremy has brought that vision to life with the help of a hand-picked team of experts and years of development.

Jeremy's search for the finest eco-friendly materials and ethical factories have helped him create a timeless product that should last for decades. The AIR MASK.

At ARIA, we're passionate about continuously improving the Air Mask to make sure it can provide everything our users want and more.

THE PERKS


Get Your Pack Today and Do your Lungs a Favor.
 

The Air Mask is only available on Indiegogo with our biggest discount at up to 52% Off.  Plus, we're offering Free Shipping to all of our Indiegogo backers from the US!

Pledge now to take advantage of exclusive Early Bird pricing and be the first to breathe clean air with style!

THE DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE


One Year and a Half of Hard Work to deliver the Air Mask. 


When we had the idea to create an anti pollution mask at the end of 2018, there wasn't a lot of knowledge around masks and the filtration they provide. With the current situation, and the global demand for masks skyrocketed seemingly overnight, everything has changed and everyone has something to say about them. New brands have come up, new designs and new needs. The good thing is, we are not new to it. The Air Mask Premium Look and Air Filtration has been years in the making and happens to be uniquely suited to life in the new normal.

 

Here is our development timeline, from the idea, to getting the team together, starting the concept process (sourcing, 3D rendering, sampling) and finalizing the Air Mask. 

WARRANTY


We Guarantee the Air Mask Production,
It's Ready to Go. 
 

Warranty

Get a 1-year warranty with all Aria Essentials products.

Return Policy

This campaign is a pre-order for our Air Mask so the funds raised through Indiegogo will be used to manufacture the product for our backers. In accordance with the Indiegogo terms of use, we will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defective. All Aria Essentials products will come with a warranty. Please contact us at contact@aria-essentials if you receive a faulty product.

Global Shipping

Full international shipping available alongside FREE shipping to the US.

Please note that we will not be responsible for any additional duties or taxes that apply to importing to your location.

At the end of the campaign, we'll reach out for your shipping address. Estimated shipping costs are $8 to Australia and $15 internationally. These charges are subject to change.

Rewards will be sent via air from our warehouses in Hong Kong and Europe. Backers should receive the rewards 4 to 20 days from when they were shipped.

FOLLOW US


& Don't Forget to Share this Project Too. 

 

Follow us on social media to stay updated about all things ARIA Essentials. Take part in various competitions and join our thriving community.

Visit our website : www.aria-essentials.com

 


 

THANK YOU


In Advance for Your Help.

The mask can be washed by hand with soap or in the washing machine.




PROTECT YOURSELF AND RESPECT THE PLANET

The Air Mask is made from eco-friendly fabrics---so it has the minimum impact possible on the environment. They're also completely reusable---making their footprint even smaller and preventing waste.
Sourced from the finest materials, the Air Mask is a timeless solution that'll last for years.
Actually, it'll last for decades.
Our fabric is proudly certified by STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX®

STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® is one of the world's best-known labels for textiles tested for harmful substances. It stands for customer confidence and high product safety.


ENJOY A SEAMLESS FIT

The Air Mask is no ordinary mask. It gives you a whole new level of filtration, breathability, design, and fit.
Our fully-ergonomic design makes sure The Air Mask will fit you like a glove. No more uncomfortable headaches or tugging on your ears with The Air Mask.
The Air Mask comes in three sizes and has a simple lace-up system that guarantees a super-comfy and adjustable fit. You’ll be able to select the sizes in our post-campaign survey, together with your shipping address and preferred add-ons!
The outer layer is made from 100% eco-friendly, moisture-wicking bamboo fabric---so you’ll feel like a chilled-out panda whenever you put it on.
Our valves allow you to breathe out easier. They prevent humidity and reduce uncomfortable heat and carbon dioxide buildup inside the mask.

VALVE DEACTIVATOR SEALS


The valve masks adequately protect the wearer. However, when breathing out some particles can escape.

That's why we offer valve deactivator seals as add-on purchases to provide two-way protection.

 

 

CHOOSE FROM 5 COLORS & BREATHE IN ESSENTIAL OILS

5 colors will complement your outfit every day. 
We keep it simple and let the colors do the talking. We've worked tirelessly to ensure that every shade and every glow matches the tone of the design---and looks great!
Our shades are inspired by scenes of nature and the details we found in them.
 

Our colourful filter packs are easily replaceable---making them adaptive to your mood while always keeping you protected. Switch them up with ease---whenever you want.Plus, the filters are gently infused with essential oils so you get that “just entered the spa” feeling whenever you put it on. Choose from the range of essential oils depending on your mood on a given day.

 

 

AT ARIA WE BELIEVE WE CAN
ALL MAKE A DIFFERENCE

Our way:High quality, Ethical products. Real transparency. Full independence.Aria was founded in 2018 by Jeremy Arnoux. He had a clear vision about creating essential everyday products that were both ethical and sustainable as well as affordable. With ARIA, he's helped bring this vision to life.
Inspired by his travels to some of the world's greatest cities, Jeremy first came up with the idea of the Air Mask when he saw the need for a covering that offered a good style and filtering out air pollution.
After a year of design, development and testing with his passionate team of experts---the Air Mask was born.
The ARIA Air Mask provides a breathable, comfortable & stylish solution that lets you thrive in any situation.

 
 
THE AIR MASK IS READY TO GO

As you can see in our video and photos the prototype is functional, we only need your orders to launch production at the end of the campaign.We will launch the official certification process during the funding and thanks to your participation.We'll keep you updated.
 


 

THE ARIA TEAM


We are an Independent Company that Believes in the Goodness of People. 

That’s why we will share with you how we work, we call it transparency.  
Jeremy made a name for himself in product development, working for a number of well-known brands. When he started ARIA, he wanted to create something worthwhile that would also stand the test of time.
His vision was to start making essential everyday products that were ethical, sustainable, and affordable.
With the AIR MASK, Jeremy has brought that vision to life with the help of a hand-picked team of experts and years of development.
Jeremy's search for the finest eco-friendly materials and ethical factories have helped him create a timeless product that should last for decades. The AIR MASK.
At ARIA, we're passionate about continuously improving the Air Mask to make sure it can provide everything our users want and more.


THE PERKS


Get Your Pack Today and Do your Lungs a Favor. 
The Air Mask is only available on Indiegogo with our biggest discount at up to 52% Off.  Plus, we're offering Free Shipping to all of our Indiegogo backers from the US!

Pledge now to take advantage of exclusive Early Bird pricing and be the first to breathe clean air with style!


THE DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE


One Year and a Half of Hard Work to deliver the Air Mask. 

When we had the idea to create an anti pollution mask at the end of 2018, there wasn't a lot of knowledge around masks and the filtration they provide. With the current situation, and the global demand for masks skyrocketed seemingly overnight, everything has changed and everyone has something to say about them. New brands have come up, new designs and new needs. The good thing is, we are not new to it. The Air Mask Premium Look and Air Filtration has been years in the making and happens to be uniquely suited to life in the new normal.
 
Here is our development timeline, from the idea, to getting the team together, starting the concept process (sourcing, 3D rendering, sampling) and finalizing the Air Mask. 


WARRANTY


We Guarantee the Air Mask Production,It's Ready to Go.  


Warranty
Get a 1-year warranty with all Aria Essentials products.

Return Policy
This campaign is a pre-order for our Air Mask so the funds raised through Indiegogo will be used to manufacture the product for our backers. In accordance with the Indiegogo terms of use, we will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defective. All Aria Essentials products will come with a warranty. Please contact us at contact@aria-essentials if you receive a faulty product.

Global Shipping
Full international shipping available alongside FREE shipping to the US.
Please note that we will not be responsible for any additional duties or taxes that apply to importing to your location.
At the end of the campaign, we'll reach out for your shipping address. Estimated shipping costs are $8 to Australia and $15 internationally. These charges are subject to change.
Rewards will be sent via air from our warehouses in Hong Kong and Europe. Backers should receive the rewards 4 to 20 days from when they were shipped.

FOLLOW US


& Don't Forget to Share this Project Too. 

 
Follow us on social media to stay updated about all things ARIA Essentials. Take part in various competitions and join our thriving community.
Visit our website : www.aria-essentials.com
 


 

THANK YOU


In Advance for Your Help.

story:
FreshDry is a floor standing, portable dryer which provides a quick and easy way to dry yourself off after a shower, gym work out or after a swim, helps you dry your body in a safe and convenient way

 

8 REASONS TO GO FOR

____________________________________

 

Can Be Used In...

____________________________________

 

Features

____________________________________

No More Bending Over

____________________________________

FreshDry has a built-in weight sensor, which automatically starts the dryer once you step on it and turns off when you step off after you finish using it. This super convenient dryer is helpful for those with mobility issues and enables them to use it without the need to bend over.

It has two settings which can be switched on by the touch button using your toe for ease, you can also change to soft or strong wind speed (max 23,000 rpm, 36m/s) and temperature of the air flow to either warm or cold, then relax and dry off.

 

Negative Ions

____________________________________

FreshDry not only dries your body, but also takes care of your skin. This standing body dryer releases 1 cm3, 300M of negative ions which allows the skin to lock in moisture, keeping it hydrated and soft. The negative ions act as a strong antioxidant that can reduce skin aging and maintain elasticity. It also purifies and promotes clean air, while boosting energy which is known to alleviate stress and depression.

 

What Our Customers Say

____________________________________

 

 

Rewards

____________________________________

 

Referral Program

____________________________________

To join our referral program, simply follow the steps below and share FreshDry to your family and friends:

1 - Get your unique link & Share the link with your family, friends!

2 - You'll get one point from each of your successful referrals!

 

Size

____________________________________

Timeline

____________________________________

 

Mass Production

____________________________________

The production of FreshDry has already been started!

 

We offer special discounts to customers with disabilities, seniors, the elderly or low income singles and families, please contact us for more info.
