story:
Despite hypertension being identified as a leading risk factor for stroke, heart attack, kidney failure, and even dementia, it can be difficult for those with hypertension to constantly monitor their blood pressure, and carrying a sphygmomanometer is just not practical. Because of this, wearable blood pressure monitoring devices have become a trend.

BP Trace is developed to be a smartwatch-type blood pressure monitor utilizing self-initiated automatic oscillometric technology that allows you to measure your blood pressure anytime, anywhere. With the FDA & CE approved accuracy and statistical analysis on its app, BP Trace can make your health management easier than ever before.

BP Trace is designed to be smart, simple, and efficient for those who need to check their blood pressure frequently. To get a new blood pressure reading, press the activation button and raise and hold your hand over your heart. The cuff will automatically inflate and deflate on its own, and get your result in seconds.

BP Trace does the same job as a traditional device and offers the same results, but “big”, “heavy”, “hard-to-use” are now things of the past. The smart technology of today allows BP Trace to be wearable, convenient, and totally user-friendly.

Size, portability, data storage, monitoring frequency, and ease-of-use make BP Trace superior to any traditional upper-arm oscillometric machine. There’s simply no comparison.

BP Trace employs the commonly recognized oscillometric technology along with new micro air inflation technology that holds multiple international patents. This device measures your blood pressure just as accurately as a regular upper-arm oscillometric device, like those typically used by doctors and other medical professionals.

The auto-inflating mini air-cuff is embedded underneath the strap to read both systolic and diastolic blood pressure, just like the thick cuff of a traditional device that is usually placed on the upper arm.

As one of the pioneering devices in the smart health device industry, BP Trace has been certified for its data accuracy by both the FDA and Medical CE. The inflatable cuff design and oscillatory technology used in BP Trace has multiple international patents as well.

In the following video, we demonstrated how to use BP Trace to check your blood pressure. We also e made a few comparisons with a traditional oscillometric monitor like those used in clinics and hospitals. Below are screenshots of the blood pressure readings from the video.

In the first test, we completed a resting blood pressure reading with both a BP Trace and a traditional device. When we compared the results of the two devices, they were almost identical. The close-ups below show that the two results varied only slightly. (Please note that a deviation of up to 5 mmHg is still considered medically acceptable).

The second test was done to compare the accuracy of a dynamic blood pressure reading. The tester did some light physical activity before measuring his blood pressure a second time. The results showed a small fluctuation in his heart rate and blood pressure but were overall still very accurate.

*International ANSI/AAMI/ISO 81060‐2:2013 guideline for the validation study (Criterion 1: Mean and standard deviation (SD) for the difference of the device minus the observer BP measurements ≤±5 and ≤8 mm Hg, respectively).

In Conclusion - For both active and resting measurements, BP Trace can measure blood pressure and heart rate accurately. However, we truly believe this product has the potential to become even more accurate., We will continue to do rigorous testing and further improve the product, and we guarantee to deliver a completely standardized final product by the final release.

As the rate of hypertension increases dramatically around the world, we noticed that there has been an increase in the number of people who do not realize they have hypertension or maybe in the stage of prehypertension. The following are some signs of and contributors to possible hypertension.

If you are experiencing one of these symptoms or engage in these behaviors, you may need to start managing your health. With BP Trace, you can help prevent hypertension and some illnesses it may cause, such as: 

Hypertension Complications：Diabetes, Hyperlipidemia, High Triglycerides，Hyperuricemia，Metabolicsyndrome，Stroke，Coronary Artery Disease，Heart Failure，COPD，Rheumatism，Psychological Disease

During pregnancy, hypertension can lead to abruptio placentae，kidney failure，liver failure, DIC, and more.

AMBP (Ambulatory Monitoring of Blood Pressure) is the golden standard for diagnosing hypertension and is the only effective method to assess blood pressure 24/7. It requires measurement every 15~30min during the day and every 30~60min during the night. According to the largest hypertension registry “The Spanish Society of Hypertension Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring Registry”, 24-hour AMBP is 30% higher than clinical blood pressure for hypertension management.

AMBP (Ambulatory Monitoring of Blood Pressure) is the golden standard for diagnosing hypertension.

Most so-called health monitors with a low price cannot provide accurate results. On the other hand, carrying a bulky traditional blood pressure device is just not practical. We invented BP Trace to be a wearable device with medical-grade accuracy while utilizing strict AMBP measurements to reflect multiple aspects of your health.

Being diagnosed with hypertension is usually based on multiple blood pressure readings over time, and only severe cases receive immediate drug treatment. To aid in the diagnosis, management, and estimate of risk in patients with hypertension, 24-hour ambulatory blood pressure monitoring is becoming a necessity. However, this type of constant observation is almost impossible outside of a healthcare facility and can be quite intrusive and inconvenient.

BP Trace is the solution to this problem. This 24-hour active monitor is wearable, auto-sampling, and fully persistent. Simply put it on your wrist, and let the self-initiated automatic oscillometric cuff check your blood pressure at regular intervals throughout the day. With BP Trace, you can easily obtain useful information including:

  1. 24-hour average blood pressure
  2. Average daytime blood pressure
  3. Average nighttime blood pressure
  4. Calculated percentage drop in blood pressure at night

Easily check your blood pressure variability throughout the day.

 

Export data from the app to calculate your average blood pressure.

 

The app provides comprehensive data to help you understand your personal health.

The BP Trace app stores multiple types of health-related data. As you continue to use BP Trace over time, each result is saved and analyzed to create trends, ranging from hourly to yearly. Most patients go to the doctor’s office without any descriptive or concrete references for diagnosis. This can not only waste time during a first-time medical examination but also doesn’t provide the doctor with any solid information about your past conditions.

The long-lasting battery life allows BP Trace to run its tracking program throughout the day and provides you with medication reminders and warnings for abnormal readings. By observing weekly trends, this device can help you make progress with your health management and help consolidate all the information necessary for a new diagnosis.

For patients that require long-term care and continual health management, weekly, monthly, or even yearly data may sometimes be required, and BP Trace can easily fill these requirements. BP Trace lets you track your measurements over multiple periods of time using smart charts, trends, and stats. With the BP Trace app you can easily share your measurements and progress with your doctor, friends, and family, or export them anywhere through email. The BP Trace app can export data in both pdf and excel files. With our lifetime free cloud storage, all of your data can be downloaded easily for a deeper analysis.

Choose custom time periods (intervals) and frequencies for blood pressure sampling based on your own preferences or your doctor's advice. Just follow a few simple steps and wait for auto-measurements to begin.

*A notification will appear 1 minute in advance.

To accommodate the need for continuous measurement, we also optimized BP Trace’s battery life. Under standard conditions (default setting), the device can complete up to 20 blood pressure measurements a day and can be used for 3 days, which makes it an ideal portable health monitor.

Blood pressure can change dramatically from morning to night, and while you sleep. It’s important to keep track of these fluctuations, and BP Trace continues to monitor your blood pressure even during the night without disturbing your sleep.

Family happiness is the ultimate goal of our medical technology. We included a feature in the BP Trace app to enable you to share data with family members by linking your accounts. This feature lets you check the wearer’s condition in real-time, no matter how far away you are.

ZTlifenets is a sister company to Kingyield Technology Co., Ltd. While Kingyield focuses on hardware development and manufacturing, ZTlifenets is responsible for branding, systems operation and marketing. We have built a class of noninvasive vital sign monitoring equipment and aim to bring smart wearable health innovations to the world. With years of experience with medical hardware and health management AI software, we have made significant contributions to the smart health management ecosystem and have helped advance the medical device industry. ZTlifenets has received multiple international certifications for its products and is always working on self-development and research to become a one-stop shop for all your health device needs.

story:
Hitch is the first water bottle with a removable barista-approved cup hidden inside. The bottle and cup each full sized (18oz bottle / 12oz cup), double walled, vacuum insulated, stainless steel, leak-proof, and BPA free. With a bottle you'll love, and a cup that's always with you, go zero waste and carry better.

 

When we set out to create Hitch, we talked to lots of people who carry reusable water bottles, and most wouldn't carry a reusable cup because it was either too much too carry everything, or too easy to forget at home.  

Simply making a tiny water bottle and tiny cup wouldn't cut it--people wanted a full size water bottle for all day hydration, a reusable cup large enough for a standard coffee drink with a lid that won't leak, and a way to carry both that was space efficient and easy to hold.  In fact, we wanted it to be so easy, that people could go zero waste.

 

Single-use paper cups and plastic bottles create a lot of waste. With Hitch, we've made the reusable bottle and cup so easy to carry, that you can go zero waste and lighten your load. 

 

We're including A FREE Bottle Protector with every Hitch. It's a flexible weatherproof cap that fits on the top or bottom of your bottle.  Protects the cup lid when it's on top, and when your cup is out, use it as a cap to protect the bottom of your bottle. 

 

 

 

Hitch is compact and easy to carry. It fits naturally in your hand where the bottle tapers in, much like a carafe. And at 9.5" tall, it can easily fit in a tote bag, messenger bag, or a backpack. We also designed the Hitch bottle and cup to fit in most cupholders.  

 

 

Hitch's cup is perfect for life on the go. When you're not using it, your cup is protected from the elements inside the bottle. When you're ready, the cup is the right size for coffee shop drinks (12oz), it's vacuum insulated to keep drinks warm, and has a leak proof and easy to drink from slider lid to keep things neat and clean.

 

If you use a paper cup at the coffee shop daily, it takes on average an entire tree worth of paper to make those cups a year. By using Hitch, you save a trees worth of cups annually. We also plant a tree when you pledge for a Hitch. We do it through our partnership with One Tree Planted, whose reforestation projects plant trees that clean our air and water, create habitats for biodiversity, and create jobs for social impact. 

 

If you use plastic bottles, much of that plastic isn't recycled but shipped to the developing world, where it ends up in rivers and waterways that flow into the ocean. By using Hitch, you prevent plastic bottles from reaching the ocean. We also prevent 100 plastic bottles from reaching the ocean with every you pledge for a Hitch through our partnership with Plastic Bank. They create impact in areas with high levels of plastic pollution, by supporting people to collect ocean bound plastic and turn it into a currency.

 

 

 

 

 

We set out to create the perfect reusable solution to carry your bottle and cup effortlessly. We knew it needed to be a great bottle, that carried its own cup inside, with the ability to carry enough water and coffee for an on-the-go lifestyle. After lots of concepts, prototypes, user testing, and refinement, we created Hitch.  

At Remaker Labs, we want to make life easier and more sustainable for everyone who carries food and drinks on the go.  As we look to the future, we're all about transforming our disposable-first culture into one that values sustainable living. In order to do that, we want to create storage solutions that offer a high level of convenience, yet are sustainable made and help people go zero waste. This idea, which we call 'conscious carry', is at the heart of what we do.

 

 

 

Spread The Word 

 

Press Kit

 

Shipping Details

We are glad to be able to share Hitch with the world, with shipping available to more than 150 countries worldwide. Depending on your country, in some instances you may be responsible for paying duty, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information.

As part of our commitment to climate positivity, all shipping for Hitch is carbon neutral (certified by our partners at Climate Neutral.) Wherever possible, we will be working with postal services (as opposed to express shippers) which use existing routes and are the most environmentally friendly way to get a package to your door.

We are working closely with our manufacturing partner to ensure that every single Hitch meets our exacting standards. In the unlikely event of a manufacturing defect, we will be more than happy to replace the unit. Please note, we cannot offer returns or refunds for any other reasons. In the event that you do have a defect or other concern about your order, please email us at support@carryhitch.com!

 

Partners   

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $300MM through crowdfunding.

Spread the word about Hitch, and earn cash back as a Kickbooster affiliate.

Wholesale

If you are interested in becoming a Hitch retailer, please fill out this form and we'll be in touch soon.
story_txt:
Hitch is the first water bottle with a removable barista-approved cup hidden inside. The bottle and cup each full sized (18oz bottle / 12oz cup), double walled, vacuum insulated, stainless steel, leak-proof, and BPA free. With a bottle you'll love, and a cup that's always with you, go zero waste and carry better.   
   
 
  

 
Hitch's patent-pending design makes it easy to carry your bottle and cup together. Simply turn the crossbar on the bottom, and the cup releases from the bottle.  
 
  When we set out to create Hitch, we talked to lots of people who carry reusable water bottles, and most wouldn't carry a reusable cup because it was either too much too carry everything, or too easy to forget at home.  Simply making a tiny water bottle and tiny cup wouldn't cut it--people wanted a full size water bottle for all day hydration, a reusable cup large enough for a standard coffee drink with a lid that won't leak, and a way to carry both that was space efficient and easy to hold.  In fact, we wanted it to be so easy, that people could go zero waste. 
 Single-use paper cups and plastic bottles create a lot of waste. With Hitch, we've made the reusable bottle and cup so easy to carry, that you can go zero waste and lighten your load.  
 
 We're including A FREE Bottle Protector with every Hitch. It's a flexible weatherproof cap that fits on the top or bottom of your bottle.  Protects the cup lid when it's on top, and when your cup is out, use it as a cap to protect the bottom of your bottle.  
 
 
   *We have updated this feature to make it even easier to use, see our most recent update for details.*
 
 

  
 
 
 
 

   Hitch is compact and easy to carry. It fits naturally in your hand where the bottle tapers in, much like a carafe. And at 9.5" tall, it can easily fit in a tote bag, messenger bag, or a backpack. We also designed the Hitch bottle and cup to fit in most cupholders.     
 
 Hitch's cup is perfect for life on the go. When you're not using it, your cup is protected from the elements inside the bottle. When you're ready, the cup is the right size for coffee shop drinks (12oz), it's vacuum insulated to keep drinks warm, and has a leak proof and easy to drink from slider lid to keep things neat and clean. 
  

  If you use a paper cup at the coffee shop daily, it takes on average an entire tree worth of paper to make those cups a year. By using Hitch, you save a trees worth of cups annually. We also plant a tree when you pledge for a Hitch. We do it through our partnership with One Tree Planted, whose reforestation projects plant trees that clean our air and water, create habitats for biodiversity, and create jobs for social impact.   If you use plastic bottles, much of that plastic isn't recycled but shipped to the developing world, where it ends up in rivers and waterways that flow into the ocean. By using Hitch, you prevent plastic bottles from reaching the ocean. We also prevent 100 plastic bottles from reaching the ocean with every you pledge for a Hitch through our partnership with Plastic Bank. They create impact in areas with high levels of plastic pollution, by supporting people to collect ocean bound plastic and turn it into a currency.   
   

 

  We set out to create the perfect reusable solution to carry your bottle and cup effortlessly. We knew it needed to be a great bottle, that carried its own cup inside, with the ability to carry enough water and coffee for an on-the-go lifestyle. After lots of concepts, prototypes, user testing, and refinement, we created Hitch.   
 
 At Remaker Labs, we want to make life easier and more sustainable for everyone who carries food and drinks on the go.  As we look to the future, we're all about transforming our disposable-first culture into one that values sustainable living. In order to do that, we want to create storage solutions that offer a high level of convenience, yet are sustainable made and help people go zero waste. This idea, which we call 'conscious carry', is at the heart of what we do.   Spread The Word      Press Kit  Shipping DetailsWe are glad to be able to share Hitch with the world, with shipping available to more than 150 countries worldwide. Depending on your country, in some instances you may be responsible for paying duty, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information.As part of our commitment to climate positivity, all shipping for Hitch is carbon neutral (certified by our partners at Climate Neutral.) Wherever possible, we will be working with postal services (as opposed to express shippers) which use existing routes and are the most environmentally friendly way to get a package to your door.We are working closely with our manufacturing partner to ensure that every single Hitch meets our exacting standards. In the unlikely event of a manufacturing defect, we will be more than happy to replace the unit. Please note, we cannot offer returns or refunds for any other reasons. In the event that you do have a defect or other concern about your order, please email us at support@carryhitch.com! Partners    This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $300MM through crowdfunding.   Spread the word about Hitch, and earn cash back as a Kickbooster affiliate.WholesaleIf you are interested in becoming a Hitch retailer, please fill out this form and we'll be in touch soon.

story:
ZoopScoop: The intelligent scooping system

 

THE INSIDE SCOOP 

We heard you, it's here: a simple, multifunctional powder scoop with precise and easy measuring and a speedy rotating paddle dispenser. Have you ever seen a scoop move like that?

We believe that existing scoops are doing it all wrong. They aren’t practical, they’re not reusable, and they’re definitely not functional. Their awkward design makes it tricky to dispense powders into narrow-necked bottles; there’s zero precision, and zero accuracy when it comes to measurements, resulting in unnecessary guesswork and unwanted waste. We’ve had enough of watching our powders (and money) wash down the drain – we felt it was time to level up the scoop.

Forget teeny tiny handles, our scoop has an extendable arm to effortlessly reach the deepest darkest depths of the protein bag without the mess. And what you don’t dispense, you save, with the help of our convenient storage lid.

 

DESIGN FEATURES

 

 

 

A SCOOP FOR THE KITCHEN

We’ve all been there! Ditch the cutlery and pick up your ZoopScoop to accurately measure flour, baking powder, salt and more at the twist of a handle. With lines for both millilitres and tablespoons, it makes baking a piece of cake.

 

 

A SCOOP AT THE GYM

We’re not all built the same, and neither is ZoopScoop. On average, the included scoops use 25% more than the recommended amount of powder. Not only can ZoopScoop help you measure the precise amount for your personal needs, but you’ll also start to notice your supply lasting a little longer too. The sealable lid allows you to simply save any excess as fuel for a post-workout pick-me-up.

 

 

A SCOOP FOR THE ROAD

Our no-mess funnel means you can easily dispense your supplements, coffee or collagen into narrow-necked bottles with a quick twist of the handle. With its multifunctional and minimal design, the ZoopScoop will become your trusty travel companion.

 

 

A SCOOP FOR YOUR BABY

Zoopscoop makes it easy to pre-measure and pack your baby formula when you’re on the move. Whether you’re jetting off on a family holiday or just heading out for the day, reduce stress and mess and let zoop do the rest. And don’t fret, it’s completely airtight and spill-proof — because there’s no point crying over spilt milk ?.

 

ZOOPSCOOP’S MISSION

“Don’t reinvent the wheel”, they said. They never mentioned the scoop.

An estimated 3.1 billion single-use plastic scoops end up in a landfill every single year. To us, that’s unacceptable — and so simple to fix. What’s more, the global protein powder and infant formula markets are set to scale to £32 billion and £103 billion respectively by 2027, meaning a more sustainable scoop is needed now more than ever.

ZoopScoop is a simple solution, and with its precise dispensing mechanism, extendable handle and sealable storage lid, it means no more spills, no more reaching, and no more plastic or excess powder waste. From protein to baby formula, to coffee and collagen, it’s the everyday essential you didn’t know you needed.

We’re looking for like-minded, forward-thinking businesses of any size to get onboard with our commitment to creating a smarter, greener future. So whether you produce protein powder, supplements, baby formula, coffee or flour, we want to hear from you. We can manufacture our scoops to meet your brand requirements from the colours to the logo, simply drop us a message to learn more.

We’ve been incredibly busy at Team Zoop, and have already managed to secure our first-ever partnership:

 

Thank you Protein World ??

We’re just getting started on our mission to develop a small army of even smarter, cleaner and greener products; in this pursuit, we recognise that there’s always room for growth. The ZoopScoop is just the beginning, and by backing us, you’re backing a movement. Our dedication to quality design means we’re committed to continuing to refine our products, for better experiences, and a greener planet.

 

TEAM ZOOP

We’re a proud bunch and a small team. ZoopScoop is the result of two years and (many) hundreds of hours of testing, measuring, designing, and finessing to create a product we’re proud to introduce to you today. We’ve consulted with leading product designers, brands, protein guzzlers, mamas, papas, manufacturers, and so many more.

We're thrilled with what we've created and can't wait to see what’s next on the horizon. We have big plans for expanding our product line, but right now the ZoopScoop is our baby, and we can’t wait to watch it grow.

 

TIMELINE

Thanks for supporting us. You're part of Zoop now, and every scoop makes a difference.

 

Rewards

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Here at ZoopScoop, we understand the inherent risks and challenges when manufacturing any product. Which is why we promise to keep our backers in the loop when it comes to any new developments, supply issues or delays. We believe in full transparency, and will make every effort to meet the dates detailed in our timeline. Fortunately, we’ve been planning this project for many years, and have put the necessary structures in place to ensure that we can deliver the ZoopScoop to our backers, and start production as soon as the campaign finishes. Our manufacturing partner is a well-known kitchen and homeware factory in China who, just like us, believes in sustainability, transparency, speedy service and efficient delivery. Thanks again for supporting our project!

 

ENVIRONMENTAL COMMITMENTS

 

SCRAP SINGLE-USE SCOOPS

One scoop is all you need. Forget single-use plastic that just ends up in landfills — we’re on a mission to make reusable scoops an everyday staple. And we’re on the lookout for more powder companies to partner with, from baby formula to coffee!

100% RECYCLABLE

Robust and reusable, the ZoopScoop is 100% recyclable, so every part can be broken down. Not sure how to recycle yours? Pop it back to us in the post and we'll do it for you!

PLANET-FRIENDLY FACTORIES

Since our launch, our manufacturing partner has strived to be leaders in the sustainable products movement. They’re aware that what they do has a direct impact on our planet, and are making positive steps towards changing the way they work. From researching greener materials to sustainable manufacturing methods, they’re dedicated to being a fully transparent supply chain.

story:
Since the pyramids era, people have dealt with body odor with Alum Crystal, making it the first known deodorant in history.

Through generations of use, we transformed it to powder, for a more convenient, effective and sustainable use.

Many people and cultures across the world have used and are still using this deodorant for its effectiveness, its low cost and longevity.

 

If only there was a deodorant that is Earth friendly, Body friendly and Community driven.

 

 

Hi, my name is Crysteous,

In my hometown they call me Chebb, but you can call me Crysteous, which means like a Crystal.

I was created to help solve the above three problems, and I intend to do that by:

1. Being completely plastic free

2. Made of ONE natural ingredient

3. Focus on empowering communities 

If you're reading this, it means you have a direct impact on whether I succeed in the first hurdle of my journey, the hurdle of being born that is!

 

 

We have created this brand as a link between the conscious western customer and villages in Africa that are already making this deodorant for a living.

Crystals mined and transformed to powder by locals are then sent in bulk to the US where they will be packed by Crysteous in a beautiful glass jar and compostable paper refills, for the least carbon footprint possible.

Crysteous aims to bring these two communities together in an honest and purposeful trade, that would result in providing clean water to communities in need, spreading love and promoting life.

Eco-Friendly: One glass jar lasts one year, after that, refills come in compostable paper. for the lowest impact on the planet.

Unscented: Most other deodorants leave you smelling worse than your natural scent at the end of the day. NOT Crysteous.

Truly effective: A small pinch applied to the center of your armpit keeps you odorless for more than 48h. period. 

Purposeful: Crysteous is not just another product you can buy, it is one on a mission and pursuing a purpose, probably just like you are.  

Leaves no stains: Leaves no stains on your shirt, and leaves no stains on your skin.

Handmade: No added chemicals, no unnecessary waste due to machinery, Crysteous is handmade, with love.

Affordable: Your daily habits shouldn't cost so much! when you buy a jar of Crysteous, you're buying a year's worth of natural deodorant.

 

 

The sole ingredient in Crysteous is Alum Crystal:

Since the times of the pharaohs in ancient Egypt, people have relied on crystal alum for a variety of uses

It was used as a water salvant

It was used as a deodorant

It was used in energy healing (mainly a remedy to evil eye)

 

Its use as a deodorant has been widely known, not only throughout time but also space, its use is present in Indian cultures, ancient Chinese and is still used by African tribes to this day.

 

From generation to generation, we’ve transformed its use from raw stone to refined powder, for a more effective use, and evidently more sustainable one (although I’m not sure that was our ancestors concern at the time)

 

Crysteous is bringing you this powder, sourced in Africa, and packaged in the US for the least impact on the planet, while still connecting two far communities with a shared objective. That of a more sustainable, fair and prosperous planet.

 

Crysteous is unscented and can be used to combat odor wherever bacteria and wetness exist, it can be used on armpits, genitals, or even in smelly shoes (just sprinkle a little powder in your shoes and you'll be good to go).

We sent the first prototypes to some beautiful people in the community who accepted to give us a try,

The feedback was amazing !

You can check out the rest of the reviews on our Instagram profile

 

 

 

Why back Crysteous into existence now?

by being an early adopter, you will not only be one of the people who saw the value in us and put their money where their belief is, but you will also enjoy:

  • Belonging to a community of like minded people, reaching for a common goal.
  • Participating in creating something you deem useful.
  • Up to 70% Off early birds enjoy a 70% discount on retail price.
  • Pay less, for life. (Price-lock on your purchase means that if you back us now, you will never pay the regular price for your deodorant in the future)
  • Exclusive perks for early birds (raw crystals for energy healing, limited edition bottle design, early and exclusive access to future products...)

 

 

This powder is very effective in combating body odor, a small pinch applied to the center of your armpit protects you from bad smells the whole day, for two days even. As long as you apply it right after shower (it doesn’t cover smell, it prevents it)

 

Deodorant, the natural way:

Body odor occurs not because of sweat, but rather because of bacteria that thrives in dark and humid places (ie: armpits, genitals and feet), that's why hand sweat doesn't smell.

Said bacteria (namely Staphylococcus hominis, Staphylococcus epidermidis and Cutibacterium avidum) lunches on the waste present in sweat, causing bad odors in the process.

Crysteous is made of a natural live crystal, upon contact with wetness its particles try to get back to their natural crystal form.

Trying to recrystallize, particles form a layer that separates bacteria from waste present in sweat, starving said bacteria and preventing smells while active.

 

Sweat less, sweat still... naturally:

Sweating is a natural process that aids the body to rid itself of its toxins, once we understand that, we don't want to completely halt the sweating process because that will trap toxins in our bodies, toxins that were supposed to be ridden of.

The second reason we sweat is to cool off, that's why we sweat a lot more in heat than in cold.

As a live salt, Crysteous acts on your pores by shrinking them (most commercial antiperspirants clog them instead) just like your face shrinks when you bite on a lemon.

Making for an antiperspirant just how nature intended, allowing you to sweat, but as minimally as possible.

 

 

Hello, I'm Walid,

5 years ago, I moved from Algeria in north Africa to the USA.

After a year or so, I consumed all my deodorant powder stash so I had to switch to a commercial alternative.

After a while of using, I started noticing problems I didn’t use to have, like my shirts would get stained, sometimes if I have a long day the smell of the deodorant turns bad, making me smell even worse than my natural body odor.

 

That was disturbing, how could something you use to combat odor makes you smell even worse!

I awaited the next opportunity when I travelled home, and got myself a big jar this time, and forgot all about the incident.

 

After a couple of years, when I was driving my cab in NYC, an old man with a white beard gets in, we started chatting, he told me he was an entrepreneur, he said that taking the leap and going into business changed his life and perception (I had no idea what that meant), then he asks, if you could create any kind of business, what would you do?

After a couple seconds I said, I would bring my culture’s deodorant to the USA.

He asked, why won’t you do it?

And I started rambling about how big corporations controlled the market and that there was no way that a person like me could succeed in such a marketplace.

He listened for a while, then we got to his stop.

He got out, and right before closing the door, he said: Do it.

And left.

 

It took me a couple years to move from the person that was too focused on obstacles and excuses, to the person that recognizes and focuses on the opportunity at hand, which is the ability to serve both my community of origin and the community that welcomed me into their own. All while serving a higher good.

 

With this personality change, I had to figure out the "Why" behind Crysteous, over a couple months, its values began to take shape, bit by bit, that lead to Crysteous' mission and vision.

We envision a startup focused on sustainable, natural and affordable toiletry. A startup that serves a higher purpose. A startup that aims to share its fruit with the community that believed in it and gave it utility.

 

 

Crysteous is a mission driven brand, it aims to align daily showering habits with Nature, in its promotion of health, efficiency and fairness towards all.

 

By providing natural hand made products.

By rethinking how we approach packaging.

By giving back to its community and empowering other communities.

We are aware it’s a big mountain to climb, we are also aware that people like us exist and that some divine plan will lead them to us, and that when we’re together, that climb becomes just a hike.

We recognize that being funded is only the first step in our journey, we also know that there will be hard times ahead and probably foggy situations where decision making can fall into a gray area.

That's why we thought it imminent to define the values we want to adopt so they will guide us when the lines get blurred.

If you want to learn how these Values came to be, you can read the story behind each one in our Reddit community: r\Crysteous 

What @jacswellness said about us after putting Crysteous to the test, tells you all you need to know

 

We are very grateful for the beautiful people who gave us a try out of cheere generosity. Thank you.

If there's one thing we'd love to leave you with...

We recognize that you are not our customer, you're more than that,

You are our Backer, Crysteous came into existence because of your trust.

Know that we cherish that and are extremely grateful for the opportunity to serve you.

Sweating is a natural process that aids the body to rid itself of its toxins, once we understand that, we don't want to completely halt the sweating process because that will trap toxins in our bodies, toxins that were supposed to be ridden of.
The second reason we sweat is to cool off, that's why we sweat a lot more in heat than in cold.
As a live salt, Crysteous acts on your pores by shrinking them (most commercial antiperspirants clog them instead) just like your face shrinks when you bite on a lemon.
Making for an antiperspirant just how nature intended, allowing you to sweat, but as minimally as possible.
 
 


Hello, I'm Walid,
5 years ago, I moved from Algeria in north Africa to the USA.
After a year or so, I consumed all my deodorant powder stash so I had to switch to a commercial alternative.
After a while of using, I started noticing problems I didn’t use to have, like my shirts would get stained, sometimes if I have a long day the smell of the deodorant turns bad, making me smell even worse than my natural body odor.
 
That was disturbing, how could something you use to combat odor makes you smell even worse!
I awaited the next opportunity when I travelled home, and got myself a big jar this time, and forgot all about the incident.
 
After a couple of years, when I was driving my cab in NYC, an old man with a white beard gets in, we started chatting, he told me he was an entrepreneur, he said that taking the leap and going into business changed his life and perception (I had no idea what that meant), then he asks, if you could create any kind of business, what would you do?
After a couple seconds I said, I would bring my culture’s deodorant to the USA.
He asked, why won’t you do it?
And I started rambling about how big corporations controlled the market and that there was no way that a person like me could succeed in such a marketplace.
He listened for a while, then we got to his stop.
He got out, and right before closing the door, he said: Do it.
And left.
 
It took me a couple years to move from the person that was too focused on obstacles and excuses, to the person that recognizes and focuses on the opportunity at hand, which is the ability to serve both my community of origin and the community that welcomed me into their own. All while serving a higher good.
 
With this personality change, I had to figure out the "Why" behind Crysteous, over a couple months, its values began to take shape, bit by bit, that lead to Crysteous' mission and vision.
We envision a startup focused on sustainable, natural and affordable toiletry. A startup that serves a higher purpose. A startup that aims to share its fruit with the community that believed in it and gave it utility.
 


 
Crysteous is a mission driven brand, it aims to align daily showering habits with Nature, in its promotion of health, efficiency and fairness towards all.
 
By providing natural hand made products.
By rethinking how we approach packaging.
By giving back to its community and empowering other communities.

We are aware it’s a big mountain to climb, we are also aware that people like us exist and that some divine plan will lead them to us, and that when we’re together, that climb becomes just a hike.


We recognize that being funded is only the first step in our journey, we also know that there will be hard times ahead and probably foggy situations where decision making can fall into a gray area.
That's why we thought it imminent to define the values we want to adopt so they will guide us when the lines get blurred.
If you want to learn how these Values came to be, you can read the story behind each one in our Reddit community: r\Crysteous 

What @jacswellness said about us after putting Crysteous to the test, tells you all you need to know
 
We are very grateful for the beautiful people who gave us a try out of cheere generosity. Thank you.

If there's one thing we'd love to leave you with...
We recognize that you are not our customer, you're more than that,
You are our Backer, Crysteous came into existence because of your trust.
Know that we cherish that and are extremely grateful for the opportunity to serve you.

story:
Traditional filters trap particles,

Genix Lite DECOMPOSES them!

Genix Lite is a portable air sterilizer with lightweight design that combined technology of UVC and photocatalysis, an edge-to-edge sleek design, sustainable eco-friendly composition, ultra-silent mode, and more.

Genix Lite is your next pot of plant, offering you a clean and peaceful environment, wherever you are.   

 

Upgrade to Genix Lite.

Traditional HEPA filters in all of the purifiers trap particles only up to 0.3 microns, when the purifier turns off, harmful substances will be set free back into the air.

Genix Lite traps molecules, disinfects nano-sized items with UVC light, and breaks down organic materials with photocatalysts.

 

Check Out our Facebook Post on 【Difference of UV Radiation】

 

To put it simply, as our device turns on, the fan circulates harmful substances through the air. Its basic principle works by turning photocatalyst into super oxidizing hydroxyl radicals under the energy of UVC light, which in turn breaks down organic compounds into water and carbon dioxide. 

The photocatalyst particle width is smaller than microbes so its effective surface area is exponentially increased due to its indirect principle. The photocatalyst is not depleted in the process as long as it exists on the material surface. Its effects are indefinite with just a trigger of UVC light.

 Check Out our Facebook Post on 【6 Steps of UVC + Photocatalysis】

 

Flexible bracket design 

With over hundreds of fail prototypes, we made a bracket that's useful anywhere around you. 
this bracket can attach to the car's air-conditioner and it also provides a nonslip design for any sleek surface.

 

Reference

  • Genix-Lite Nicotine decomposing validation report
  • SGS Certificate 
  • Nicotine decomposing report
  • Formaldehyde decomposing report
  • Aspergillus brasiliensis decomposing report
  • Staphylococcus aureus decomposing report

 

 

 

Our team pledges to encourage a “Zero-Waste Lifestyle”. Even during tough times, we are still pushing ourselves to design products that are eco-friendly and bring a healthy way of life to everyone. 

Genix Lite is designed to allow its users to avoid changing filters(plastics) for its entire lifespan because it uses UVC and Photocatalysis technology. Additionally, it barely consumes any energy. 

The world is all we have in common, Love Our Earth. Thank you for joining us on this journey toward a “Zero-Waste Lifestyle”.

story:
About Flying Chicken

Flying Chicken is the latest in kegel exercise technology for both men and women who want to strengthen their pelvic floor muscles. This revolutionary gadget helps you regain your confidence and improve your quality of life through muscle stimulating functions.

What Are Flying Chicken's Kegel Exercises？

The group of muscles located at the base of your pelvis are known as pelvic floor muscles. These muscles play quite a big role in sexual performance for both men and women, which is why kegel exercises are so beneficial to those suffering from sexual dysfunction and a number of other pelvic disorders.

 

Kegel Exercises Made Easy

The Flying Chicken is pelvic lifesaver. It uses vibration to relax the pelvic muscles. Just place the Deoum under the pelvis. It is very convenient to use it without taking up space.

 

Suitable For Both Men and Women

The group of muscles located at the base of your pelvis are known as pelvic floor muscles. Massage the pelvic floor muscles by vibration, suitable for both men and women. 

Save Your Time and Effort

It don’t require your eyes or your hands, so you can make Flying Chicken Pro part of your workout routine without taking time away from anything else. You can be improving your sexual health and fitness while you’re watching the game on car (or at work, or on your commute, or eating breakfast at home, or in a hundred other situations).

Use It Anytime

Our Flying Chicken Pro  can be used anytime and anywhere. Whether you are in a busy office, vacationing in the wild, or resting on the sofa at home. Flying Chicken keeps you relax and happy.

  • At home

 

  • In car

 

Remote Control

The remote control of Flying Chicken has 5 gears, you can choose different gears and set the usage time at any time.

How the Flying Chicken Works?  

  • Step 1: Find Your Pelvic Muscle

If you’re unsure, it’s the muscle that contracts urination mid-stream.

  • Step 2: Place the Flying Chicken under Your Pelvic Floor Muscle

Adjust the device and your posture to ensure that the air bag is accurately placed, and start the device via the remote control. Select any function that is most comfortable for you.

  • Step 3: Relieve Exercised Muscles

As with any exercise, the muscles will feel a bit stiff afterwards. But not to worry! Simply choose the massaging mode, and heat the muscles to relieve any discomfort.

Easy To Carry

The Flying Chicken Pro  easy to storage and convenient to carry. You can put it in the car, your desk, briefcase and so on. Use it anytime, anywhere.

Why Are Kegel Exercises Beneficial for Men?

Experience Rigid, Powerful Erections: Recent studies have shown that pelvic floor muscles play a key role in erectile firmness, durability, ejaculation regulation and force, and even sexual pleasure. This means that, by increasing the strength of your pelvic floor muscles, you will inevitably increase these benefits!

Bladder and Stool Control: Benefit from urgency control and avoid those uncomfortable, embarrassing slips.

Better and faster recovery:Studies have shown that Kegel exercises are excellent for restoring erectile function after prostate surgeries.

 

 

Know Your Pelvic Muscles

If you're looking for a little light reading with more details, the studies report following are great.

 

 You can also read about the importance of pelvic floor health at Men's Health, BBC News, Huffington Post, Cosmopolitan, Everyday Health, Ask Men, Daily Mail, Details, New York Times Blog, and Juliewiebpt.

Why are Kegel Exercises Beneficial for Women?

 Bladder and Stool Control: Strengthening your pelvic floor muscles can help the body better constrict the anus, vagina, and bladder, therefore preventing any unwelcome slips.

 Improve Pelvic Suppleness: Like any other muscle, the pelvic floor muscle keeps things tight, preventing uncomfortable sagging or prolapses.

 Improve Orgasms: Kegel exercises also strengthen the pubococcygeal muscle, which is the main muscle that contracts during an orgasm.

Operation

About Flying Chicken and Flying Chicken Pro 

There are two versions of Deoum, Flying Chicken Basic Edition and Flying ChickenPro upgraded edition. The Flying Chicken basic edition is purely physical. When doing Kegel exercises, the ball on the top will shrink and play a supporting role. The Flying Chicken Pro upgraded version is controlled by the remote control the vibration and heating function.

What's in The Box?

3 Colors to Choose

The Growing History of Flying Chicken

About us

Shenzhen Hongzhun IM Technology Co.,Ltd.was established in 2007,As a forward-looking company, Hongzhun IM focus on developing creative products for everyone can easy to use and afford for it.Nothing could replace the health,it is the most precious wealth of man.

 

Flying Chicken is born for health.it’s reported that do Kegel exercises can have a huge impact on your fitness and happiness.we tapped the top engineering,innovative ideas and industrial design talent to create Flying Chicken.As a R&D and production company,we have full confidence in our production process and quality.
