story:
Bunshi Lab makes it worth while.

Based on our philosophy,
the idea of creating a beautiful and high quality face mask for the new era was born.
Bunshi Lab introduces ‘Bunshi Mask',
a mask created from the Japanese spirit of hospitality and craftsmanship.
 

Bunshi Mask maintains a sleek and stylish design with optimal protection.

 


Bunshi Mask is made from environmentally friendly materials and uses the finest cotton knit fabric.

 


A mask developed for comfort and peace of mind.

 

Bunshi Lab believes in using sustainable and organic materials that are friendly to the people and environment.

 

New normal, new standard.
A new era mask that combines a beautiful minimalist design with high performance.

 

 

6 Features of 'Bunshi Mask'

 

Mask performance is required to be higher than ever, which is why ‘Bunshi Mask’ is equipped with the latest nanofiber filters developed in Tokyo.
 

The nanofiber filter invented by Prof Tanioka (emeritus professor) in Tokyo Institute of Technology, catches more than 99% of fine particles (of 100 nanometers) according to the quality test conducted by KAKEN TEST CENTER General Incorporated Foundation.

​


It uses the latest nanofiber filter leveraging “van der Waals’ force” acts. Since Bunshi Mask adopted finer mesh for its filter, “van der Waals’ force” could be stronger and catch fine particles effectively.


The inventor of 'Bunshi Mask' is Emeritus Professor Tanioka of Tokyo Institute of Technology (TIT).
TIT is one of the top Universities in Japan (often referred to as the "MIT of Japan").
Professor Tanioka has made a lot of efforts to research and develop the nanofiber filter for many years and is one of the leading authorites in this field.
He is currently a chairman of the Nanofiber Society (a non-profitable organization) in Japan and internationally recognized.

 

 

'Bunshi Mask’ allows you to breath with ease in comparison to other types of masks.
 


*Pressure loss of Bunshi Mask was tested by KURASHI KAGAKU LABORATORY co.,ltd.

Breath twice as easily compared to non-woven masks.
8x easier to breathe than the N95 mask.

 

With other masks, the stronger filters in place create a strain on your breathing.
However, Bunshi Mask has found the solution to maintain protective power and comfort for breathing.


 

'Bunshi Mask' is washable and reusable.
 

The ability to catch fine particles stays at the same level even after 100 times of laundry.

 


It is wrinkle-resistant and keeps its protective power even after *repeated laundry.
A great solution for sustainability (made from cotton and recycled PET nanofibers)​

*Thin nanofiber was used for the quality test in order to recognize tiny changes in the numbers.

 

 

'Bunshi Mask' is made by mercerized high-quality cotton (NOT XINJIANG COTTON​).
​

Organic, fine-knit cotton fabric (NOT XINJIANG COTTON​)​ creates a comfortable fit.
Designed to prevent moisture retention and be gentle on sensitive skin (including children).

 

 

The well thought-out design was created to flatter all face types.
 

The inner lining cotton is colored beige, to prevent makeup stains from standing out.

 

 

‘Bunshi Mask’ offers various colors to choose from.
 


5 colors (white, gray, beige, pink, black)

Four sizes (XL, L, M, S/kids) to fit you best

 

How to choose your best size


*Reference if you do not have a measuring tape available:
Measure with 2 credit cards (sideways) aligned vertically, approximately 11 cm (4.3 inches). If your measurements are larger than the 2 credit cards (sideways), the best fit will be L, and M if the measurements are about the same.

 

 

More about Materials

The main body of Bunshi Mask is 100% organic cotton. Nanofiber filter (inside) is made from PET resin, recycled from plastic bottles and adjusters are made from polycarbonate resin (plastic). Knit fabric is used for the ear bands. There is no space between the ear band and piping line so that you can have an optimal fit and get rid of ear pain.

 

 

Who Are We?

We are "Bunshi Lab"

Our mission is to deliver high-quality items to everyone,
from people with sensitive skin conditions to those who value functionality and design.

 

 

Already Popular in Japan

Bunshi Mask has already been used by many people in Japan.

Bunshi Lab launched the first crowd-funding campaign for Bunshi Mask in Japan last year. The campaign was successfully supported by more than 17,000 people and raised approximately 1.6 million USD (1USD = 110 JPY). Bunshi Mask quickly became “the biggest selling face mask among crowd-funding campaigns in Japan”.

More than 200,000 Bunshi Masks had been sold within just 4 months after the launch in the Japanese open market, with sales records getting a great deal of press.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

  • The laundry test (100 times) was conducted with water quality and a washing machine in Japan. Please be informed that it may not be as durable as the test result when testing under different conditions.

  • The designs, colors and specifications are subject to change (products under development only). 

  • We offer rewards shipped to: Australia, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Singapore, United Kingdom, United States

  • The shipping schedule may be delayed depending on the order status and/or the supply status of the materials and manufacturing process.

  • Colors of Bunshi Mask may appear differently from the site depending on the device you are viewing.

  • COVID-19 has impacted shipping times, so please keep in mind the delivery of your reward could be delayed up to a maximum of 1-2 months (or cancelled & refunded given the situation).

  • Any import taxes and fees will be paid by the backers.

The designs, colors and specifications are subject to change (products under development only). 
We offer rewards shipped to: Australia, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Singapore, United Kingdom, United States
The shipping schedule may be delayed depending on the order status and/or the supply status of the materials and manufacturing process.

COVID-19 has impacted shipping times, so please keep in mind the delivery of your reward could be delayed up to a maximum of 1-2 months (or cancelled & refunded given the situation).

story:
maskirei

Maskirei is a compact face mask container that fits in your bag. In addition, it takes only five minutes to clean and sterilize your facemask. 

 

 

 After sterilizing, you can take it out quickly and easily,  and put the newly cleaned facemask on again.

 

Maskirei keeps your facemasks in and clean

If you carry the maskirei with you, you can easily sterilize your facemask on the go or at work, so you can avoid throwing them away frequently.

 

Features of maskirei

1. Compact: it is easy to put it in your bag

2. Anywhere and anytime: Built-in battery can help you sterilize and dry your facemasks

3. Handy Sterilizer: it can be used as a sterilizer too

4. Four UV-C LEDs: maskirei can sterilize in only five minutes.

5. Washable parts: the acrylic part can be washed. You can always use the clean maskirei

6. Powebank: it can be used as an emergency power bank

 

1. Compact: it is easy to put it in your bag

The thickness is as thin as 3.3 cm, and it is a compact design that fits easily in the bag. Disposable paper face masks or cloth face masks can be put in easily and sterilized.

 

 ※ The inner dimensions:  90x121x27mm

It is possible to quickly sterilize bacteria whenever necessary in only a short time. It is not bulky or heavy and it fits in your pocket in your bag.

 

2. Anywhere and anytime: Built-in battery can help you sterilize and dry your facemasks

It used to be necessary to use sterilizers by plugging them into an outlet.

The maskirei is equipped with 2000mAh battery, so it does not need to be set up near outlets. You can start sterilizing and drying your facemasks anytime and anywhere. You are no longer need to feel tied to an outlet.

 

 

When the temperature rises, the facemask inevitably becomes damp, and many people may feel discomfort when putting on the same facemask again after they take it off.

The maskirei, by sterilizing and drying your facemasks, will enable you to use them again,  cleanly and comfortably, even after you have used them.

 

3. Handy Sterilizer: it can be used as a sterilizer too

The maskirei can be used on both cloth and disposable facemasks. Furthermore, it can sterilize many other types of stuff by irradiating UV-C LED. You can use it as a handy sanitizer on the go! 

 

 

4. Four UV-C LEDs: maskirei can sterilize in only five minutes.

The powerful sterilizing effect of ultraviolet rays is being recognized around the world. The maskirei uses UV-C ( deep UV ) LEDs that have an excellent sterilizing effect.

UV-C has the strongest sterilizing effect of the ultraviolet rays, but many other sterilizing products have only one UV-C LED and so it therefore takes more time to sterilize.

It may be inconvenient in many cases because you cannot fully sterilize your facemasks, perhaps because of time constraints in your busy schedule. Furthermore, since there is only one LED , the sterilization rate will below.

Since the maskirei is equipped with four UV-C LEDs, it takes only five minutes to sterilize facemasks.

 

5. Washable parts: the acrylic part can be washed so you can always use the clean maskirei

Many sterilizers cannot be washed with water and are recommended to wipe to clean.

However, we think some people may feel unsafe to just wipe it off and they want to wash the sterilization box itself.

The maskirei is designed to be able to wash the part that attaches the facemasks with water. You can keep not only your facemasks clean, but also your sterilizer box clean.

 *Resin is used for this prototype, but the actual product is acrylic. 

 

6. Powerbank: it can be used as an emergency power bank

maskirei is equipped with a 2000mAh battery so you can also use it as a power bank! Even though the size is small, it can be used in two ways. 

 

maskirei features

maskirei can dry and sterilize facemasks with one button. When the sterilization is completed, the operation will automatically stop. You can stop or switch modes during operation.

 

Drying/sterilization mode ( 10 minutes)

Both sterilization and drying are performed at the same time.

Drying mode ( 10 minutes)

Only fan drying.

Sterilization mode ( 5 minutes)

Only sterilizing.

 

How to use

 

Design

By using white as the basic tone and using silver as an accent, we tried to make it look clean. This look is easy to match with other items in your bag.

In addition, it is designed with curved edges, so that it can be smoothly taken in and out when it is put in a bag.

The interior is made of acrylic and was developed with a focus on hygiene so that it can be removed and washed.

 

Name Behind The Product: Why Is It Called “Maskirei”?

Maskirei is actually a combination of two words, “mask” and “kirei” in Japanese.

Mask means facemask in Japanese and we usually say “mask” when we talk about them.

Kirei is 綺麗 when we write in Japanese. It means clean, neat, or beautiful. It is used in many situations. It can be used by people or places, too.

We combined the two words into one to become “maskirei.” We hope this word will become catchy with our customers.

 

Accessories

  • maskirei
  • charging cable
  • stand
  • instruction manual

 

Specifications

 

Introduction of PDQC18W

We will include the PDQC18W charger to the Charger set.

 

 

 

Project Schedule

 

FAQ

Q: Can it be used by children?

A: Even children can use it easily. However, please do not look directly at the LED part.

Q: What size of the face mask can be used?

A: If your face mask fits in the case, it can be used in your case. If it is not, you can sterilize your face masks by irradiating UV-C LED.

 

CIO Co., Ltd.

We launched CIO Co., Ltd. in 2017 and operate mainly EC malls such as Rakuten Ichiba and Yahoo Shopping. Under the concept of " delivering the latest exciting gadgets ♪ ", we are not just importing maker products, we are focusing on developing new products as our own products for Japanese customers.

We will continue to make every effort to deliver products with high quality and high-cost performance that can only be produced locally in Japan, to our customers.

At Crowdfunding, we would like you to experience the concept of our shop with actual products.

We have many opportunities to launch various projects at Makuake, and many people have sympathized and supported us. Through such projects, I'm really happy that everyone can experience a really useful gadget.

We would like to ask for your continued support and cooperation.

story:
YOU CAN ENJOY RIDING

 

 

FREE FROM PAIN

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1. Hip pain caused by compression of the sciatic nodule  

The sciatic nodule is the protruding part of the area where the hip and saddle meet. This is the area where you feel a lot of pain when riding a bicycle. If you continue riding the bike, the pain from the saddle may be relieved.

It's not usually a big problem, but some people feel saddle pain a lot.


 

 

 2. Pain caused by compression of the pudendal nerve 

 

Often known as “Prostate Pain”. However, the prostate is located in front of the bladder and is not pressed directly. The pudendal nerve, which is not normally subject to pressure, is pressed against the saddle, supporting the weight of the body. When riding, about 3cm of the perineum is pressed by the saddle.

 



 

If left unattended while riding for a long time, it may cause chronic pain such as impotence, inability, and urination disorders, which may lead to hospitalization.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pain area: The area that is pressed and feels pain when riding

 

HUAN PPS saddle is designed to wrap around the pelvis to maintain the correct posture throughout the ride and prevents the sciatic nodule (the area where the bone protrudes from the hip which is often called as “Sit Bones”) and the pudendal nerves from being compressed.

 

 

Design considering sciatic nodule as well as pudendal(genital) nerve 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Urethane material high-density foam is used to support the perineum and pelvis with a small area.

 

 

 Urethane, which changes according to the weight placed on the saddle, enables comfortable riding.

 

 

The slope of the cushion is designed to be more flatten and wide so that there is no part that feels pressed due to the sudden change in height during riding, and the cushion covers the hip so that it is comfortable for long riding.

 

 

 

 

Developed a thinner 6mm rail was developed after long efforts with HUAN PPS and partners

 

 

 

 

 

Plate material Nylon 66 resistant to impact due to elasticity

 

 

 

 

 

The U-shaped groove across the saddle center was designed prevents excessive friction and an impaired blood flow

 

 

 

 

The ergonomic design that grabs around The hip bone, maintains a good body shape and a stable posture

 

 

 

 

Silicone rubber that can bridge the gap

 

There is a gap between the seat post and the rail?

 

 

Do not worry!

 

We prepared a separate silicone rubber that can bridge the gap.

PPS available for almost bikes.

 

 

 

OUTDOOR

 

 

 

 

 

INDOOR

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Color: Gold, Red, Black, Blue

Made: Made in Korea

Specification : 7.1 x 10.3 x 4.1 inch (width x length x height)

                              180.5 x 263.5 x 105mm

Weight: 0.76lb (346grams)

Cushion(Material) : Polyurethane

Plate(Material) : Nylon 66

Rail(Material): Hard Drawn Steel Wires KS D 3510 (ISO8458-1/2)

Manufacturer: HUAN Inc. 24399, 878-3 Sunhwan-daero Donggnae-myeon, Chuncheon-si, South Korea

US Sales Company: HUAN USA Inc.

Customer Service: huan71@naver.com

 

 

 

To prevent damage, ships in specially tailored boxes.

 

 

We are working hard to produce, looking forward to the day you will be happy.

 

 

 

I biked 577 km from Chuncheon to Busan. I ran 7 hours/day at 20 km/hour for 5 days and 4 nights with my friend.

On the second day, at around 6 pm, I took a picture from the top of Lee Hwa Ryeong. On the way down after taking a picture, I fell into a gap in the road. Fortunately, my bones were not broken, so I continued riding my bicycle down to the village, and after receiving treatment at the emergency room of a general hospital 40 km away, I headed to the hotel.

Should I go to Busan? I was frustrated and couldn't sleep. Fortunately, I thought I could go to Busan because there was no difficulty in getting up and running the next day.

If I had pain in my hip, I would have given up going to Busan on the pretext of being injured.

Fortunately, there was no pain in the hip, so I rode a bicycle to Busan.

After finishing my bike ride to Busan, I was very happy. Not only the joy of completing the race even after getting hurt, the development of a pain-free saddle and the idea that many people can enjoy cycling without pain in the future made me even more delighted.

 

 

 

 I won't stop. 

With your enthusiasm and donations, we will be able to apply not only new saddle products in 2022 but also another product that can improve the sitting experience.

Further researches and developments, I can contribute to a society that reduces air pollution and improves people's health.

I and HUAN will do our best to make it. We look forward to your continued support. Thank you.

 

 

 

 

 My passion for the saddle has been around for a long time. Saddle pain was considered a pain to overcome, so I sat down on the saddle every few days and tried to get used to it. However, after learning that saddle pain is not only temporary pain, it can cause a variety of complications,

I started my research.

 

 I was trained in the IP Creation Zone of the Intellectual Property Center, and acquired knowledge little by little by going to various exhibitions and training centers. Although technically inadequate, as I worked hard for a saddle without pain, thankfully, there were people who supported me and improved the product little by little with experts in this field. There are hobbyists who can tell us the reviews, so we were able to improve each step.

 

 

 We are a small start-up company of riding-loving hobbyists, but we are very proud of our passion and technology.

It is our dream to enable riders to enjoy riding without any more painful experiences.

 

2020 Gangwon Science and Technology Festival IP Simulation Investment Audition Grand Prize Hosted by Gangwon Do, Republic of Korea

 

 

2020 Trademark Design Exhibition Gold Prize Hosted by Minister of Commerce, Industry and Energy Republic of Korea

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have tested our technology through several steps, but we know we are not perfect. We are committed to understanding the needs of our sponsors and actively communicating with them to provide the best possible product. However, the process including manufacturing and testing can be unexpectedly delayed due to the Covid-19 pandemic. We ask for your patience and understanding as our team works to overcome the problem.

story:
INTRODUCTION

Get ready to upgrade your In-home pedicure treatment! 

Before PediCurve Solar, most in-home pedicure devices were based on roller technology.

These old school pedicure devices were cheaply made sandpaper rolls, or some other form of rough composite material.

Sandpaper rollers are unhealthy and wasteful. They rip and scrape your skin, causing friction and heat which will damage your feet. Even worse, they wear out quickly and need to be thrown away. You’ll then need to replace and continue spending money. It’s terrible for your skin, and for the environment.

As for composite rollers, this technology is a bit better, but also induces friction/heat and are wearing down fast, making them in-efficient and very expensive in the long run both with replacing batteries and buying new rollers.

We decided to innovate and solve this problem once and for all!

PediCurve Solar is the best in-home pedicure device on the planet.

  • Gentle on your skin
  • Use it in the shower on softer skin
  • Solar powered, no need for batteries
  • Hygienic and efficient with patented PediGlass discs
  • Reduces waste and lower cost of ownership compared to disposables
  • No batteries, no cables, no chargers, no adapters
  • Loved by men and women alike!

What makes this possible?

We use a patented PediGlass Disc, along with solar power. When using this product in the shower (or bath), your skin becomes softer and it’s much easier to remove hard, calloused skin. PediCurve Solar is gentle, hygienic and efficient. 

Our PediGlass Discs are chemically etched with craters on the glass which easily removes softened skin and leaves your feet feeling soft and smooth. No abrasion, no pain or discomfort like the old school disposable products you’ve used in the past.

**UPDATE** - We’re getting PediCurve Solar certified as a medical device!

Our application will be based on preliminary data obtained with our previous pedicure device. Although we obtained this data some time ago, unfortunately this data wasn’t validated and so we’ll need to start with new benchmark data. Our original data was very promising, especially towards diabetics. We’re excited to continue this process, albeit it is long and costly, while these clinical tests will objectively show just how good and innovative PediCurve Solar really is:-) 

Please remember, currently PediCurve Solar is NOT certified as a Medical Device but we’re working very hard to achieve this certification.

THE SOLUTION TO YOUR HARD SKIN ON YOUR FEET:

As stated in the Introduction, PediCurve Solar must be used on wet skin preferable in the shower but can also be in connection with a footbath:-) 

The huge advantage of PediCurve Solar being 100% waterproofed, is that you save time on your pedicure, while nurturing your feet during showering, hereby saving time and avoid dirt and dry skin together with keeping the whole foot treatment healthy and hygienic due to the inert nature of the PediGlass disc's and the running water.

 Our patented PediGlass Discs are made in the Czech Republic from Bohemian Glass. They're easy to use and healthy for your skin. No rollers or harsh scrubbing devices needed!

Use the rough PediGlass Disc to remove hard skin and calluses from your feet without uncomfortable scrubbing or added heat and friction. Follow with the smooth PediGlass Disc to leave your skin feeling and looking fresh and radiant.

 

PediCurve Solar features solar-powered charging, which means no batteries, cords, wires or adapters.

It can be recharged anywhere, any time, via sunlight or even electric light, so you can take it with you wherever you go.

Our beautifully crafted Danish design is sleek, easy to use, and comfortable to work with.

PediCurve Solar is long-lasting, sustainable and durable, too. The PediGlass Discs are designed to last for years, so you won’t need to replace parts after just a few uses.

If something does happen to your PediCurve Solar, we are offering a one-year warranty for the wearing down of or breakage of the PediGlass Discs.

PediCurve Solar easily travels with you wherever, whenever! Because it’s cordless and doesn’t require extra add-ons, PediCurve Solar easily fits in your bag or its accompanying travel bag. Plus, the travel bag is made of recycled plastic assembled from the Ocean!

This is our overview of The PediCurve Solar compared to the other pedicure devices on the marked and to be honest, there's not a lot of overlap, unfortunate enough, since the quality of electrical pedicure devices has been very very limited up until now;-)

 

It is extremely important after a PediCurve Solar treatment to apply our high-end Intensive Foot Therapy Crème (or any other good foot cream..), in order for the skin not to dry. After using PediCurve Solar in the shower, use our Intensive Foot Therapy Crème to moisturize your fresh feet. Using a combination of stimulating wintergreen and eucalyptus oils, our foot cream helps keep your feet fresh, moisturized and healthy.

With sustainability as part of our core mission, we’ve partnered with Design by Us, a fellow Danish company, to create limited edition travel bags for your PediCurve Solar. These travel bags are a limited edition design that will only be available during this campaign!

Plus, we’re going a step further by making our travel bags from recycled plastic in honor of our mission to help create a more sustainable future. That's right, our eco-friendly, limited edition travel bags are made from recycled ocean plastic!

 

Design by Us crafts unique objects within lighting, furniture and accessories for everyday use. We are passionate about making an impact on the perception of design by pushing our aesthetics away from the usual and mundane, and tread the deeper waters where success is harder to achieve, however greater the prize. Our studio is an experimental and creative playground where we challenge the concept of design by adding passion, identity and handcrafted detailing in our objects. In short, we are a multidisciplinary design studio that stands out.

We are involved in the sustainable Green movement, reusing materials and trying to save the environment for lots of plastic and waste through designing sustainable and lasting products, people can enjoy for years to come.

"When The Curve approached us with the PediCurve Solar project, we found it inspiring and innovative. Using plastic from the ocean in designing and manufacturing the Travel Bag is a statement to the Green profile of PediCurve Solar."

THE SPECIFICATIONS OF PEDICURVE SOLAR

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My background is in biotech and science - Having a Master's in Biochemistry and a Ph.D in Molecular Virology. I was involved in HIV research for 10 years. With a basis in data and analyses, life is simply to short for low quality products - We need to be more environmental cautious and sustainable... That is The Curve's mission within pedicure.
 

I apologise for the video, which is not my proudest moment. But I underestimated the nature of being video filmed, which seriously caught me by surprise:-) In my many years as a scientist I've held many lectures and presentations But this was my first video session, which I clearly underestimated...

 

The Curve ApS joined the pedicure market in 2015. Astonished by the lack of quality in products on the market for electrical pedicure devices, the founder had the idea for PediCurve.

The ability to treat our feet is a necessity, but there needed to be a better way to get soft, smooth results. The idea for PediCurve came from a pedicure file, which is a great treatment for feet.  We've successfully sold over 70K units of our original PediCurve device. Now, we're excited to launch the newest, eco-friendly version of our best-selling product, PediCurve Solar.

PediCurve Solar was inspired by green thinking and sustainability. Our goal is to move away from the “use and throw away” culture, by creating high-quality, sustainable products.

 

 
 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make PediCurve Solar a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase PediCurve Solar, if you’re a supporter of PediCurve Solar, you can help us spread the word on Facebook!

Return policy. Indiegogo is platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. In accordance with Indiegogo's Terms of Use will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defective. However, in the event that you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact us at info@thecurve.dk

Global Shipping. We are offering shipping worldwide at a flat rate of 8,- EURO€, except for US/CA (Free Shipping). Please note that the price of the item does not include additional duty and taxes (and VAT) that may apply as per local laws of importation. These fees will be calculated and paid for in Backerkit towards the end of the campaign. We will also do our best to avoid custom fees where possible.
story_txt:
INTRODUCTION
Get ready to upgrade your In-home pedicure treatment! 
Before PediCurve Solar, most in-home pedicure devices were based on roller technology.
These old school pedicure devices were cheaply made sandpaper rolls, or some other form of rough composite material.
Sandpaper rollers are unhealthy and wasteful. They rip and scrape your skin, causing friction and heat which will damage your feet. Even worse, they wear out quickly and need to be thrown away. You’ll then need to replace and continue spending money. It’s terrible for your skin, and for the environment.
As for composite rollers, this technology is a bit better, but also induces friction/heat and are wearing down fast, making them in-efficient and very expensive in the long run both with replacing batteries and buying new rollers.
We decided to innovate and solve this problem once and for all!
PediCurve Solar is the best in-home pedicure device on the planet.

Gentle on your skin
Use it in the shower on softer skin
Solar powered, no need for batteries
Hygienic and efficient with patented PediGlass discs
Reduces waste and lower cost of ownership compared to disposables
No batteries, no cables, no chargers, no adapters
Loved by men and women alike!

What makes this possible?
We use a patented PediGlass Disc, along with solar power. When using this product in the shower (or bath), your skin becomes softer and it’s much easier to remove hard, calloused skin. PediCurve Solar is gentle, hygienic and efficient. 
Our PediGlass Discs are chemically etched with craters on the glass which easily removes softened skin and leaves your feet feeling soft and smooth. No abrasion, no pain or discomfort like the old school disposable products you’ve used in the past.
**UPDATE** - We’re getting PediCurve Solar certified as a medical device!
Our application will be based on preliminary data obtained with our previous pedicure device. Although we obtained this data some time ago, unfortunately this data wasn’t validated and so we’ll need to start with new benchmark data. Our original data was very promising, especially towards diabetics. We’re excited to continue this process, albeit it is long and costly, while these clinical tests will objectively show just how good and innovative PediCurve Solar really is:-) 
Please remember, currently PediCurve Solar is NOT certified as a Medical Device but we’re working very hard to achieve this certification.

THE SOLUTION TO YOUR HARD SKIN ON YOUR FEET:



As stated in the Introduction, PediCurve Solar must be used on wet skin preferable in the shower but can also be in connection with a footbath:-) 
The huge advantage of PediCurve Solar being 100% waterproofed, is that you save time on your pedicure, while nurturing your feet during showering, hereby saving time and avoid dirt and dry skin together with keeping the whole foot treatment healthy and hygienic due to the inert nature of the PediGlass disc's and the running water.

 Our patented PediGlass Discs are made in the Czech Republic from Bohemian Glass. They're easy to use and healthy for your skin. No rollers or harsh scrubbing devices needed!
Use the rough PediGlass Disc to remove hard skin and calluses from your feet without uncomfortable scrubbing or added heat and friction. Follow with the smooth PediGlass Disc to leave your skin feeling and looking fresh and radiant.


 

PediCurve Solar features solar-powered charging, which means no batteries, cords, wires or adapters.
It can be recharged anywhere, any time, via sunlight or even electric light, so you can take it with you wherever you go.

Our beautifully crafted Danish design is sleek, easy to use, and comfortable to work with.
PediCurve Solar is long-lasting, sustainable and durable, too. The PediGlass Discs are designed to last for years, so you won’t need to replace parts after just a few uses.
If something does happen to your PediCurve Solar, we are offering a one-year warranty for the wearing down of or breakage of the PediGlass Discs.

PediCurve Solar easily travels with you wherever, whenever! Because it’s cordless and doesn’t require extra add-ons, PediCurve Solar easily fits in your bag or its accompanying travel bag. Plus, the travel bag is made of recycled plastic assembled from the Ocean!

This is our overview of The PediCurve Solar compared to the other pedicure devices on the marked and to be honest, there's not a lot of overlap, unfortunate enough, since the quality of electrical pedicure devices has been very very limited up until now;-)
 

It is extremely important after a PediCurve Solar treatment to apply our high-end Intensive Foot Therapy Crème (or any other good foot cream..), in order for the skin not to dry. After using PediCurve Solar in the shower, use our Intensive Foot Therapy Crème to moisturize your fresh feet. Using a combination of stimulating wintergreen and eucalyptus oils, our foot cream helps keep your feet fresh, moisturized and healthy.

With sustainability as part of our core mission, we’ve partnered with Design by Us, a fellow Danish company, to create limited edition travel bags for your PediCurve Solar. These travel bags are a limited edition design that will only be available during this campaign!
Plus, we’re going a step further by making our travel bags from recycled plastic in honor of our mission to help create a more sustainable future. That's right, our eco-friendly, limited edition travel bags are made from recycled ocean plastic!
 

Design by Us crafts unique objects within lighting, furniture and accessories for everyday use. We are passionate about making an impact on the perception of design by pushing our aesthetics away from the usual and mundane, and tread the deeper waters where success is harder to achieve, however greater the prize. Our studio is an experimental and creative playground where we challenge the concept of design by adding passion, identity and handcrafted detailing in our objects. In short, we are a multidisciplinary design studio that stands out.
We are involved in the sustainable Green movement, reusing materials and trying to save the environment for lots of plastic and waste through designing sustainable and lasting products, people can enjoy for years to come.
"When The Curve approached us with the PediCurve Solar project, we found it inspiring and innovative. Using plastic from the ocean in designing and manufacturing the Travel Bag is a statement to the Green profile of PediCurve Solar."


THE SPECIFICATIONS OF PEDICURVE SOLAR

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

story:
Trace-Temp1 on the News

The Straits times

The incredibly smart, accurate and compact infrared thermometer is featured on The Straits Times, the top news publication in Singapore. "... an advanced infrared thermometer that allows people to monitor their temperature on the go."

 

CNA938

Click here to watch the feature on CNA 938.

Incredibly Convenient Temperature Taking

Take your temperature without lifting a finger. Use this accessory (named T-Manipulator) to clip Trace-Temp1 onto your computer, stand, car dashboard, or visor etc. so that your temperature will be continuously taken throughout the day as you do your work. Welcome to a novel experience of handsfree temperature monitoring.

The Trace-TempAI app needs at least 6 temperature points a day for 1 week (total of 42 points) in order to determine your baseline temperature. You may be reluctant, and think “It’s just too cumbersome. If only there was a way to do it without me being bothered to remember to do it,  and yet still be provided  with useful health insights.” The T-Manipulator is here to ease your burden.

  • Use this clip-on accessory T-Manipulator to secure Trace-Temp1 onto a place of your choice
  • Freely rotate or angle the head so that the device faces you
  • Activate continuous monitoring mode in Trace-Temp1
  • Your temperature will be taken whenever you are in front of the mounted Trace-Temp1.

T-Manipulator is the unobtrusive, simple and efficient solution to daily temperature monitoring.

Improve your physical wellbeing and epitomise the interaction of humans and technology in a positive way with Trace-Temp1 and T-Manipulator.

Trace-Temp1: Industry Leading Temperature Accuracy

 

Incredibly Smart and Accurate

Leading edge design concept expanding thermal measurement capabilities. Highly accurate, highly precise. A.I. powered device offering greater temperature insights.

 

Incredibly Portable

Small enough to fit into your purse. Portability for your everyday use.

Smart IR Thermometer + A.I. Powered App

    Trace-Temp1 is the first temperature monitoring device with Integrated Infrared Technology and Artificial Intelligence. Together with the Trace-TempAI app, they offer a complete set of tools that measures and monitors body temperature. Temperature measurements will now be more accurate, repeatable and insightful.

     

    Smart Temperature Monitoring Has Never Looked So Good

     

    Features of Trace-Temp1

     

    Ergonomical


    Slim body with sleek curves. One’s fingers and thumb can grip the device more naturally when holding the device, thus providing a firm yet comfortable grip and effective control over the device during each temperature measurement.

     

    Single Grip

    The Single Grip design only has a single bump to provide extra support between the forefinger and middle finger. The remaining body is smooth to offer the user flexibility in how he/she wants to hold the device. Recommended for people who like freedom and flexibility.

    Secure Grip

    Secure Grip earned its name thanks to the four bumps under the device. This functional aesthetics clearly indicate how the fingers should be placed on each dip. Suitable for people with longer/slimmer fingers.

    Posi Grip

    This Posi Grip power grip design boasts of a heavier bottom accompanied by a wavy design. The triangular base fits perfectly into the space formed between the fingers and palm when gripping an item. Best for people who tend to drop things, suitable for bigger hands.

     

    Infrared Technology

    Trace-Temp1 uses infrared technology to take body temperature without any skin contact. This is more hygienic, economical (no need to buy ear probe covers!) and comfortable.

    It's perfectly safe to use an IR thermometer. Find out more:

     

     

    Multiple Users

    Add your network into the Trace-TempAI app and create different groups for easy tracking. The app can provide appropriate data summaries in group or individual view. Suitable for families, offices, classrooms, hospitals etc.


    Sync to Trace-TempAI

    Trace-Temp1 has Bluetooth 5.2M LE so that it can be connected to the Trace-TempAI app on smartphones, tablets and computers. Enjoy a seamless experience when viewing the latest temperature measurement on your Trace-TempAI app. The Trace-TempAI app is compatible with smartphones, tablets and computers. It can be run on Android and iOS.

    Xenacious

    Trace-TempAI shows the new transformation in looking at body temperature. It helps us understand and embrace how important it is to identify fever trends. Also, with all your temperature data synced into the Trace-TempAI app, you can access the records anywhere you are (with Internet connection). At your next medical appointment, simply show your charts on the Trace-TempAI app. No need to lug around papers and notebooks.

    5 Things To Love About Trace-TempAI App

    • It’s powerful: Algorithms powered by artificial intelligence

    The in-built artificial intelligence software is able to handle the huge amount of temperature data stored in the app, analyse it, and provide you with deep insights into your health. It can spot trends, compare to clinical fever patterns and warn you about possible fever.

    • It’s understandable: Understand complex data at a glance

    Looking at individual temperature readings can be confusing. Thus the Trace-TempAI app offers visual representation of temperature trends in different chart formats. You can also filter and sort your data easily to find exactly what you want. Tap to compare your temperature trend with known clinical fever patterns. Grow or shrink the highly interactive charts to control the amount of information shown.

    • It’s enabling: Connect and care for your network

    You can’t always be with your family, colleagues and friends but you can constantly care for them. Trace-TempAI app allows you to add multiple users and create groups to track and monitor their wellbeing as individuals or collectively. Be in the know about their fever patterns and health risks like COVID-19, Dengue, HFMD, Typhoid, Pneumonia, H1N1, etc..

    • It’s accessible: Monitor your health wherever you are

    Trace-TempAI is compatible across smartphones, tablets and computers so that you can stay connected and be on top of your health throughout the day. Receive timely updates on the phone when you are up and about; or on your computer when you are working at your desk.

    • It’s empowering: Take charge of your own health

    With personalized guidance and recommendations on next steps, as well as early fever detection warning system, Trace-TempAI app makes it easier for you to take care of your health proactively and seek medical attention before it is too late.

    3 Different Software Tiers to Suit Your Specific Needs

    Features of Trace-TempAI App

     

    Temperature Monitoring and Its Importance

     

     

    The forgotten vital sign

    Body temperature is one of the four vitals signs to monitor, along with blood pressure, heart rate and sugar level. However, it is often forgotten. People tend to only take their temperature when they are ill, which can be too late.

    "but not a lot of people in this world right now know what their normal body temperature is or how much it varies normally," said Dr. Waleed Javaid, the director of infection prevention and control at Mount Sinai Downtown in New York state (CNN).

    Why body temperature is important

    Our body temperature reveals a lot of information about our health, such as providing insights into hormonal health. Knowing our body temperature can also assist us with training and recovery decisions.

    Measuring body temperature is also very important in medicine. A number of diseases are characterized by a change in body temperature. For example, a persistent fever is a possible symptom for blood cancer. 

    With other illnesses, the course of the disease can be followed by measuring body temperature. This allows the doctor to analyze the effectiveness of treatments based on body temperatures.

    There are also diseases with known fever patterns, such as dengue and zika. By understanding our body temperature and being able to compare our abnormal temperature trends to those illnesses’, it can help us realize health issues before it’s too late.

    Temperature measurements vs Temperature trend

    In most cases, body temperature trends are more significant than individual measurements. Temperature curves with measured values taken in close sequence can best be compared by a doctor. These, together with other clinical observations, can help provide secure diagnoses.

    How Trace-Temp1 and Trace-TempAI App can help

    Temperature monitoring should be done consistently throughout the day so that accurate temperature trends can be formed. Trace-Temp1 is thus created to be accurate and portable while Trace-TempAI app is compatible across devices so that you can monitor your temperature on the go.

     

    Additional Links:

    • Discover T-SMART's perspective about the importance of fever detection during COVID-19.

    • Look forward and rethink the way we live post COVID-19.

    • Read what T-SMART founder realised during the COVID-19 pandemic.

    • Read Press Release 1 (as featured on over 40 media publication)

    ​

    • Read Press Release 2 (as featured on over 50 media publication).

    • Read Press Release 3.

    ​

     


    Shipping Details

    We believe that Trace-Temp1 is an essential for everyone to have and we are glad to be able to share this temperature monitoring device with the world. We currently ship to Australia, Canada, China, Europe (including Ireland), Hong Kong, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, New Zealand, Philippines, Republic of Korea (South Korea), Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, United States, United Kingdom, Vietnam. If your country is not listed here, please email us at inquiry@tsmartsystems.com and we will see what we can do. Depending on your country, in some instances you may be responsible for paying duty, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information.

    We are working closely with our manufacturing partner to ensure that every unit of Trace-Temp1 will be of high quality. In the unlikely event of a manufacturing defect, we will be more than happy to replace the unit. Please note, we cannot offer returns or refunds for any other reasons. In the event that you do have a defect or other concern about your order, please email us at inquiry@tsmartsystems.com!

    Some details:

    • All backers are protected with our 30-day performance guarantee + 1-year warranty

     

    FAST FACTS

    New to Indiegogo? Check out our guide and order your Trace-Temp1 now! 

    Contact inquiry@tsmartsystems.com if you need more help.

     

    Our Motivation

    Our motivation lies in showing that where fever detection technology works, temperature screening is the new normal. Many people are considering purchasing technologies that can detect elevated temperatures during this pandemic. While fever detection is not guaranteed to determine whether someone has a COVID-19 infection, temperature screening does have its benefits. Also, given the ongoing debate about temperature checks and the number of solutions on the market, people from all walks of life, such as business owners, school leaders, factory supervisors, and security guards, need to be familiar with the technology behind temperature monitoring.

     

    Who Are We?

    We are T-SMART, a forward-looking thermal measurement device company that provides two solutions to every thermal problem. Our focus is on providing both software and hardware solutions to thermal detection technology and ergonomics.

    We are more than just an opportunity company going after specific products. We are an enterprise company whose product was developed to address a societal situation and to improve the health and welfare of every human being. We are a technology company that has taken a mature technology in thermal detection and created new solutions for mankind’s benefits.

     

    Disclaimer: The handheld infrared device "Amanda Series 1" as mentioned in the videos/pictures has been renamed to "Trace-Temp1" as of 25 March 2021.

While fever detection is not guaranteed to determine whether someone has a COVID-19 infection, temperature screening does have its benefits. Also, given the ongoing debate about temperature checks and the number of solutions on the market, people from all walks of life, such as business owners, school leaders, factory supervisors, and security guards, need to be familiar with the technology behind temperature monitoring. Who Are We?We are T-SMART, a forward-looking thermal measurement device company that provides two solutions to every thermal problem. Our focus is on providing both software and hardware solutions to thermal detection technology and ergonomics.We are more than just an opportunity company going after specific products. We are an enterprise company whose product was developed to address a societal situation and to improve the health and welfare of every human being. We are a technology company that has taken a mature technology in thermal detection and created new solutions for mankind’s benefits. Disclaimer: The handheld infrared device "Amanda Series 1" as mentioned in the videos/pictures has been renamed to "Trace-Temp1" as of 25 March 2021.

story:
The SPOTU wearable device contains powerful technology and high-end mechanics uniquely specialized for indoor exercises.

We have two options available for you - The SPOTU Lite and SPOTU Pro. Here are the differences below...

 

Collect data anywhere, any time.

One of the most distinctive features of the SPOTU Pro is the vital signs monitoring system. Users can exercise smartly by keeping track of  their respiration, body temperature, and heart rate - all with one device.

1. Respiration monitoring

Consistent breathing is important for any workout from Crossfit to Yoga. Spotu monitors your breathing so that you can stay on track and even avoid injury from breathing imbalances.

2. Body temperature monitoring

Many studies have shown that athletic performance is closely related to body temperature. During exercise, the heating of your  body increases fatigue, which can affect your workout. Spotu tracks your body temperature so you can operate at peak performance.

3. Heart Rate Monitor

SPOTU uses an ECG-type heart rate sensor -  the most accurate sensor available, traditionally used for medical purposes. Keep track of your heart rate in real time so you make sure you’re reaching your goals and making your workout as efficient as possible. 

 

SPOTU Lite is designed to separate the head unit device from the band. So you can easily wash the band individually. It is also compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry.

The same motion and heart rate sensor with SPOTU Pro are applied to SPOTU Lite, and it is suitable for at-home fitness, bodyweight, and HIIT as well.

 

Press the button on the center of the device for 2-3 seconds to turn on the device. When it is on, there will be vibration feedback and the LED circle lamp will blink.
 
On your smartphone or tablet, enable the Bluetooth network, and run the SPOTU mobile application. Follow the instructions on the app to sign up or log in. Then connect it to the device after the device registration on the Profile tab.
 
Now, you can start your workout with SPOTU! While you exercise, SPOTU will monitor and record your workout data in real-time.
 

 

 

SPOTU is a wearable fitness device that has been developed and optimized for routine-based indoor exercises, such as gym workouts. It accurately monitors physical condition through the advanced wearable device and provides workout performance insights and solutions for more effective self-coaching, exercise ability improvement, and injury prevention based on a variety of data.

Existing smart devices such as smartwatches and fitness trackers rely heavily on GPS technology for tracking workout activities.

 

 

While these devices are designed for outdoor exercises such as running and cycling, they face many limitations when it comes to indoor exercises where posture and rep counting are more important.

They also normally use PPG optical sensors for heart rate measuring, which have accuracy problems during intense exercises such as weight training, high-intensity interval training, etc.

 

SPOTU analyzes the YouTube videos that are most popular in the at-home fitness category as well as the YouTube channels that you’ve already subscribed to and displays them in the app for easy reference. 

 SPOTU also extracts workout details from the videos and saves them into the database, so you can view those details in the SPOTU app without having to watch the videos themselves.

Easily search for workouts that you want to do using keywords, as well as get workout recommendations for your fitness level - all from the SPOTU app.

 

SPOTU offers Real-time Performance Monitoring and Augmented Video Recording features so you can coach yourself while you're working out. This means you can see where you need to improve and correct your form before it becomes a habit or you potentially hurt yourself.

While you're working out, you'll also see information on the video itself such as:

  • Movement names
  • Workout time
  • Reps
  • Total reps 
  • RPM (reps per minute) 
  • HR bpm
  • Body temperature

 

You can also check out the recorded videos for much more detailed indicators after your workout.

 

The straightforward user interface of SPOTU makes it easy and convenient to check motion speed, pace, and movement consistency so that you can have important training feedback even if you are not a fitness expert.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

During your workout, SPOTU allows you to check your heart rate level via an LED lamp on the device. The ECG type Heart Rate Sensor in the device maintains accurate HR measurement even during intense workouts.

 

Each color on your LED light represents a different heart rate level, so you know your current physical status immediately. That's important information that will help you adjust your pace for more effective athletic growth, as well as reducing the risk of injury.

 

 

SPOTU is the height of technology, wrapping comfortably around your chest and maximizing the accuracy of the biometric data by utilizing an ECG-type heart rate sensor, respiration sensor, and noise-minimized motion tracking technology. 

 

Also, the SPOTU Motion Judging Engine (an in-house developed core technology) identifies and distinguishes user movements and counts repetitions of movements accurately and in real-time.

 

Among the various types of data that SPOTU collects are linear acceleration and quaternion, both types of motion data that show patterns and features when specific movements are repeated. The SPOTU Motion Judging Engine uses a deep learning method, which makes for more accurate data and better overall performance.

Currently, SPOTU can recognize the composition and repetition counts of exercises like:

  • Jumping jacks
  • Burpees
  • High knees
  • Air squats 
  • Planks
  • Sit ups
  • Push-ups
  • And more...

The SPOTU team plans to include more than 100 exercise movements in the device from bodyweight exercises to weightlifting to gymnastics before the product is shipped.

On the SPOTU PRO spec basis, there are 4 types of sensors (ECG type heart rate, respiration, motion tracking, and temperature sensors) included in the device to collect biometric and motion data in real-time.

The respiratory measurement sensor has applied advanced smart textile technologies based on the nano carbon coating of the MCELL (US patent 16/081,875). Unlike other wrist strap type devices, SPOTU is a chest strap type device.

We chose the chest strap style because the chest is the most ideal part of human body to collect motion and biometric data.

CrossFit Mayhem Athlete Drop-In SPOTU

 

 

Exclusive Behind Scene with Carlos 

 

 

YouTuber's Review

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SPOTU devices and the mobile app are newly launched products by Spotu Technologies, Inc. - a fitness gear brand and company that was created by exercise experts, software engineers, and hardware engineers. Our team came together because we all had the same criticisms of existing fitness trackers and wanted to develop much more accurate and comfortable fitness gear.

We have put our heart and soul into this project for 3 years, and we are very pleased to introduce SPOTU to backers for the first time.

 

The SPOTU team has put a LOT of working into developing the hardware and software, in fact we have gone through 5 different prototypes and gone into 3 different stages of pre-production to ensure perfection. We are primed and ready to source parts and go into mass production as soon as the campaign is finished. 

 

The reason why we have taken 3 years to launch our campaign is that we wanted to launch our product when the mass production process was already ready. After the prototyping and pre-production stages, we secured the supply chains and means of delivery, so we are primed and ready to go into production and start deliveries within 5 months after the campaign ends. 

Our quality control and assurance, as well as the whole manufacturing process, will be done in South Korea to ensure our products will be delivered on-time all over the world.

 

Risks and challenges

SPOTU took extensive time to research and develop as it required various technologies coming together to make this work so well.

We faced many challenges along the way in the making of this product, but we are confident that we will be able to produce and deliver this product with super quality and top-notch performance exactly how we say. We make this promise to all our Indiegogo backers.

Even though we don't expect any delays, howveer if we do happen to have unexpected situations such as issues in procuring parts, we will inform our backers of them through prompt updates. With long-standing experience and know-how, we will make sure to provide the best products and accurately deliver them to you on time.

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ
